example_sentences.zh: 迄今为止，还没有什么起义的迹象。

meaning: adj. 现在的；最近的；流行的；流传的n. 趋势；电流；水流；涌流
zh_source: current 当前的，流通的来自PIE*kers, 跑，词源同car,course.
variation: 复数： currents

example_sentences.en: Current iron ore prices are attractive .
example_sentences.zh: 当前的铁矿石价格颇具吸引力。

example_sentences.en: The current electoral law is universally deplored .
example_sentences.zh: 现行的选举法广受非议。

meaning: n. 下层；洞穴；地下室；表层下基岩
vt. 把…归于，认为…是由于；认为…具有
zh_source: ascribe 认为前缀a-同ad-. 词根scribe, 写，见describe.
variation: 第三人称单数： ascribes过去式： ascribed过去分词： ascribed现在分词： ascribing

example_sentences.en: Don 't ascribe your failure to others .
example_sentences.zh: 不要把你的失败归咎于他人。

example_sentences.en: Some ascribe that late take-off to chance .
example_sentences.zh: 一些人将该发展归因于偶然。

meaning: n. 革命；彻底改变；旋转；运行，公转
zh_source: revolution 革命，大变革来自 revolve,旋转，-ute,过去分词格，-ion,名词后缀。引申词义革命，大变革。
variation: 复数： revolutions易混淆的单词： Revolution

example_sentences.en: Today there 's a revolution in brazil .
example_sentences.zh: 巴西正在经历着一场革命。

example_sentences.en: Soros 's radar for revolution is the second key to his investing style .
example_sentences.zh: 索罗斯对于大变革的敏锐嗅觉，是他投资风格的第二个关键点。

meaning: n. 台阶，阶地；阳台；柱廊，门廊；斜坡上房屋间的街巷vt. 把（如山坡或坡地）修成梯田；给（如房屋）建阳台
zh_source: terrace 排房，排屋，阶梯看台，梯田terr-,土地，陆地，-ace,名词后缀。原指在土地上所修建的平台或平整土地使成平台状，引申 诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： terraces第三人称单数： terraces过去式： terraced过去分词： terraced现在分词： terracing易混淆的单词： Terrace

example_sentences.en: It climaxes with dessert wine on the mansion 's rooftop terrace .
example_sentences.zh: 在大厦的顶层露台吃点心、品红酒将宴会推向高潮。

example_sentences.en: Vegetation is not always necessary while arranging your terrace or open yards .
example_sentences.zh: 在布置露台或是开阔的空间的时候，植物并不是必不可少的。

meaning: vi. 狂喜，欢跃
zh_source: exult 兴奋ex-, 向外。-sult, 跳，词源同salient, insult.
variation: 第三人称单数： exults过去式： exulted过去分词： exulted现在分词： exulting

example_sentences.en: Exult greatly , o daughter of zion ; shout , o daughter of jerusalem !
example_sentences.zh: 锡安的女子阿，应当大大欢腾；耶路撒冷的女子阿，应当欢呼！

example_sentences.en: And my reins exult when thy lips speak uprightly .
example_sentences.zh: 你的嘴唇说正直话的时候，我的内心就欢乐。

meaning: n. 深奥，深刻，深厚
zh_source: profundity 深邃，深远来自拉丁语profundus,深的，无底的，来自pro-,向前，朝向，fundus,底部，词源同fundamental,bottom.-ity,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: Similarly the islands of profundity are often lost in the glare from the seas of gossip .
example_sentences.zh: 同样地，深奥之岛经常会在刺眼的闲聊之海中迷失。

example_sentences.en: Vast stretches of oceans appeal to us much the rather because their profundity is difficult of access .
example_sentences.zh: 辽阔的海洋因其深奥难以理解才更引起我们的浓厚兴趣。

meaning: adj. 有效的；有法律效力的；正当的；健全的
zh_source: valid 有效的来自拉丁语valere, 强健的，勇敢的，词源同value，引申词义有效的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： VALID

example_sentences.en: Think of it as voting via statistically valid sample .
example_sentences.zh: 你可以把它看成统计学上的有效采样。

example_sentences.en: He doesn 't have a valid reason .
example_sentences.zh: 他没有给出任何正当的理由。

meaning: adj. （指字迹）草书的n. 草书
zh_source: cursive 草书的来自词根cur, 跑，词源同current, course.

example_sentences.en: He managed hieroglyphs , musical notation and the first cursive font , for mamie eisenhower , who had tired of writing out white house invitations .
example_sentences.zh: 泰特尔成功为艾森豪威尔夫人进行设计，用打字机打出象形文字、乐谱和草书体，因为她烦于手写白宫请柬。

example_sentences.en: In what became the machine 's signature advertising image , the little screen displayed not the apple logo , but the cursive word hello in all lowercase letters .
example_sentences.zh: 在后来成为这款机器标志性广告图像的地方，小小的屏幕上显示的不是苹果的logo，而是小写草书“你好”字样。

meaning: vt.& vi. 进一步加强，大大增加vi. 再加倍，翻两番
zh_source: redouble 加倍，加强re-,再，重新，double,加倍。
variation: 第三人称单数： redoubles过去式： redoubled过去分词： redoubled现在分词： redoubling

example_sentences.en: Haqqani involvement this time would redouble america 's fury with pakistan .
example_sentences.zh: 哈卡尼与巴基斯坦这次混乱牵连加倍了美国的愤怒。

example_sentences.en: Most of all , india must redouble its efforts to liberalise .
example_sentences.zh: 最重要的是，印度必须加倍努力放宽限制。

meaning: n. 黑种人，黑人adj. 黑人的
zh_source: Negro 黑人来自拉丁语niger,黑的，暗的，可能来自PIE*nekw,黑暗，夜晚，词源同night.
variation: 复数： Negroes易混淆的单词： NEGRO

example_sentences.en: The great majority of negro youth are city-born today .
example_sentences.zh: 今天绝大多数的黑人青年都生于城市。

example_sentences.en: He might have recovered from the scandal they say were he not a negro .
example_sentences.zh: 他们认为，如果伯克不是黑人，他可能早就从丑闻带来的伤害中恢复了。

meaning: adj. （指字迹）草书的n. 草书
zh_source: cursive 草书的来自词根cur, 跑，词源同current, course.

example_sentences.en: He managed hieroglyphs , musical notation and the first cursive font , for mamie eisenhower , who had tired of writing out white house invitations .
example_sentences.zh: 泰特尔成功为艾森豪威尔夫人进行设计，用打字机打出象形文字、乐谱和草书体，因为她烦于手写白宫请柬。

example_sentences.en: In what became the machine 's signature advertising image , the little screen displayed not the apple logo , but the cursive word hello in all lowercase letters .
example_sentences.zh: 在后来成为这款机器标志性广告图像的地方，小小的屏幕上显示的不是苹果的logo，而是小写草书“你好”字样。

meaning: adj. 可归于…的

example_sentences.en: His success is ascribable to his patience .
example_sentences.zh: 他的成功得力于他的耐心。

example_sentences.en: His success is ascribable simply to hard work .
example_sentences.zh: 他的成功就是由於勤奋。

meaning: vt. 促进，推进；提升，助长；促销；使（学生）升级vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子
zh_source: promote 促进，促销，提拔pro-,向前，-mot,移动，词源同motion,move.比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: What daily steps do you take to promote sustainability ?
example_sentences.zh: 9.你每天会采取哪些措施促进可持续发展？

example_sentences.en: Shama kabani spends much of her time teaching entrepreneurs and ceos to promote themselves on social media .
example_sentences.zh: 莎玛•卡巴尼的大部分时间都用在指导企业家和首席执行官们如何通过社交媒体进行自我宣传。

meaning: n. （尤指战斗中的）勇猛，英勇
zh_source: valor 英勇来自PIE*wal,强健的，勇敢的，词源同value,valiant.

example_sentences.en: As it 's been said : " discretion is the better part of valor . "
example_sentences.zh: 就好像人们常说：“谨慎也是英勇的一部分。”

example_sentences.en: In the sunshine , ultraviolet rays make my valor .
example_sentences.zh: 沐浴，我的勇气也因紫外线的射灼。

meaning: n. [医]结石，石，积石，牙垢；[数]运算，演算，微积分（学）
zh_source: calculus 微积分来自词根calc, 小石子。指古时用小石子计数，现指数学术语微积分。
variation: 复数： calculusescalculi

example_sentences.en: Newton and leibniz invented calculus about the same time .
example_sentences.zh: 牛顿和莱布尼兹几乎同时发明了微积分方法。

example_sentences.en: My most abjures class was advanced calculus mathematics .
example_sentences.zh: 最深奥难懂的课非微积分莫属。

meaning: vt. 在…周围划线；划定…范围；限制；限定
zh_source: circumscribe 限制circum-,圈，周围，-scribe,写，划，见describe,script.
variation: 第三人称单数： circumscribes过去式： circumscribed过去分词： circumscribed现在分词： circumscribing

example_sentences.en: Business leaders can no longer separate innovation from the laws that circumscribe it .
example_sentences.zh: 商业领袖已不能再把创新本身和对它进行限制的法律分开。

example_sentences.en: Authority and fear can circumscribe the argument , or congeal it , but can 't end it .
example_sentences.zh: 权威和恐惧能够限制，或者冻结争论，但无法予以终结。

meaning: adj. 粗略的，草率的，仓促的；肤皮潦草
zh_source: cursory 粗略的来自词根cur, 跑，词源同current, course.

example_sentences.en: Even a cursory glance at other fields reveals similar patterns .
example_sentences.zh: 即使粗略检视其他领域你也会发现类似的情况。

example_sentences.en: Knowing about that resource includes a cursory calculation of its quantity .
example_sentences.zh: 而了解一种能源也包括粗略的估计其储量。

meaning: n. 促进，增进；提升，升级；（商品等的）推广；发扬
zh_source: promotion 提拔，晋升来自promote,提拔。

example_sentences.en: But enterprise claims that its return on investment is still positive because of its internal promotion policy . "
example_sentences.zh: 但Enterprise认为，由于公司的内部晋升政策，它依然从培训中获得了积极的投资回报。

example_sentences.en: Best hire or promotion of 2012 : ginni rometty .
example_sentences.zh: 2012年最佳聘任或升迁：罗睿兰。

meaning: n. 效用，利益vt.& vi. 有益于，有益于；使对某人有利
zh_source: avail 有益，有用前缀a-同ad-, 去，往. 词根val, 力量，词源同value, valiant. 指有益的，有力量的。
variation: 复数： avails第三人称单数： avails过去式： availed过去分词： availed现在分词： availing易混淆的单词： AVAIL

example_sentences.en: The evangelicals protested this action without avail .
example_sentences.zh: 福音派没有利用这一抗议行动。

example_sentences.en: The app accompanied a parody video news report , and the onion tried to convice apple that it fitted the bill , to no avail .
example_sentences.zh: 这款应用程序伴随着一篇拙劣的视频新闻报道推出来，洋葱试图让苹果公司确信它是符合要求的，但无济于事。

meaning: n. 原则，原理；准则，道义；道德标准；本能
zh_source: principle 原则，准则，规范来自principal,主要的，最重要的，-le,工具格后缀。引申词义原则，准则，规范等。

meaning: adj. 无事实根据的；无基础的；未建立的；未确定的

example_sentences.en: Other scholars however describe the fears regarding confucius institutes as in their experiences unfounded .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，也有其他的学者通过切身的经历认为对孔子学院的担心是没有事实根据的。

example_sentences.en: Actually , many critics admit that their complaints are unfounded even as they lodge them .
example_sentences.zh: 实际上，许多批评人士甚至在一开始就承认，他们的抱怨没有事实根据。

meaning: n. 地形，地势；地面，地带；[地理]岩层；（知识的）领域范围
zh_source: terrain 地形，地势terra-,土地，陆地，-ain,名词后缀。引申词义地形，地势。
variation: 复数： terrains

example_sentences.en: Rough terrain and local bureaucracy are obstacles to drawing capital .
example_sentences.zh: 崎岖的地形和地方官僚主义作风，构成了吸引资金的障碍。

example_sentences.en: Metsamor lies on some of earth 's most earthquake-prone terrain .
example_sentences.zh: metsamor核电站位于地球上地震多发的地带。

meaning: n. 退休金，养老金；膳宿费；生活津贴；寄宿学校vt. 发给…养老金[退休金]；准予退休，强迫退休（并发给退休金）
zh_source: pension 养老金pension 廉价小旅店来自拉丁语pendere,悬挂，称量，支付，词源同pendulum,dependent,pound.-s,过去分词格。引申词义定期支付的钱，养老金。来自拉丁语pendere,悬挂，称量，支付，词源同pendulum,dependent,pound.-s,过去分词格。 引申词义定期支付的钱，后用于指寄宿学校，现用于指法国等国家的廉价小旅店。

example_sentences.en: Raimondo led the reform of rhode island 's all-but-bankrupt public employee pension system .
example_sentences.zh: 雷蒙多对罗德岛州几近破产的公务员养老金体系进行了改革。

example_sentences.en: Progress on the former has been extremely disappointing , with italy and france already retreating on pension reform .
example_sentences.zh: 随着意大利和法国放弃养老金制度改革，第一种路径方面的进展极为令人失望。

meaning: adj. 倔强对抗的，拒不服从的；拗强
zh_source: recalcitrant 难以控制的re-,向后，往回，-calc,脚跟，踢，词源同 calcaneus,decal,inculcate.引申词义难以控制的。

example_sentences.en: It is much harder for american shareholders , for example , to force out recalcitrant directors .
example_sentences.zh: 举例来说，要排除顽固的董事对美国的股东而言显得更困难。

example_sentences.en: Even the recalcitrant car-crash simulations , he thinks , will yield to the new approach soon .
example_sentences.zh: 他认为，即便是顽固的汽车碰撞模拟问题不久也会出现新的解决方法。

meaning: adj. 优先的；占先的；在…之前n. 小修道院院长，大修道院的副院长；（隐修院）会长；[史]行政长官；普赖尔adv. 在前；居先
zh_source: prior 先前的，优先的，小隐修院院长来自拉丁语prior,先前的，领先的，来自古拉丁语pri,在前，先于，来自PIE*per,向前，词源同ford,first.-or,比较级后缀。后用于小隐修院院长尊称。

meaning: n. （药的）一服，一剂
zh_source: potion 魔水，药水，一剂药来自拉丁语potionem,一服药，一口，魔水，来自potare,饮，喝，来自PIE*poi,饮，喝，词源同potable,imbibe.

example_sentences.en: Did you find the potion morgana took ?
example_sentences.zh: 你找到莫嘉娜服的药剂了吗?

example_sentences.en: She told the sea witch that she wanted the magic potion .
example_sentences.zh: 她向海巫婆说她想要这帖神奇药水。

meaning: vt. 侮辱，凌辱；辱骂；损害
zh_source: insult 侮辱，冒犯in-,进入，使，-sul,跳，词salient,salmon.即跳起来打，后用于指语言侮辱，侵犯，冒犯。
variation: 复数： insults第三人称单数： insults过去式： insulted过去分词： insulted现在分词： insulting

example_sentences.en: But civility has been sacrificed to the gratuitous insult .
example_sentences.zh: 然而礼貌却沦为无端侮辱的牺牲品。

example_sentences.en: Unsurprisingly scottish voters have woken up to the insult .
example_sentences.zh: 面对这种侮辱，难怪苏格兰选民会醒悟过来。

meaning: n. 优先，优先权；（时间，序上的）先，前；优先考虑的事；[数]优先次序
zh_source: priority 优先权来自prior,先前的，优先的，-ity,名词后缀。引申词义优先权。

example_sentences.en: Introduce a clear top-down stance that defines the priority of social initiatives .
example_sentences.zh: 1．引入清晰完整的社交立场，确定社交举措的优先级别。

example_sentences.en: Why should europe be a priority ?
example_sentences.zh: 凭什么应该优先考虑欧洲？

meaning: adj. 沉思的，深思的
zh_source: pensive 哀伤的，忧戚的来自拉丁语pendere,悬挂，称量，词源同pendulum,dependent,pound.-s,表反复。即反复称量的，反复衡量的，引申词义哀伤的，忧戚的。词义演变比较deliberate.

example_sentences.en: His external persona is calm , collected , pensive .
example_sentences.zh: 他的外表让人感觉是平静，镇定，沉思的。

example_sentences.en: The woman in this painting has a pensive smile .
example_sentences.zh: 画上的女人有一副若有所思地笑容。

meaning: n. （尤指集体）远足；短途旅行，游览；离题；[机]冲程
zh_source: excursion 远足ex-, 向外。-cur, 跑，词源同course, current.
variation: 复数： excursions

example_sentences.en: They want to make a walking excursion next week .
example_sentences.zh: 他们下星期要做一次徒步旅行。

example_sentences.en: Before you set out on your camping excursion , make sure to investigate whether the area you 're camping in is prone to flash flooding .
example_sentences.zh: 在你准备出门远足前，先确认下宿营的地方是否容易发生暴洪。

meaning: adj. 故意的；蓄意的；深思熟虑的；慎重的vt. 权衡vi. 熟虑；商讨
zh_source: deliberate 故意的de-, 向下，强调。-liber, 秤，称量，词源同Libra,equilibrium.引申义反复称量的，故意的。
variation: 第三人称单数： deliberates过去式： deliberated过去分词： deliberated现在分词： deliberating

example_sentences.en: Obfuscation and deliberate dissembling have complicated this fundamental debate .
example_sentences.zh: 混乱不清和蓄意掩饰增加了这场根本辩论的复杂性。

example_sentences.en: She would tearfully denounce his deliberate and thoughtless cruelty .
example_sentences.zh: 她常常含泪控诉本故意的嘲笑和残忍行为。

meaning: vt. 行贿，教唆[买通]…作伪证
zh_source: suborn 收买，买通sub-,在下，-orn,安排，装饰，词源同 order,adorn.即私下安排好的，引申词义收买，买通。
variation: 第三人称单数： suborns过去式： suborned过去分词： suborned现在分词： suborning

example_sentences.en: He was charged with conspiracy to suborn witnesses .
example_sentences.zh: 他被指控阴谋收买证人作伪证。

example_sentences.en: Lambasting officials in poor countries for their sticky fingers is easier ( and less open to legal challenge ) than investigating the outsiders who suborn them .
example_sentences.zh: 在贫穷的国家，猛烈抨击公职人员顺手牵羊的毛病要比调查收买了他们的外部人员容易（并且面临更少的法律挑战）。

meaning: n. <主英>（小）飞机场
zh_source: aerodrome 小型飞机跑道合成词。aeroplane, 飞机。词根drome, 跑，见hippodrome, 跑马场。
variation: 复数： aerodromes

example_sentences.en: The flights are set to leave from the warton aerodrome in lancashire , england .
example_sentences.zh: 该航班预定从英国兰开夏郡的沃顿机场起飞。

example_sentences.en: According to dictionary compilers , the word aerodrome is one of the words vanishing from use .
example_sentences.zh: 据词典编纂者称，单词aerodrome（飞机场）是从日常使用中消失的单词之一。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使旋转；反复考虑；使循环vi. 旋转；循环出现；反复考虑
zh_source: revolve 旋转，转动，环绕re-,向后，往回，再次，-volv,转动，词源同 devolve,evolve,involve.
variation: 第三人称单数： revolves过去式： revolved过去分词： revolved现在分词： revolving

example_sentences.en: A third roller held the ball in place against the encoders while letting it revolve freely .
example_sentences.zh: 第三个轮子将使球在自由旋转的同时和译码器保持固定。

example_sentences.en: Photosynthetic plants on other planets that revolve around different kinds of suns could be mostly gray or black . Cynthia graber reports .
example_sentences.zh: 在围绕着不同太阳旋转的星球上能进行光合作用的植物可能大多呈现出灰色或者黑色.辛西娅格拉贝报道.

meaning: adj. 离题的

example_sentences.en: The goverment has promised that they will carry out some measures effective to change the dirty and excursive situation of this area in one week .
example_sentences.zh: 政府已许诺采取有效措施在一周内改变这个地区脏乱的状况。

example_sentences.en: Organize language answering question around him examination questions , the space of free play is larger , but cannot take off excursive aim completely .
example_sentences.zh: 围绕试题自己组织语言答题，自由发挥的空间较大，但不能完全脱离题旨。

meaning: adj. 能复原的；弹回的，有弹性的；能立刻恢复精神的；社会渣滓
zh_source: resilient 有弹力的，有适应力的re-,向后，往回，-sil,弹，跳，词源同 salient,result.引申词义有弹力的，有适应力的。

example_sentences.en: Its economy was more resilient than most observers expected .
example_sentences.zh: 其经济则要比大多数观察人士所预期的更有弹性。

example_sentences.en: Resilient people usually make good decisions and choices .
example_sentences.zh: 适应性强的人通常做出正确的决定和选择。

meaning: v. 摆动
vt. 估价；估计；估量；评价，鉴定
zh_source: appraise 评估前缀ap-同ad-. -praise同price, 价格，即评估。
variation: 第三人称单数： appraises过去式： appraised过去分词： appraised现在分词： appraising

example_sentences.en: Maybe I can appraise property for a real estate company .
example_sentences.zh: 也许我可以为一家房地产公司做资产评估。

example_sentences.en: For public art , try to appraise the values of the intended demographic .
example_sentences.zh: 对于公共艺术来说，要尝试评估受众的价值。

meaning: n. [数]参数；<物><数>参量；限制因素；决定因素
zh_source: parameter 参数，规范para-,在旁，在周围，-meter,测量，规定，词源同meter,measure.引申词义参数，规范。

example_sentences.en: These strings are stored in a parameter named strings .
example_sentences.zh: 这些字符串会被存在一个名为strings的参数中。

example_sentences.en: This parameter is reserved and must be zero .
example_sentences.zh: 这个参数是预留的它必须为0.

meaning: n. 左轮手枪；旋转者，旋转式装置；[冶]转炉
zh_source: revolver 左轮手枪来自 revolve,旋转，转动。后用于指左轮手枪。
variation: 复数： revolvers易混淆的单词： Revolver

example_sentences.en: Shouldn 't the revolver bounce off his chest too ?
example_sentences.zh: 难道左轮手枪不应该同样从他的胸口弹开吗？

example_sentences.en: As with his revolver mechanism , colt 's innovative cable was adapted from an earlier design : a cable developed by telegraph inventor samuel f.b. morse ( 1791-1872 ) .
example_sentences.zh: 正如他的转轮手枪机制，柯尔特的创新电缆也是改良自早期的设计：一种由电报发明人塞缪尔f.b.莫尔斯（samuelf.b.morse）（1791-1872年）开发的电缆。

meaning: n. 倾向，习性，癖好，偏爱
zh_source: propensity 倾向，习性pro-,向前，-pens,悬挂，依靠，词源同depend,pension.引申词义倾向，习性。

example_sentences.en: But statement does not concern the average propensity to consume .
example_sentences.zh: 但结论和平均消费倾向并无太大关系。

example_sentences.en: Individuals , companies and some governments have continued their propensity to save .
example_sentences.zh: 个人、企业和一些国家的政府保持了储蓄的习惯。

meaning: n. 结果；（尤指足球比赛的）胜利；[体]比分；成功实现的事vi. 发生，产生；归结为，导致；后果，终结；由…而造成[产生]
zh_source: result 结果，后果re-,向后，往回，-sul,跳，词源同 salient,resilient.即跳回，引申词义结果，后果。
variation: 复数： results第三人称单数： results过去式： resulted过去分词： resulted现在分词： resulting

example_sentences.en: The result is not pretty .
example_sentences.zh: 结果不是很令人满意。

example_sentences.en: The result is pretty convincing .
example_sentences.zh: 结果非常有说服力。

meaning: adj. 陆地的；地球的；人间的；<天>类地行星的n. 地球人，陆地生物
zh_source: terrestrial 陆地的，陆栖的terra-,土地，陆地，-ster,名词后缀。引申词义陆地的，陆栖的。比较 celestial.
variation: 复数： terrestrials

example_sentences.en: Something similar happens when terrestrial ice melts .
example_sentences.zh: 类似的情况也发生在陆地的融冰过程中。

example_sentences.en: The worm is the deepest living multicellular terrestrial organism on earth .
example_sentences.zh: 这种蠕虫是地球上生活在最深处的多细胞陆地生物。

meaning: n. 考虑，深思熟虑；评议，审议；（言语、行动等的）从容；沉着，慎重
zh_source: deliberation 审慎de-, 向下，强调。-liber, 秤，称量，词源同Libra,equilibrium.即反复称量的，审慎。
variation: 复数： deliberations

example_sentences.en: An emotionally mature adult responds with thoughtful deliberation , not raw feeling .
example_sentences.zh: 一个情绪成熟的成人会以深思熟虑回应，而不是最初印象。

example_sentences.en: With a bit more deliberation and purpose , the best may be yet to come .
example_sentences.zh: 凭借多一点深思熟虑和决心，好景可能还在后头。

meaning: adj. 可预见的；可估计的；可察觉的；相当可观的

example_sentences.en: There will be an appreciable increase of our salaries .
example_sentences.zh: 我们的工资会有较为可观的增加。

example_sentences.en: In the longer run , a big reduction in us demand , still 20 per cent of the world 's total , might make an appreciable difference to prices .
example_sentences.zh: 长远来看，如果美国的石油需求大幅减少（目前仍占世界石油总需求量的20%），或许会对油价产生可观的影响。

meaning: adj. 离题的

example_sentences.en: The goverment has promised that they will carry out some measures effective to change the dirty and excursive situation of this area in one week .
example_sentences.zh: 政府已许诺采取有效措施在一周内改变这个地区脏乱的状况。

example_sentences.en: Organize language answering question around him examination questions , the space of free play is larger , but cannot take off excursive aim completely .
example_sentences.zh: 围绕试题自己组织语言答题，自由发挥的空间较大，但不能完全脱离题旨。

meaning: n. 乐观；乐观主义
zh_source: optimism 最优主义，乐观派来自optimum,最优，最佳，-ism,主义，思想。比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: With any luck , your optimism will be contagious .
example_sentences.zh: 运气好的话，你的乐观也会感染面试官。

example_sentences.en: In the modern era sweden offers grounds for optimism .
example_sentences.zh: 在现代，瑞典给乐观主义提供了温床。

meaning: vt. 招致，引起；遭受
zh_source: incur 招致，导致in-,进入，使，-cur,跑，词源同course,current.即跑进来，引申词义招致，导致。
variation: 第三人称单数： incurs过去式： incurred过去分词： incurred现在分词： incurring

example_sentences.en: It would incur a loss on its existing reserves but stem future losses .
example_sentences.zh: 这将招致其现有的储备的损失，但免于未来损失。

example_sentences.en: Since the manager 's compensation is tied to results , he 'll incur financial penalties .
example_sentences.zh: 由于经理的报酬和决策结果挂钩，他将会招致经济上的惩罚。

meaning: adj. 内心的，精神的，思想的，心理的；智慧的，智[脑]力的；〈口〉精神病的，意志薄弱的，愚笨的n. 精神病患者
zh_source: mental 精神的，心理的，思考的来自拉丁语mens,思想，思考，词源同man,mind.引申词义思考的，心理的，智力的。

example_sentences.en: Mental fitness is like physical fitness .
example_sentences.zh: 精神健康就像身体健康一样。

example_sentences.en: It was a simple mental prop .
example_sentences.zh: 它是一个简单的精神依托。

meaning: adj. 显著的，突出的；重要的，主要的；跳跃的；（指角）凸出的n. 凸角，[建]突出部；<军>进攻或防卫阵地的突出部分
zh_source: salient 最重要的，显著的来自拉丁语 salire,跳，跳起，来自 PIE*sel,跳，词源同 sally,result,resilient.即跳跃的，跳出来 的，引申词义显著的，最重要的。
variation: 复数： salients比较级： more salient最高级： most salient

example_sentences.en: Financial regulation and trade are the most salient cases .
example_sentences.zh: 金融监管和贸易是最突出的例子。

example_sentences.en: The scrutiny in british politics strikes many outsiders as its salient feature .
example_sentences.zh: 在英国政坛的审议工作以其显著的特点冲击着许多外地人。

meaning: n. （人体的）重要器官，要害，命脉；紧要器官

example_sentences.en: Okay . Check vitals . Where 's the pulse ?
example_sentences.zh: 好吧，检查器官，脉搏呢？

example_sentences.en: She kneed her attacker in the vitals and ran away .
example_sentences.zh: 她用膝盖撞那个袭击者的要害部位，然後跑掉了。

meaning: n. <数>周长；周围，边界
zh_source: perimeter 外缘，周长peri-,在周围，-meter,测量，词源同meter,diameter.引申词义外缘，周长。

example_sentences.en: The number of services to destinations outside the perimeter will increase by two-thirds .
example_sentences.zh: 周边以外的服务目的地数量将增加三分之二。

example_sentences.en: Senator john mccain of arizona introduced an unsuccessful bill to repeal the perimeter rule in 2009 .
example_sentences.zh: 亚利桑那州参议员约翰麦凯恩于2009年曾提出一项法案，试图废除周边规则，但未获成功。

meaning: n. 消融，切除；冲蚀；消蚀；磨削
zh_source: ablation 冰雪消融前缀ab-,离开。词根lat, 拿，带，见translate翻译。此处用于地质学。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Ablation

example_sentences.en: Radiofrequency ablation is often done on an outpatient basis .
example_sentences.zh: 射频消融术经常由门诊部完成。

example_sentences.en: This image shows the ablation zone where the glacier is primarily losing ice .
example_sentences.zh: 这张照片展示了主要因为失去冰雪而造成的消融的冰川地带。

meaning: vt.& vi. 欢迎，致敬vt. 向…致意；赞扬，赞颂vi. 致意，打招呼；行礼n. 致敬，欢迎；敬礼；举枪，举刀（礼）
zh_source: salute 致意，致敬，敬礼来自拉丁语 salutare,致意，打招呼，表达尊重或尊敬，来自 salutis,健康的，有益处的，来自
variation: 复数： salutes第三人称单数： salutes过去式： saluted过去分词： saluted现在分词： saluting

example_sentences.en: But distrustful , angry britain should salute him .
example_sentences.zh: 不能相信地，愤怒地英国人应向他致敬。

example_sentences.en: It salivated its salute to physiology .
example_sentences.zh: 还流下了口水是在向生理学致敬。

meaning: n. 不法行为；少年罪犯；过失； 罪过
zh_source: delinquency （常指青少年的）违法，犯罪行为来自delinquent, 不良青少年。
variation: 复数： delinquencies

example_sentences.en: He is an expert in juvenile delinquency .
example_sentences.zh: 他是研究青少年犯罪的专家。

example_sentences.en: Application of punishment to juvenile delinquency .
example_sentences.zh: 论对未成年人犯罪的刑罚适用。

meaning: adj. 无礼的；莽撞的；不切题的；不中肯的
zh_source: impertinent 不相关的，不切题的，粗鲁的，无礼的im-,不，非，pertinent,相关的。即不相关的，引申词义扯远的，过度的，粗鲁的，无礼的。

example_sentences.en: America is not the only giant to suffer from an impertinent ratings agency .
example_sentences.zh: 美国不是唯一受到无礼降级的超级大国。

example_sentences.en: The young grow restless and impertinent .
example_sentences.zh: 年轻人们越来越不耐烦、不守规矩。

meaning: adj. 中央的，中间的

example_sentences.en: The mesial prefrontal cortex is thought to be important to social and other behavior and emotions .
example_sentences.zh: 前额叶皮质区的中部被认为对于社会，其他习惯和情绪十分重要。

example_sentences.en: Specifically , they found autistic children had 79 percent more neurons in the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex and 29 percent more in the mesial prefrontal cortex than other kids .
example_sentences.zh: 特别是，他们发现自闭症孩子的后侧和中部前额叶皮质区的神经细胞比正常孩子多了79%和29%。

meaning: n 肠系膜
vt. 保持；保养；坚持；固执己见
zh_source: maintain 维持，保持，保养来自古法语maintenir,保持，维持，来自拉丁语manu tenere,握在手上，控制，来自manu,手，词源同manual,tenere,握住，词源同tenure,contain.引申多种词义。

example_sentences.en: Such achievers must maintain that drive . "
example_sentences.zh: 这些成功人士必定保持了那种进取精神。

example_sentences.en: We both want to maintain the relationship , so we make adjustments . "
example_sentences.zh: 我们都希望保持联系，因此我们双方都做了调整。”

meaning: n. 维生素；维他命na. “vitamine“的变体
zh_source: vitamin 维他命，生命素最早写做vitamine,来自vit-,生命，-amine,氨。后证实这种物质不属于氨基，因此字母e脱落。
variation: 复数： vitamins易混淆的单词： Vitamin

example_sentences.en: The news on vitamin e has been more mixed .
example_sentences.zh: 关于维生素e的新闻则复杂的多。

example_sentences.en: Fresh rocket leaves contain good levels of vitamin c .
example_sentences.zh: 新鲜的芝麻菜叶也含有很多的维他命c。

meaning: n. 维持，保持；保养，保管；维护；维修
zh_source: maintenance 维持，保持来自maintain的名词形式。

example_sentences.en: The company makes 75 % of its revenues on swimming-pool maintenance and repair . "
example_sentences.zh: 它75%的收入来自游泳池维护和维修。

example_sentences.en: Aside from the costs of installation and maintenance , wang notes that bandwidth in china is extremely expensive .
example_sentences.zh: 除去安装和维护的成本，王也注意到中国的宽带成本也相当高昂。

meaning: adj. 活泼的，快活的adv. 快活地，活泼地
zh_source: vivacious 活泼的viv-,生命，活力，词源同vital,vivid.

example_sentences.en: The vivacious king lived happily in his palace .
example_sentences.zh: 这个活泼的国王在王宫里过著快乐的生活。

example_sentences.en: She is vivacious , beautiful and intelligent , and yet she dates you ; ergo you have hidden assets .
example_sentences.zh: 她活泼、漂亮、聪明，而她与你约会，这说明你具有不外露的优点。

meaning: vt. 使免除，豁免adj. 被免除的，被豁免的n. 被免除（义务，责任）的人；免税人
zh_source: exempt 免除ex-, 向外。-em, 拿出，带出，词源同example, sample. 即拿出来的，免除或豁免。
variation: 第三人称单数： exempts过去式： exempted过去分词： exempted现在分词： exempting

example_sentences.en: Retail products such as mortgages will also be exempt .
example_sentences.zh: 零售型商品例如抵押贷款也属于被豁免的。

example_sentences.en: If beijing wants to exempt them , it probably can .
example_sentences.zh: 如果政府想豁免它们，也许就能做到。

meaning: adj. 不尽责的，怠工的；有过失的；拖欠债务的n. 流氓；少年罪犯；失职者
zh_source: delinquent 不良青少年de-, 向下，离开。-linqu, 留下，遗弃，词源同leave, relinquish. 即被遗弃的人，缺乏管教的人，后主要指少年犯，不良青少年。
variation: 复数： delinquents

example_sentences.en: There is even a fledgling market in bonds explicitly backed by delinquent mortgages .
example_sentences.zh: 甚至公开以拖欠的按揭房屋支持的债券市场已经初具雏形。

example_sentences.en: Both lenders and the overall economy would be better off if more delinquent mortgages were restructured rather than foreclosed .
example_sentences.zh: 如果有更多的拖欠的抵押贷款的人进行重组而不是被取消抵押贷款权，借贷人和总体经济这两者将会变得更好。

meaning: vt. 感激；欣赏；领会；鉴别vi. （使）增值，涨价
zh_source: appreciate 升值，感激前缀ap-同ad-. 词根prec, 价格，见price. 指给出一个合理的价格，给出一个好价格。
variation: 第三人称单数： appreciates过去式： appreciated过去分词： appreciated现在分词： appreciating

example_sentences.en: Do you appreciate the value of routine ?
example_sentences.zh: 你欣赏常规流程的价值吗？

example_sentences.en: Elsewhere the risk is that currencies continue to appreciate .
example_sentences.zh: 其它地区面临的风险是货币持续升值。

meaning: vt. 获得，得到；流行；买到，达到（目的）vi. 通行，通用；流行；存在
zh_source: obtain 得到，获得ob-,向前，朝向，-tain,伸，抓，词源同contain,tenure.引申词义得到，获得。
variation: 第三人称单数： obtains过去式： obtained过去分词： obtained现在分词： obtaining

example_sentences.en: Efforts to obtain chinese government comment were unsuccessful .
example_sentences.zh: 记者未能获得中国政府对此事的评论。

example_sentences.en: It takes six months to obtain a one-year licence .
example_sentences.zh: 获取一年的营业执照要花六个月时间。

meaning: n. （招亡魂问卜的）巫术；通灵术；魔术；妖术
zh_source: necromancy 通灵者necro-,死人，-mancy,占卜，预言。即用死人占卜的人，通灵的人。

example_sentences.en: I know some necromancy spells and rituals .
example_sentences.zh: 我知道一些巫术咒语和仪式。

example_sentences.en: I seat with three book about necromancy and start to read .
example_sentences.zh: 我与三个有关巫术的书，开始阅读座位。

meaning: adj. 领土的；区域的；土地的；地方的n. 地方自卫队士兵
zh_source: territorial 领土的来自 territory,领土，领地。
variation: 复数： territorials

example_sentences.en: It is not about territorial or resource nationalism either .
example_sentences.zh: 这不是领土或者资源上的民族主义问题。

example_sentences.en: Censors block publications with maps that show the actual line of control in kashmir , not india 's territorial claim .
example_sentences.zh: 审查人员屏蔽的是带有地图的kashmir真实有效领土的出版物，而不是印度所宣称的领土。

meaning: adj. 生动的；（记忆、描述等）清晰的；（人的想像）丰富的；（光、颜色等）鲜艳的，耀眼的
zh_source: vivid 生动的来自拉丁语vivus,活的，有生命的，来自PIE*gweie,存活，词源同biology,vital,zoo.
variation: 比较级： more vivid最高级： most vivid易混淆的单词： VIVIDVivid

example_sentences.en: My most vivid recollection of that summer is the ocean .
example_sentences.zh: 我对那个夏天的最生动的记忆就是海洋。

example_sentences.en: His poems are good , very vivid and emotional .
example_sentences.zh: 他的诗写得不错，栩栩如生且情感丰富。

meaning: n. 侵犯；侵入；（河水等）流入；袭击
zh_source: incursion 入侵in-,进入，使，-curs,跑，词源同course,cursive.
variation: 复数： incursions

example_sentences.en: Pakistanis say another incursion this week was repulsed , though both armies deny it .
example_sentences.zh: 巴基斯坦人称，他们在本周击退了另一起入侵，不过两国军方都否定了这种说法。

example_sentences.en: In homs people are braced for another military incursion after opposition activists reported tanks amassing around the city .
example_sentences.zh: 在霍姆斯，反对派活动人士报称坦克在该城附近集结，人们即将要承受另一波军队入侵。

meaning: n. 七角形，七边形
zh_source: heptagon 七边形来自希腊语hepta,七，词源同seven,-gon,边，角，词源同knee,hexagon.

meaning: n. （义务等的）免除；免（税）；（收入中的）免税额
variation: 复数： exemptions

example_sentences.en: It makes no exemption for technology transfers .
example_sentences.zh: 外国技术转移也未能在这项议案中豁免。

example_sentences.en: To start , congress should end the terrestrial performance royalty exemption .
example_sentences.zh: 首先，国会应该终止豁免无线广播的版税交付。

zh_source: speedometer 速度计speed-,速度，-meter,仪器。 speed-read 快速阅读

example_sentences.en: The speedometer on my scooter is broken .
example_sentences.zh: 我摩托车的速度表坏了。

example_sentences.en: My car doesn 't have a speedometer .
example_sentences.zh: 我车上没有时速表。

meaning: n. 侵犯；侵入；（河水等）流入；袭击
zh_source: incursion 入侵in-,进入，使，-curs,跑，词源同course,cursive.
variation: 复数： incursions

example_sentences.en: Pakistanis say another incursion this week was repulsed , though both armies deny it .
example_sentences.zh: 巴基斯坦人称，他们在本周击退了另一起入侵，不过两国军方都否定了这种说法。

example_sentences.en: In homs people are braced for another military incursion after opposition activists reported tanks amassing around the city .
example_sentences.zh: 在霍姆斯，反对派活动人士报称坦克在该城附近集结，人们即将要承受另一波军队入侵。

meaning: adj. 可用的；有空的；可会见的；（戏票、车票等）有效的
zh_source: available 可获得的，有空的avail,有益，有用，-able,形容词后缀。引申词义可获得的，有空的等。

example_sentences.en: Both 32-bit and 64-bit versions will be available .
example_sentences.zh: 32位和64位版本都可用。

example_sentences.en: Is your video only available in some locales ?
example_sentences.zh: 你的视频只在某些地区可用？

meaning: adj. 感激的；有欣赏力的；表示赞赏的

example_sentences.en: She won 't be appreciative of his efforts .
example_sentences.zh: 她不会感激他所作的努力。

example_sentences.en: I told how appreciative I was of here thoughtfulness .
example_sentences.zh: 我告诉如何欣赏，我这里体贴。

meaning: vi. 关于，有关；适合；附属，从属
zh_source: pertain 与相关，从属per-,完全的，-tain,抓住，握住，词源同contain,continent.引申词义相关。

example_sentences.en: Tellingly , the top five all pertain to how we love and relate to others .
example_sentences.zh: 值得注意的是，前五项都关于如何爱别人，以及与他人的互动。

example_sentences.en: How this might pertain to choices that people might make is , as yet , unclear .
example_sentences.zh: 这些方式怎样附属于人们可能做出的选择至今仍未明了。

meaning: vt. 征召入伍，强行征召
variation: 第三人称单数： conscribes过去式： conscribed过去分词： conscribed现在分词： conscribing

meaning: n. 领土，版图；领地；领域，范围；[商]势力范围
zh_source: territory 领土，领地terra-,土地，陆地，-ory,表地后缀。原指领主管辖区域，引申词义领土，领地。
variation: 复数： territories易混淆的单词： Territory

example_sentences.en: This is new territory for the european project .
example_sentences.zh: 对欧洲计划来说这是个新领域。

example_sentences.en: Previous empires have gained power and wealth by conquering territory .
example_sentences.zh: 以往的帝国一直通过征服领地来获取权力和财富。

meaning: n. 六边形，六角形
zh_source: hexagon 六边形hexa-,六，-gon,边，角，词源同knee,heptagon.
variation: 复数： hexagons

example_sentences.en: Saturn has a hexagon , it 's some kind of a wave , but it 's a permanent wave .
example_sentences.zh: 土星有一个六边形，它是一种波，但这是一个永久的波。

example_sentences.en: Click on a hexagon to place a new monster there .
example_sentences.zh: 点击一个六边形摆出新的怪物。

meaning: adj. 断然的；不容置辩的；傲慢的；专横的
zh_source: peremptory 强硬的，专横的per-,整个的，-empt,拿，带，词源同exempt.assumptive.即整个的拿走，引申词义强硬的，专横的。

example_sentences.en: Peremptory silence no longer works .
example_sentences.zh: 无法再强制人们保持沉默了。

example_sentences.en: He was neither overly worried nor briskly peremptory .
example_sentences.zh: 他既不是过分地忧心，也不是盛气凛凛地专横。

meaning: n. 对称；对称美；整齐，匀称
zh_source: symmetry 对称sym-,一起，一致，-metry,测量，词源同 meter,optometry.引申词义对称。
variation: 复数： symmetries

example_sentences.en: The most important feature of such a tax is symmetry .
example_sentences.zh: 该税最重要的特点在于其对称性。

example_sentences.en: Various symmetry arguments prove that many of these grids are equivalent .
example_sentences.zh: 通过各种对称性可以证明网格中有许多都是等价的。

meaning: vt. 阻止，制止；使不敢；使踌躇vi. 阻止，威慑
zh_source: deter 震慑de-, 向下，强调。-ter, 恐惧，词源同terrible,terrorist. 即使恐惧，威慑，震慑。
variation: 第三人称单数： deters过去式： deterred过去分词： deterred现在分词： deterring

example_sentences.en: To deter bad behaviour fines need to rise .
example_sentences.zh: 要阻止这种不良行为就应该提高罚款。

example_sentences.en: But prison does not seem to deter attackers .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，判刑似乎并不能阻止袭击事件的发生。

meaning: n. 交流，交往，交际；[生]交合
zh_source: intercourse 交际，性交inter-,在内，在中间，相互，course,跑动，跑道。即跑到一起，引申词义交际，性交。
variation: 复数： intercourses

example_sentences.en: It made commerce and travel possible , allowing intercourse between separate ethnic and religious groups .
example_sentences.zh: 这种安宁有助于商业和旅行活动以及不同种族和宗教之间的交流。

example_sentences.en: He did not allow the difference between our ages to be any bar to my free intellectual and sentimental intercourse with him .
example_sentences.zh: 他不愿意叫我们之间的年岁上的差异阻碍我智力和感情与他自由交流。

meaning: n. 温度计；体温表
zh_source: thermometer 温度计therm-,热，热量，-meter,仪器。
variation: 复数： thermometers

example_sentences.en: Also make sure your thermometer is functioning properly .
example_sentences.zh: 还有就是确保温度计可以正常使用。

example_sentences.en: Use a light-colored stainless steel or enamel saucepan and a candy thermometer .
example_sentences.zh: 使用浅颜色的不锈钢或搪瓷锅和一支用来煮糖果的温度计。

meaning: v. （使）贬值

example_sentences.en: By this we can ruin their credit , and make their currency devaluate and inflate .
example_sentences.zh: 这样我们就有十足的把握来摧毁他们的信用，使他们的货币贬值，发生通货膨胀。

example_sentences.en: The seller in accordance with the buyer 's claim shall be responsible for the immediate elimination of the defects complete or partial replacement of the commodity or devaluate the commodity according to the state of defects .
example_sentences.zh: 按买方索赔要求，卖方有责任立即排除货物缺陷，全部或部分更换货物，或根据缺陷情况作降价处理。

meaning: adj. 有关的，相干的；恰当的，中肯的；关于…的；切题的
zh_source: pertinent 相关的来自pertain,与相关，从属，-ent,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: The second reason is more pertinent for england .
example_sentences.zh: 第二个原因对英国来说就更加中肯一些了。

example_sentences.en: With hindsight his warnings about the need to reassure the bond markets appeared pertinent .
example_sentences.zh: 事后看来，默文金警告必须安抚债券市场的言论显得十分中肯。

meaning: n. 制止

example_sentences.en: Stay motivated , be determent and mostly persevere .
example_sentences.zh: 留动机的，予以遏制，而且大部分持之以恒。

example_sentences.en: For too long children with special needs were completely isolated from other children , often to their determent .
example_sentences.zh: 有特殊需求的儿童与其他儿童完全隔离已经太久了,这对他们通常是妨碍。

meaning: vi. 贬值，跌价；轻视vt. <正>贬低，轻视；使贬值
zh_source: depreciate 贬值de-, 向下。-prec, 价格，价值，词源同price. 即贬值。
variation: 第三人称单数： depreciates过去式： depreciated过去分词： depreciated现在分词： depreciating

example_sentences.en: Any new currency would depreciate and inflation would soar .
example_sentences.zh: 新发行的任何本币都会贬值，通胀将会飙升。

example_sentences.en: This alienation leads us to value things in an excessive way and then to depreciate ourselves and , by extension , do deny the humanity of our peers .
example_sentences.zh: 这种倾向导致我们用过分的手段去衡量事物的价值，然后贬低自己的价值，自然而然的，令我们否认了同类中人性的价值。

meaning: n. 交流，交往，交际；[生]交合
zh_source: intercourse 交际，性交inter-,在内，在中间，相互，course,跑动，跑道。即跑到一起，引申词义交际，性交。
variation: 复数： intercourses

example_sentences.en: It made commerce and travel possible , allowing intercourse between separate ethnic and religious groups .
example_sentences.zh: 这种安宁有助于商业和旅行活动以及不同种族和宗教之间的交流。

example_sentences.en: He did not allow the difference between our ages to be any bar to my free intellectual and sentimental intercourse with him .
example_sentences.zh: 他不愿意叫我们之间的年岁上的差异阻碍我智力和感情与他自由交流。

meaning: vt. 描写，形容；叙述；描绘，作图；（行星等）周转
zh_source: describe 描述de-, 向下。-scribe, 写，词源同scribe, conscript.
variation: 第三人称单数： describes过去式： described过去分词： described现在分词： describing

example_sentences.en: And given three minutes to describe themselves .
example_sentences.zh: 他们用三分钟描述来自己。

example_sentences.en: Ask your friends for a few words to describe you .
example_sentences.zh: 让你的朋友用一些词来形容你。

meaning: [地名] [美国] 五角大楼〈弗吉尼亚州〉
zh_source: pentagon 五边形，五角形penta-,五，-gon,边，角，词源同knee,heptagon.

example_sentences.en: We overheard someone say that the pentagon was attacked .
example_sentences.zh: 我们听到有人在说，五角大楼遭到了袭击。

example_sentences.en: The pentagon is now investigating the incident .
example_sentences.zh: 五角大楼正在对这个事故展开调查。

meaning: adj. 相等的，相当的，等效的；等价的，等积的；[化学]当量的n. 对等物；[化学]当量
zh_source: equivalent 等价的来自equal, 平等的。-val, 价值，见value.
variation: 复数： equivalents

example_sentences.en: That doesn 't mean the two systems are equivalent .
example_sentences.zh: 这并不意味着两种体系是等同的。

example_sentences.en: That is the equivalent of around half the current-account deficit .
example_sentences.zh: 这个数字等同于美国经常账户赤字的一半。

meaning: vi. 发生；出现；闪现
zh_source: occur 发生，出现oc-,相对，对着的，-cur,跑，词源同current,course.即跑到一起的，引申词义遇到，出现，发生。
variation: 第三人称单数： occurs过去式： occurred过去分词： occurred现在分词： occurring

example_sentences.en: Might such an internal adjustment even occur naturally ?
example_sentences.zh: 这样的内部调整会自然而然地发生吗？

example_sentences.en: That is because that pain will occur anyway .
example_sentences.zh: 这是因为痛苦无论如何都会出现。

meaning: adj. 喋喋不休的；爱说话的；（指说话）快的；口若悬河的
zh_source: voluble 滔滔不绝的来自拉丁语volvere,旋转，来自PIE*wel,转，来自PIE*wei的扩大格，词源同wind,volume。引申词义滔滔不绝的。

example_sentences.en: A small voluble figure , he preferred the spoken to the written word , and he took to television as a duck to water .
example_sentences.zh: 这位身材矮小的健谈者，更喜欢说而不喜欢写，面对电视仿佛如鱼得水。

example_sentences.en: Mr. li , 48 , is the voluble son of former farmers who has built one of china 's biggest privately owned car makers on the back of a tiny rural photo studio he started after finishing high school .
example_sentences.zh: 李书福今年48岁，非常健谈，出身于农民家庭，高中毕业后，从经营一家极小的农村照相馆开始，逐步建立起了中国最大的一个民营汽车制造企业。

meaning: vt. 核对，校对（书、底稿等）；（装钉）整理，检查；[宗]委任牧师职
zh_source: collate 核对col-, 强调。-lat, 带来，词源同relate, translate.
variation: 第三人称单数： collates过去式： collated过去分词： collated现在分词： collating

example_sentences.en: Collate what other people say about ......
example_sentences.zh: 整理其他人说的关于某一话题的言论……

example_sentences.en: The book draws on menzie 's navigational experience , as well as the findings of a team of experts he assembled to collate and decipher an ever-growing body of multilingual , cartographic , and biological evidence .
example_sentences.zh: 这本书的写作基于曼兹的航海经验和他收集的一些专家理论，他经由校对整理破译了越来越多的多语言的，生物，绘图证据。

meaning: vi. 发生；出现；闪现
zh_source: occur 发生，出现oc-,相对，对着的，-cur,跑，词源同current,course.即跑到一起的，引申词义遇到，出现，发生。
variation: 第三人称单数： occurs过去式： occurred过去分词： occurred现在分词： occurring

example_sentences.en: Might such an internal adjustment even occur naturally ?
example_sentences.zh: 这样的内部调整会自然而然地发生吗？

example_sentences.en: That is because that pain will occur anyway .
example_sentences.zh: 这是因为痛苦无论如何都会出现。

meaning: n. 前辈，前驱，先锋，前任；预兆，先兆，初期形式；[核]前驱波，初级粒子；预报器
zh_source: precursor 先驱，先锋pre-,在前，-curs,跑，词源同course,cursor.

example_sentences.en: Improving sentiment is a precursor of recovering mutual fund demand .
example_sentences.zh: 投资者信心的恢复是共同基金需求恢复的前兆。

example_sentences.en: Rising public debt is a near universal precursor of other postwar crises .
example_sentences.zh: 公共债务上升是战后危机中一个几乎普遍的前兆。

meaning: vt. 说明；表明；给…加插图；（用示例、图画等）说明vi. 举例说明
zh_source: illustrate 解释，阐明il-,进入，使，luster,发光，光泽。引申词义解释，阐明。
variation: 第三人称单数： illustrates过去式： illustrated过去分词： illustrated现在分词： illustrating

example_sentences.en: Protectionist tariffs and farm subsidies illustrate the same problem .
example_sentences.zh: 贸易保护关税和对农场的补助也说明了同样的问题。

example_sentences.en: Let me quickly illustrate some of the links between food and water .
example_sentences.zh: 让我来迅速地阐明食物跟水之间的一些关联。

meaning: n. 核对，小吃

example_sentences.en: But an indexed view definition cannot contain the collation clause .
example_sentences.zh: 但是索引视图定义不能包含该排序规则子句。

example_sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a collation of data .
example_sentences.zh: 拖到绘图页后，可以添加数据整理。

meaning: vt. 使具有生气，使生动
variation: 第三人称单数： vivifies过去式： vivified过去分词： vivified现在分词： vivifying

example_sentences.en: A smile may vivify a face .
example_sentences.zh: 微笑使脸变得有活力。

example_sentences.en: China should actively meet the challenge of globalization and vivify the traditional oriental culture .
example_sentences.zh: 面对全球化的挑战，中国文化应当积极应对，让古老的东方文明重现生机。

meaning: n. 前辈，前驱，先锋，前任；预兆，先兆，初期形式；[核]前驱波，初级粒子；预报器
zh_source: precursor 先驱，先锋pre-,在前，-curs,跑，词源同course,cursor.

example_sentences.en: Improving sentiment is a precursor of recovering mutual fund demand .
example_sentences.zh: 投资者信心的恢复是共同基金需求恢复的前兆。

example_sentences.en: Rising public debt is a near universal precursor of other postwar crises .
example_sentences.zh: 公共债务上升是战后危机中一个几乎普遍的前兆。

meaning: n. 三角形，三角琴，（占星术12宫中隔120度的）三宫之一组

example_sentences.en: You , o king , have made a decree that every man who hears the sound of the horn , flute , lyre , trigon , psaltery , bagpipe , and all kinds of music shall fall down and worship the golden image .
example_sentences.zh: 王阿，你曾降旨说，凡听见角、笛、七弦琴、三角琴、瑟、风笛、和各样乐器声音的人，都当俯伏敬拜金像。

example_sentences.en: At the time that you hear the sound of the horn , flute , lyre , trigon , psaltery , bagpipe , and all kinds of music , you shall fall down and worship the golden image that nebuchadnezzar the king has set up .
example_sentences.zh: 你们一听见角、笛、七弦琴、三角琴、瑟、风笛、和各样乐器的声音，就当俯伏敬拜尼布甲尼撒王所立的金像。

meaning: n. （资产等）折旧；货币贬值；贬低；蹂躏

example_sentences.en: A big real depreciation is required .
example_sentences.zh: 希腊货币需要大幅度的实际贬值。

example_sentences.en: International resources are better used to mitigate the collateral damage of depreciation .
example_sentences.zh: 国际资源最好是用在减轻贬值带来的间接危害上。

meaning: vt. 先占；取代；先取；先发制人

example_sentences.en: Planning ahead will help you preempt a task that comes seasonally .
example_sentences.zh: 提前计划可以帮助你预先规划好周期性的任务。

example_sentences.en: They do not preempt the land surface that is useful for other purposes .
example_sentences.zh: 它们不预先占用对其它目的有用的地面。

meaning: adj. （指树木）每年落叶的
zh_source: deciduous 落叶的de-, 向下。-cid, 掉落，词源同case, accident. 即掉落的。

example_sentences.en: Deciduous perennial herbs of south africa .
example_sentences.zh: 南非多年生每年落叶的多年生草本植物的一个属。

example_sentences.en: The marula is a deciduous tree native to southern and eastern africa .
example_sentences.zh: 阿玛诺拉是一种产于非洲南部及东部地区的落叶树。

meaning: adj. 著名的；杰出的，卓越的；辉煌的；显赫
zh_source: illustrious 著名的il-,进入，使，luster,发光，光泽。即发光的，引申词义著名的。

example_sentences.en: Dr leakey is a member of an illustrious palaeontological clan .
example_sentences.zh: 利基博士是一个杰出的古生物学家族的成员之一。

example_sentences.en: Photo.net has a great interview with menzel where menzel talks about his illustrious career .
example_sentences.zh: photo.net有一篇关于门泽尔的绝佳采访，在这次采访中门泽尔谈论了他辉煌的职业生涯。

meaning: n. 描述；形容；种类；类型
variation: 复数： descriptions

example_sentences.en: And show the data themselves rather than a description .
example_sentences.zh: 给他们看的是数据而不是描述。

example_sentences.en: It is a description of a spring scene .
example_sentences.zh: 它描绘了一幅春天的景象。

meaning: vt. 取得，获得；实现，完成；导致vi. 取得；介绍娼妓，拉皮条
zh_source: procure 费力取得，获得来自拉丁语procurare,关心，照看，管理，看护，来自pro-,向前，代表，-cur,关切，照看，词源同cure,pedicure.引申词义得到，获得，特指费尽心力取得。

example_sentences.en: Staff members attach themselves to effective people , and the capacity to procure resources is good evidence of that ability .
example_sentences.zh: 下属总是愿意追随有效工作的领导，而获取资源的能力就是很好的证明。

example_sentences.en: It is unclear how the stores procure the apple merchandise .
example_sentences.zh: 目前还不清楚这些商店是如何获得苹果的商品。

meaning: vt. 评价；求…的值（或数）；对…评价；[数学、逻辑学]求…的数值vi. 评价，估价
zh_source: evaluate 估价e-, 向外。-val, 力量，价值，词源同value, valiant.
variation: 第三人称单数： evaluates过去式： evaluated过去分词： evaluated现在分词： evaluating

example_sentences.en: Insurers must also evaluate risk across their whole group .
example_sentences.zh: 保险公司必须评估其整个集团的风险。

example_sentences.en: How you evaluate your life affects your decisions .
example_sentences.zh: 你对自己生活的评价会影响你做出的决定。

meaning: n. 赞扬，称赞；崇拜；赞词v. 赞扬，赞美；歌颂；崇拜
zh_source: praise 称赞，赞美来自古法语prisier,称赞，赞美，评估，来自拉丁语preciare,估价，词源同price,appreciate.

example_sentences.en: * He had high praise for paul jobs ' work ethic . "
example_sentences.zh: *他高度赞扬了养父保罗•乔布斯的职业操守。

example_sentences.en: The second is setting up behavioral cues and reminders to stop you from seeking praise .
example_sentences.zh: 第二步是设定行为信号和提示，防止自己寻求表扬。

meaning: n. 事件，事变；小插曲；敌对行动；骚乱adj. [法]附带的；[光]入射的；易有的，附随的
zh_source: incident 偶发事件，摩擦，冲突in-,进入，使，-cid,掉落，落下，词源同accident,occasion.引申词义偶发事件，摩擦，冲突等。
variation: 复数： incidents

example_sentences.en: The incident under investigation in japan occurred last year .
example_sentences.zh: 正在调查中的日本事件发生在去年。

example_sentences.en: They said the incident was contrived to attract sympathy votes .
example_sentences.zh: 他们说这个插曲是人为的，用来博取同情票。

meaning: n. 量，大量；体积；音量；卷adj. 大量的vi. 成团卷起vt. 把…收集成卷
zh_source: volume 体积，容积，卷，册来自拉丁语volvere,旋转，来自PIE*wel,转，来自PIE*wei的扩大格，词源同wind,voluble。引申词义体积，容积，卷，册等。
variation: 复数： volumes

example_sentences.en: Coal remains the fastest growing world fuel by volume .
example_sentences.zh: 煤炭依然是全球消耗量增长最快的燃料。

example_sentences.en: The baseline was the volume of a normal conversation .
example_sentences.zh: 此研究的基准为普通对话的音量。

meaning: vt. 雕，刻；题写，题献
zh_source: inscribe 题，刻in-,进入，使，-scribe,写，词源同scribe,description.引申词义题，刻。
variation: 第三人称单数： inscribes过去式： inscribed过去分词： inscribed现在分词： inscribing

example_sentences.en: Five grades chinese unit 5 testings inscribe one .
example_sentences.zh: 五年级语文第五单元测试题一。

example_sentences.en: Will you inscribe your name in the book ?
example_sentences.zh: 能否请你在这本书上签名？

meaning: v. 活体解剖，解剖
variation: 第三人称单数： vivisects过去式： vivisected过去分词： vivisected现在分词： vivisecting

example_sentences.en: Vivisect observation on blood supply of pulmonary artery in lung cancer tissue .
example_sentences.zh: 肺癌组织内肺动脉供血活体灌注观察。

example_sentences.en: People no longer vivisect animals -- it 's considered unethical .
example_sentences.zh: 人类不再解剖动物-这被认为是不道德的。

meaning: adj. 花的，花似的；以花装饰的；植物的，植物群的；花神的
zh_source: floral 花饰的来自词根flor, 花，词源同flower.
variation: 易混淆的单词： Floral

example_sentences.en: To decorate with flowers or with a floral pattern .
example_sentences.zh: 以花装饰以花装饰或以花的图案装饰。

example_sentences.en: It 's clear that ranunculus is a favorite among floral designers !
example_sentences.zh: 很明显，毛茛是花卉设计师最喜爱的一种花材！

meaning: vt. 取得，获得；实现，完成；导致vi. 取得；介绍娼妓，拉皮条
zh_source: procure 费力取得，获得来自拉丁语procurare,关心，照看，管理，看护，来自pro-,向前，代表，-cur,关切，照看，词源同cure,pedicure.引申词义得到，获得，特指费尽心力取得。

example_sentences.en: Staff members attach themselves to effective people , and the capacity to procure resources is good evidence of that ability .
example_sentences.zh: 下属总是愿意追随有效工作的领导，而获取资源的能力就是很好的证明。

example_sentences.en: It is unclear how the stores procure the apple merchandise .
example_sentences.zh: 目前还不清楚这些商店是如何获得苹果的商品。

meaning: vt. <商>分期偿还（债务）
zh_source: amortize 分期偿还前缀a-同ad-. 词根mort, 死，同 mer, 见mortal, 凡人，终有一死的。
variation: 第三人称单数： amortizes过去式： amortized过去分词： amortized现在分词： amortizing

example_sentences.en: Intangible assets amortize ought not to uniform plan enter " overhead expenses "
example_sentences.zh: 无形资产摊销不该一律计入“管理费用”

example_sentences.en: I 'm going to amortize the cost of the apartment .
example_sentences.zh: 我打算分期偿还这套公寓的费用。

meaning: n. 求援；追索权；依赖；所依靠的物[人]
zh_source: recourse 求助，依靠re-,向后，往回，-cour,跑，词源同 course,current.即跑回来，引申词义求助，依靠。

example_sentences.en: As an unregulated exchange , norway 's otc market offers the deal 's opponents little recourse .
example_sentences.zh: 作为一家不受监管的交易所，挪威场外市场能为交易反对者提供的求助途径少之又少。

example_sentences.en: A fund adequate to secure stability of the global financial system without recourse to taxpayers would need access to several trillion dollars .
example_sentences.zh: 要建立一只能够确保全球金融体系稳定而不求助于纳税人的基金，需要筹集数万亿美元资金。

meaning: vi. 消失；突然不见；消亡，消灭；[数]化为零vt. 使消失，使不见n. [语音学]消失音，弱化音
zh_source: vanish 消失缩写自拉丁语evanescere,来自e-,向外，-van,空出，虚无，词源同vain。引申词义消失。
variation: 第三人称单数： vanishes过去式： vanished过去分词： vanished现在分词： vanishing

example_sentences.en: For most , work will vanish with the summer .
example_sentences.zh: 对于大部分人来说，工作将随夏天一道消失。

example_sentences.en: If the violets vanish , so could the bees , and ultimately acres of crops .
example_sentences.zh: 一旦紫罗兰绝迹，蜜蜂也会遭遇同样的结局，而最终受害的将是成片的农作物。

meaning: adj. 宝贵的，珍贵的；贵重的；矫揉造作的；可爱的，宝贝的adv. <口>很，非常n. 珍爱的人；可爱的人
zh_source: precious 珍贵的来自拉丁语pretium,价格，价值，词源同price,prize.引申词义有价值的，值得珍惜的，珍贵的。

example_sentences.en: We cannot afford to lose our most precious resource : talent , " the letter stated .
example_sentences.zh: 这封信写道：“我们不能失去我们最宝贵的资源——人才。”

example_sentences.en: Restrictions on the sale of petrochemicals , gold and other precious metals were also lifted .
example_sentences.zh: 协议同时取消了伊朗在出口化工产品和黄金等贵金属方面所受的限制。

meaning: n. 求援；追索权；依赖；所依靠的物[人]
zh_source: recourse 求助，依靠re-,向后，往回，-cour,跑，词源同 course,current.即跑回来，引申词义求助，依靠。

example_sentences.en: As an unregulated exchange , norway 's otc market offers the deal 's opponents little recourse .
example_sentences.zh: 作为一家不受监管的交易所，挪威场外市场能为交易反对者提供的求助途径少之又少。

example_sentences.en: A fund adequate to secure stability of the global financial system without recourse to taxpayers would need access to several trillion dollars .
example_sentences.zh: 要建立一只能够确保全球金融体系稳定而不求助于纳税人的基金，需要筹集数万亿美元资金。

meaning: adj. 乐观的，乐观主义的

example_sentences.en: I suspect this is too optimistic .
example_sentences.zh: 我怀疑这是过于乐观。

example_sentences.en: The many egyptians standing in line appeared less optimistic .
example_sentences.zh: 站成长队的埃及人很少有乐观的。

meaning: n. 小花（尤指菊科植物管状花状小花），绢丝
zh_source: floret 花部来自词根flor, 花，词源同flower.
variation: 复数： florets

example_sentences.en: Floret preparation goes and its brother elder sisters left .
example_sentences.zh: 小花预备去和它的哥哥姐姐离开。

example_sentences.en: Times length of spikelet ; lower floret usually staminate .
example_sentences.zh: 小穗的刚毛3-4次长度；更低的小花通常雄蕊花。

meaning: adj. 不死的；永恒的，不朽的；神的；流芳百世的n. 神仙；流芳百世的人；不朽的作家
zh_source: immortal 不死的，神仙im-,不，非，mortal,凡人，终有一死的。
variation: 复数： immortals

example_sentences.en: We are proud to introduce : the immortal jellyfish .
example_sentences.zh: 我们将自豪地向你介绍不朽的水母。

example_sentences.en: Finally , he was free to be an immortal striver .
example_sentences.zh: 最终他可以自由的做个不朽的奋斗者。

meaning: adj. 非常宝贵的；无法估计的；无价的；金不换
zh_source: invaluable 无价的，极宝贵的in-,不，非，value,价值。即无法估量价值的，无价的，极宝贵的。同时，也可理解成毫无价值的，但该词义已做古。

example_sentences.en: Stroking is invaluable in this situation as well .
example_sentences.zh: 安抚在这样的情况下也是无价的。

example_sentences.en: This is admirable , of course , and his wisdom and experience are invaluable .
example_sentences.zh: 当然，这是值得尊敬的，他的智慧和经验是无法估价的。

meaning: n. [天]（日、月）食；消失，黯然失色；漆黑vt. 使黯然失色；形成日（或月）食
zh_source: eclipse 日食，月食ec-, 向外。-lipse, 留下，词源同leave, ellipse. 即留下一块阴影的。
variation: 复数： eclipses第三人称单数： eclipses过去式： eclipsed过去分词： eclipsed现在分词： eclipsing易混淆的单词： ECLIPSEEclipse

example_sentences.en: The hive was a mystery as unfathomable as an eclipse .
example_sentences.zh: 蜂群曾经如同日蚀一样神秘、一样深不可测。

example_sentences.en: The pictures of the 1919 eclipse precisely matched his prediction .
example_sentences.zh: 1919年的日蚀照片完全符合爱因斯坦的预测。

meaning: n. [大气]龙卷风，陆龙卷；大雷雨；具有巨大破坏性的人（或事物）
zh_source: tornado 龙卷风，旋风，雷暴来自西班牙语 tronada,雷暴，来自 tronar,打雷，来自拉丁语 tonare,打雷，词源同 thunder,Thor. 拼写和词义可能受到拉丁语 tornare 影响，来自 tornare,扭曲，转动，词源同 turn.引申词义龙 卷风，旋风。
variation: 复数： tornadoestornados

example_sentences.en: Campsites in tornado-prone areas usually have a tornado shelter .
example_sentences.zh: 在龙卷风易发的地区经常有个避难所。

example_sentences.en: The raf 's enthusiasm for the tornado is understandable .
example_sentences.zh: 皇家空军对“旋风”式战机的热情是可以理解的。

meaning: vt. 使扩大；详述；使膨胀；扩张vi. 扩大；膨胀；详述
zh_source: dilate 膨胀di-, 分开，散开，来自dis-变体。-lat, 变宽，膨胀，词源同latitude, lateral. 即扩散，膨胀。
variation: 第三人称单数： dilates过去式： dilated过去分词： dilated现在分词： dilating

example_sentences.en: Dr mcmahon also established that stored blood does indeed lose its ability to dilate blood vessels .
example_sentences.zh: 他还确定储存过的血确实失去了扩张血管的能力。

example_sentences.en: The buildup of carbon dioxide causes blood vessels in the brain to dilate , resulting in headaches .
example_sentences.zh: 二氧化碳的累积造成脑部血管扩张，导致头痛。

meaning: n. 机会，时机；场合；理由；需要vt. 惹起，引起
zh_source: occasion 偶然，场合，时机oc-,向前，朝向，-cas,掉落，词源同case,cascade,accident.引申词义偶然，场合，时机。
variation: 复数： occasions第三人称单数： occasions过去式： occasioned过去分词： occasioned现在分词： occasioning

example_sentences.en: Then you can use music for every occasion .
example_sentences.zh: 你可以把音乐用在任何场合。

example_sentences.en: Copenhagen is the occasion to fix a broken system .
example_sentences.zh: 哥本哈根提供了修复一个破碎体系的机会。

meaning: n. （作者）题词；献词；碑文；证劵持有人的登记
zh_source: inscription 铭文，碑文来自inscribe,题，刻，引申词义铭文，碑文。
variation: 复数： inscriptions

example_sentences.en: Maybe you can even get a small inscription .
example_sentences.zh: 或许你还可以得到一个小的铭文。

example_sentences.en: She points to the inscription on one : " jn kelly , cheesemonger of shoreditch " .
example_sentences.zh: 她指着其中一个上面的题字说：“金凯利（jnkelly），肖荻奇（shoreditch）干酪店。”

meaning: vt. 应受；应得；值得vi. 应受报答；应得报酬；应得赔偿；应受惩罚
zh_source: deserve 应得de-, 向下，强调。serve, 服务。原指服务所应得的报酬，后词义通用化。
variation: 第三人称单数： deserves过去式： deserved过去分词： deserved现在分词： deserving

example_sentences.en: International organisations also deserve some praise .
example_sentences.zh: 国际组织也值得我们赞扬。

example_sentences.en: You really get what you deserve in your life ?
example_sentences.zh: 你真的得到了你应得的吗？

meaning: n. 西方国家
variation: 易混淆的单词： occident

example_sentences.en: Our cultural beliefs caused many problems traveling through the occident .
example_sentences.zh: 我们在文化上的信仰导致了许多在西方国家旅游时的问题。

example_sentences.en: Chinese toys sell hot in occident on christmas .
example_sentences.zh: 圣诞节：中国玩具在欧美仍然抢手。

meaning: n. 花艺，栽培花卉

example_sentences.en: I hope to take up floriculture with my leisure .
example_sentences.zh: 我希望空闲时种种花。

example_sentences.en: National honor society for floriculture , landscape horticulture , and ornamental horticulture .
example_sentences.zh: 美国景观园艺学、观赏园艺学和花卉学荣誉协会。

meaning: n. 手稿；原稿；底稿；手写本adj. 手写的，手抄的
zh_source: manuscript 手稿，原稿manu-,手，-script,写，词源同script,describe.引申词义手稿，原稿。

example_sentences.en: I 'd never heard of manuscript boxes .
example_sentences.zh: 我从来没听说过手稿箱。

example_sentences.en: We can put out a book within days of receiving the manuscript .
example_sentences.zh: 我们可以在收到手稿几天内就做出一本书来。

meaning: vt. 使永恒；使不灭；使不朽；使名垂千古
variation: 第三人称单数： immortalizes过去式： immortalized过去分词： immortalized现在分词： immortalizing

meaning: vt. 估价过低；轻看
variation: 第三人称单数： undervalues过去式： undervalued过去分词： undervalued现在分词： undervaluing

example_sentences.en: They tend to undervalue signs that a man is interested in a committed relationship .
example_sentences.zh: 他们倾向于低估男人对于效忠的兴趣。

example_sentences.en: People constantly undervalue the return on investment you get from taking risks to invest in your own career .
example_sentences.zh: 当你冒着风险为职业生涯投资的时候，人们通常都会低估投资所带来的回报。

meaning: n. （重要字或音之）略语；迷睡
n. 精神作用，心理状态
n. 热情，热忱；热衷的事物；宗教的狂热
zh_source: enthusiasm 热情，热忱来自enthuse，热情。

example_sentences.en: The review does nothing to dampen customer enthusiasm .
example_sentences.zh: 但这次评测丝毫没有减弱消费者的热情。

example_sentences.en: The combination of youth and enthusiasm with experience and seasoning can be a very powerful cocktail .
example_sentences.zh: 将年轻和激情与经验和老道掺在在一起，可以调合出一道非常神奇的鸡尾酒。

meaning: n. 无光泽，暗淡adj. 无光泽的，暗淡的
zh_source: lackluster 单调的lack,缺乏，luster,光泽。引申词义单调的。

example_sentences.en: With personal bonds this important , it would seem prudent to put a little work into improving them , especially if they are struggling or even just a little lackluster .
example_sentences.zh: 既然人际关系如此重要，那么稍微多用点心对其加以改善应该是明智之举，尤其是当人际关系出现困难甚至有点了无生气时。

example_sentences.en: Despite a stronger share of consumption in gdp growth , retail sales appeared lackluster .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管消费对中国gdp增长的贡献率加大，但零售情况却显得低迷。

meaning: vt. 使最优化，使尽可能有效
zh_source: optimize 最优化来自optimum,最优，最佳，-ize,使。
variation: 第三人称单数： optimizes过去式： optimized过去分词： optimized现在分词： optimizing

example_sentences.en: These are the things you should streamline and optimize .
example_sentences.zh: 这些事情你就需要将它们精简优化。

example_sentences.en: Optimize and distribute a press release announcing blog .
example_sentences.zh: 优化并分发一个博客声明的新闻。

meaning: vt. 保持；留在心中，记住；雇用；付定金保留
zh_source: retain 保留，保持re-,向后，往回，-tain,保持，词源同 contain,tenure.
variation: 第三人称单数： retains过去式： retained过去分词： retained现在分词： retaining易混淆的单词： RETAIN

example_sentences.en: Mr lu will retain his position at taobao .
example_sentences.zh: 但他将保留在淘宝的职位。

example_sentences.en: Retail banks must also retain adequate equity .
example_sentences.zh: 零售银行也必须保持股本充足。

meaning: vt. 赎回，挽回；履行；偿还；兑现
zh_source: redeem 补救，弥补，拯救，救赎，兑换，兑现来自中古法语 redemer,买回，拿回，来自拉丁语 redimere,买回，拿回，来自 red-,向后，往回， -im,拿到，买取，词源同 example,exempt,emption.引申诸相关词义。

example_sentences.en: If an issuer does not redeem then , they must pay a higher penalty coupon rate .
example_sentences.zh: 如果发券商不按时赎回，那么它们必须支付一个较高的惩罚性利率。

example_sentences.en: If the owner wishes to redeem the animal , he must add a fifth to its value .
example_sentences.zh: 他若一定要赎回，就要在你所估定的价值以外加上五分之一.

meaning: n. 旅行，观光；巡回演出；任职期；轮班vt. 到…旅游；在…巡回演出vi. 观光；巡回
zh_source: tour 旅游，观光，巡回比赛，巡视来自古法语 tourn,转动，巡游，绕圈，词源同 turn.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： tours第三人称单数： tours过去式： toured过去分词： toured现在分词： touring易混淆的单词： Tour

example_sentences.en: Chinese tour operators canceled trips to the philippines .
example_sentences.zh: 中国的旅游业者取消了前往菲律宾的旅行团。

example_sentences.en: Tour groups can be exempted from the rule .
example_sentences.zh: 旅行团可不受这一规定限制。

meaning: vi. 再发生；复发；重现；回想
zh_source: recur 复发，再次发生re-,再，重新，-cur,跑，词源同 course,current.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： recurs过去式： recurred过去分词： recurred现在分词： recurring

example_sentences.en: Symptoms tend to recur in a predictable pattern .
example_sentences.zh: 症状复发有规可循。

example_sentences.en: The treaties could then be revised in a calmer atmosphere so that the current imbalances will not recur .
example_sentences.zh: 可以在局势更为平静的时候修改条约，以防止今天的失衡再次重演。

meaning: adj. 最适宜的n. 最佳效果；最适宜条件；[生物学] 最适度
zh_source: optimum 最优，最佳，最优的，最佳的来自拉丁语optimum,最优的，最佳的，可能来自PIE*op,选择，词源同option.-tim,最高级后缀，词源同maximum,ultimate,intimate.

example_sentences.en: He shows conclusively that the eurozone is far from an optimum currency area .
example_sentences.zh: 他有力地表明，欧元区远非是一个最佳的货币区域。

example_sentences.en: For ms. christy , these are mathematical problems with no one optimum solution .
example_sentences.zh: 对于克里斯蒂来说，这些数学问题，没有唯一的最佳方案。

meaning: n. 锦标赛，联赛；中世纪的骑士比武；锦标赛
zh_source: tournament 中世纪骑马比武，锦标赛来自古法语 tornement,一群骑士在马背上打斗，来自 tornoier,打斗，骑马长矛比武，字面意
variation: 复数： tournaments

example_sentences.en: Her team promptly pulled out of the tournament .
example_sentences.zh: 她所在的代表队立即退出了比赛。

example_sentences.en: The tournament will kick off on 12 june 2014 .
example_sentences.zh: 此次世界杯锦标赛将于2014年6月12日开始。

meaning: vt. 危害

example_sentences.en: Because the disserve of fire for people is very sarge , it is very necessary for us to design a all antomutil anll intelliyentizal fireproofing in order to decrease the loss of school possessions and the expendenture of the control fire work .
example_sentences.zh: 火灾对人类的危害是非常的大，为了减少学校财产的损失和减少在防火工作中的开支，做一个全自动、智能化的防火系统也是非常的必要。

meaning: adj. （兴趣、精神、思想等）病态的；疾病的；有成见的；令人毛骨悚然的，恐怖的
zh_source: morbid 病态的来自拉丁语morbus,疾病，来自mori,快死，将死，来自PIE*mer,死亡，词源同mortal,murder.即生病的，病态的。

example_sentences.en: A large movement shocked me from my morbid contemplation .
example_sentences.zh: 一个很大的动静将我从这种病态的沉思中惊醒过来。

example_sentences.en: And so may 4 will be fascinating -- even if the fascination is of the morbid variety .
example_sentences.zh: 因此，五月四日将是迷人的一天即便是一种病态的魅力。

meaning: n. （信末签名后的）附言，又及；（正文后的）补充说明
zh_source: postscript 附言，补编，跋post-,在后，-script,写，词源同description.

example_sentences.en: It ends with a somewhat depressing postscript chapter .
example_sentences.zh: 另外这本书以一个稍微令人沮丧的后记章节收尾。

example_sentences.en: Few people know that princip 's life had a postscript .
example_sentences.zh: 很少有人知道，普林西普的生命还有后记。

meaning: n. 虚荣，浮华；自负；空虚，无聊的事物；无价值的东西
zh_source: vanity 自负来自vain,自负的，虚无的，徒劳的，词源同vainglory.
variation: 复数： vanities

example_sentences.en: My poet 's vanity dies in shame before thy sight .
example_sentences.zh: 我诗人的虚荣在你的目光前羞惭而死。

example_sentences.en: What women mistake for infidelity is usually no more than vanity .
example_sentences.zh: 女士们常常错误地把虚荣的情况认作是不忠的情况。

meaning: vt. 使成斑驳，使多样化
variation: 第三人称单数： variegates过去式： variegated过去分词： variegated现在分词： variegating易混淆的单词： Variegate

example_sentences.en: Variegate with different colors , shades , or patterns .
example_sentences.zh: 用不同的颜色阴影或图案使多样化。

meaning: adj. 安全的；牢固的；有把握的；安心的vt. 保护；（使）获得；使安全；担保vi. 获得安全，变得安全；安全，保险；承保，担保；[航海学]停止工作
zh_source: secure 安全的，可靠的se-,分开，没有，-cur,关心，挂念，照顾，词源同 cure,curator.即不需要挂念的，引申词义安 全的，可靠的等。
variation: 第三人称单数： secures过去式： secured过去分词： secured现在分词： securing易混淆的单词： SECURE

example_sentences.en: Will you feel secure doing so ?
example_sentences.zh: 您觉得这种方法安全吗？

example_sentences.en: Large new importers secure supply through government-to-government deals .
example_sentences.zh: 新的进口大国通过政府间交易获得供应。

meaning: vt. 提到，说起；提名表扬n. 提及
zh_source: mention 提到，提及来自拉丁文mens,思考，思想，记忆，词源同mind,mania.引申词义想起，提到，提及。

example_sentences.en: Yglesias doesn 't even mention this kind of journalism .
example_sentences.zh: 依格雷西亚斯甚至根本就没有提到这类新闻。

example_sentences.en: Oh , did I mention that gongquan was already married ?
example_sentences.zh: 哦，我提到过王功权早就是已婚人士了吗？

meaning: adj. 光亮的，透明的
zh_source: lucent 光亮的，透明的来自拉丁语lucere,发光，照耀，词源同light.
variation: 易混淆的单词： LUCENT

example_sentences.en: Lucent is now a $ 2 stock .
example_sentences.zh: 朗讯现在的股价是两美元。

example_sentences.en: Mitigation agreements negotiated by cfius with other non-us companies , including alcatel lucent , include rules on employee screening and third-party audits .
example_sentences.zh: 外国投资委员会与其它非美国公司如阿尔卡特朗讯（alcatellucent）谈判达成的缓和协议，包含有关雇员筛查和第三方审计的规定。

meaning: adj. 贵重的，宝贵的；有价值的；可评估的n. 贵重物品，财宝
zh_source: valuable 有价值的来自value,价值。
variation: 复数： valuables

example_sentences.en: What 's the most valuable thing you own ?
example_sentences.zh: 你拥有的最有价值的东西是什么？

example_sentences.en: But the past still provides valuable lessons .
example_sentences.zh: 但历史仍提供了宝贵教训。

meaning: n. 遵守，奉行；（宗教的，正式的）仪式；惯例；庆祝
zh_source: observance 遵守，奉行来自observe,遵行，遵守。
variation: 复数： observances

example_sentences.en: As for the future , each of them should enter into an indenture with the accounting standards board , promising strict observance of professional standards .
example_sentences.zh: 至于以后，它们每个都应该与会计标准委员会签订合同，保证严格遵守职业标准。

example_sentences.en: But what the story of libor shows is that this free market language has been honoured as much in the breach as the observance , to borrow shakespeare 's phrase .
example_sentences.zh: 但借用莎士比亚（shakespeare）话来说，巴克莱企图操纵libor一事表明，这种自由市场言论遭到的违反和遵守一样多。

meaning: vt. 指定，规定；指定，规定vi. 建立规定，法律或指示；开处方，给医嘱
zh_source: prescribe 规定，命令，开药pre-,在前，早于，预先，-scribe,写，词源同describe.引申诸相关词义。

example_sentences.en: But they prescribe a quite different political potion .
example_sentences.zh: 但他们开出了一副截然不同的政治处方。

example_sentences.en: But pediatricians do not consistently prescribe vitamin drops .
example_sentences.zh: 但是儿科医生没有自始至终地开出维生素点滴的处方。

meaning: vt. 想，设想；想像；料想，猜想；误认为vi. 想象；猜想，推测
zh_source: imagine 想象，幻象来自image,形象，印象，影像。引申词义想象，幻象等。
variation: 第三人称单数： imagines过去式： imagined过去分词： imagined现在分词： imagining易混淆的单词： Imagine

example_sentences.en: Imagine you are driving a car .
example_sentences.zh: 想象你正在开着车。

example_sentences.en: Imagine you 've been served with a legal complaint .
example_sentences.zh: 设想一下你现在正面临一场诉讼。

meaning: adj. 清楚的，明白的；神志清醒的；清澈的，透明的；[动，植]光滑的
zh_source: lucid 清楚的来自拉丁语lucere,发光，照耀，词源同light.引申词义明亮的，清楚的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： LUCID

example_sentences.en: Delbanco 's overview , though brief , is lucid and well informed .
example_sentences.zh: 德尔班科的概述，虽然简短，但是清晰而信息量大。

example_sentences.en: We hire them because they 're eloquent , lucid , imaginative wordsmiths .
example_sentences.zh: 我们雇用他，是因为他们雄辩的，清晰的，富有想象力的文字表达能力。

meaning: vt. 使高兴，使得意
variation: 第三人称单数： elates过去式： elated过去分词： elated现在分词： elating

example_sentences.en: Travel taiwan tainan elate pudding flan .
example_sentences.zh: 台湾台南依蕾特布丁奶酪。

example_sentences.en: Don 't let your sober face elate you , however ;
example_sentences.zh: 不过，别因为你那张清醒的面孔而得意。

meaning: n. 观察；观察力；注意；观察报告
zh_source: observation 观察，监视来自observe,观察，监视。
variation: 复数： observations

example_sentences.en: Mr allen and his colleagues made one other observation .
example_sentences.zh: 艾伦先生及其同事还有另一个观察结果。

example_sentences.en: Each end is fitted with triangular observation decks .
example_sentences.zh: 桥每端都设有三角观测台。

meaning: adj. 濒死的，垂死的；奄奄一息的；停滞不前的n. 垂死的人
zh_source: moribund 垂死的，行将灭亡的来自拉丁语mori,去死，将死，词源同mortal,murder.-bund,工具格后缀，将成为，词源同be.

example_sentences.en: They said it was outdated , moribund , and in decline .
example_sentences.zh: 投资者说这家公司已经过时了，奄奄一息而且在下滑。

example_sentences.en: It was a perfect union that single-handedly revived the moribund mp3-player market .
example_sentences.zh: 这对完美的组合振兴了垂死的mp3播放器市场。

meaning: n. 杰出人物，名人；天体；发光体
zh_source: luminary 专家，权威来自拉丁语lumen,光亮，光线，词源同light.引申词义发光的人，专家，权威。
variation: 复数： luminaries

example_sentences.en: Ling of product safety certification projects for luminary products .
example_sentences.zh: 负责完成灯具类产品的安全认证项目。

example_sentences.en: That doctor is considered a luminary in his field .
example_sentences.zh: 那位医师在他的专业领域里是公认的杰出人物。

meaning: adj. 可想像的；可能的

example_sentences.en: But belcher 's batteries can be engineered into any shape imaginable .
example_sentences.zh: 而且，belcher研制的电池还可以做成任何想象的形状。

example_sentences.en: You can have almost any size or shape imaginable .
example_sentences.zh: 你可以有几乎所有的大小或形状想像。

meaning: n. （无经验之人的）有经验可信赖的顾问vt. 做…的良师；指导
zh_source: mentor 导师来自希腊语Mentor,导师，指导者，来自PIE*men,思考，思想，词源同mind,mania.来自荷马史诗《奥德赛》，雅典娜化身Mentor指导奥德赛儿子学习和思考，后词义通用化。

example_sentences.en: I am privileged to be able to call him a friend and mentor .
example_sentences.zh: 我非常荣幸地能有他这样的朋友和导师。

example_sentences.en: As a mentor and financier , he has a penchant for backing japanese women-run startups over their male counterparts .
example_sentences.zh: 作为一名导师和金融家，他更喜欢资助日本女性（而不是日本男性）经营的初创公司。

meaning: n. 天文台；气象台；瞭望台
zh_source: observatory 天文台，气象台来自observe,观察，注视。用于指天文台，气象台等。
variation: 复数： observatories

example_sentences.en: Officials from greenwich observatory have the clock checked twice a day .
example_sentences.zh: 格林尼治天文台的官员们每天两次派人矫正此种。

example_sentences.en: The detector and arrays combine to make the icecube neutrino observatory .
example_sentences.zh: 探测器和阵列共同构成了冰立方天文台的主体部分。

meaning: n. 椭圆
zh_source: ellipse 椭圆el-, 进入，同en-. -lipse, 留下，词源同eclipse, leave. 即缺了一块的，后且做数学术语。
variation: 复数： ellipses

example_sentences.en: Another ellipse around the sun
example_sentences.zh: 另一个绕日椭圆轨道

example_sentences.en: The current national christmas tree was planted on the ellipse in 1978 .
example_sentences.zh: 现在的这棵国家圣诞树是1978年在椭圆广场栽种的。

meaning: n. 安全；保证，担保；保护，防护；有价证券adj. 安全的，保安的，保密的
zh_source: security 保安，安保措施，债券secure,安全的，可靠的，-ity,名词后缀。引申词义保安，安保措施，债券等。
variation: 复数： securities易混淆的单词： Security

example_sentences.en: Good security is going to require tradeoffs .
example_sentences.zh: 良好的安全性势必需要权衡。

example_sentences.en: Security is a problem too .
example_sentences.zh: 安全也是一大问题。

meaning: adj. 致命的；不共戴天的；终有一死的；极度的n. 凡人，人类
zh_source: mortal 死亡的，致命的，终有一死的，凡人来自拉丁语mors,死亡，词源同murder,morbid.引申词义死亡的，终有一死的，后该词用于指凡人。比较immortal.

example_sentences.en: Or else he would forego his mortal nature .
example_sentences.zh: 不然他就失去了凡人的本性。

example_sentences.en: Apollo gave him all his love forgetting he was a mere mortal .
example_sentences.zh: 阿波罗将所有的爱给了雅辛托斯，忘记了他只是个凡人。

meaning: （古希腊、罗马供奉众神的）万神殿（罗马一圆顶庙宇，建于公元120-124）
zh_source: pantheon 众神，诸神，先贤祠pan-,全部，所有，-the,神，词源同theism,atheist.即众神所在之地，众神之庙，引申词义先贤祠。

example_sentences.en: There 's also the original , rome 's pantheon .
example_sentences.zh: 还有最早的一座万神殿。

example_sentences.en: Churchill , after all , was already an iconic , if controversial , figure when he took office , and has long since taken his place in history 's pantheon .
example_sentences.zh: 毕竟，尽管丘吉尔颇受争议，但他在上任前就已经是偶像人物，并且长期以来就被纳入历史伟人之列。

meaning: n. 命令，规定，法令；药方

example_sentences.en: Suggestion about amending punishment prescript for unit crime .
example_sentences.zh: 对单位犯罪处罚规定的修正建议。

example_sentences.en: Be sure to obtain your prescript eyeglasses ready .
example_sentences.zh: 一定要得到你的回复眼镜准备。

meaning: adj. 发冷光的，发光的

example_sentences.en: The fact that even larvae are luminescent lends support to this theory .
example_sentences.zh: 事实上，萤火虫幼虫发光现象支持了这一理论。

example_sentences.en: They also created 300 clay millipedes , half painted with a luminescent pigment .
example_sentences.zh: 他们还创建了300个粘土千足虫，一半涂上发光颜料。

meaning: adj. 富于想像力的，运用想像力的；想象或创造出来的；沉溺于想象的；虚假的

example_sentences.en: Imaginative play helps develop empathy for others .
example_sentences.zh: 充满想象力的模仿游戏培养孩子对他人的同理心。

example_sentences.en: O parents of fantasizers encourage imaginative play .
example_sentences.zh: 幻想者的父母鼓励孩子去玩富于想像力的游戏。

meaning: vt. 放弃；让出（权利，财产等）；放开，松手；撤离
zh_source: relinquish 放弃，放手，让渡来自拉丁语 relinquere,留下，留给，来自 re-,向后，往回，linquere,留下，留给，词源同 delinquency,relic.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： relinquishes过去式： relinquished过去分词： relinquished现在分词： relinquishing

example_sentences.en: Relinquish control of your technology infrastructure-you don 't need it anymore .
example_sentences.zh: 放弃对技术基础架构的控制，你可以不再需要它了。

example_sentences.en: Tribes were therefore most likely compelled by violence to relinquish their autonomy .
example_sentences.zh: 因此，部落极有可能在暴力的威胁下交出自治权。

meaning: vt.& vi. 观察；研究vt. 遵守；观察；庆祝vi. 注意；说；评述；当观察员
zh_source: observe 观察，注视，遵行，遵守ob-,向前，朝向，-serve,注视，观察，保护，词源同conserve,hero.引申词义坚守，遵守，遵行等。
variation: 第三人称单数： observes过去式： observed过去分词： observed现在分词： observing

example_sentences.en: Hubble then began to observe more details about galaxies .
example_sentences.zh: 哈勃那时候开始观察星系的更多细节。

example_sentences.en: I observe that this seems a fine distinction .
example_sentences.zh: 我注意到，这似乎是一个很细微的区别。

meaning: n. 兴高采烈；欢欣鼓舞；（病态的）欣快；欣快症

example_sentences.en: The dominant emotion among turkey 's elites in the wake of the arab uprisings is elation .
example_sentences.zh: 阿拉伯世界爆发革命后，土耳其精英的主要情绪是欢欣鼓舞。

example_sentences.en: It was one frenzy after one elation after one enthusiasm after one hysteria after another .
example_sentences.zh: 那是一个兴高采烈后的狂热，续歇斯底里后的热情。

meaning: adj. 红润的；华丽的；炫耀的；绚丽
zh_source: florid 红润的来自词根flor, 花，词源同flower. 即像花一样的，形容脸色红润的。

example_sentences.en: Florid scenery of city line chongqing street corner beautiful woman .
example_sentences.zh: 都市绚丽风景线重庆街头美女。

example_sentences.en: Nobody likes this florid style with little content .
example_sentences.zh: 没有人喜欢这种缺乏内容的华丽文风。

meaning: n. [医]药方，处方；处方药；训令，指示；法规
zh_source: prescription 药方，处方来自describe,开药，-pt,过去分词格。

example_sentences.en: Raynor 's first prescription is to remember that persuasive storytelling requires that the storyteller leave out the weeds .
example_sentences.zh: 雷诺的第一个处方是：务必记住，有说服力的故事需要讲故事的人忽略杂音。

example_sentences.en: Ledger died of a prescription drug overdose last month .
example_sentences.zh: 莱杰上个月死于处方药使用过量。

meaning: vt. 攀登；继承；占领vi. 上升；爬坡；追溯
zh_source: ascend 上升前缀a-同ad-, 在sc, sp, st开头词根前缩小为a-. 词根scend, 爬，爬升，比较descend，下降.
variation: 第三人称单数： ascends过去式： ascended过去分词： ascended现在分词： ascending

example_sentences.en: He could then ascend to the prime ministerial job after elections in 2014 .
example_sentences.zh: 并且在随后的2014年大选中，他很可能一举登上总理职位。

example_sentences.en: Ascend the elevator at h-8 and prepare to kill or invis by the orcs roaming outside the house .
example_sentences.zh: 在h-8登上电梯并准备杀死或者透明通过漫步在屋外的兽人.

meaning: n. 死亡数，死亡率；必死性，必死的命运
zh_source: mortality 死亡率，死亡数量来自mortal,死亡的，致命的。引申词义死亡率，死亡数量。

example_sentences.en: Falling rates of child mortality are also significant .
example_sentences.zh: 儿童死亡率的下降也是比较重要的原因。

example_sentences.en: Mortality also plays a role .
example_sentences.zh: 死亡率也起了一定的作用。

meaning: n. 制止物；威慑物adj. 制止的；遏制的
zh_source: deterrent 威慑因素来自deter, 震慑，威慑。
variation: 复数： deterrents

example_sentences.en: This is too lenient to be an effective deterrent .
example_sentences.zh: 这种惩罚过于宽大，不足以形成有效的威慑。

example_sentences.en: Britain 's independent nuclear deterrent is preserved .
example_sentences.zh: 英国独立的核威慑力量将会保留。

meaning: adj. 空的，空虚的，没人住的；（职位）空缺着的；无效的n. 太空，宇宙空间；空位，空隙；空虚感，寂寞的心情vt. 使无效；宣布…作废；取消；排泄
zh_source: void 空白，空虚来自古法语voide,空的，来自PIE*wa-,空出，遗弃，词源同vain,vacuum。引申词义空白，空虚。
variation: 复数： voids第三人称单数： voids过去式： voided过去分词： voided现在分词： voiding

example_sentences.en: Peer-to-peer websites have filled the void .
example_sentences.zh: 对等网站已经填补了空白。

example_sentences.en: Life breeds both plenitude and void , exuberance and depression .
example_sentences.zh: 生活同时孕育充足与空虚，繁荣与萧条。

meaning: vt.& vi. 潦草地书写；乱写，胡写；滥写（文学作品等）；[印，纺]粗梳n. 潦草书写；乱写；拙劣文字；粗制滥造的文章vi. 乱写，乱涂
zh_source: scribble 乱写，乱画来自 scribe,写，-le,表反复。引申词义乱写，乱画。
variation: 复数： scribbles第三人称单数： scribbles过去式： scribbled过去分词： scribbled现在分词： scribbling

example_sentences.en: She took out her checkbook and began to scribble a check .
example_sentences.zh: 她拿出支票簿，开始用潦草的字迹涂写一张支票。

example_sentences.en: The child loves to scribble with a pencil .
example_sentences.zh: 这孩子喜欢用铅笔乱涂乱画。

meaning: n. 赎回；偿还；补救
zh_source: redemption 拯救，救赎来自 redeem,拯救，救赎，-pt,过去分词格，-ion,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： redemptions易混淆的单词： Redemption

example_sentences.en: His answer was that service brought redemption and renewal .
example_sentences.zh: 他的回答是这样做的目的是为了救赎和重生。

example_sentences.en: But it is certainly not a simple path to redemption .
example_sentences.zh: 但是这肯定不是一条简单的救赎之路。

meaning: adj. 奇迹般的；不可思议的；神奇
zh_source: miraculous 奇迹般的来自miracle,奇迹。

example_sentences.en: Some animals perform this miraculous feat effortlessly .
example_sentences.zh: 有些动物毫不费力就能完成这奇迹般的壮举。

example_sentences.en: It is a big change from the miraculous corporate history of post-war japan .
example_sentences.zh: 这是一次重大的改革在战后日本奇迹般的公司的历史中。

meaning: vi. 挥舞；茂盛，繁荣；活跃，蓬勃vt. 挥动，挥舞n. 挥舞，挥动；花样，华丽的辞藻；夸张的行为或手势；花式吹奏
zh_source: flourish 繁盛来自词根flor, 花，词源同flower. 引申义开花，繁盛。
variation: 第三人称单数： flourishes过去式： flourished过去分词： flourished现在分词： flourishing

example_sentences.en: They flourish in unregulated markets .
example_sentences.zh: 他们在无序的市场竞争中繁荣。

example_sentences.en: A period of relatively wet conditions saw many cultures in the area flourish .
example_sentences.zh: 一段相对湿润的气候在该地区造就了许多文化的繁荣。

meaning: adj. 可怕的；危害极大的；<非正>很糟的；劣质的adv. 口〉非常，很，极n. 可怕的人
zh_source: terrible 可怕的来自 terror,恐惧，惊恐，-ible,形容词后缀。
variation: 比较级： more terrible最高级： most terrible

example_sentences.en: Terrible news was in the price .
example_sentences.zh: 价格方面的消息相当糟糕。

example_sentences.en: And then a terrible thing happened .
example_sentences.zh: 然后一件可怕的事发生了。

meaning: n. （尤指无脊椎动物的）血球，血细胞

example_sentences.en: Plasmatocytes and granular cells are the hemocyte types involved in these responses .
example_sentences.zh: 浆血细胞和粒血细胞是参与这些反应的血细胞类型。

meaning: n. 优势，支配地位；支配倾向
variation: 易混淆的单词： Ascendancy

example_sentences.en: Those six killer apps were the key to western ascendancy .
example_sentences.zh: 这六个“杀手级程式”曾是西方取得优势地位的关键。

example_sentences.en: But that ascendancy might be its own salvation , because with it comes responsibility .
example_sentences.zh: 但是这种优势地位可能是他对自己的救赎，因为与此同来的还有责任。

meaning: n. 血红素；血红蛋白

example_sentences.en: Normally , a 14-month-old 's hemoglobin is around 10 to 13 .
example_sentences.zh: 正常情况下，14个月的孩子血红蛋白含量大约在10到13之间。

example_sentences.en: It is also used for condition when red blood cells do not have enough hemoglobin .
example_sentences.zh: 当血红细胞中没有足够的血红蛋白也可以称为贫血。

meaning: n. 海市蜃楼，幻景
zh_source: mirage 幻景，海市蜃楼可能来自miracle,奇迹，引申词义幻景，海市蜃楼。或来自mirror,镜子，引申词义反射，反射体。

example_sentences.en: The trouble is that it 's mostly a mirage .
example_sentences.zh: 但问题是，这基本只不过是海市蜃楼而已。

example_sentences.en: It is like a mirage and yet quite real .
example_sentences.zh: 好像海市蜃楼似地，但又非常真实。

meaning: adj. 极好的；极其的，非常的；可怕的，凄惨的；了不起
zh_source: terrific 极好的，绝妙的来自 terrify,使恐惧，-ic,形容词后缀。比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: Those cardboard tubes make terrific cable tidies !
example_sentences.zh: 这些纸板管制造出了了不起的线缆收齐器！

example_sentences.en: Open it carefully - because it makes a terrific freezer / food bag .
example_sentences.zh: 细心打开-因为它可以做成了不起的冷冻/食品袋。

meaning: adj. 螺旋状的；螺线
zh_source: helical 螺旋的来自helix,螺旋形。

example_sentences.en: Metric helical spring lock washers general specifications-general specifications .
example_sentences.zh: 公制螺旋弹簧锁垫圈一般规格-一般规格。

example_sentences.en: Processing trough situated on helical springs .
example_sentences.zh: 处理槽位于螺旋状的弹簧上。

meaning: n. 干燥病

example_sentences.en: Vitamin a deficiency with corneal ulceration and xerosis .
example_sentences.zh: 伴有眼角膜溃疡及乾燥症之维生素Ａ缺乏。

example_sentences.en: It is recorded by essential oil complete works that ginseng essential oil can relieve xerosis cutis , improve cutaneous circulation and promote metabolism .
example_sentences.zh: 《精油全书》中记载人参精油有缓解皮肤干燥，促进皮肤血液循环，增进新陈代谢。

meaning: n. 神学家，宗教研究家
variation: 复数： theologians

example_sentences.en: He was basically a science-fiction theologian .
example_sentences.zh: 他基本上是科幻作品领域里的神学家。

example_sentences.en: Our best teacher on these matters is joseph soloveitchik , the great jewish theologian .
example_sentences.zh: 在这些事情上，我们最好的老师是伟大的犹太神学家约瑟夫soloveitchik。

meaning: vt. 保护；保持，保存；腌制食物；防腐处理vi. 保鲜；保持原状；做蜜饯；禁猎n. 蜜饯；防护用品；禁猎地；独占的事物（或范围）
zh_source: preserve 保护，维护，保存pre-,在前，早于，预先，-serv,保护，看护，词源同conserve,observe.

example_sentences.en: It 's meant to help preserve wealth , and as such doesn 't use direct leverage .
example_sentences.zh: 它的目的是帮助保存财富，因此并不使用直接杠杆。

example_sentences.en: Or has sergio marchionne figured out a way to preserve its wilderness cred ?
example_sentences.zh: 还是克莱斯勒的老板塞尔吉奥•马尔乔内已经想到了法子，保存自由客的越野口碑？

meaning: vt. 否认，消除

example_sentences.en: Sublate various concrete patterns of " alienation labour " and fully realize human values .
example_sentences.zh: 扬弃“异化劳动”的具体形式，全面实现人的价值。

example_sentences.en: In order to construct the scientific view of ecological ethic , we must sublate the anthrocentrism .
example_sentences.zh: 摘要构建科学的生态伦理观，必须扬弃人类中心主义。

meaning: adj. 喧嚷的，吵闹的；大声要求（或抗议）的；闹哄哄；聒噪

example_sentences.en: You know I hate the crowded and clamorous cities .
example_sentences.zh: 你知道我很讨厌拥挤而且吵闹的城市。

example_sentences.en: He was deafened by the clamorous voices .
example_sentences.zh: 喧闹声震得他耳朵快要聋了。

meaning: n. 上色，彩色，斑；彩斑

example_sentences.en: Many hollies have delightful vellow-and-white variegation .
example_sentences.zh: 许多冬青树长有好看的黄白相间的杂色斑。

example_sentences.en: But the author puts all this variegation to good use , taking expert measure of our capacity for self-delusion and complicity , not to mention desolation .
example_sentences.zh: 但作者提出这一切上色很好地利用，同时专家衡量我们的自卫能力，妄想和同谋，更遑论苍凉。

meaning: n. 直升机，直升飞机vt. 用直升飞机载送vi. 乘直升飞机
zh_source: helicopter 直升机helico-,螺旋，-pter,翅膀，词源同feather,pterodactyl.比喻用法。
variation: 复数： helicopters第三人称单数： helicopters过去式： helicoptered过去分词： helicoptered现在分词： helicoptering

example_sentences.en: China currently has fewer than 650 licenced helicopter pilots .
example_sentences.zh: 中国目前有驾照的直升机飞行员不到650人。

example_sentences.en: Evacuated by helicopter , he recovered after six operations .
example_sentences.zh: 被直升飞机营救出来后，他做了六次手术才康复。

meaning: n. 神学
zh_source: theology 神学theo-,神，-logy,学说，
variation: 复数： theologies

example_sentences.en: He wanders through a mysterious world of arcane theology .
example_sentences.zh: 他在奇妙的神学领域的神秘世界之中穿梭。

example_sentences.en: The brotherhood 's influence on bin laden was particularly striking , batarfi told me , because the movement 's emphasis on the need for political transformation in the muslim world differed from the more introspective islamic theology then prevalent in saudi arabia .
example_sentences.zh: 巴塔菲告诉我说，兄弟会对本拉登的影响是极其深远的，因为他们的兄弟会强调在穆斯林世界进行政治变革的需要从自身的伊斯兰宗教体系到沙特阿拉伯整个国家。

meaning: vt. 使恐怖，使惊吓；恐吓，吓唬；威胁
zh_source: terrify 使恐惧，使惊吓来自 terror,恐惧，惊恐，-fy,使。
variation: 第三人称单数： terrifies过去式： terrified过去分词： terrified现在分词： terrifying

example_sentences.en: The scum terrify honest citizens in freedom 's name .
example_sentences.zh: 那些人渣以自由的名义恐吓诚实的市民。

example_sentences.en: Then you scare me with dreams and terrify me with visions .
example_sentences.zh: 你就用梦惊骇我，用异象惊吓我。

meaning: vt. 使受辱；伤害（人的感情）；克制；抑制（肉体、情感等）vi. （指肌肤）变成坏疽
