example_sentences.en: His smile and beard , trimmed in a crescent , beam from posters plastered everywhere .
example_sentences.zh: 他微笑着摸摸剪成月牙形的胡须，到处张贴的海报里都看得到他的笑容。

meaning: adj. 公众的，公共的；公开的；政府的；人人知道的，知名的n. 大众；社会；公共场所；（文学家等的）爱读者
zh_source: public 公众的，百姓的，公共的，公开的来自拉丁语publicus,人民的，普通人的，来自populus,人，人民，词源同people,popular.并引申诸词义。

example_sentences.en: • Public interest salary : $ 58,376
example_sentences.zh: •公共部门薪金：58,376美元

example_sentences.en: Its theme : the secret to success in any business serving the broad public is superb customer service .
example_sentences.zh: 书的主旨是：任何服务大众的业务要想取得成功，秘诀是一流的客户服务。

meaning: adj. 神经的；背的，背侧的
zh_source: neural 神经的词源同nerve,跟腱，筋，神经。

example_sentences.en: However , the neural circuits that are activated are distinct .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，激活的神经的通路是不同的。

example_sentences.en: Glucose also plays an important role in improving memory , as it can pass from blood to the brain , providing energy and boosting neural metabolism .
example_sentences.zh: 葡萄糖也在改善记忆里扮演了重要的记忆，因为它可以从血液流向大脑，提供能源和促进神经的新陈代谢。

meaning: adj. 清晰的；精确的；正规的；精密
zh_source: precise 精确的pre-,预先，-cis,剪，切，词源同concise,excise.引申词义精确的。

example_sentences.en: Lore created an algorithm to determine precise inventory amounts and when to reorder .
example_sentences.zh: 劳发明了一种算法，来确定精确的库存数量以及何时补充库存。

example_sentences.en: A sundial showed very precise time .
example_sentences.zh: 日晷上显示的时间非常精确。

meaning: vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗vi. 利用；欺骗；施加影响
zh_source: impose 推行，强加im-,进入，使，-pos,放置，词源同position,compose.即放置，施压，引申词义推行，强加。
variation: 第三人称单数： imposes过去式： imposed过去分词： imposed现在分词： imposing

example_sentences.en: She would never impose on her anything she might dislike .
example_sentences.zh: 瓦内莎绝不会把安洁莉卡不喜欢的任何东西强加给她。

example_sentences.en: More broadly , they impose costs on our entire collective culture .
example_sentences.zh: 更宽泛地讲，他们给我们的集体文化强加代价。

meaning: n. 不和，纠纷，争吵
variation: 复数： dissensions

example_sentences.en: It was hobbled first by incompetence and internal dissension .
example_sentences.zh: 开始时，它由于无能和内部纠纷而行动缓慢。

example_sentences.en: Father 's will caused much dissension among his children .
example_sentences.zh: 父亲的遗嘱引起了子女之间的纷争。

meaning: n. 出版；出版物；公布；发表
zh_source: publication 出版，发行来自拉丁语publicare,使公开化，使公众化，词源同public.引申词义出版，发行。

example_sentences.en: There 's an advantage to being a web-first publication and being able to speak that language .
example_sentences.zh: 成为以网页为主要载体的刊物、并且能用这种语言进行表达有一定的优势。

example_sentences.en: The publication offers a " daily jenny " column every 24 hours .
example_sentences.zh: 这份出版物每24个小时推出一篇“每日珍妮”（DailyJenny）专栏文章。

meaning: n. 中部，中间，当中prep. 在…中间（等于amidst）adv. 在中间，在中央
zh_source: midst 中间的来自mid,中间的，-s,所有格后缀，-t,寄生字母。比较against.

example_sentences.en: But , in their midst , there is one truly strange character .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，在他们中间，有一个确实奇怪的卡通人像。

example_sentences.en: Cesar stood in the midst of all the dogs , his back straight and his shoulders square .
example_sentences.zh: 西泽站在狗狗们中间，他的后背笔直肩膀很宽。

meaning: n. （尤指史前作石碑用的）巨石
zh_source: megalith 巨石mega-,巨大的，-lith,石头，词源同lithilogy.

example_sentences.en: Macedonia : people watch the first rays of the sunrise through the astronomical stone markers at the ancient megalith observatory of kokino ( photograph : georgi licovski / epa )
example_sentences.zh: 马其顿：人们观看第一缕刚刚升起的阳光穿射过古代科其（kokino）巨石望台的天文石遗迹（photograph:georgilicovski/epa）

meaning: n. 神经炎

example_sentences.en: Magnetic resonance imaging and computed tomography in optic neuritis .
example_sentences.zh: 视神经炎患者之核磁共振及电脑断层摄影研究。

example_sentences.en: Optic neuritis may occur in two guises .
example_sentences.zh: 视神经炎可能以两种形式出现。

meaning: n. 中部，中间，当中prep. 在…中间（等于amidst）adv. 在中间，在中央
zh_source: midst 中间的来自mid,中间的，-s,所有格后缀，-t,寄生字母。比较against.

example_sentences.en: But , in their midst , there is one truly strange character .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，在他们中间，有一个确实奇怪的卡通人像。

example_sentences.en: Cesar stood in the midst of all the dogs , his back straight and his shoulders square .
example_sentences.zh: 西泽站在狗狗们中间，他的后背笔直肩膀很宽。

meaning: n. 减少，减小；减少量vi.&vt. 减少，减小
zh_source: decrease 减低de-, 向下。-cre, 创造，增加，词源同create, crescent.
variation: 复数： decreases第三人称单数： decreases过去式： decreased过去分词： decreased现在分词： decreasing

example_sentences.en: But contact between the two schools will decrease .
example_sentences.zh: 不过两所学校之间的联系将会减少。

example_sentences.en: Some women find a decrease in sexual sensation after an episiotomy .
example_sentences.zh: 有的女性发现，外阴切开术后性感觉降低了。

meaning: vt. 浸没；施浸礼；沉迷…中，陷入
zh_source: immerse 浸没im-,进入，使，-mers,浸入，词源同emerge,submerse.
variation: 第三人称单数： immerses过去式： immersed过去分词： immersed现在分词： immersing

example_sentences.en: Children immerse themselves in their own artificial worlds of miniatures .
example_sentences.zh: 儿童们沉浸在他们自己的微型人造世界里。

example_sentences.en: Get the cloth or clothes you need and immerse them in the solution .
example_sentences.zh: 把你所要加工的布料或者衣服浸泡到刚才的溶液里。

meaning: n. 词典编纂
zh_source: lexicography 词典编纂学lexico-,词汇，-graphy,书写。用于指词典编纂学。
variation: 复数： lexicographers

example_sentences.en: Lexicography is really more about material science .
example_sentences.zh: 词典学更类似于材料科学。

example_sentences.en: Computational lexicography , vocabulary learning , and standardized tests .
example_sentences.zh: 计算辞典学、词汇教学、标准考试。

meaning: n. 自杀；自杀者；自杀行为vt. 自杀adj. 自杀的
zh_source: suicide 自杀来自拉丁语 suicidium,自杀，来自 sui,自己的，词源同 self,-cid,杀，词源同 herbicide,homicide.
variation: 复数： suicides易混淆的单词： Suicide

example_sentences.en: Could living at high altitude raise suicide risk ?
example_sentences.zh: 生活在高海拔能增加自杀风险？

example_sentences.en: And was the master sargent 's death an act of heroism or suicide ?
example_sentences.zh: 军士长的死是英雄的行为呢？还是自杀行为呢？

meaning: n. 胡说，废话；荒谬的念头；愚蠢的行为；胡闹adj. 无意义的；荒谬的int. 荒唐
zh_source: nonsense 胡说non-,无，非，sense,有意义词。
variation: 复数： nonsenses

example_sentences.en: One person close to mr prince dismisses this as nonsense .
example_sentences.zh: 一位接近普林斯的人士将这种言论斥之为胡说八道。

example_sentences.en: You 're just talking nonsense .
example_sentences.zh: 少废话，我怎么说你就怎么办。

meaning: adj. 无法抗拒的；诱惑人的，具有非常的魅力的；不可抗拒；不可阻挡
zh_source: irresistible 无法抑制的ir-,不，非，resistible,抑制的。

example_sentences.en: The essence is a magnetic personality that makes bond bold and irresistible .
example_sentences.zh: 这个有磁性的个性本质创造了邦德的英勇且不可抗拒。

example_sentences.en: We appear to be wired to find all manner of fads psychologically irresistible .
example_sentences.zh: 我们似乎会在心理上不可抗拒地搜寻各种形式的流行风尚。

meaning: n. 消耗；减量；缩减

example_sentences.en: This is a default decrement that you cannot change .
example_sentences.zh: 这是默认减少量，您无法更改。

example_sentences.en: The natural logarithm of this ratio is called the logarithmic decrement .
example_sentences.zh: 此比率自然对数称为对数的减量。

meaning: n. 强加；被迫接受；过分的要求；税收
zh_source: imposition 颁布，实施来自impose,推行，强加。引申词义颁布，实施。
variation: 复数： impositions

example_sentences.en: The unilateral imposition of tariffs would be illegal under global trade rules .
example_sentences.zh: 在全球贸易规则之下，单方面征收关税可能是非法的。

example_sentences.en: Imposition of a national sales tax is a very live option sitting atop the obama administration 's policy table .
example_sentences.zh: 征收全国营业税现在已成为奥巴马政府的首选政策。

meaning: vi. 旋转，回旋
zh_source: gyrate 旋转来自PIE*geu, 弯，转，进一步来自PIE*sker, 弯，转，词源同ring, circle.
variation: 第三人称单数： gyrates过去式： gyrated过去分词： gyrated现在分词： gyrating

example_sentences.en: Gyrate atrophy of the choroid and retina .
example_sentences.zh: 脑回状脉络膜视网膜萎缩。

example_sentences.en: Gyrate the dancers gyrated wildly to the strong beat of the music .
example_sentences.zh: 跳舞者随着音乐的强烈节奏而猛烈地旋转着。

meaning: n. 公众信息；宣传效用；宣传；公诸于众的状况
zh_source: publicity 宣传，报道来自public,公众的，公开的，-ity,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: State and local governments are readying their publicity machines .
example_sentences.zh: 州政府和地方政府正在为宣传人口普查做准备。

example_sentences.en: The constant bad publicity cannot help .
example_sentences.zh: 对于这一切，持续的坏名声将无所作为。

meaning: n. <医>神经病学；<医>神经病学家adj. <医>神经病学的
zh_source: neurology 神经学neuro-,神经，-logy,学说。

example_sentences.en: Charcot 's work encompassed other aspects of neurology as well .
example_sentences.zh: charcot的工作同样囊括了神经学的其他方面。

example_sentences.en: The navy isn 't the only one intrigued by neurology 's prospects for warfare .
example_sentences.zh: 海军并不是唯一对神经学的战争前景产生兴趣的。

meaning: n. 感激，感谢；感激的样子；谢意；恩义
zh_source: gratitude 感谢，感激来自词根grat, 感谢，词源同grace, gratitude.

example_sentences.en: Reinforce this by cultivating an attitude of gratitude .
example_sentences.zh: 通过培养感激的态度加强这一观点。

example_sentences.en: It should be the attitude of gratitude .
example_sentences.zh: 当以感恩的心来领受。

meaning: n. 陀螺仪，回转仪
zh_source: gyroscope 陀螺仪gyro-, 旋转。-scope, 看，见telescope. 后用做科技名词。
variation: 复数： gyroscopes

example_sentences.en: The device features 14 saline-based sensors and a gyroscope .
example_sentences.zh: 这款设备拥有14个基于盐水的传感器和一个陀螺仪。

example_sentences.en: An iru is a gyroscope that records changes in acceleration .
example_sentences.zh: iru是一个可以记录加速度变化的陀螺仪。

meaning: vt. 将…关起来；扣押，监禁；搁置，保留；蓄水
zh_source: impound 扣押im-,进入，使，pound,兽栏。即关在栏子里面，引申词义扣押。
variation: 第三人称单数： impounds过去式： impounded过去分词： impounded现在分词： impounding

example_sentences.en: And while you 're at it , impound those bikes .
example_sentences.zh: 既然来了，所有的车子都先行扣押。

example_sentences.en: At the federal impound lot downtown .
example_sentences.zh: 在市区的联邦扣押车场上。

meaning: vt.& vi. 出版，发行；发表，宣布（结婚等）；公布，颁布；出版…的著作
zh_source: publish 出版，发行来自拉丁语publicare,使公开化，使公众化，-ish,动词后缀，词源同finish.引申词义出版，发行等。

example_sentences.en: In science , almost all the papers we publish are written together with several people in research groups .
example_sentences.zh: 在科学领域，我们发表的所有论文几乎都是和其它研究小组合作的产品。

example_sentences.en: What users do : publish and share short bursts of celebrity gossip and breaking news
example_sentences.zh: 用途：发布、分享各类名人八卦和重大新闻

meaning: adj. 月的，月球的；阴历的；（光）苍白的，微弱的；银的，含银的
zh_source: lunar 月亮的来自拉丁文luna,月亮，词源同lumen,light.
variation: 易混淆的单词： Lunar

example_sentences.en: Food is grown , harvested and sometimes even consumed in accordance with lunar cycles .
example_sentences.zh: 农作物的生长，收获，甚至有时连吃喝都要与月亮的运行周期相一致。

example_sentences.en: The higher powers are mainly used for lunar , planetary , and binary star observations .
example_sentences.zh: 更高的放大率通常用于月亮，行星和双子星的观察。

meaning: n. 严守时间；正确，规矩

example_sentences.en: Reliability and punctuality have become more important .
example_sentences.zh: 可靠性和准时性变得更为重要。

example_sentences.en: The economists kaushik basu and jorgen weibull argue that punctuality is not a unique equilibrium .
example_sentences.zh: 经济学家考希克巴苏（kaushikbasu）和乔根韦布尔（jorgenweibull）提出，准时不是唯一的均衡状态。

meaning: n. 旋翼机

example_sentences.en: An introduction to the advances in gyroplane technology and the emerging market opportunities for a new generation of gyroplanes ranging from small vtol & ustol gyroplanes to large vtol gyrodyne airliners or freighters with 20 ton payload capacity .
example_sentences.zh: 介绍旋科技的进步,以及新一代旋翼机的市场机会,从小型超短距离升降和垂直升降的旋翼机到可垂直升降,载重20吨以上的大型直升旋翼客机和货运机.

example_sentences.en: Breakthroughs in modern gyroplane technology-an introduction to the advances in gyroplane technology and the emerging market opportunities for a new generation of gyroplanes ranging from small vtol & ustol gyroplanes to large vtol gyrodyne airliners or freighters with 20 ton payload capacity .
example_sentences.zh: 现代旋翼机科技的突破-介绍旋科技的进步，以及新一代旋翼机的市场机会，从小型超短距离升降和垂直升降的旋翼机到可垂直升降，载重20吨以上的大型直升旋翼客机和货运机。

meaning: v. 坚持；固执；存留；继续存在
zh_source: persist 坚持per-,完全的，-sist,站立，坚持，词源同stand,assist.

example_sentences.en: Specifically , the wave of popular dissatisfaction sweeping across europe would persist .
example_sentences.zh: 具体而言，席卷欧洲的普遍不满情绪将会持续。

example_sentences.en: The jitters in china 's stock market could persist .
example_sentences.zh: 中国股市的恐慌情绪可能会持续下去。

meaning: adj. 模棱两可的；意义不明的；模糊的；（指人等）不可靠的
zh_source: equivocal 模棱两可的来自equal, 平等的。-voc, 说话，词源同voice, invoke.引申义模棱两可的。

example_sentences.en: The russian delegates were strikingly equivocal about free enterprise .
example_sentences.zh: 俄罗斯的代表们在对待自由企业上突显了模棱两可的态度。

example_sentences.en: The african union , many of whose members have received cash from col gaddafi , is equivocal .
example_sentences.zh: 非洲联盟（africanunion）的态度比较暧昧，该联盟的许多成员国曾接受卡扎菲上校的资金援助。

meaning: n. 对手；反对者；敌手adj. 对立的；敌对的
zh_source: opponent 反对者，对手op-,相对，对着的，-pon,放置，词源同pose,component.即对着放的，引申词义反对者，对手。
variation: 复数： opponents

example_sentences.en: He may even be elected without a serious opponent .
example_sentences.zh: 甚至都没有一个真正意义上的对手。

example_sentences.en: That of an enthusiast or that of an opponent ?
example_sentences.zh: 由支持者来主导是是反对者来主导？

meaning: vt. 不时打断某事物；使用标点符号
zh_source: punctuate 打标点符号来自拉丁语punctum,点，刺点，来自pungere,刺，击，词源同pungent,point.引申词义打标点符号。

meaning: adj. 新石器时代的
zh_source: Neolithic 新石器时代的neo-,新，-lith,石头，词源同lithosphere。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Neolithic

example_sentences.en: Why do you collect neolithic pottery ?
example_sentences.zh: 您为什么要收藏新石器时代的陶器？

example_sentences.en: In fact , nobody really knows how neolithic man managed to hew these pillars .
example_sentences.zh: 实际上，没人知道新石器时代的人用什么方法凿出了这些石柱。

meaning: vt.& vi. （使）混合；相融；融入；渐渐消失在某物中
zh_source: merge 合并，融合来自拉丁语mergere,浸入，浸没，来自PIE*mezg,浸入，浸没，词源同immerse,emerge.字母z被r音化。引申词义合并，整合等。

example_sentences.en: It plans to merge with rival u.s. airways to form the world 's biggest airline .
example_sentences.zh: 它打算和竞争对手全美航空合并，从而打造全球最大的航空公司。

example_sentences.en: The company also has moved to merge overlapping products .
example_sentences.zh: 谷歌还开始着手合并有交叉的产品。

meaning: vt.& vi. 增加，增大，增多vt. 增强，增进；[缝纫]放（针）vi. 增强；增进；增殖，繁殖；[缝纫]放针
zh_source: increase 增长in-,进入，使，-cre,增加，创造，词源同create,crescent.
variation: 复数： increases第三人称单数： increases过去式： increased过去分词： increased现在分词： increasing易混淆的单词： Increase

example_sentences.en: Saudi arabia is driving the increase .
example_sentences.zh: 沙特正在推动提高产量上限。

example_sentences.en: What are the percentages of increase ?
example_sentences.zh: 那么增长的百分比是多少？

meaning: adj. 免费的，无偿的；无必要的；无故的，无理由的
zh_source: gratuitous 无缘无故的，无谓的来自词根grat, 感谢，词源同grace, gratitude. 原指表达感谢，报答，免费给予。后词义贬义化，指无缘无故的，莫名其妙的。比较汉语无功不受禄。

example_sentences.en: But civility has been sacrificed to the gratuitous insult .
example_sentences.zh: 然而礼貌却沦为无端侮辱的牺牲品。

example_sentences.en: It is difficult to get the attention of most gamers under the age of 25 because our games offer no first-person perspective or gratuitous violence .
example_sentences.zh: 因为我们的游戏不提供第一人称视角和无端暴力所以很难吸引25岁以下的年轻玩家。

meaning: vi. 使用模棱两可的话隐瞒真相；躲闪；推诿；含糊其词；说话支吾，态度暧昧
variation: 第三人称单数： equivocates过去式： equivocated过去分词： equivocated现在分词： equivocating

example_sentences.en: Please don 't equivocate just give me a clear reply .
example_sentences.zh: 别说模棱两可的话，给我一个明确的答复。

example_sentences.en: Ex. you can tell when they 're stressed out , they 'll equivocate and vacillate .
example_sentences.zh: 当他们压力过大时，你是可以辨别出来的，因为他们会支支吾吾、犹豫不决。

meaning: adj. 相对的；对面的；对立的；[数学]（顶、边等）对的prep. （表示位置）在…的对面；[数学]（顶、边等）对的；与…在一排；（表示方式）与…联合主演adv. 在对面，对过n. 对立面，对立物，相反的人[事物]
zh_source: opposite 相反的，对立的来自oppose,反对，-ite,形容词后缀。即反对的，对立的。
variation: 复数： opposites

example_sentences.en: Some liars do the opposite .
example_sentences.zh: 有一些说谎者完全相反。

example_sentences.en: I could argue the opposite .
example_sentences.zh: 我对此持有相反观点。

meaning: n. 审计员；查账员；听者；旁听生
variation: 复数： auditors

example_sentences.en: The concept of auditor independence was completely ignored .
example_sentences.zh: 所谓审计师的独立性在此案中被完全破坏。

example_sentences.en: Mr. yamada resigned from his post as corporate auditor last month .
example_sentences.zh: 山田秀雄上个月辞去了公司审计师的职务。

meaning: abbr. Midsummer Day (Saturday nearest June 21 or 22) 仲夏日（接近6月20日或22日的星期六）；Midsummer Eve or Midsummer Night 仲夏夜前夕或仲夏夜
zh_source: midsummer 仲夏，中夏Midsummer ’s Day 施洗约翰节（6月24日）mid-,中间的，summer,夏天。即仲夏节，同时也为“施洗者约翰”的节日。参照百度百科。

example_sentences.en: Eggs with dill are a traditional midsummer food .
example_sentences.zh: 加小茴香的鸡蛋是传统的仲夏节食品。

example_sentences.en: A midsummer night 's dream by william shakespeare ( download pdf )
example_sentences.zh: 仲夏夜之梦（威廉莎士比亚）-下载

meaning: n. 增长；增量；增额； 定期的加薪
zh_source: increment 增加，加薪in-,进入，使，-cre,增加，创造，词源同create,crescent.引申词义加薪。
variation: 复数： increments

example_sentences.en: Nor is increment 3.1 the last planned raptor upgrade .
example_sentences.zh: 增量3.1并不是猛禽战机的最后一次升级。

example_sentences.en: In the chart shown , each increment represents an extra $ 10000 .
example_sentences.zh: 在下面的图表中，每个梯度代表10000美元的增量。

meaning: n. 渴望，贪婪；（抗体与抗原的）亲合力

example_sentences.en: The man began to eat with avidity .
example_sentences.zh: 那人贪婪地吃起来。

example_sentences.en: Significance and detection of rubella virus specific igg avidity .
example_sentences.zh: 风疹病毒特异性igg抗体亲和力测定的临床意义。

meaning: n. 观众席，听众席；礼堂，会堂

example_sentences.en: At the doors of the auditorium , chaos reigns .
example_sentences.zh: 在礼堂的门前，混乱大当其道。

example_sentences.en: The weightlifting auditorium has a leaky roof .
example_sentences.zh: 举重大礼堂内的屋顶漏着水。

meaning: vt.& vi. 淹没；把…浸入；沉没，下潜；使沉浸vt. 淹没；把…浸入；沉浸vi. 淹没；潜入水中；湮没
zh_source: submerge 浸入，淹没sub-,在下，-merg,浸入，词源同 emerge,immerse.
variation: 第三人称单数： submerges过去式： submerged过去分词： submerged现在分词： submerging

example_sentences.en: Icebrrg use light to submerge its website deep underwater .
example_sentences.zh: icebrrg利用光照使页面潜入水下。

example_sentences.en: And eventually submerge these volcanoes .
example_sentences.zh: 最终把这一片火山都淹没了。

meaning: adj. 持续的；坚持不懈的；持久的；坚持不渝
zh_source: persistent 坚持的，执着的来自persist,坚持。

example_sentences.en: A persistent shortfall in demand will weigh on supply .
example_sentences.zh: 持续的需求不足将对供给造成压力。

example_sentences.en: Lovelock recognized that persistent almost-fell is a hallmark of life .
example_sentences.zh: 洛夫洛克认为这持久的摇摇欲坠状态是生命的显著特征。

meaning: vt.& vi. 生（儿、女），生育，生殖
zh_source: procreate 繁殖，生殖pro-,向前，create,创造，生长。引申词义繁殖，生殖。

example_sentences.en: Most young women feel a biological need to procreate .
example_sentences.zh: 大多数的年轻妇女都有生儿育女的生理需要。

example_sentences.en: While priests were denied the right to marry and procreate , he said , their situation would remain impossible .
example_sentences.zh: 他说，只要牧师仍被剥夺结婚生于的权利，他们的处境就是令人难以接受的。

meaning: n. 照片，相片vt.& vi. 为…拍照；拍照，摄影；成为拍照对象，在照片上显得
zh_source: photograph 照片，照相phot-,光，-graph,写，记录。即把光记录下来，引申词义照相，相片。

example_sentences.en: There is a lot to see in this photograph !
example_sentences.zh: 这张照片里有很多东西值得看看！

example_sentences.en: So it will be interesting to hear her thoughts on this photograph .
example_sentences.zh: 所以，她关于这次拍照的想法，应该会很有意思。

meaning: n. 报酬；小账；小费；养老金
zh_source: gratuity 小费来自词根grat, 感谢，词源同grace, gratitude. 即出于感谢给的小费。
variation: 复数： gratuities

example_sentences.en: The tipping problem in many european countries is solved by automatically adding a 15 per cent gratuity to the bill .
example_sentences.zh: 许多欧洲国家自动加收15%的消费费用来解决付小费问题。

example_sentences.en: In general , the more westernized the place is , the more likely you 'll be expected to leave a gratuity .
example_sentences.zh: 总的说来，一个地方西化的程度越高，你就越有可能需要给小费。

meaning: n. 程序；节目，节目单；计划，安排v. [计]给…编写程序；为…制定计划；设计安排活动；编排
zh_source: program 程序，计划，方案来自pro-,向前，朝向，-gram,写。引申诸相关词义。

example_sentences.en: ( We have a great management-training program . )
example_sentences.zh: （我们有很出色的管理培训计划。）

example_sentences.en: Last year a new program sent employees to ghana and india to work on community projects .
example_sentences.zh: 去年，这家公司还启动了一个新方案，将员工送往加纳和印度从事社区项目。

meaning: adj. 中间的n. 期中考试
zh_source: midterm 中期的mid-,中间的，term,期限。即中期的。

example_sentences.en: Traditionally , midterm elections had been fought seat by seat .
example_sentences.zh: 按惯例，中期选举的争夺是一个席位一个席位地展开的。

example_sentences.en: Economists and others weigh in on what the midterm elections mean for the broader economy .
example_sentences.zh: 经济学家和其他人士解读美国中期选举对整体经济而言意味着什么。

meaning: vt. 刺，戳；贬低，削弱；揭穿vi. （指轮胎等）被刺穿n. 刺痕；（车胎等的）刺孔
zh_source: puncture 小孔，小洞来自拉丁语punctum,点，刺点，来自pungere,刺，击，词源同pungent,point.引申词义小孔，小洞。

example_sentences.en: The needles painlessly puncture the skin , but do not go through it .
example_sentences.zh: 针头会毫无痛觉地刺进皮肤，但不会刺穿。

example_sentences.en: The last thing general motors ( gm ) needs is another puncture .
example_sentences.zh: 通用公司最害怕的就是遭受另一轮的削弱。

meaning: n. 神经元；神经细胞
zh_source: neuron 神经元neuro-,神经，-on,医学名词后缀。
variation: 复数： neuronsneurones

example_sentences.en: So when the neuron fires it glows yellow .
example_sentences.zh: 因此，当神经元受到刺激时就会发出黄光。

example_sentences.en: I don 't have much positive to say about motor neuron disease .
example_sentences.zh: 对于运动神经元疾病，我没有太多正面积极的话说。

meaning: v. 抵抗，抗拒；忍耐；反对，抵制n. 防染剂；防腐剂
zh_source: resist 反抗，抵制re-,向后，往回，-sist,站，站立，词源同 stand,assist.引申词义反抗，抑制。
variation: 第三人称单数： resists过去式： resisted过去分词： resisted现在分词： resisting

example_sentences.en: The starting point is planting varieties that resist disease .
example_sentences.zh: 这样做的初衷是多品种可以抵御虫害。

example_sentences.en: They grab jake , who doesn 't resist .
example_sentences.zh: 他们抓住jake，后者没有做出任何抵抗。

meaning: adj. 听不见的
zh_source: inaudible 听不到的in-,不，非，audible,听得到的。

example_sentences.en: Depending on the circumstances , the resulting soundwave may be so faint as to be inaudible to human ears .
example_sentences.zh: 在某些环境中，用这种文件处理后的声波可能会变得很微弱，人耳几乎听不到。

example_sentences.en: Specifically , it causes the user 's smart phone to emit a high-frequency noise that 's inaudible to humans but that the pesky insects reportedly can 't stand .
example_sentences.zh: 具体说来，它让用户的智能手机发出一种高频噪声，这声音人听不到，但那些烦人的蚊虫却受不了。

meaning: n. 忘恩负义的人

example_sentences.en: Don 't say that : you ingrate son of a bitch .
example_sentences.zh: 别那么说，你这个忘恩负义的王八蛋。

example_sentences.en: That ingrate can 't stop hounding me for five minutes .
example_sentences.zh: 那个烂人连五分钟都不让我歇。

meaning: n. 复杂性，错综复杂的状态；复杂的事物；复合物
variation: 复数： complexities

example_sentences.en: Markets no longer reward instruments for complexity and opacity .
example_sentences.zh: 市场不再奖赏金融工具的复杂性和不透明性。

example_sentences.en: I 'm fascinated by the chemical complexity of semen .
example_sentences.zh: 精液复杂的化学成分让我充满兴趣。

meaning: n. 双关语，含糊措辞

example_sentences.en: I feel your child is suffering from epileptic equivoke which we call abdominal epilepsy and epileptic headaches .
example_sentences.zh: 我认为您的孩子患是的双关型的癫痫，我们把它叫做腹型癫痫和癫痫性头疼。

meaning: adj. 辛辣的；刺激性的；苦痛的；尖刻的
zh_source: pungent 刺鼻的，一针见血的来自拉丁语pungere,刺，叮，咬，来自PIE*pung,刺，击，打，词源同point,puncture.引申词义刺鼻的，一针见血的等。

example_sentences.en: Years ago , it was the site of such pungent industries as tanning and tallow .
example_sentences.zh: 很久以前，这一区域主要是制革和牛油工业，气味刺鼻。

example_sentences.en: Instead of recoiling at the smell of something foreign and pungent , get to know it better .
example_sentences.zh: 不要一闻到一些奇特的和刺鼻的味道就打退堂鼓，要更好地去了解它。

meaning: n. 中途，半途；娱乐场，游乐场；折中办法，中间道路adv. 中途地，中间地；中途，半路adj. 居中的，中途的

example_sentences.en: In the seven novels , christmas day always falls midway .
example_sentences.zh: 七部小说里，圣诞节假期总是被中途打断。

example_sentences.en: Midway into writing my book , my wake-up call was my cholesterol check .
example_sentences.zh: 在我写作中途，我的闹铃是我的胆固醇检查结果。

meaning: n. <医>神经机能病，神经衰弱症
zh_source: neurosis 神经官能症，神经过敏neuro-,神经，-osis,疾病症状。
variation: 复数： neuroses

example_sentences.en: Such problems can distort personality and lead to neurosis .
example_sentences.zh: 这类问题会扭曲人的个性并引起神经官能症。

example_sentences.en: Objective to explore the effective method for depressive neurosis .
example_sentences.zh: 目的探讨抑郁性神经症有效治疗方法。

meaning: adj. <正>好战的，好争吵的，好斗的；黩武
zh_source: bellicose 好战的来自词根bell, 好战，词源同duel, 决斗。

example_sentences.en: Tehran has responded by turning up the bellicose rhetoric .
example_sentences.zh: 伊朗政府的回应是抛出一套好战言论。

example_sentences.en: But elsewhere he has repeatedly taken a more bellicose line .
example_sentences.zh: 但是在其他方面，他反复采取了更加好战的态度。

meaning: n. 抵抗；阻力；抗力；电阻
zh_source: resistance 反抗，抵制来自 resist,反抗，抑制。
variation: 复数： resistances

example_sentences.en: Stop following the path of least resistance .
example_sentences.zh: 不要走阻力最小的人生道路。

example_sentences.en: They have their ways of expressing resistance .
example_sentences.zh: 他们有他们表达抵抗的方式。

meaning: n. 穷凶极恶；弥天大罪；巨大；极大
variation: 复数： enormities

example_sentences.en: That gives some idea of the enormity of apple 's recent success on the back of the iphone and ipad .
example_sentences.zh: 这让人们对苹果（apple）在相继推出iphone和ipad之后获得的巨大成功，有了一些概念。

example_sentences.en: The enormity of the duke and duchess of cambridge 's global influence is daunting , especially for kate , whose look is admired , copied and analysed everywhere .
example_sentences.zh: 剑桥公爵及其夫人巨大的国际影响力令人讶异，特别是对于凯特来说，不管在哪里，她的表情都会受人敬仰、被人模仿乃至分析。

meaning: v. （使）突然燃烧，（使）爆燃

example_sentences.en: With deflagrate zirconia of rice of law preparation accept and its mechanism .
example_sentences.zh: 用爆燃法制备纳米氧化锆及其机理。

meaning: vt. 产生，引起；唤起
zh_source: evoke 唤醒e-, 向外。-vok, 叫，喊，词源同voice, invoke.
variation: 第三人称单数： evokes过去式： evoked过去分词： evoked现在分词： evoking

example_sentences.en: Use yellow to evoke pleasant cheerful feelings .
example_sentences.zh: 用黄色唤起愉快、高兴的感情。

example_sentences.en: She mentioned this with the slight scorn that such houses evoke in her .
example_sentences.zh: 她提起这件事的时候，语气里充满了轻蔑，那些时髦房子唤起的轻蔑。

meaning: vt. 使复杂化；使错综，使混乱；使卷入；变复杂adj. 复杂的；麻烦的；（昆虫的翅）纵折的
zh_source: complicate 复杂化com-, 强调。-plic, 编织，组成，词源apply,implicate. 即多成分，复杂的。
variation: 第三人称单数： complicates过去式： complicated过去分词： complicated现在分词： complicating

example_sentences.en: In any case , these situations complicate human relations .
example_sentences.zh: 不管怎样，这种情形使人们的关系复杂化了。

example_sentences.en: But it could complicate the criminal prosecution .
example_sentences.zh: 但是那会让刑事诉讼更加复杂化。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使摆姿势；以…身份出现；招摇；炫耀vt. 提出；造成（威胁、问题等）；引起；产生n. 姿势；姿态；装腔作势；伪装
zh_source: pose 摆姿势，佯装，冒充pose 提出，提问，造成威胁来自古法语poser,放置，提议，来自拉丁语pausare,停止，暂停，停歇，休息，词源同pause.同时，词义与另一个拉丁词ponere的过去分词positus相混淆并大量吸收了该词词义，来自ponere,放置，摆放，词源同position,component.引申词义摆出姿势，佯装，冒充等。缩写自oppose,对着放，反对。引申词义提问，造成威胁等。

example_sentences.en: Hamas 's rocket attacks pose an irreversible threat .
example_sentences.zh: 哈马斯的火箭弹袭击却造成不可逆转的威胁。

example_sentences.en: This pose was what berg hoped to attain .
example_sentences.zh: 而这个姿势也正是berg所希望普及的。

meaning: adj. 生长水中的，浸没的，淹没的v. 使沉入水中，淹没( submerse的过去式和过去分词 )

example_sentences.en: Research progress on influencing of environmental factors on the growth of submersed macrophytes .
example_sentences.zh: 沉水植物生长影响因子研究进展。

example_sentences.en: Submersed , amphibious , or terrestrial herbs , rooted at nodes when terrestrial or at plant base when aquatic ; stem slender .
example_sentences.zh: 沉水，两栖，或者陆生草本，陆生植物在节上生根，水生植物在植株基部生根；茎纤细。

meaning: n. 精神失常者，精神病人；疯子；极愚蠢的人；狂人adj. 疯狂的；精神错乱的；愚蠢的；极端的
zh_source: lunatic 精神病来自拉丁语luna,月亮，词源同lunar.因西方古代医学认为月相的盈亏可引发暂时的神经错乱，也就是月亮效应，但时至今日，医学界仍对这一现象争论不休，没有定论。
variation: 复数： lunatics

example_sentences.en: One lunatic with a gun could have changed everything .
example_sentences.zh: 如果有个带枪的疯子，一切可能全被改变。

example_sentences.en: If the charges are true , this capable man is a lunatic .
example_sentences.zh: 如果相关指控属实，那么这位能干的人就是个疯子。

meaning: vt. 讨好，谄媚
zh_source: ingratiate 讨好，巴结in-,进入，使，-grat,致意，恩情，感谢，词源同congratulation,gratitude.即让别人感恩的，引申词义讨好，巴结。
variation: 第三人称单数： ingratiates过去式： ingratiated过去分词： ingratiated现在分词： ingratiating

example_sentences.en: He had sent it to ingratiate himself and to get intelligence .
example_sentences.zh: 他送这些炸药过去是为了讨好利比亚政权从而获取情报。

example_sentences.en: Some of the bands I have pretended to like to ingratiate myself I turn out to actually like .
example_sentences.zh: 为了迎合我自己，我曾经假装喜欢的一些乐队，最后却真的让我喜欢上他们了。

meaning: vt. 使得到休养vi. 使得到娱乐/消遣
zh_source: recreate 再创造re-,再，重新，create,创造。
variation: 第三人称单数： recreates过去式： recreated过去分词： recreated现在分词： recreating

example_sentences.en: Failed to recreate completed instances and relationship views .
example_sentences.zh: 无法重新创建已完成实例和关系视图。

example_sentences.en: To recreate the conditions immediately after the big bang .
example_sentences.zh: 这是为了重现宇宙大爆炸之后瞬间的情形。

meaning: adj. 臭名远扬的；恶名昭著的；明目张胆的
zh_source: flagrant 罪恶昭彰的来自PIE*bhleg, 照明，闪光，来自PIE*bhel的扩大形式，词源同flame, blaze. 原义为闪光的，辉煌的。然后由于不知道的原因词义贬义化。参照中国反腐案例。

example_sentences.en: Once having caught her in a flagrant act .
example_sentences.zh: 一旦遇上了有公然她。

example_sentences.en: In flagrant disregard of the law .
example_sentences.zh: 明目张胆地置法律于不顾。

meaning: vi. （靠很少的钱或食物）维持生活，生存下去
zh_source: subsist 维持生活，度日sub-,在下，-sist,站立，词源同 stand,assist.引申比喻义勉强维持生活，度日等。
variation: 第三人称单数： subsists过去式： subsisted过去分词： subsisted现在分词： subsisting

example_sentences.en: Many already subsist on the mere threshold of survival .
example_sentences.zh: 许多人早已是仅仅能够维持生存。

example_sentences.en: And how do the poor subsist on such a meagre amount ?
example_sentences.zh: 穷人又是怎样靠这般小数目维持生活的？

meaning: n. 标准；规范；准则；（劳动）定额
zh_source: norm 规范，准则来自拉丁语norma,木工的方尺，准则，可能来自希腊语gnome,裁决，判断的基准，来自PIE*gne,知道，了解，词源同know,gnome,notice.

example_sentences.en: Kindness and courtesy are no longer the expected norm . "
example_sentences.zh: 友善礼貌不再是期待的行为标准。”

example_sentences.en: Quarterly reporting is already the norm on the mainland .
example_sentences.zh: 在中国内地，季度业绩报告已成为标准。

meaning: v. 用尽，耗尽
adj. 交战的；卷入冲突的；好战的；交战国的n. 交战国，交战者；参加斗殴的人或集团
zh_source: belligerent 好斗的词根bell, 好战，同Bellona, 司战女神。ger, 含有，带来，同ingest, 消化。
variation: 复数： belligerents

example_sentences.en: A whole nation of belligerent , snappish people ?
example_sentences.zh: 整个国家都是好战暴躁的人民？

example_sentences.en: But it has succeeded mainly in pushing the more moderate ones together with the most belligerent .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，军事干预的主要成就在于让温和派与最好战的分子走到一起。

meaning: n. 火焰；热情，激情；〈俚〉爱人，情人；激动vi. 燃烧，发出火焰；面红；闪光vt. 烧；激起，激怒
zh_source: flame 火焰来自PIE*bhel, 燃烧，闪光，词源同blank, blaze.
variation: 复数： flames第三人称单数： flames过去式： flamed过去分词： flamed现在分词： flaming易混淆的单词： FlameFLAME

example_sentences.en: Use a low to medium flame when you 're cooking .
example_sentences.zh: 当你煮东西的时候，使用低到中等火焰。

example_sentences.en: The plane burst into flame .
example_sentences.zh: 飞机突然猛烈燃烧起来。

meaning: adj. 祈求的，祈愿的

example_sentences.en: Rena marriage is old , fail to be pregnant all the time child , go cathedral is invocatory .
example_sentences.zh: 丽娜结婚多年，一直未能怀孕得子，便去教堂祈求。

example_sentences.en: I have invocatory god to grant my endurance only , and do not want turn the fine time of our meet again too far .
example_sentences.zh: 我只有祈求上苍赐给我忍耐力，并且不要把我们重逢的良辰推得太远。

meaning: adj. 正常的；正规的，标准的；[数学]正交的；精神健全的n. 正常，常态；标准；[数学]法线
zh_source: normal 正常的来自norm,规范，正常。
variation: 复数： normals易混淆的单词： Normal

example_sentences.en: Life has returned to normal .
example_sentences.zh: 生活已经恢复正常秩序。

example_sentences.en: I live a normal life .
example_sentences.zh: 我过着正常的生活。

meaning: n. 存活，生存；生计，维生之道
zh_source: subsistence 维持生活，度日subsist,维持生活，度日，-ence,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: Islands of capitalism existed amid a sea of subsistence labour .
example_sentences.zh: 资本主义群岛存在于的求生存的劳动力大海中。

example_sentences.en: The chinese people are likewise confronted with all sorts of problems for subsistence .
example_sentences.zh: 中国人同样面临着生存的各种问题。

meaning: n. 新月形的东西，新月形表记
variation: 复数： lunulae易混淆的单词： Lunula

example_sentences.en: The white part of your fingernail is called the lunula .
example_sentences.zh: 手指甲根部的白色部份叫做。

meaning: n. 位置，方位；地位，职位；态度；状态vt. 安置；把…放在适当位置；给…定位；驻扎军队
zh_source: position 位置，观点，态度来自拉丁语positus,放置的，来自ponere的过去分词，词源同component,composite.引申词义位置，观点，态度等。

example_sentences.en: Irani recently lost his board seat and chair position .
example_sentences.zh: 伊拉尼最近也失去了董事席位和董事长职位。

example_sentences.en: That way , " they understand what it means to come up in that position . "
example_sentences.zh: 这样，“学员就能很好地认识自己的岗位。”

meaning: vt. 实施，执行；使生效，实现；落实（政策）；把…填满n. 工具，器械；家具；手段；[法]履行（契约等）
zh_source: implement 贯彻，实施im-,进入，使，-ple,满的，词源同full,complete.引申词义装满，提供，提供工具，贯彻，实施等。
variation: 复数： implements第三人称单数： implements过去式： implemented过去分词： implemented现在分词： implementing

example_sentences.en: The question will now be how to implement it .
example_sentences.zh: 现在就要看如何实施该协定了。

example_sentences.en: It may take years to implement its 240 new rules .
example_sentences.zh: 要执行法案的240条新规可能需要数年的时间。

meaning: n. [医]并发症；错杂，纠纷；混乱，精神错乱
variation: 复数： complications

example_sentences.en: But china has proven to be a continuous complication .
example_sentences.zh: 不过现实表明，中国崛起令这一地区的局势日趋复杂。

example_sentences.en: Tardive dyskinesia also is mentioned as a possible complication .
example_sentences.zh: 迟发性运动障碍也作为可能的并发症被写入其中。

meaning: n. 充分
n. 合谋，串通；共犯；牵连
zh_source: complicity 同谋com-, 强调。-plic, 编织，组成，词源apply,implicate. 即卷进去的，同谋。
variation: 复数： complicities

example_sentences.en: Desperate to find culprits , iraqis accuse syria and iran of complicity .
example_sentences.zh: 迫切地希望找到罪犯，伊拉克人指责syria和iran合谋。

example_sentences.en: Two former cabinet ministers were sentenced to three years for complicity in the killings .
example_sentences.zh: 两名前内阁大臣因合谋参与杀戮，被判3年监禁。

meaning: vt. 乞灵，祈求；提出或授引…以支持或证明；召鬼；借助
zh_source: invoke 援引，提及，祈求神灵in-,进入，使，-vok,说，祈求，词源同voice,evoke.即召唤神灵，祈求神灵，引申词义援引，提及。
variation: 第三人称单数： invokes过去式： invoked过去分词： invoked现在分词： invoking

example_sentences.en: You 've said there is no reason to invoke god to light the blue touchpaper .
example_sentences.zh: 你曾说过，我们没有理由祈求上帝去点燃蓝色火种。

example_sentences.en: The right colors will invoke pleasing thoughts and emotions in association with your product .
example_sentences.zh: 色彩的恰当使用能够唤起人们对产品愉快的想法和情绪

meaning: n. 消遣（方式）；娱乐（方式）；重建，重现
zh_source: recreation 娱乐来自 recreate,再创始。比喻用法。
variation: 复数： recreations易混淆的单词： Recreation

example_sentences.en: In china the birds are also used for recreation .
example_sentences.zh: 在中国，这种鸟也被用来娱乐。

example_sentences.en: But not all stereotypes are rooted in camaraderie and recreation .
example_sentences.zh: 然而并不是所有关于男性的观点都是出自友情和娱乐。

meaning: n. 淹没

example_sentences.en: During his submersion the photographer contracted several tropical diseases , including malaria
example_sentences.zh: 在他潜入水底的这段时间，他沾染了疟疾等多种热带病。

example_sentences.en: You 're sure she was alive at the time of submersion ?
example_sentences.zh: 你肯定她沉下去的时候还活着吗

meaning: adj. 半月形的

example_sentences.en: From stem cells to viable autologous semilunar heart valve .
example_sentences.zh: 从干细胞到可行的自体心脏半月瓣。

example_sentences.en: Conduction anesthesia -- trigeminale semilunar ganglion ( gasseri ) anesthesia .
example_sentences.zh: 传导麻醉三叉神经半月神经节麻醉。

meaning: n. 丰富，大量；充足，充裕，充分adv. 相当地，充分地；（口）十分，充分adj. 足够的，很多的，充裕的；很多的
zh_source: plenty 大量，众多plen-,全体的，全部的，-ty,名词后缀。引申词义大量，众多。

example_sentences.en: Europe is still very sick and there is plenty of data proving it .
example_sentences.zh: 欧洲依然重病缠身，有充足的数据可以证明这一点。

example_sentences.en: There are plenty of ways to use the technology as it exists today in more and more creative ways .
example_sentences.zh: 当前科技以越来越富创意的方式存在，我们有足够的方式去利用科技。

meaning: adj. 积极的；确实的，肯定的；[数]正的；[医]阳性的n. 正面；正片；[语]原级形容词；[数]正量
zh_source: positive 乐观的，积极的，实证的，阳性的，正极的来自position,放置，位置，-ive,形容词后缀。即放好的，有位置的，原用于法律术语解决的，后引申诸多正面词义。

example_sentences.en: Reviews have been -- and remain -- positive .
example_sentences.zh: 用户对软件的评价一如既往地积极。

example_sentences.en: This will have two critically important positive effects :
example_sentences.zh: 这样做会带来两大积极效应：

meaning: vi. 遵从；依从，顺从；应允，同意
zh_source: comply 顺从，遵从com-, 强调。-ple, 装满，满的，词源同full, fulfill. 即补足，顺从。拼写受ply影响。
variation: 第三人称单数： complies过去式： complied过去分词： complied现在分词： complying

example_sentences.en: Or comply , and initiate violence ?
example_sentences.zh: 或者顺从地，才引发暴力事件么？

example_sentences.en: Those that do not comply may lose their assets and operating licences .
example_sentences.zh: 那些不顺从的公司或会失去资产以及执业许可。

meaning: adj. 不能取消的；不可改变的；不能挽回的
zh_source: irrevocable 不可更改的ir-,不，非，revocable,可更改的。

example_sentences.en: A real decision is irrevocable .
example_sentences.zh: 一个真正的决定是不可改变的。

example_sentences.en: Payment by irrevocable sight lc is acceptable .
example_sentences.zh: 面熟不可撤销信用证付款是可以接受的。

meaning: vt. 补充；重新装满；把…装满；〈古〉使牲口[人和动物]众多
zh_source: replenish 重新装满re-,再，重新，-plen,满的，词源同 fill,plenary.
variation: 第三人称单数： replenishes过去式： replenished过去分词： replenished现在分词： replenish-ing

example_sentences.en: Stem cells exist to replenish the supply ofother cells .
example_sentences.zh: 干细胞存在的作用在于补充其他细胞的供给。

example_sentences.en: We have to depend on the fish to replenish themselves .
example_sentences.zh: 我们需要依靠鱼本身繁殖来补充鱼的数量。

meaning: vt. [生]分泌；隐匿，隐藏；私下侵吞
variation: 第三人称单数： secretes过去式： secreted过去分词： secreted现在分词： secreting

example_sentences.en: Sebaceous glands secrete oil-like sebum for lubricating the hair and skin .
example_sentences.zh: 皮脂腺分泌油状皮脂润滑毛发和皮肤。

example_sentences.en: The bacteria secrete the alkanes , which can then by easily collected and used as a fuel .
example_sentences.zh: 改造过的细菌能分泌烷类，很容易被收集并可以用作燃料。

meaning: vt. 使延期，延缓；把…放在次要地位；把…放在后面vi. 延缓；延缓发作
zh_source: postpone 推迟，延期post-,在后，-pon,放置，词源同position.引申词义推迟，延期。

example_sentences.en: Businesses postpone capital spending and hiring until the clouds clear .
example_sentences.zh: 企业推迟资本的使用和借贷直至乌云散去之前。

example_sentences.en: Regulators are under pressure to dilute and postpone .
example_sentences.zh: 监管机构受到了要求稀释和延迟实施新规的压力。

meaning: vt. <正>解释，说明（文章或计划等）；引申，阐述 （学说、理论、原理、原则等）
zh_source: explicate 解释清楚的ex-, 向外。-plic, 卷，卷入，词源同imply, implicate. 即展开，卷开，解释。
variation: 第三人称单数： explicates过去式： explicated过去分词： explicated现在分词： explicating

example_sentences.en: Maybe a wee bit of complementary words would explicate the details .
example_sentences.zh: 也许再补充一点话可以解释下细节。

example_sentences.en: Purpose is to explicate and understand .
example_sentences.zh: 以说明和理解为目的。

meaning: adj. 挑衅的；刺激性的n. 刺激物；兴奋剂
zh_source: provocative 挑衅的，激怒的来自provoke,挑衅，激怒，-ative,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: I ask him about his punchy and provocative style .
example_sentences.zh: 我问起他那有力且挑衅性的风格。

example_sentences.en: The sco has provided a platform for provocative stances before .
example_sentences.zh: 上合组织从前为煽动性的立场提供了一个平台。

meaning: n. 水产养殖

example_sentences.en: The market is small fan , how to develop aquiculture .
example_sentences.zh: 市场低迷,如何发展水产养殖。

example_sentences.en: The western area of dongting lake is one of the main marketable grain base in our country , and an important marketable base for pork , reed hemp and the freshwater aquiculture .
example_sentences.zh: 摘要东洞庭湖区是国内主要商品粮基地之一，也是国内重要的牲猪、芦苇、苎麻商品基地和举足轻重的淡水品养殖基地。

meaning: adj. 饱食的；充满的，供应充足的n. [昆] 贮蜜蚁
zh_source: replete 充满re-,再，重新，-plet,满的，词源同 fill,complete.
variation: 复数： repletes比较级： more replete最高级： most replete

example_sentences.en: Recent history is replete with such underpricing persisting for years .
example_sentences.zh: 近代史充满了这种持续数年低估风险的现象。

example_sentences.en: The official media are replete with stories of happy tibetans .
example_sentences.zh: 官方的媒体充斥着对幸福西藏人的报道。

meaning: vi. 发出吼叫声，咆哮（尤指因痛苦）vt.& vi. 大声喝道，大叫，出大而有力的声音n. 吼叫声，轰鸣声
zh_source: bellow 吼叫来自PIE *bhel-(3), 发声，怒吼，拟声词，同bell.
variation: 复数： bellows第三人称单数： bellows过去式： bellowed过去分词： bellowed现在分词： bellowing易混淆的单词： Bellow

example_sentences.en: She was yelling now , as the train 's bellow grew louder .
example_sentences.zh: 她几乎是在喊，火车的轰鸣声越来越响了。

example_sentences.en: Most conservatives did not so much signal their disagreement with the report as bellow it .
example_sentences.zh: 大多数的保守派们并没有以咆哮的方式表达他们对报告的不同意见。

meaning: adj. 可解释的，可说明的
zh_source: explicable 可解释的来自explicate,解释清楚的。

example_sentences.en: China 's economic success is explicable by normal economics .
example_sentences.zh: 从常规经济来讲，中国的经济成功是可以解释的。

example_sentences.en: Under the circllmstances , what he said was quite explicable .
example_sentences.zh: 在这种情况下，他所说的话是相当可以理解的。

meaning: vt. 激起，挑起；煽动；招致；触怒，使愤怒
zh_source: provoke 挑衅，挑逗，激起pro-,向前，-vok,说话，叫喊，词源同voice,invoke.引申词义挑衅，挑逗。

example_sentences.en: Did mr nasrallah intend to provoke a powerful reaction ?
example_sentences.zh: 难道纳斯鲁拉先生想激起以色列的强力反击吗？

example_sentences.en: They might seek to provoke communal or religious clashes .
example_sentences.zh: 阿拉维派会试着挑起群体冲突或是宗派冲突。

meaning: adj. 燃烧的；火红的，火焰般的；热情的，激情的v. flame的现在分词；燃烧；变亮

example_sentences.en: It hurls flaming aluminum particles into the air , causing a bright flash without an accompanying shockwave
example_sentences.zh: 燃烧的铝粒子在空气中四溅，却没有伴随冲击波引起晃眼的闪光。

example_sentences.en: Flaming hoops and torches added deep orange flashes to the kaleidoscopic scene .
example_sentences.zh: 燃烧的火圈和深橘色的火炬映照着这个缤纷炫丽的场景。

meaning: n. 树木栽培；树艺；树艺学

example_sentences.en: That you 're interested in arboriculture now ?
example_sentences.zh: 所以你才会对种植树木感兴趣？

example_sentences.en: Ecological consciousness , represented by seeking harmony , cherishing life , conforming to climate and encouraging arboriculture , is an important component of traditional ecological consciousness in china .
example_sentences.zh: 以追求和谐、珍爱生命、顺天应时、鼓励树艺等为代表的生态意识，是中国传统生态意识的重要组成部分。

meaning: adj. 明确的，清楚的；直言的；详述的；不隐瞒的
zh_source: explicit 清楚明白的来自explicate,解释清楚的。

example_sentences.en: Third , develop an explicit policy on public ownership .
example_sentences.zh: 第三条经验是，制定明确的公共所有权政策。

example_sentences.en: How would adopting an explicit numerical inflation objective help ?
example_sentences.zh: 实行明确量化通胀目标会起到何种作用呢？

meaning: n. 反政府的人；反叛者；造反者；叛逆者adj. 反抗的；造反的
zh_source: rebel 反抗，叛逆re-,相对，相反，-bel,战争，词源同 belligerent,bellicose.引申词义反抗，叛逆。
variation: 复数： rebels第三人称单数： rebels过去式： rebelled过去分词： rebelled现在分词： rebelling易混淆的单词： Rebel

example_sentences.en: The regime continued its crackdown by shelling rebel areas .
example_sentences.zh: 叙政权炮击反叛地区，持续其镇压。

example_sentences.en: But the recession has prompted clients to rebel .
example_sentences.zh: 但是经济的衰退导致客户开始反抗。

meaning: n. 支持者，拥护者；提倡者；提出认证遗嘱者
zh_source: proponent 支持者，拥护者pro-,向前，-pon,放置，词源同position,postpone.引申词义支持者，拥护者。

example_sentences.en: Campos is a strong proponent of employee accountability .
example_sentences.zh: 坎波斯是员工责任制的强烈支持者。

example_sentences.en: The leading proponent of this idea is better place .
example_sentences.zh: 这一建议的主要支持者是betterplace。

meaning: adj. 可废止的，可撤回的

example_sentences.en: The credit shall be deemed to be revocable .
example_sentences.zh: 信用证应视作是可撤销的。

example_sentences.en: A credit may be either revocable or irrevocable .
example_sentences.zh: 信用证可以是可撤销的或可撤销的。

meaning: n. 祭仪（尤其指宗教上的）；<宗>狂热的崇拜；礼拜
zh_source: cult 狂热来自PIE*kwel,弯，转，耕作，词源同cycle,colony.原指农耕文明靠天吃饭，因而对神灵的无 比虔诚。
variation: 复数： cults易混淆的单词： CULT

example_sentences.en: The birth of the cult of fine wine can be dated precisely .
example_sentences.zh: 对名酒佳酿的狂热，可以精确地追溯其诞生的日期。

example_sentences.en: He has exploited the cult of che in particular .
example_sentences.zh: 卡斯特罗特别地利用了人民对切格瓦拉的狂热崇拜。

meaning: vt. 牵涉，涉及（某人）；表明（或意指）…是起因；暗示n. 包含的东西
zh_source: implicate 牵连，牵涉im-,进入，使，-plic,编织，卷入，词源同imply,complicate.引申词义牵连，牵涉。
variation: 复数： implicates第三人称单数： implicates过去式： implicated过去分词： implicated现在分词： implicating

example_sentences.en: A parliamentarian from the governing party tried to persuade mr bout to implicate an exiled former prime minister , thaksin shinawatra , in his dealings .
example_sentences.zh: 来自执政党的一名国会员试图说服布特先生将一个流亡海外的泰国前总理他信牵扯入案。

example_sentences.en: I might have to implicate you .
example_sentences.zh: 我可能会连累你。

meaning: n. 红鹳，火烈鸟（羽毛粉红、长颈的大涉禽）
zh_source: flamingo 弗拉门科舞（一种节奏明快的西班牙舞蹈）flamingo 火烈鸟来自西班牙语。一种观点认为来自Fleming, 民族名，民族舞蹈。或来自flame, 燃烧，炫丽，形容这种舞蹈的欢快。来自flame, 燃烧，炫丽。因这种鸟火红的翅膀而得名。
variation: 复数： flamingos flamingoes易混淆的单词： Flamingo

example_sentences.en: Around 600 flamingo chicks were ringed and measured this week before being released in the lagoon
example_sentences.zh: 在被放生到环礁湖前，本周人们将给大约六百只火烈鸟装上标记环并进行称量。

example_sentences.en: Yeah , but will I see you at flamingo ?
example_sentences.zh: 那我能在佛来明哥见到你吗?

meaning: n. 提议；建议；求婚；〈美〉投标
zh_source: proposal 提议，建议，求婚来自propose,提出，建议，求婚，-al,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: The last proposal was to tax small accounts just 3 % .
example_sentences.zh: 最后的提议是对小额账户仅征税3%。

example_sentences.en: Their initial proposal was that mr. ren would be the chair of the emt .
example_sentences.zh: 他们最初建议由任正非先生担任董事长。

meaning: n. 造反，叛乱；反抗
zh_source: rebellion 反抗，谋反来自 rebel,反抗，叛逆。
variation: 复数： rebellions易混淆的单词： Rebellion

example_sentences.en: The boxer rebellion followed a year later .
example_sentences.zh: 一年后，义和团叛乱爆发。

example_sentences.en: But after two years he faced a rebellion in the north .
example_sentences.zh: 但2年后他就面临科特迪瓦北部的叛乱。

meaning: vt. 撤销，取消；废除vi. 有牌不跟
zh_source: revoke 撤消，废除re-,向后，往回，-vok,说话，词源同 voice,invoke.引申词义撤消，废除。
variation: 第三人称单数： revokes过去式： revoked过去分词： revoked现在分词： revoking

example_sentences.en: Golden city has since declared force majeure to revoke its contracts .
example_sentences.zh: 金城宣称因为不可抗力而撤销其赌场合同。

example_sentences.en: That led washington to revoke the visa of the venezuelan ambassador .
example_sentences.zh: 而这也举动也促使华盛顿撤销了委内瑞拉驻美大使的签证。

meaning: n. 含义；含蓄，含意，言外之意；卷入，牵连，牵涉，纠缠；[逻辑学]蕴涵，蕴含
zh_source: implication 牵连，牵涉来自implicate,牵连，牵涉。
variation: 复数： implications

example_sentences.en: But others argue it has at least one strong implication .
example_sentences.zh: 但是其他学者认为，这条规律至少有一种强烈的暗示。

example_sentences.en: An important implication of this view is that shares are always correctly priced .
example_sentences.zh: 这种观点的一个重要含义是，股票总是被正确定价。

meaning: vt. 耕作，种植；教养，栽培；改善；交朋友
zh_source: cultivate 耕作来自cult-,耕作。
variation: 第三人称单数： cultivates过去式： cultivated过去分词： cultivated现在分词： cultivating

example_sentences.en: This is a way to cultivate inner silence .
example_sentences.zh: 这是培养内心安静的一种方法。

example_sentences.en: He was granted many privileges to cultivate crops .
example_sentences.zh: 他被给予许多特权来培育农作物。

meaning: adj. 反叛的；造反的；难控制的

example_sentences.en: Reich 's theories about sex made promiscuity seem rebellious and self-affirming .
example_sentences.zh: 赖希的性理论使得性乱交似乎具有了反叛意识和自我实现的味道。

example_sentences.en: Brands such as nike explicitly adopt rebellious attitudes in their advertising campaigns .
example_sentences.zh: 很多品牌比如耐克就显而易见地在广告宣传中采用反叛精神。

meaning: n. 意志；目的；作用；（进行中的）行动vt. 有意；打算；企图（做）；决意（做）
zh_source: purpose 意图，目的，意义pur-,向前，-pos，放置，词源同pose,position.引申词义意图，目的等。

example_sentences.en: Is love a purpose of life ?
example_sentences.zh: 那么爱是生命的目的吗？

example_sentences.en: Each kind of resource serves a different purpose .
example_sentences.zh: 每种资源都有不同的用途。

meaning: adj. 声音的，嗓音的；由嗓音发出或产生的；有声音的，能发出声音或语言的；畅所欲言的n. 元音；[音乐]声乐作品
variation: 复数： vocals易混淆的单词： VOCAL

example_sentences.en: Vocal critics , however , are uncomfortable with the impact of these beauty contests on chinese culture .
example_sentences.zh: 但直言不讳的评论家们，就美女争嫁富豪类征婚活动对中国文化的冲击非常不安。

example_sentences.en: It probably has something to do with a funky guitar , jazzy piano and jon 's vocal .
example_sentences.zh: 有可能是因为时尚的吉他，奔放的钢琴和乔恩声音的缘故。

meaning: n. 文化；[生物学]（微生物等的）培养；修养；养殖vt. 培植，培养
zh_source: culture 种植，栽培，文明，文化来自cult-,耕作。引申词义文化，即耕耘，培养。
variation: 复数： cultures第三人称单数： cultures过去式： cultured过去分词： cultured现在分词： culturing

example_sentences.en: Religion and culture are important factors .
example_sentences.zh: 宗教和文化是重要因素。

example_sentences.en: The anasazi culture was stressed and erupted into warfare .
example_sentences.zh: 阿纳萨奇文明生存严峻，爆发了战争。

meaning: adj. 不言明[含蓄]的；无疑问的，绝对的；成为一部份的；内含的
zh_source: implicit 含蓄的，内含的，完全的im-,进入，使，-plic,编织，卷入，词源同imply,complicate.词义完全的见短语implicit faith in God,对上帝完全的信仰。

example_sentences.en: And deposits enjoy an implicit state guarantee .
example_sentences.zh: 可是国家却一直为储蓄提供隐性的担保。

example_sentences.en: Banks with an implicit government guarantee will continue to take excessive risks .
example_sentences.zh: 银行若能获得隐性政府担保，就将继续承担过度风险。

meaning: n. 休息，安眠，宁静vt. 将（手臂等）靠在某人（某物）上
zh_source: repose 躺，休息来自中古法语 reposer,来自古法语 repauser,来自拉丁语 repausare,停下休息，来自 re-,表强调， pausare,停下，暂停，词源同 pause.
variation: 第三人称单数： reposes过去式： reposed过去分词： reposed现在分词： reposing

example_sentences.en: She knew the value of repose .
example_sentences.zh: 她懂得举止安详的重要意义。

example_sentences.en: My grandparents now repose in a cemetery in jamaica .
example_sentences.zh: 我的祖父母现长眠在牙买加的公墓里。

meaning: n. 园艺（学）；园艺学家adj. 园艺学的
zh_source: horticulture 园艺学来自拉丁语hortus,花园，词源同garden,culture,培植，培养。即花草培植，引申词义园艺学。

example_sentences.en: We might build up a bank of practical skills , from horticulture to land management .
example_sentences.zh: 我们可以建立起实践技能的信息库，内容可以包括园艺学、土地管理等等。

example_sentences.en: Dave had only wanted a place to do a homestay and earn his degree in desert horticulture .
example_sentences.zh: 戴夫只想找个地方过一段家庭居住的生活以获得沙漠园艺学学位。

meaning: adj. 易燃的，可燃的
zh_source: flammable 易燃的来自flame, 燃烧。

example_sentences.en: First , a flammable environment , ready for a spark .
example_sentences.zh: 首先是有一个易燃环境，随时可能被星星之火引燃。

example_sentences.en: Foxconn said a buildup of flammable dust in the air caused an explosion .
example_sentences.zh: 富士康表示，引起爆炸的原因是空气中集聚了过多的可燃粉尘。

meaning: n. 声乐家；歌手
zh_source: vocalist 歌唱家来自voc-,声音，词源同voice。引申词义歌唱家。
variation: 复数： vocalists

example_sentences.en: Vocalist : is he a singer , too ?
example_sentences.zh: 歌手：他也是个歌手吗？

example_sentences.en: Jackson won eight awards , including favorite male vocalist and favorite album for the top-selling thriller .
example_sentences.zh: 杰克逊囊括了八项大奖，包括最受欢迎男歌手和最畅销专辑《颤栗者》。

meaning: vt.& vi 暗示；意味；隐含；说明，表明
zh_source: imply 暗示，暗指im-,进入，使，-ply,编织，卷入，词源同apply,implicate.
variation: 第三人称单数： implies过去式： implied过去分词： implied现在分词： implying

example_sentences.en: This need not imply total failure for the fed .
example_sentences.zh: 这不一定意味着美联储的彻底失败。

example_sentences.en: But that does not imply he held such convictions .
example_sentences.zh: 但是他那样说并不暗示他持有那样的信念。

meaning: n. 仓库；贮藏室；博物馆；亲信
zh_source: repository 仓库re-,向后，往回，-posit,放置，词源同 position,composite.引申词义仓库。
variation: 复数： repositories

example_sentences.en: Now you have made your first commit to your new git repository !
example_sentences.zh: 大功告成，我们已经向git仓库完成了第一次提交！

example_sentences.en: The repository will generally consist of a single table known as the partition table .
example_sentences.zh: 这个仓库通常有单表构成，即所谓分区表。

meaning: adj. 没有开垦的，没有耕种的，没有教养的
vt.& vi. （使）发怒，过热；使发炎
zh_source: inflame 燃烧，激怒in-,进入，使，flame,燃烧。引申词义使激怒。
variation: 第三人称单数： inflames过去式： inflamed过去分词： inflamed现在分词： inflaming

example_sentences.en: Fighting the global threat of climate change could unite countries-or inflame rivalries .
example_sentences.zh: 对抗气候变化的全球威胁可能会团结各国或是加剧对抗。

example_sentences.en: A direct u.s. attack on libyan soil could further inflame tensions in the region , american officials acknowledge .
example_sentences.zh: 美国官员承认，直接在利比亚国内发起攻击可能会进一步加剧该地区的紧张局势。

meaning: n. 职业，使命；神召，天命
zh_source: vocation 职业来自拉丁语 vocare,说，呼唤，词源同voice,vow。原义为灵魂的召唤，引申词义职业。词义演变参照calling,召唤，使命感，职业。
variation: 复数： vocations

example_sentences.en: Mr chandler could easily have missed his vocation .
example_sentences.zh: 钱德勒本可以很容易地错过他的职业。

example_sentences.en: This was a blow , as I had thought I 'd found my vocation .
example_sentences.zh: 这简直是当头一棒，因为我本以为自己找到了职业发展方向。

meaning: vt. 使迷惑，使混乱；使复杂化
zh_source: perplex 使困惑per-,完全的，-plex,卷，缠绕，词源同ply,complex.引申词义使困惑。

example_sentences.en: Perplex blackhead many years , ask an expert to help me .
example_sentences.zh: 困扰多年的黑头，请专家帮帮我。

example_sentences.en: It seems to me that they do so on the understanding that these problems that perplex us are deep , substantive , and really matter .
example_sentences.zh: 在我看来，他们之所以关心此类问题，正是因为这些困扰我们的问题是如此的深邃、实在，而且很关键。

meaning: vt. 假定；猜想，推测；认为；让（用于祈祷语气）vi. 想象，猜想
zh_source: suppose 认为，假设，推测，猜测sup-,在下，-pos,放置，词源同 position,propose.引申词义认为，假设等。
variation: 第三人称单数： supposes过去式： supposed过去分词： supposed现在分词： supposing

example_sentences.en: Suppose we want to buy an ipod from amazon .
example_sentences.zh: 假设我们要在亚马逊上买一个ipod。

example_sentences.en: I suppose I should close my egg account now .
example_sentences.zh: 我想我现在就应该注销我的egg账户。

meaning: adj. 易燃的；<口>易激动的，易激怒的n. 易燃物
zh_source: inflammable 易燃的，易激怒的来自inflame,燃烧，激怒。引申词义易燃的，易激怒的。
variation: 复数： inflammables

example_sentences.en: Sometimes , probably when inflammable liquids were set alight , the bomb blasts looked like flaming hair .
example_sentences.zh: 有时可能是大火点燃了某种易燃液体，火团爆炸，看起来像燃烧的头发。

example_sentences.en: Goods of an inflammable , explosive or dangerous nature .
example_sentences.zh: 具有易燃、爆炸或危险性质的货物。

meaning: adj. 吵吵嚷嚷的；大声叫喊的；叫嚣的
zh_source: vociferous 大声疾呼的voc-,声音，呼唤，词源同voice,-fer,带来，词源同bring.

example_sentences.en: Calls to draw on reserves are most vociferous in america .
example_sentences.zh: 在美国，动用石油储备的呼喊声最强烈。

example_sentences.en: One of the most vociferous and influential critics was colleague ronald fisher .
example_sentences.zh: 其中最响亮和最有影响力的批评来自他的同事罗纳德费希尔。

meaning: n. 猜测； 推测；假定；猜想
zh_source: supposition 推测，推断，想法suppose,猜测，推测，-ition,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： suppositions

example_sentences.en: Both parts of that supposition have turned out to be wrong .
example_sentences.zh: 事实证明，这一假设的两个部分都是错误的。

example_sentences.en: As it happens , there is some evidence to back this supposition .
example_sentences.zh: 碰巧，上述假设还是有证据支撑的。

meaning: adj. 易弯的；柔韧的；柔顺的；能适应的
zh_source: pliable 易弯曲的来自ply,弯，转，-able,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: Want to keep your plaster pliable a bit longer to get it all smoothed out ?
example_sentences.zh: 要保留你的石膏柔韧多一点的时间来把一切理顺吗？

example_sentences.en: Better yet , what if plastic was pliable enough to form all sorts of wearable electronics and even implantable medical devices ?
example_sentences.zh: 更喜人的是，塑料足够柔韧，可以制成各种可穿戴电子产品，甚至可以应用到植入式医疗器材中。

meaning: vt. 增补，补充n. 增补，补充；补充物；增刊，副刊
zh_source: supplement 补充，补编，增补，增刊来自 supply,补充，供应，-ment,名词后缀。引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： supplements

example_sentences.en: Powdered formula is the most convenient to supplement breastfeeding .
example_sentences.zh: 奶粉配方用于补充母乳喂养是最方便的。

example_sentences.en: The dietary supplement industry is a multi-billion dollar business .
example_sentences.zh: 膳食补充剂产生了一个数亿美元的市场。

meaning: adj. 令人激动的；有煽动性的；炎性的，发炎的
zh_source: inflammatory 发炎的，发怒的来自inflammation,炎症，发炎。

example_sentences.en: Despite the inflammatory language , cheating seems to be relatively infrequent .
example_sentences.zh: 虽然语言很有煽动性，但欺骗的情况还是比较少见的。

example_sentences.en: Read charitably , mr duncan smith 's remarks were less inflammatory than the headlines .
example_sentences.zh: 宽容一点看，邓肯先生的话没有报纸头条那么具有煽动性。

meaning: vt. <数>移项；使变位；<音>使变调；变换顺序vi. 进行变换n. 转置阵
variation: 复数： transposes第三人称单数： transposes过去式： transposed过去分词： transposed现在分词： transposing

example_sentences.en: Transpose the words of a sentence .
example_sentences.zh: 把句子中的词序调换一下。

example_sentences.en: This program achieves geometrical transform algorithm of images levle-remove , circumrotation , mirror , transpose , zoom and so on .
example_sentences.zh: 此代码实现了图象的平移,旋转,镜像,转置,缩放等几何变换算法。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使用（工具）；经常供应（食物、饮料）；固定往来；经营生意n. （毛线、绳等的）股；层；厚；（夹板的）层片vt. （娴熟地）使用
zh_source: ply 弯，转，往返，往来，股，层来自拉丁语plicare,弯，转，折叠，编织，扭，词源同imply,complicate,complex.引申诸相关词义。

example_sentences.en: Big vehicles like the chevrolet suburban and nissan armada still ply u.s. highways — though in smaller numbers .
example_sentences.zh: 虽然美国的高速公路上仍然不时能见到雪佛兰巨无霸（ChevroletSuburban）和日产（Nissan）Armada等大型SUV，但数量却早已不如往日。

example_sentences.en: At each ply , the " turn " switches to the other player .
example_sentences.zh: 在每一层中，“转换”开关指向另一个游戏者。

meaning: adj. 不燃烧的，不易燃烧的

example_sentences.en: Since argon is nonflammable , special firefighting equipment and instructions are not needed .
example_sentences.zh: 由于氩不可燃,不需要特殊的救火设备和指导.

example_sentences.en: Since helium is nonflammable , special fire fighting equipment and instructions are not needed .
example_sentences.zh: 由于氦不可燃,不需要特殊的救火设备和指导.

meaning: vt. 对…感到愤怒；怨恨；愤恨；厌恶
zh_source: resent 气愤，愤恨re-,表强调，-sent,感觉，感知，词源同 sense,consent.即强烈的感觉，后引申词义气愤，愤恨。
variation: 第三人称单数： resents过去式： resented过去分词： resented现在分词： resenting

example_sentences.en: Don 't resent it ; don 't internalize you anger .
example_sentences.zh: 不要怨恨，不要将你的愤怒内在化。

example_sentences.en: Opinion polls show that ordinary afghans still deeply resent its interventions .
example_sentences.zh: 民意调查显示，普通阿富汗人对巴基斯坦介入本国问题始终心怀怨恨。

meaning: n. 胶合板，合板，夹板
zh_source: plywood 压合板ply,层，wood,木头，木板。

example_sentences.en: So when smith decided to expand his business to include bamboo flooring and plywood , he was patient .
example_sentences.zh: 因此，当史密斯决定拓宽自己的业务，同时还兼卖竹制地板和夹板的时候，他显得很有耐心。

example_sentences.en: Everything is a maze of cubicles boxed in with fences of upholstered plywood .
example_sentences.zh: 只有用胶合板卡座组成的迷宫。

meaning: n. 愤恨，不满
zh_source: resentment 气愤，愤恨来自 resent,气愤，愤恨，-ment,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： resentments

example_sentences.en: Resentment grows , and the project and relationships suffer .
example_sentences.zh: 怨恨在不断累积，项目和同事关系也遭到破坏。

example_sentences.en: First is the accumulated resentment of past battles .
example_sentences.zh: 首先是过去的竞争累积起来的愤恨。

meaning: n. 复制品
zh_source: replica 复制品来自拉丁语 replica,复制，重复，来自 replicare,复制，词源同 replicate.
variation: 复数： replicas

example_sentences.en: This shuttle replica is another giant step for mankind .
example_sentences.zh: 这个航天飞机复制品是人类又一伟大的进步。

example_sentences.en: British adventurer aims to sail replica phoenician sailboat across atlantic
example_sentences.zh: 英国冒险者旨在跨大西洋航行复制品腓尼基帆船

meaning: vt. 预感；预见；预料；先于…行动vi. 过早地提出；过早地考虑（或说、做）一件事；（在口头或用文字）预言；预测
zh_source: anticipate 预期前缀ante-, 在前。词根cip, 同cap, 拿，抓，见capture.
variation: 第三人称单数： anticipates过去式： anticipated过去分词： anticipated现在分词： anticipating

example_sentences.en: How long do you anticipate living in your next home ?
example_sentences.zh: 在下次搬家之前你预期要住多长时间？

example_sentences.en: Bear markets anticipate and price in economic contractions .
example_sentences.zh: 熊市预期经济会出现萎缩，并在价格中得到体现。

meaning: n. 感觉，官能；意识，观念；理性；识别力vt. 感到；理解，领会；检测出
zh_source: sense 感官，感觉，意义，含义，理解力，判断力来自古法语 sens,感觉，知觉，理解，五种感官的功能，来自拉丁语 sensus,感觉的，知觉的， 感知的，过去分词格于 sentire,感觉，感知，知晓，来自 PIE*sent,感觉，可能来自 PIE*sent, 走，离开，送出，词源同 send.其逻辑关系可能为摸着石头过河，根据感觉找路。引申诸相 关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： senses过去式： sensed过去分词： sensed现在分词： sensing

example_sentences.en: But it made some sense .
example_sentences.zh: 但是它有一些道理。

example_sentences.en: But even this makes sense .
example_sentences.zh: 但这也是有道理的。

meaning: vt. 复制，复写；重复，反复；折转；[生] 复制adj. 复制的；折叠的；[植]折转的n. 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音
zh_source: replicate 复制来自 replicare,重复，复制，来自 re-,再次，-plic,弯，转，词源同 ply,complicate.
variation: 复数： replicates第三人称单数： replicates过去式： replicated过去分词： replicated现在分词： replicating

example_sentences.en: Such a company would be difficult to replicate quickly .
example_sentences.zh: 这样的公司短期内很难被复制。

example_sentences.en: Such attributes are hard to replicate .
example_sentences.zh: 这些特征都在发展中国家是难以复制的。

meaning: n. 情感；敏感性，灵敏度；感觉，感性；感光性，感光度
zh_source: sensibility 感觉能力，鉴赏力来自 sensible,能感知的，有理解力的。
variation: 复数： sensibilities

example_sentences.en: That sensibility has broken down .
example_sentences.zh: 这个敏感度已经被破坏。

example_sentences.en: Parkour is a challenging and demanding discipline , therefore learning parkour must always be approached with sensibility and caution .
example_sentences.zh: 酷是一项充满挑战和危险的体育项目，因此学习跑酷时必须时刻保持清醒和敏感。

meaning: adj. 宽敞的，气度宏大的

example_sentences.en: Capacious western-style malls are also cropping up , especially for luxury goods .
example_sentences.zh: 宽敞的西式商场也在大量涌现，尤其是销售奢侈品的商场。

example_sentences.en: Our country country is an extremely capacious consumption .
example_sentences.zh: 我国农村是一个极广阔的消费.

meaning: n. 回答，答复；反应；报复（行动）；[法律]答辩vi. [法律]（原告对被告）答辩；反响；作答；（以行动）做出反应vt. 回应，作出反应
zh_source: reply 答复，回复来自 replicare,回复，答复，来自 re-,向后，往回，-plic,弯，转，词源同 ply,complicate.
variation: 复数： replies第三人称单数： replies过去式： replied过去分词： replied现在分词： replying

example_sentences.en: The companies didn 't reply to emails seeking comment .
example_sentences.zh: 两家公司均未回复请求置评的电子邮件。

example_sentences.en: Mr hague offered a disarmingly honest reply .
example_sentences.zh: 黑格先生回答地非常诚实。

meaning: adj. 恳求的n. 恳求者
zh_source: supplicant 祈求者，哀求者来自拉丁语 supplicare,乞求，乞讨，来自 sub,向下，-plic,弯，转，词源同 complicate,triplicate. -ant,人。
variation: 复数： supplicants

example_sentences.en: Britain was an indebted supplicant .
example_sentences.zh: 英国只是一个负债累累的乞讨者。

example_sentences.en: They want ai5 as a supplicant client , rather than as a well-disposed but independent ally .
example_sentences.zh: 他们想让军情5局成为一个乞求他们的附属机构，而不是一个能听得进意见的独立盟友。

meaning: adj. 明智的；合乎情理的；通情达理的；意识到的，能感觉到的n. 可感觉到的东西；敏感的人
zh_source: sensible 有理解力的，明智的，理智的来自 sense,感觉，知觉，理解，-ible,形容词后缀。
variation: 比较级： more sensible最高级： most sensible

example_sentences.en: This is all sensible stuff .
example_sentences.zh: 这些都是明智之举。

example_sentences.en: This is all eminently sensible .
example_sentences.zh: 这项计划非常明智。

meaning: n. 容量；才能；性能；生产能力adj. 充其量的，最大限度的
variation: 复数： capacities

example_sentences.en: And production capacity in europe is limited .
example_sentences.zh: 欧洲的生产能力也是有限的。

example_sentences.en: The glut of shipping capacity has forced down rates .
example_sentences.zh: 航运量的供过于求已经造成了利率下滑。

meaning: adj. 敏感的；感觉的；[仪]灵敏的；易受影响的n. 敏感的人；有灵异能力的人
zh_source: sensitive 敏锐的，敏感的，体贴的，体恤的来自 sense,感觉，知觉，-itive,形容词后缀。引申诸相关比喻义。
variation: 复数： sensitives

example_sentences.en: Such discussions are sensitive because mr. strauss-kahn hasn 't resigned .
example_sentences.zh: 这种讨论是敏感的，因为卡恩尚未辞职。

example_sentences.en: It is also sensitive to acidity .
example_sentences.zh: 聚合物对酸度也是敏感的。

meaning: n. 船长，机长；领袖，首领；上尉；（美国警察局的）副巡长vt. 当首领；统帅或指挥
zh_source: captain 队长来自词根cap, 头, 词源同chief, cape.
variation: 复数： captains第三人称单数： captains过去式： captained过去分词： captained现在分词： captaining易混淆的单词： CAPTAIN

example_sentences.en: He had gone with that captain mike .
example_sentences.zh: 他都是跟米高船长一起去的。

example_sentences.en: A battling performance by the stoke captain .
example_sentences.zh: 斯托克城队长之表现如同战士。

meaning: adj. 感觉的，感受的，感官的；传递感觉的
zh_source: sensory 感觉的，感官的来自 sense,感觉，知觉，感官，-ory,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: Does she need lots of sensory input ?
example_sentences.zh: 她是不是非常需要感觉的输入？

example_sentences.en: Be fully present during your entire shower , and pay attention to sensory experience .
example_sentences.zh: 在整个淋浴期间请完完全全地进入当下时刻，注意进行感觉的体验。

meaning: n. 标题，说明文字，字幕；字幕；第三档vt. 给（图片、照片等）加说明文字；在（文件等）上加标题；在…上加字幕
zh_source: caption 说明文字来自词根cap, 抓，拿，握，见captive，accept. 即便于接受和理解的文字。
variation: 复数： captions第三人称单数： captions过去式： captioned过去分词： captioned现在分词： captioning

example_sentences.en: Please suggest a caption in the comments thread below .
example_sentences.zh: 请将所建议的标题写在下面的评论栏中。

example_sentences.en: The caption : " financial company capital injections : too early " .
example_sentences.zh: 该图表题为“金融企业注资：为时过早”。

meaning: n. 感情，情绪；情操；意见，观点；感伤
zh_source: sentiment 情感，伤感，哀伤来自拉丁语 sentire,感觉，感知，词源同 sense.-ment,名词后缀。原指客观的感觉，后词义感 情化，多用于指伤感，哀伤。
variation: 复数： sentiments

example_sentences.en: Such weary sentiment is widespread in the industry .
example_sentences.zh: 这种厌倦情绪在石油业界非常普遍。

example_sentences.en: But that sentiment has been shaken by declining performance .
example_sentences.zh: 可是，业绩下降已经动摇了这种观点。

meaning: n. 出口，通道；退场；退去，退出；死亡vi. 离开；退出；退场；去世
zh_source: exit 出口ex-, 向外。-it, 走，词源同ion, itinerary.
variation: 复数： exits第三人称单数： exits过去式： exited过去分词： exited现在分词： exiting

example_sentences.en: But where is the exit sign ?
example_sentences.zh: 但退出标记在哪里呢？

example_sentences.en: They eventually managed to sneak out of a secret exit .
example_sentences.zh: 他们最终成功地由一个秘密出口偷偷地逃走。

meaning: adj. 爱找岔子的，强词夺理的

example_sentences.en: If you blame him , he think you are captious .
example_sentences.zh: 如果你数落他，他会认为你挑剔。

example_sentences.en: A captious pedant ; an excessively demanding and faultfinding tutor .
example_sentences.zh: 吹毛求疵的学究；过分苛求、吹毛求疵的导师。

meaning: n. 美德；德行；价值；长处
zh_source: virtue 品德，美德来自拉丁语vir,男人，词源同virile,引申词义男人应有的品行和美德，具体为7种基本品行：justice,prudence,temperance,fortitude,hope,faith,charity,后来词义通用化也用来指女人的美德，贞洁等。
variation: 复数： virtues易混淆的单词： Virtue

example_sentences.en: That old virtue of experience may be undervalued here .
example_sentences.zh: 经验这一古老的美德如今可能被低估了。

example_sentences.en: The virtue of recycling has been appreciated for centuries .
example_sentences.zh: 废料回收的优点已经被人们重视了好几个世纪了。

meaning: adj. 伤感的；多愁善感的；感情用事的；寓有情感的
variation: 比较级： more sentimental最高级： most sentimental易混淆的单词： Sentimental

example_sentences.en: Ms marton avoids being too self-centred or sentimental as she tells the story .
example_sentences.zh: marton小姐讲述这个故事的时候避免了太过于以自我为中心和太过于多愁善感。

example_sentences.en: Some scornfully see this as a mere ploy to squeeze dollars from sentimental foreigners .
example_sentences.zh: 一些人对此不屑一顾，认为其不过是向多愁善感的外国人勒索钱财罢了。

meaning: adj. 最初的；开始的；首字母的n. 首字母；[语音学]声母；特大的大写字母vt. 用姓名的首字母签名
zh_source: initial 最初的，开始的in-,进入，使，-it,走，开始，词源同itinerary,exit.即走起来的，开始的。
variation: 复数： initials第三人称单数： initials过去式： initialled initialled过去分词： initialled initialled现在分词： initialling initialling

example_sentences.en: We are through the initial testing period .
example_sentences.zh: 我们通过了最初的考试阶段。

example_sentences.en: So far , it has passed its initial test .
example_sentences.zh: 迄今为止，它已经受住初步考验。

meaning: vt. 迷住，迷惑；<古>逮捕
zh_source: captivate 着迷来自词根cap, 抓，拿，握，见captive。
variation: 第三人称单数： captivates过去式： captivated过去分词： captivated现在分词： captivating

example_sentences.en: In a trial that is set to captivate hong kong , handwriting experts and feng shui gurus will also testify .
example_sentences.zh: 在这场将会吸引全香港关注的审讯中，笔迹专家和风水师也将出庭作证。

example_sentences.en: So many men out there are just as puzzled on how to attract a woman , captivate a woman and keep her captivated .
example_sentences.zh: 很多男人纠结迷惑于如何吸引女人、俘获芳心、留住女人的感情。

meaning: vt. 使安心，使消除疑虑；再对…进行保险；再保证
zh_source: reassure 使安心re-,再，重新，assure,确信。
variation: 第三人称单数： reassures过去式： reassured过去分词： reassured现在分词： reassuring

example_sentences.en: Let me reassure you that I like doing podictionary .
example_sentences.zh: 我可以放心的告诉你，我喜欢做单词爱好者。

example_sentences.en: Tie-ups between banks and operators will help reassure regulators .
example_sentences.zh: 银行和运营商的联合，将会使监管部门消除疑虑。

meaning: n. 生物化学；生物化学成份
variation: 复数： biochemistries

example_sentences.en: Wong made it to college studying biochemistry .
example_sentences.zh: wong在大学里学习生物化学。

example_sentences.en: Arsenic is poisonous because it so easily replaces phosphorous in our biochemistry .
example_sentences.zh: 我们生化组成中的磷很容易被砷替代，因此砷是有毒的。

meaning: adj. 某一；必然的；已确定的pron. [动词用复数]某些
zh_source: certain 确定来自PIE*krei, *sker, 切，分开。词源同crisis, crime, discriminate, shear.
variation: 比较级： more certain最高级： most certain

example_sentences.en: But victory is far from certain .
example_sentences.zh: 但交易能否成功远不能确定。

example_sentences.en: We are born with certain talents .
example_sentences.zh: 我们生来就伴随某些天赋。

meaning: vt. 开始，发起；传授；创始，开辟；接纳新成员n. 新加入某组织（或机构、宗教）的人，新入会的人；被传授初步知识的人adj. 被传授初步知识的；新入会的
zh_source: initiate 开始，启动来自initial,开始的。引申词义开始，启动。
variation: 第三人称单数： initiates过去式： initiated过去分词： initiated现在分词： initiating

example_sentences.en: And , what happens when brand makers don 't initiate the conversation ?
example_sentences.zh: 并且，当品牌建立者不主动发起这样的对话时会发生什么情况呢？

example_sentences.en: Or comply , and initiate violence ?
example_sentences.zh: 或者顺从地，才引发暴力事件么？

meaning: adj. 被俘的；被监禁的；被关押的；无法逃离的n. 战俘，俘虏；被（爱情等）迷住的人；自保公司
zh_source: captive 俘虏来自词根cap, 抓，拿，握，见captive。
variation: 复数： captives易混淆的单词： CAPTIVE

example_sentences.en: Bank interest rates remain captive to the policy of regulated deposit rates .
example_sentences.zh: 银行利率依然是政策的俘虏，被用来监管储蓄利率。

example_sentences.en: Once bought , natural-resource firms can become captive suppliers of the middle kingdom .
example_sentences.zh: 一旦并购成功，这些自然资源企业就成为这个中原王国被俘虏的供应商。

meaning: n. 保证人，担保，保证
zh_source: surety 保证金，担保人sure,确定的，确信的，-ty,名词后缀。引申词义保证金，担保人。
variation: 复数： sureties

example_sentences.en: International credit insurance & surety association .
example_sentences.zh: 国际信用保险和保证协会。

example_sentences.en: Are you willing to stand surety for your brother ?
example_sentences.zh: 你愿意为你兄弟作担保吗？

meaning: n. 生物杀灭剂；农药

example_sentences.en: Contains biocide to extend fluid life .
example_sentences.zh: 含有杀菌剂以延长切削液使用寿命。

example_sentences.en: Sealer - pumpable , high bake , paintable , ultralight with biocide .
example_sentences.zh: 泵式，高烘烤，适于绘画，与杀菌剂超轻。

meaning: vt. 俘获；夺取；夺得；引起（注意、想像、兴趣）n. 捕获；占领；捕获物；[计算机]捕捉
zh_source: capture 抓住来自词根cap, 抓，拿，握，见captive。
variation: 第三人称单数： captures过去式： captured过去分词： captured现在分词： capturing

example_sentences.en: Carbon capture and storage is not a sure thing .
example_sentences.zh: 碳捕获与封存技术还不是很确定的事情。

example_sentences.en: Step 3 - capture and interpret intuitive information .
example_sentences.zh: 第三步：捕捉并理解直觉信息。

meaning: n. 确定性，确实性；确定的事，必然的事
variation: 复数： certainties

example_sentences.en: Will this meet the uk government 's need for certainty ?
example_sentences.zh: 这能满足英国政府对确定性的需求吗？

example_sentences.en: The atom stands for power and knowledge and certainty .
example_sentences.zh: 原子代表着力量，代表着知识和必然。

meaning: n. 煽动行为或言论，煽动叛乱
zh_source: sedition 煽动叛乱sed-,分开，来自 se-在元音前的异体形式，-it,走，词源同 exit,transit.比较前缀 re-在元音前的 异化形式 redolent,olfactory.字面意思即分开走，使分开，引申词义煽动叛乱。

example_sentences.en: Hindu nationalists demanded she be tried for sedition .
example_sentences.zh: 印度斯坦民族主义者认为她是在煽动叛乱。

example_sentences.en: In spinoza 's view intolerant laws lead ultimately to anger revenge and sedition .
example_sentences.zh: 在斯宾诺莎看来，不宽容的法律终将导致愤怒、报复和叛乱。

meaning: vt. 向…保证；使…确信；<英>给…保险
zh_source: assure 确信前缀as- 同ad-. sure, 确信。
variation: 第三人称单数： assures过去式： assured过去分词： assured现在分词： assuring易混淆的单词： ASSURE

example_sentences.en: Apologise and assure him it will not happen again .
example_sentences.zh: 道歉并向他保证不会再发生这种事情。

example_sentences.en: They are sound sleepers , I assure you .
example_sentences.zh: 他们是酣睡的人，我向你保证。

meaning: n. 书写，笔迹，书法

example_sentences.en: Innovation of chirography precedes that of art .
example_sentences.zh: 先有书体的创新，后有艺术的创新。

example_sentences.en: Being that everybody different , but those write with the left hand with the chirography that the right hand writes out is alike with minor differences but .
example_sentences.zh: 就是用右手写出来的笔迹人人不同，而那些用左手写的却是大同小异的。

meaning: vt. (使某物碎裂，崩裂；使某物衰微，瓦解，分崩离析vi. 碎裂，崩裂；衰微，瓦解，分崩离析
zh_source: disintegrate 解体dis-, 不，非，使相反。integrate, 连接，一体。
variation: 第三人称单数： disintegrates过去式： disintegrated过去分词： disintegrated现在分词： disintegrating

example_sentences.en: We have three empires that disintegrate within weeks of each other .
example_sentences.zh: 数周内我们的三个帝国彼此开始解体。

example_sentences.en: Discovery relies on observing the particles into which higgs bosons disintegrate , rather than detecting them directly .
example_sentences.zh: 对希格斯玻色子的发现，依赖于观察它们撞击并在其中解体的粒子，而非直接观测。

meaning: n. 传记；档案；传记体文学；个人简介
zh_source: biography 传记词根bio, 生命。词根graph, 写。
variation: 复数： biographies

example_sentences.en: The jobs book will be his fourth major biography .
example_sentences.zh: 《乔布斯传》将是艾萨克森完成的第四本传记。

example_sentences.en: Certain aspects of this biography work less well .
example_sentences.zh: 这本传纪有些部分写得也不好。

zh_source: conceive 构想con-, 强调。-ceive, 词源同cap, 抓住，理解，词源同capable. 指形成思想和概念的。

example_sentences.en: Want to conceive twins naturally without the dangers of fertility drugs ?
example_sentences.zh: 想要不受怀孕辅助药物的副作用威胁就自然怀上双胞胎吗？

example_sentences.en: The research could explain why so many couples with no apparent reproductive problems are unable to conceive .
example_sentences.zh: 这一研究结果可以解释为什么那么多无明显生育问题的夫妇无法怀孕。

meaning: n. 过渡，转变，变迁；[语]转换；[乐]变调
zh_source: transition 过渡，转变，变迁来自 transit,中转，过渡，-ion,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： transitions

example_sentences.en: Your lifetime coincides with this era of transition .
example_sentences.zh: 你们恰恰生活在这个转变的时代。

example_sentences.en: He also served on president obama 's transition team .
example_sentences.zh: 他同时也在奥巴马总统过渡小组任职。

meaning: n. 证明书；文凭，结业证书vt. 发给证明书；用证书证明（或认可）
zh_source: certificate 证书来自certify, 证明，证实。
variation: 复数： certificates第三人称单数： certificates过去式： certificated过去分词： certificated现在分词： certificating

example_sentences.en: Even then you still don 't get the patent certificate .
example_sentences.zh: 即使到那时，您也拿不到专利证书。

example_sentences.en: Should the agency refuse , that certificate too is probably in doubt .
example_sentences.zh: 若其拒绝交出证据，则此证书也可能悬而不决。

meaning: n. 保证，担保；（人寿）保险；确信；厚脸皮，无耻
variation: 复数： assurances

example_sentences.en: The government scrambled to give that assurance .
example_sentences.zh: 政府勉强拼凑出了这个保证。

example_sentences.en: Britons have had that assurance for generations .
example_sentences.zh: 几代人以来，英国人一直对此充满信心。

meaning: n. 生物学；生物
zh_source: biology 生物学词根bio, 生命。词根logy, 学说。
variation: 复数： biologies

example_sentences.en: The biology behind it is what 's being studied .
example_sentences.zh: 科学家们研究的就是这其中的生物原因。

example_sentences.en: Synthetic biology companies fall into two categories .
example_sentences.zh: 合成生物学公司分为两类。

meaning: n. 受精，怀孕；胚胎；概念；设想，构想
variation: 复数： conceptions易混淆的单词： Conception

example_sentences.en: The other factors may be timing of conception .
example_sentences.zh: 很有可能是怀孕的时间这个因素。

example_sentences.en: After conception , men aren 't exactly needed to keep their child alive .
example_sentences.zh: 怀孕后，使胎儿存活下来的过程根本不需要男人。

meaning: n. 瓦解；崩溃；<物>裂变；蜕变

example_sentences.en: For the moment a disintegration of news corp seems unlikely .
example_sentences.zh: 眼下，新闻集团看来还不太可能瓦解。

example_sentences.en: Yet the debate about how to save europe 's single currency from disintegration is stuck .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，就如何挽救欧洲单一的货币体系使其免于瓦解，各方争论不休，难以定夺。

meaning: vt. 剥夺，夺去，使丧失
zh_source: deprive 剥夺de-, 夺去，损毁。-priv, 自己的，私人的，词源同private, property.
variation: 第三人称单数： deprives过去式： deprived过去分词： deprived现在分词： depriving

example_sentences.en: Alas , other parts of the law deprive investors of helpful disclosures .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，这部法案的其他部分剥夺了对投资者有帮助的公开批露。

example_sentences.en: India fears that china 's dam-building projects may deprive it of its water .
example_sentences.zh: 印度担心中国的水坝建设项目将剥夺印度的水资源。

meaning: vt. （尤指书面）证明；发证书给…；证明（某人）患有精神病；颁发（或授予）专业合格证书
zh_source: certify 证明，证实来自词根cert, 确定，见certain.
variation: 第三人称单数： certifies过去式： certified过去分词： certified现在分词： certifying

example_sentences.en: The companies are required to obtain third-party audits to certify that they adhere to the standards .
example_sentences.zh: 这些公司必须取得第三方审核，以证明他们坚持了上述标准。

example_sentences.en: Securities laws currently require research analysts to personally certify that their reports accurately reflect their views of a stock .
example_sentences.zh: 现行证券法要求研究分析师亲自证明报告准确反映了他们对某只股票的看法。

meaning: adv. 确实地，确信地；管教

example_sentences.en: Their attempts will most assuredly fail .
example_sentences.zh: 他们的企图肯定会失败。

example_sentences.en: Know assuredly that today I have testified against you .
example_sentences.zh: 你们要确实的知道，我今日作证警告你们了。

meaning: n. 生物圈；生物界；生物层

example_sentences.en: Can any person be healthy if the biosphere is sick ?
example_sentences.zh: 如果生物圈都是病态的，还会有任何人健康吗？

example_sentences.en: Death valley national monument was designated a biosphere reserve in 1984 .
example_sentences.zh: 1984年，死谷国家历史遗迹被指定为生物圈保护区。

meaning: v. 欺诈；误导
zh_source: deceive 欺骗来自deceit, 欺骗。
variation: 第三人称单数： deceives过去式： deceived过去分词： deceived现在分词： deceiving

example_sentences.en: Many people routinely deceive themselves to rationalize dishonest behavior .
example_sentences.zh: 很多人为了使自己的欺骗行为趋于合理而长期自欺欺人。

example_sentences.en: The animals are trying their utmost to fool predators but that 's not enough to deceive international photographer art wolfe
example_sentences.zh: 动物们会尽最大的努力欺骗掠食者，但还不足以骗过国际摄影师阿特沃尔夫。

meaning: adj. 完整的；积分的；必须的n. 整体；积分
zh_source: integral 整体的in-,不，非，-teg,接触，词源同tangible,intact.即没有接触过的，整体的。
variation: 复数： integrals

example_sentences.en: Such machines cannot truly make computing an integral , invisible part of the way people live their lives .
example_sentences.zh: 这些机器不能够真正的将计算变成人们生活方式中的一个整体的，无形的部分。

example_sentences.en: This fourth level is the witness of all the other states , the integral awareness that links the other three levels together .
example_sentences.zh: 这第四层见证其他三种状态，是将其他三个层次连接起来的整体意识。

meaning: n. 确信
variation: 复数： certitudes

example_sentences.en: If I had to suggest one single reason for that , it 's our love of certitude .
example_sentences.zh: 如果非要找出一个原因的话，那就是我们太偏爱确定性了。

example_sentences.en: It is not clear why we enjoy certitude so much certitude being the subjective experience of feeling certain .
example_sentences.zh: 我们为什么这么喜欢确定性还不清楚确定性其实是“感到肯定”的一种主观体验。

meaning: n. （通常互利的）共生（现象）；（人与人之间的）互利关系
zh_source: symbiosis 共生关系，合作关系sym-,一起，一致，-bio,生命，词源同 biology,生物学，-sis,表状态。
variation: 复数： symbioses易混淆的单词： SYMBIOSIS

example_sentences.en: Symbiosis works at many different levels of biological organisation .
example_sentences.zh: 共生在生物组织的多个层面都扮演重要角色。

example_sentences.en: There is a symbiosis between large and small .
example_sentences.zh: 大公司与小公司之间存在着一种共生关系。

meaning: n. 剥夺；丧失；免职，废止
variation: 复数： deprivations

example_sentences.en: Eventually , this extreme sleep deprivation kills them .
example_sentences.zh: 他们最终死于这种极端的睡眠剥夺。

example_sentences.en: However , much sleep deprivation is involuntary .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，许多睡眠损失是非自愿的。

meaning: adj. 欺诈的，骗人的；靠不住的；迷惑的；虚伪的

example_sentences.en: His conversational style can also be rather deceptive .
example_sentences.zh: 他的对话风格具有很强的欺骗性。

example_sentences.en: Yet these reassuring numbers are deceptive .
example_sentences.zh: 但事实上这些看起来令人鼓舞的数字是骗人的。

meaning: vt. 涉及，关系到；使关心，使担忧；参与n. 关心；关系，有关；顾虑；公司或企业
zh_source: concern 影响，涉及con-, 强调。-cern, 分开，筛选，词源同discern, crisis. 即区分开的，关心自己那一部分的。
variation: 复数： concerns第三人称单数： concerns过去式： concerned过去分词： concerned现在分词： concerning

example_sentences.en: Yet this concern is probably overblown .
example_sentences.zh: 但这种担心有点言过其实。

example_sentences.en: Inflation is always a cause for concern .
example_sentences.zh: 通货膨胀一直都是人们关心的话题。

meaning: vt. 分派，选派，分配；归于，归属；[法律] 把（财产，权利、利息）从一人转让给另一人；把…编制n. [常用复数][法律]受让人，接受财产等转让的人，受托者
zh_source: assign 指定前缀as- 同ad-. sign, 记号。
variation: 第三人称单数： assigns过去式： assigned过去分词： assigned现在分词： assigning

example_sentences.en: Assign him a task reflecting the size of his ego .
example_sentences.zh: 分配给他一项能反映他自负程度的任务。

example_sentences.en: Assign restrictions and roles to specific pages , posts or categories .
example_sentences.zh: 为特定的页面，内容和类别分配管理权限和角色.

meaning: n. 小说，虚构的文学作品；虚构的或想像出的事，并非完全真实的事；编造，虚构
zh_source: fiction 小说来自PIE*dheigh, 捏造，制造，形成，词源同dough, figure. 用来指小说。
variation: 复数： fictions

example_sentences.en: It won the 1964 national book award for fiction .
example_sentences.zh: 小说在1964年获国家图书小说类奖。

example_sentences.en: In the story , truth was interweaved with fiction .
example_sentences.zh: 这篇故事中，真实与虚构交织在一起。

meaning: vt. 使一体化；使整合；使完整；使结合成为整体vi. 成为一体；结合在一起；合并；[数学]作积分运算adj. 整体的；完整的；完全的；综合的
zh_source: integrate 使一体化来自integral,整体的，引申词义使一体化。
variation: 第三人称单数： integrates过去式： integrated过去分词： integrated现在分词： integrating

example_sentences.en: Integrate your learnings into your plans for the future .
example_sentences.zh: 将你的学习收获整合进将来的计划。

example_sentences.en: Human workflows must integrate seamlessly into the meis .
example_sentences.zh: 人类的工作流必须与meis无缝整合。

meaning: n. 隐私，秘密；隐居；私事；不受公众干扰的状态
zh_source: privacy 隐私，私密来自private,私人的，私密的，-acy,名词后缀。引申词义隐私，私密。

meaning: vt. 解放；解脱（疑虑，迷信，偏见等）；[法]使（孩子）脱离父母的管束（获得行动自主权）
zh_source: emancipate 解放e-, 向外。-man,手，见manual. -cip, 拿，握，控制，见captive, capture. 即松手的。
variation: 第三人称单数： emancipates过去式： emancipated过去分词： emancipated现在分词： emancipating

example_sentences.en: The maoists want to push through land reform , emancipate the lower castes and seek foreign investment .
example_sentences.zh: 毛派想通过土地改革、解放处于社会低层的人民和吸引外国投资来推动这两方面的变革。

example_sentences.en: However various attempts at alternatives ( now disowned by the marxists as stalinism and maoism ) have also failed to emancipate the suffering plebian class .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，选择种种尝试（现在已为曾经是斯大林主义和毛主义的马克思主义者所否定）也未能解放受苦受难的平民阶级。

meaning: vt. 看出；理解，了解；识别，辨别vi. 辨明，分清
zh_source: discern 识别dis-, 分开，散开。-cern, 分开，词源同concern, certain. 即分散开，识别。
variation: 第三人称单数： discerns过去式： discerned过去分词： discerned现在分词： discerning

example_sentences.en: Many presenters get distracted by trying to discern the intention behind questions or comments .
example_sentences.zh: 很多陈述人试图分辨出问题背后的含义，而被分散了注意力。

example_sentences.en: Semantic technology can discern what it is .
example_sentences.zh: 语义技术可以辨明真相。

meaning: n. 分给，分配；任务，工作，（课外）作业；<美>任命；指定，委派
variation: 复数： assignments

example_sentences.en: Hou bo should never have got the assignment .
example_sentences.zh: 侯波本不可能接受这项任务。

example_sentences.en: Two of my students cheated on a written assignment by submitting the same paper .
example_sentences.zh: 我的两名学生在一次书面作业中作弊，交了两份同样的论文。

meaning: adj. 私有的，私人的；秘密的；内心的；平民的，无官职的，士兵的n. 列兵，士兵，[陆]二等兵；〈古〉私人，个人；阴部，生殖器
zh_source: private 个人的，私有的来自拉丁语privare,使个人化，使分开，使剥离，来自privus,个人的，自己的，来自PIE*per,向前，穿过，词源同ford,first.

example_sentences.en: The private contractors ' roles have ballooned . "
example_sentences.zh: 私营承包商的作用大大提高。”

example_sentences.en: * A neighbor of steve jobs offers a glimpse into his private life .
example_sentences.zh: *史蒂夫•乔布斯的一个邻居带领我们一窥“乔帮主”的私生活。

meaning: adj. 虚构的，编造的；假定的，虚设的；小说式的；假装的
