zh_source: fictitious 虚假的来自fiction, 捏造，虚假，小说。

example_sentences.en: To the minimalists , david and solomon were simply fictitious characters .
example_sentences.zh: 在极简主义者眼中，大卫和所罗门只是虚构的人物。

example_sentences.en: But their work is still bound to have impacts on the ecosystem of fictitious monsters .
example_sentences.zh: 但他们的工作仍然对虚构的怪物们的生态系统有影响。

meaning: n. 正直，诚实；完整；[计算机]保存；健全
zh_source: integrity 完整，健全，诚实，正直来自integral,整体的。后引申诸多形容人的美好品行的褒义词义。
variation: 复数： integrities

example_sentences.en: They undermine the integrity of our economy and democracy .
example_sentences.zh: 他们渐渐破坏了我们经济和民主的完整性。

example_sentences.en: Sincerity and personal integrity are crucial to their appeal .
example_sentences.zh: 忠诚和个人正直对他们的魅力尤为关键。

meaning: vt. 把…除外；不计prep. 除…外conj. [口语]要不是；除非；除…以外vi. 反对，表示异议（与 to 或 against连用）
zh_source: except 除了ex-, 向外。-cept, 拿，握，词源同captive, accept.
variation: 第三人称单数： excepts过去式： excepted过去分词： excepted现在分词： excepting易混淆的单词： EXCEPT

example_sentences.en: Man cannot survive except through his mind .
example_sentences.zh: 人无法生存，除非通过他的思想。

example_sentences.en: Category includes all farm managers except horticultural .
example_sentences.zh: 此类别包括所有的农场经理，园艺除外。

meaning: adj. 分离的，不相关联的；分立式；非连续
zh_source: discrete 离散的dis-, 分开，散开。-cret,区分，词源同crisis, critic, discern. 词义与discreet在17世纪前没有区别，后来才赋予不同的词义。

example_sentences.en: These observations most obviously apply to what we have called discrete rather than continuous content businesses .
example_sentences.zh: 很明显，这些观点大部都适用于我们所谓的离散型内容公司而不是连续型内容公司。

example_sentences.en: Moreover , this spending will create only discrete projects , not ongoing businesses that generate jobs and profits .
example_sentences.zh: 此外，这些支出只会产生离散的项目，而不是可以创造就业机会和利润的现有业务。

meaning: n. 对抗疗法
n. 家长式制度adj. 家长式的
zh_source: paternalism 家长式制度，专制来自paternal,父亲的，-ism,主义，思想，制度。比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: Governmental paternalism when directed to children is less problematic than paternalism toward adults .
example_sentences.zh: 政府的家长作风在针对儿童的时候没有针对成年人时的问题那么大。

example_sentences.en: Most of all , you believe , educated paternalism has delivered the goods .
example_sentences.zh: 最重要的一点是你相信，教育式家长作风带来的好的一面。

meaning: n. 痛苦；不幸；穷困；悲惨的境遇
zh_source: misery 痛苦，悲惨来自拉丁语miser,可怜的，可悲的，悲惨的。

example_sentences.en: But mary 's parents seem almost oblivious to misery .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，玛丽的父母似乎已经忘记了痛苦。

example_sentences.en: Somalia 's misery also threatens the outside world .
example_sentences.zh: 索马里所遭受的这些苦难，还威胁到了外界。

meaning: n. 大赦，特赦vt. 对…实行大赦；赦免
zh_source: amnesty 大赦前缀a-, 无，没有。Zero-grade词根mn, 记忆，同mind. 此处用以指法律术语。
variation: 复数： amnesties第三人称单数： amnesties过去式： amnestied过去分词： amnestied现在分词： amnestying

example_sentences.en: Not that old-style amnesty was soft on the west .
example_sentences.zh: 老派的大赦国际并未对西方有所偏爱。

example_sentences.en: To demand the assad family 's departure is counter-productive unless an amnesty is offered .
example_sentences.zh: 除非对阿萨德家族进行赦免，否则人们要阿萨德家族离开的要求注定是无效的。

meaning: n. 特权；（因财富和社会地位而仅有部分人享有的）权益；免责特权；特殊荣幸vt. 给与…特权，特免
zh_source: privilege 特权来自拉丁语privilegium,私人法律，特权，来自privus,个人的，词源同private,-leg,法律，词源同legal.

example_sentences.en: But public outrage over unearned privilege is still growing .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，公众对特权腐败的愤怒依然在增长。

example_sentences.en: This is a great privilege and gives us dignity .
example_sentences.zh: 这是人极大的殊荣，也是神所赋予人的尊严。

meaning: n. 开始，开端，初期；获得学位
zh_source: inception 开始in-,进入，使，-cept,拿，带，开始，词源同accept,concept.
variation: 易混淆的单词： Inception

example_sentences.en: From its inception , the vast scheme has suffered both delays and criticism .
example_sentences.zh: 从一开始，这项巨大的工程就不断被延期并且饱受诟病。

example_sentences.en: Tehran is revelling in analogies between egypt and tunisia , and its own revolutionary inception .
example_sentences.zh: 伊朗政府正为埃及和突尼斯相似的遭遇以及本国的革命性开端而自鸣得意。

meaning: n. 虚构的事物；臆造的事物，虛构的事
zh_source: figment 虚构来自PIE*dheigh, 揉捏，捏造，形成，词源同dough, fiction. 引申词义虚构。

example_sentences.en: I am just a figment of your imagination .
example_sentences.zh: 我是你想像中的一个虚构人物。

example_sentences.en: It had all been a figment ofmy imagination .
example_sentences.zh: 这一切都是我臆想出来的.

meaning: vt. 委托，托付；托运；寄售；用作，当作
zh_source: consign 交付给con-, 强调。-sign, 记号，标记。
variation: 第三人称单数： consigns过去式： consigned过去分词： consigned现在分词： consigning

example_sentences.en: If the clothes are still in good shape when your children outgrow them , you can auction or consign them to recover some of your costs
example_sentences.zh: 而如果当孩子长大了，这些衣服还很好，你也可以拍卖或寄售来收回一部分费用。

example_sentences.en: This solidarity was on display in durban last week , with china , india , africa , latin america and other vulnerable countries teaming up to oppose unfair machinations by obstinate developed nations whose overall policy would consign africa to perpetual poverty .
example_sentences.zh: 这一共识在上周的德班会议上公布，与中国、印度、非洲、拉丁美洲和其他弱小国家联手反对不公平的阴谋：那些顽固的发达国家政策将把非洲交付于永久的贫困中去。

meaning: n. 父亲的身份[地位]
zh_source: paternity 父亲的身份来自拉丁语pater,父亲，词源同father.

example_sentences.en: " One myth is that men won 't take paternity leave , " says twaronite . "
example_sentences.zh: 特瓦罗尼特说：“有一种错误的观点，认为男性不应该享受陪产假。

example_sentences.en: Paternity tests available to private citizens from oct 13 .
example_sentences.zh: 亲子鉴定13日起向私人开放。

meaning: adj. 开始的，初期的
zh_source: incipient 开端的in-,进入，使，-cip,拿，带，开始，词源同inception,participate.

example_sentences.en: The first signs of incipient malnutrition .
example_sentences.zh: 早期营养不良的最初迹象。

example_sentences.en: Beijing 's olympics may themselves be a sign of this incipient democracy .
example_sentences.zh: 可能北京奥运会本身就是这种初始民主的一个迹象。

meaning: n. 数字；算术；图解；轮廓vi. 计算；出现；扮演角色vt. 计算在内；估计；推测；认为
zh_source: figure 数字，雕像，身段来自PIE*dheigh, 揉捏，捏造，形成，词源同dough, fiction. 由揉捏引申多种词义。
variation: 复数： figures第三人称单数： figures过去式： figured过去分词： figured现在分词： figuring

example_sentences.en: The figure came in well below expectations .
example_sentences.zh: 这一数字远远低于期望水平。

example_sentences.en: He was a figure from another age .
example_sentences.zh: 他是来自另一个时代的人物。

meaning: n. 慎重，慎重；考虑周到；判断力，辨别力；自行决定的自由
zh_source: discretion 自行决定权，慎重来自discreet, 慎重。

example_sentences.en: But he breached his trade 's cardinal rule : discretion .
example_sentences.zh: 但他却违法了这一行最重要的职业准则：谨慎。

example_sentences.en: In today 's volatile markets , such discretion might prove the better part of valour .
example_sentences.zh: 在如今这多变的市场里，这种判断力可能是一种恰如其分的英勇。

meaning: n. 装运的货物，托运的货物；托运，运送；委托，托管
zh_source: consignment 装运货物，运送物来自consign, 交付，交寄。
variation: 复数： consignments

example_sentences.en: We are pleased to inform you that the last lot consignment will be dispatched next month .
example_sentences.zh: 我们很高兴地通知您，您的最后一批货物将于下雨发货。

example_sentences.en: We confirm our respects of the 3rd may , and inform you that your consignment has duly arrived .
example_sentences.zh: 兹确认我们5月3日所发函并告知您发来的货物已如期到达。

meaning: n. 借口，托辞；假象，掩饰vt. 借口，假托
zh_source: pretext 借口，托辞pre-,在前，早于，预先，-text,编织，词源同text,texture.比喻用法，即先编好的。

meaning: vt. 收集，收藏；收到；收款，收帐；聚积vi. 聚集，集合vt.& vi. 征收，募集adj. 由受话人付费的（美国英语）adv. （电话、电报等）由受话人付费
zh_source: collect 收集col-, 强调。-lect, 收集，选出，词源同elect, college.
variation: 第三人称单数： collects过去式： collected过去分词： collected现在分词： collecting易混淆的单词： Collect

example_sentences.en: Probably he will start to collect movies himself .
example_sentences.zh: 也许他就要开始自己收集电影。

example_sentences.en: But instruments to collect data would still need to be built .
example_sentences.zh: 但不管怎样，是用来搜集数据的设备仍然需要建立起来。

meaning: n. 热水瓶，保温瓶。来自于德国品牌膳魔师保温瓶商标“Thermos”
zh_source: Thermos 保温瓶商标名，来自希腊语 thermos,热的，温暖的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Thermos

example_sentences.en: At work , a blonde notices her that cubicle mate has a thermos .
example_sentences.zh: 上班的时候，金发美女注意到和她一起的同事有个保温瓶。

example_sentences.en: As thermos flasks demonstrate , a vacuum is a great insulator .
example_sentences.zh: 如同热水瓶所显示的那样，真空是极好的绝缘体。

meaning: vt. 拦截，拦住；截球；截击；拦阻n. （数学）截距；截击，拦截；截听；拦截者
zh_source: intercept 阻截，拦截inter-,在内，在中间，相互，-cept,拿，握，词源同capable,capture.引申词义阻截，拦截。
variation: 复数： intercepts第三人称单数： intercepts过去式： intercepted过去分词： intercepted现在分词： intercepting

example_sentences.en: Makes it possible for hackers to intercept these signals .
example_sentences.zh: 一些很简单的软件就可以让黑客们拦截你的信号。

example_sentences.en: A european defence official says even video surveillance cameras can intercept or disrupt communications .
example_sentences.zh: 一欧洲国防官员说就连监视摄像头都能拦截或扰乱通讯。

meaning: n. 父权制（社会）；家长制，家长统治；族长政治；族长管区

example_sentences.en: I have no nostalgia for the patriarchy , please believe me .
example_sentences.zh: 请相信我，我对父权制度毫无怀旧之情。

meaning: adj. 个人的，私人的；秘密参与的；（行为）暗中参与的；不公开的n. 有利害关系的人；<古>厕所
zh_source: privy 准许知事的，可参与秘事的来自古法语prive,私密的，私密场所，词源同private.用于政治术语准许知情的，可参与政事的。

example_sentences.en: Contact the undersigned to be privy to this mail .
example_sentences.zh: 联系本人知悉，这封邮件。

example_sentences.en: I am not privy to any private information about the company , but I ' ve said publicly that I admire the founders and the kind of business they have been able to build so quickly .
example_sentences.zh: 我并不了解该公司的任何内幕，但我曾公开表示，对该公司创始人以及他们能如此迅速壮大起来的业务，我感到钦佩。

meaning: vt.& vi. 歧视；区别；辨出
zh_source: discriminate 区分，歧视dis-, 分开，散开。-crim, 区分，词源同crime, crisis. 即区分开，区别对待，歧视。
variation: 第三人称单数： discriminates过去式： discriminated过去分词： discriminated现在分词： discriminating

example_sentences.en: Isps cannot discriminate against any service in an anti-competitive way .
example_sentences.zh: 网络服务提供商们不能以反竞争的方式歧视任何服务。

example_sentences.en: Subsidy programmes that discriminate between local and foreign producers invite wto litigation .
example_sentences.zh: 对本国和外国生产商区别对待的补贴项目很容易引发wto诉讼。

meaning: vt.& vi. 设计；绘制vt. 设计；计划；企图；决意（做）n. 设计；图案；结构；计划vi. 设计略图；（为工艺品、装潢项目等）设计；当设计师；构思
zh_source: design 设计de-, 向下。sign, 写，标记。即写下来，描绘，设计。
variation: 复数： designs第三人称单数： designs过去式： designed过去分词： designed现在分词： designing

example_sentences.en: They will help design your products .
example_sentences.zh: 他们会帮助你设计产品。

example_sentences.en: Copy a design , such as two intersecting pentagons .
example_sentences.zh: 复制一个图案，如两个相交的五边形。

meaning: n. 纺织品，织物；纺织业
zh_source: textile 纺织品text-,纺织，编织，-ile,形容词后缀。词性由形容词作名词使用。
variation: 复数： textiles

example_sentences.en: Cambodian textile exports have been hit harder than bangladeshi ones .
example_sentences.zh: 柬埔寨的纺织品出口受到的打击比孟加拉国更严重。

example_sentences.en: It is also managing to repatriate more trafficked artefacts from abroad , including 18 ceramic , textile and metal objects from germany two months ago .
example_sentences.zh: 它还成功地从国外追回更多被走私的文物，包括两个月前从德国追回的18件陶质的，纺织的和金属物件。

meaning: n. 占有人；居住者
zh_source: occupant 占用者，占据者来自occupy,占用，占据，居住。
variation: 复数： occupants

example_sentences.en: A sensing wristband automatically detects a fall or heart problems in an elderly occupant and can send an alert .
example_sentences.zh: 一个有感知力的表带能自动探测疾病或是老年居住者的心脏问题，并发出警报。

example_sentences.en: The tech crowd thought the latest occupant of the white house was one of their own .
example_sentences.zh: 搞科技的曾认为白宫的这位新主人是他们中的一员。

meaning: vt. 纪念， 庆祝；成为…的纪念
zh_source: commemorate 纪念com-, 强调。-memor, 记忆，见memory。
variation: 第三人称单数： commemorates过去式： commemorated过去分词： commemorated现在分词： commemorating

example_sentences.en: Time there is an event to commemorate the holocaust .
example_sentences.zh: 每次举行大屠杀纪念活动时，人们都要提到它。

example_sentences.en: The united states postal service has issued a new stamp to commemorate the 2008 olympic games in beijing .
example_sentences.zh: 美国邮政总局近日发行庆祝2008年北京奥运的新邮票。

meaning: n. 祖传的财物，<喻>继承物，遗产
zh_source: patrimony 文物，祖传遗产patri-,父亲，-mony,名词后缀。引申词义父亲留下的财产，祖传遗产，文物。

example_sentences.en: Declared patrimony of humanity in 1993 by unesco .
example_sentences.zh: 1993年被联合国教科文组织宣布为世界人类遗产。

example_sentences.en: It is their cultural patrimony , they say .
example_sentences.zh: 他们说那都是他们的文化遗产。

meaning: adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的n. [统]集体；[语]集合名词；集团
variation: 复数： collectives

example_sentences.en: He also wants to make collective bargaining more flexible .
example_sentences.zh: 他同时希望能使集体谈判能更灵活。

example_sentences.en: The england football team exemplified this collective delusion , and the country 's rampant materialism .
example_sentences.zh: 那时的英格兰足球队代表了这种民众集体的妄想和这个国家无法遏制的物质享乐主义。

meaning: n. 太空航空学

example_sentences.en: Hotels nanjing aeronautics and astronautics university .
example_sentences.zh: 临近南京航空航天大学的酒店。

example_sentences.en: Beijing university of aeronautics and astronautics stadium -- weight lifting hall .
example_sentences.zh: 北京航空航天大学体育馆--举重馆。

meaning: vt. 指明，指出；指派；表明，意味着；把…定名为adj. 指定而尚未上任的；选出而尚未上任的
variation: 第三人称单数： designates过去式： designated过去分词： designated现在分词： designating

example_sentences.en: Designate a night when you don 't cook .
example_sentences.zh: 指定一个不用下厨的晚上

example_sentences.en: Wales and scotland are expected to designate other marine conservation areas later this year .
example_sentences.zh: 威尔士和苏格兰也希望在今年晚些时候命名其他一些海洋保护区。

meaning: adj. 正确的；合适的；（举止言谈）符合公认准则的；符合公认的准则的vt. 改正；[数学、物理学]校正；（试卷）改错；批改vi. 纠正错误；调整；校准（常与 for 连用）
zh_source: correct 正确的cor-, 强调。-rect, 直，正确，词源同erect, right .
variation: 第三人称单数： corrects过去式： corrected过去分词： corrected现在分词： correcting

example_sentences.en: It might be only half correct .
example_sentences.zh: 这怕是只是一半正确。

example_sentences.en: This is a misperception the president needs to correct .
example_sentences.zh: 总统需要纠正人们对美国的这个误解。

meaning: n. 质地；结构；本质v. 使具有某种结构
zh_source: texture 纹理，质地text-,纺织，编织，-ure,名词后缀。引申词义结构，后用于指纹理，质地等。
variation: 复数： textures第三人称单数： textures过去式： textured过去分词： textured现在分词： texturing

example_sentences.en: They may recoil from the texture of food .
example_sentences.zh: 食物的质地可能会造成他们的恐惧。

example_sentences.en: Despite having the texture of wet cement , lahars can flow rapidly .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管有着类似湿法水泥的质地，火山泥流还是能够快速地流动。

meaning: adj. 有鉴别能力的，有识别能力的v. 分别，辨别，区分( discriminate的现在分词 )；歧视，有差别地对待

example_sentences.en: Is israel discriminating between civilians and combatants ?
example_sentences.zh: 攻击时有没有区分平民和斗争人员？

example_sentences.en: Discriminating between the worthwhile acquisitions and the dogs requires careful due diligence and negotiating skills , but time is often short .
example_sentences.zh: 区分有价值和无价值的对象需要认真的尽职调查和谈判技巧，但时间往往不充裕。

meaning: n. 职业，工作；占有，占领；（土地、房屋、建筑等的）使用
zh_source: occupation 占用，工作，职业来自occupy,占用，占据，居住。引申词义职业。
variation: 复数： occupations

example_sentences.en: The first chinese occupation happened in guangzhou on february 19th .
example_sentences.zh: 第一例中国人的占领运动发生在2月19日的广州。

example_sentences.en: Few knew each other by name or occupation .
example_sentences.zh: 很少有人知道彼此的真实姓名或职业。

meaning: n. （对国家、事业等的）背叛

example_sentences.en: The first was yahoo 's defection to the microsoft camp .
example_sentences.zh: 首先是雅虎的背叛，并倒向了微软阵营。

example_sentences.en: Both cooperation and defection do not relate to any absolute standard of morality .
example_sentences.zh: 无论合作或是背叛都涉及到道德的绝对标准。

meaning: adj. 星形的；星际的

example_sentences.en: There is no gravity affecting you in astral form .
example_sentences.zh: 处于星体躯体中时没有重力影响你。

example_sentences.en: They are possessed by many low astral entities .
example_sentences.zh: 他们被很多低星光实体所支配。

meaning: n. 氯化物；〈口〉漂白粉
variation: 复数： chlorides易混淆的单词： Chloride

example_sentences.en: Chloride from table salt is oxidised to form chlorine , which disinfects the water .
example_sentences.zh: 食盐中提取出的氯化物氧化制取氯气，用来对水进行消毒。

example_sentences.en: It is a rubber-like product made by reacting rape-seed oil from the dutch east indies with sulfur chloride .
example_sentences.zh: 那是一种有来自于荷属东印度群岛菜籽油与硫氯化物反应后制成的类似于橡胶的产品。

meaning: n. 爱国者，爱国主义者
zh_source: patriot 同胞，爱国者来自希腊语patriotes,同胞，乡亲，老乡，来自pater,父亲，词源同father.-otes,状态后缀。即同一个父亲的，同一个祖先的，后用以指同胞，爱国者。

example_sentences.en: It is placing patriot anti-aircraft missiles in poland .
example_sentences.zh: 将爱国者号反飞行器导弹布置在波兰境内。

example_sentences.en: Your father was a fighter and a patriot .
example_sentences.zh: 你父亲是位战士，也是位爱国者。

meaning: adj. 无法追忆的，远古的
zh_source: immemorial 远古的im-,不，非，memorial,有记忆的。即没有记忆的，远古的。

example_sentences.en: Innovations in learning have been in existence since time immemorial .
example_sentences.zh: 创新学习自古以来一直存在.

example_sentences.en: Since time immemorial , mankind has gazed at the static-like tapestry of the stars hovering above the horizon .
example_sentences.zh: 从远古以来，人们就仰望着如挂毯般静静徘徊于地平线上的星幕。

meaning: n. 端正，有礼有节

example_sentences.en: Rules and correctitude destroy genius and art .
example_sentences.zh: 规则与谦逊会毁掉天才和艺术。

example_sentences.en: He is resolutely relaxed about usage , understanding that correctitude and intelligibility are not the same .
example_sentences.zh: 他坚决地宽容看待这些用法，认为得体与明了是不一样的。

meaning: vt. 选举；挑出，挑选；决定vi. 选择，挑选；进行选举adj. 精选的，选出的；选中的，当选而尚未就职的n. 被选的人
zh_source: elect 选举e-, 向外。-lect, 收集，选出，词源同collect,elite.
variation: 复数： elects第三人称单数： elects过去式： elected过去分词： elected现在分词： electing易混淆的单词： ELECT

example_sentences.en: Americans will elect their next president on november 4 .
example_sentences.zh: 美国人将在11月4号选举下届总统。

example_sentences.en: The swiss government will elect a new snb president .
example_sentences.zh: 瑞士政府将通过选举产生一名新央行行长。

meaning: vt. 占领；使用，住在…；使从事，使忙碌；任职
zh_source: occupy 占用，占据oc-,向前，朝向，-cup,抓，握，持有，词源同capable,participate.即抓住的，占有的，引申词义占用，占据。
variation: 第三人称单数： occupies过去式： occupied过去分词： occupied现在分词： occupying

example_sentences.en: It is plainly unwilling to occupy the place again .
example_sentences.zh: 它只是不愿意在占领哪个地方罢了。

example_sentences.en: Private aircraft occupy the lowest rung of the flight ladder .
example_sentences.zh: 私人飞机占据航机阶梯的最低一级。

meaning: vt. 环航
variation: 第三人称单数： circumnavigates过去式： circumnavigated过去分词： circumnavigated现在分词： circumnavigating

example_sentences.en: The most economical way to circumnavigate is to buy a round-the-world air ticket that uses one airline alliance .
example_sentences.zh: 环航最经济有效的办法就是在同一家航空联盟公司买张环球机票。

example_sentences.en: Ferdinand magellan 's expedition was the first to circumnavigate the globe .
example_sentences.zh: 费迪南根兰的远征是第一次环绕世界的航行。

meaning: adj. 值得纪念的；显著的，难忘的；重大的，著名的
zh_source: memorable 难忘的来自memory,记忆。即值得记忆的，难忘的。

example_sentences.en: Creating a unique and memorable experience for your customers .
example_sentences.zh: 为你的客户创造一份独特而难忘的经历。

example_sentences.en: Ms foreman draws many memorable portraits .
example_sentences.zh: 弗尔曼女士还描写了许多值得纪念的人物。

meaning: n. 影响；效果；印象；所有物vt. 使发生；引起；产生（效果）
zh_source: effect 效果ef-, 向外。-fect, 做，词源同fact, affect. 即做出来的效果。
variation: 复数： effects第三人称单数： effects过去式： effected过去分词： effected现在分词： effecting

example_sentences.en: But it may have little effect .
example_sentences.zh: 但它可能没有什么效果。

example_sentences.en: But the formula effect will persist .
example_sentences.zh: 但是公式效应仍将继续。

meaning: adj. 不加选择的，不分青红皂白的；随意的，任性的，任意的；眼内无珠；汗漫不可收拾
zh_source: indiscriminate 不加选择的in-,不，非，discriminate,有选择的，有鉴别的。

example_sentences.en: The market 's aversion to banking risk is perhaps indiscriminate .
example_sentences.zh: 市场对银行业风险的嫌恶或许不分青红皂白。

example_sentences.en: That is a decent start , but may be too indiscriminate .
example_sentences.zh: 这是个好的开始，但是也可能出先不分青红皂白的情况。

meaning: n. 名称；选派；指定
zh_source: designation 指定来自design, 标记，指定。
variation: 复数： designations

example_sentences.en: That designation tells only half the story .
example_sentences.zh: 这项称号只反映出部分事实。

example_sentences.en: The designation would trigger official talks between the u.s. and china over the value of the yuan .
example_sentences.zh: 这一称号会促使中美两国之间围绕人民币币值问题进行正式会谈。

meaning: n. 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神
zh_source: patriotism 爱国主义来自patriot,同胞，爱国者，-ism,主义，思想。

example_sentences.en: Pride and patriotism seem to be universal values .
example_sentences.zh: 自豪和爱国主义似乎是全球普遍价值观。

example_sentences.en: Patriotism never tasted so delicious .
example_sentences.zh: 爱国精神在这时是如此的美味。

meaning: n. 有选举权的人；选举人；总统选举人；<美>总统选举团成员
variation: 复数： electors

example_sentences.en: Augustus iii , king of poland and elector of saxony .
example_sentences.zh: 1756年受波兰与撒克逊选民的国王奥古斯特三世。

example_sentences.en: First , was this already becomes the antique elector system itself .
example_sentences.zh: 首先，就是这一已经成为古董的选举人制度本身。

meaning: adj. 矫正的；惩治的n. 矫正物；改善法；补救药
variation: 复数： correctives

example_sentences.en: They were an odd couple , he and the mayor ; corrective measures were needed .
example_sentences.zh: 总裁和市长是奇怪的一对，需要采取矫正措施。

example_sentences.en: But x-ray imaging has its own problems , with x-rays difficult to focus or manipulate even with corrective lenses .
example_sentences.zh: 但是x光射线图像本身也有自己的问题，比如x光射线难于聚焦，甚至在使用矫正透镜的情况下也难于控制。

meaning: n. 作呕；恶心；反胃；极度厌恶
zh_source: nausea 恶心，作呕来自拉丁语naus,船，词源同nautical,navigate.其原义为晕船，作呕，后词义通用化。

example_sentences.en: The patient developed nausea and vomited bile-stained fluid on several occasions .
example_sentences.zh: 这病人恶心，曾呕吐了含有胆汁液体数次。

example_sentences.en: High concentrations of antimony can cause nausea , vomiting and diarrhea .
example_sentences.zh: 大量的锑累积可导致恶心、呕吐以及腹泻等症状。

meaning: n. 叶绿素
zh_source: chlorophyll 叶绿素chloro, 绿色，词源同chlorine, gold。-phyll, 叶子，词源同foliage, folio.

example_sentences.en: The secret ingredient is chlorophyll , which aids in overall digestive function .
example_sentences.zh: 它的秘密成分是叶绿素，有助改善整个呼吸道功能。

example_sentences.en: Scientists use these observations to estimate chlorophyll concentration ( bottom ) in the water .
example_sentences.zh: 科学家们利用这些观测估计水中的叶绿素浓度（下图）。

meaning: n. （液体的）澄清；净化；澄清法；（意义等的）澄清、说明

example_sentences.en: No one presents concerns until clarification is complete .
example_sentences.zh: 在完全澄清这个议题之前，任何人都不要提出问题。

example_sentences.en: The debate could do with a little clarification .
example_sentences.zh: 需要对这场辩论进行一点说明。

meaning: v. 意识到；察觉，发觉；理解
zh_source: perceive 感觉，感知来自拉丁语percipere,得到，抓住，来自per-,完全的，-cip,抓住，理解，词源同conceive,percipient.引申词义感觉，感知。

example_sentences.en: We create and perceive our world simultaneously .
example_sentences.zh: 我们在感知世界的同时，也在创造它们。

example_sentences.en: The eye tends to perceive it only as smudge or sludge .
example_sentences.zh: 眼睛通常会仅将雾感知类似为一种斑迹。

meaning: n. 占星术；占星学；原始天文学

example_sentences.en: In indian astrology , even the minute of birth is important .
example_sentences.zh: 在印度占星术中，就连出生的分钟也很重要。

example_sentences.en: Nostradamus studied astrology and various " occult " sciences and used those to predict the future .
example_sentences.zh: 诺查丹玛斯学习研究占星术以及玄幻科学还有那些能用来预测未来的东西。

meaning: n. [外]照会，备忘录；[商]便笺，函；记录；[法]（契约等条文的）节略
zh_source: memorandum 备忘录来自拉丁语memor,记忆，词源同memory.-and,动名词后缀，-um,中性格。引申词义备忘录。

example_sentences.en: The pentagon will issue a formal memorandum in the next few weeks .
example_sentences.zh: 在接下来的几周中五角大楼将发布一份正式的备忘录。

example_sentences.en: Japan signed its first defense memorandum in southeast asia with singapore in 2009 .
example_sentences.zh: 日本在2009年同新加坡签署它在东南亚的第一份防务备忘录。

meaning: n. 选民（全体）；选举区；[史]选帝侯的爵位[领土]
variation: 复数： electorates

example_sentences.en: But the electorate has grown used to unfulfilled promises .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，选民已经对这种空头承诺习以为常了。

example_sentences.en: Anything less is an insult to the electorate 's intelligence .
example_sentences.zh: 不说清楚就是对选民智慧的一种侮辱。

meaning: n. 赞助人，资助人；顾客，老主顾；保护人；[宗]守护神
zh_source: patron 赞助，主顾来自古法语patron,赞助，主顾，来自拉丁语patronus,守护圣人，保护者，来自pater,父亲，词源同father.后引申词义顾客，主顾，赞助商。

example_sentences.en: The earl was shakespeare 's only known literary patron .
example_sentences.zh: 南安普敦伯爵是莎士比亚的唯一已知的文学赞助者。

example_sentences.en: General prayuth 's hawkish views reflect those of queen sirikit , his patron .
example_sentences.zh: 巴育将军的强烈态度反映了他的赞助者诗丽吉王后的观点。

meaning: vt. 实行，完成
variation: 第三人称单数： effectuates过去式： effectuated过去分词： effectuated现在分词： effectuating

example_sentences.en: The disease do not prevent him from effectuate his plan .
example_sentences.zh: 疾病并未妨碍他实现计划。

example_sentences.en: Chinese policymakers have decided to broaden the base of financial institutions required to comply with 21.5 % reserve requirements , which will effectuate a further tightening of liquidity .
example_sentences.zh: 中国的政策制定者已经决定要求更多金融机构遵守21.5%的存款准备金率，这将造成流动性进一步收紧。

meaning: adj. 直接的；直的；直系的；率直的adv. 直接地；径直地；直截了当地；正好vt. （用建议、指示、有益的情报等）指导；导演（戏剧或电影）；指示方向；把…对准（某方向或某人）vt.& vi. 指导，导演，管理vi. 引路；当向导；领唱；领奏
zh_source: direct 直接，管理dis-, 分开。-reg, 竖直，引导，词源同regulate, correct. 引申义拉直，部署，管理。
variation: 第三人称单数： directs过去式： directed过去分词： directed现在分词： directing

example_sentences.en: This will cause direct friction .
example_sentences.zh: 这将导致直接摩擦。

example_sentences.en: We need more direct action .
example_sentences.zh: 我们需要更加直接的措施。

meaning: n. 旗，船旗，国旗；<美>海军少尉；（表示职别等的）徽章
zh_source: ensign 舰旗en-, 进入，使。sign, 记号，标志。
variation: 复数： ensigns易混淆的单词： Ensign

example_sentences.en: So what nonsense are you reading today ensign ?
example_sentences.zh: 所以你在看什么废话今天少尉？

example_sentences.en: Tiger : who say my power and prestige eight sides , be my skin usually take by the person to do big ensign !
example_sentences.zh: 老虎：谁说我威风八面，我的皮常常被人拿去做大旗呢！

meaning: n. 规诫，戒律，箴言
zh_source: precept 规范，准则pre-,在前，早于，-cept,拿，握，持有，词源同accept,capable.引申词义规范，准则。

example_sentences.en: Their members are elected and they can charge a " precept " that is added to the borough council tax .
example_sentences.zh: 它的成员是民选的，并可以收取的“戒律税”，将其加到市政税中。

example_sentences.en: He had dared to change the only precept of the divine law that unmistakably points all mankind to the true and living god .
example_sentences.zh: 他胆敢窜改神的戒律中的唯一的一条无可非议地向全人类指明谁是真的、有生命的神的圣律。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使清楚，澄清vt. （尤指通过加热使黄油）纯净；说明；使（头脑、神智等）清醒vi. （液体）变得澄清；净化；变得清楚
zh_source: clarify 澄清来自clar-,清晰的，词源同clear.
variation: 第三人称单数： clarifies过去式： clarified过去分词： clarified现在分词： clarifying

example_sentences.en: Beijing should quickly clarify its approach to local-government debt .
example_sentences.zh: 北京方面应该尽快澄清处理地方政府债务的方式。

example_sentences.en: These clarify some of the things that were worrying bosses .
example_sentences.zh: 这些阐明了一些正困扰着老板们的麻烦事。

meaning: vt. 使恶心，作呕
zh_source: nauseate 使恶心来自nausea,恶心。
variation: 第三人称单数： nauseates过去式： nauseated过去分词： nauseated现在分词： nauseating

example_sentences.en: Love and sex built upon only money just makes me nauseate .
example_sentences.zh: 爱情与性只建筑在金钱上,我会作呕.

example_sentences.en: I began to nauseate the place I was in .
example_sentences.zh: 我开始厌恶我所住的地方。

meaning: n. 叶绿体
zh_source: chloroplast 叶绿体chloro, 绿色，词源同chlorine, gold。-plast, 形成，见plastic, 塑料，塑造。

example_sentences.en: With an artificial chloroplast outer layer , designer wu peng 's power cyton could aptly be named leaf if only that badge weren 't already taken .
example_sentences.zh: 设计者吴鹏的“能量神经细胞体”带着人工叶绿体的外覆层，如果“叶子”没有被占用的话，用之命名非常的恰如其分。

example_sentences.en: Like those chloroplast cells -- they 're completely surrounded by other life .
example_sentences.zh: 就像那些叶绿体细胞-它们全被其他生命所包围。

meaning: n. 宇航员；太空人；航天员
zh_source: astronaut 宇航员词根astro, 星。词根naut, 航行，见nautical, 航海的。
variation: 复数： astronauts

example_sentences.en: Former nasa astronaut ed lu heads the foundation .
example_sentences.zh: 前nasa宇航员卢杰为基金会的领导人。

example_sentences.en: In some spots , decades-old astronaut footprints are still visible .
example_sentences.zh: 在一些地点，依然可见几十年前老宇航员的脚印。

meaning: vt. 惠顾；资助；保护；屈尊
zh_source: patronize 赞助，保护，屈尊来自patron,赞助，保护，-ize,使。后引申贬义词义屈尊，像别人的父亲的。

example_sentences.en: I go out of my way to patronize a dentist who has excellent communication skills .
example_sentences.zh: 我经常光顾我的牙医，他有着高超的交流技巧。

example_sentences.en: I really want to go patronize every day xd .
example_sentences.zh: 我真的好想每天都去光顾一下。

meaning: n. 方向，指南；指挥，指导，管理；用法说明，指示，命令，吩咐；导演，（乐队）指挥
zh_source: direction 方向来自direct, 管理，引导。引申义方向，正确指引。后词义通用化。
variation: 复数： directions

example_sentences.en: Down-market is the direction mr murdoch knows .
example_sentences.zh: 默多克了解的方向是低端市场。

example_sentences.en: And its future direction will influence the entire post-soviet space .
example_sentences.zh: 而乌未来走向将影响整个后苏联地区。

meaning: abbr. Memorial Stadium, Baltimore 巴尔的摩纪念馆
zh_source: memorial 记忆的来自memory,记忆。

example_sentences.en: Outside the church , a memorial depicts a miner kneelingbefore the virgin mary .
example_sentences.zh: 在教堂外，有一个纪念碑，描画了一个矿工在圣母玛利亚面前跪拜的情景。

example_sentences.en: Security at the memorial will be tight .
example_sentences.zh: 纪念馆的安全措施将会严密控制。

meaning: adj. （人或其举止）优美的；漂亮的；简炼的；简洁的
zh_source: elegant 优雅的e-, 向外。-leg, 收集，选出，词源同college, eligible. 即选出来的，优秀的，优雅的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Elegant

example_sentences.en: Most of the structures are stunningly unique and elegant .
example_sentences.zh: 大部分建筑结构别致优雅到让人叹为观止。

example_sentences.en: They are of such elegant people .
example_sentences.zh: 他们就是那种气质非常高雅的人。

meaning: adj. （药、措施等）有效的

example_sentences.en: Criteriafor inclusion in the panel are the existence of a reliable screenand an efficacious treatment
example_sentences.zh: 这些项目的标准包括存在性的可靠检查以及有效的治疗方法。

example_sentences.en: Jack kemp lauded his former aide : " it will be proven the most efficacious of all the reforms . "
example_sentences.zh: 杰克康普称赞自己曾经的助手：“历史会证明它将是迄今最有效的改革。”

meaning: n. 全神贯注，入神；当务之急；使人全神贯注的事物；偏见，成见

example_sentences.en: One early preoccupation was finding a new home .
example_sentences.zh: 公司的当务之急是找到一个新家。

example_sentences.en: Today , the middle east has replaced the cold war as america 's primary foreign-policy preoccupation .
example_sentences.zh: 如今，中东问题取代了冷战，成为美国重要外交政策当务之急的问题。

meaning: n. 证章，官职的标志（如肩章、领章等）
zh_source: insignia 标志，徽章in-,进入，使，sign,标志。引申词义徽章等。
variation: 复数： insignias

example_sentences.en: Thinking of getting the superman insignia on your bicep ?
example_sentences.zh: 像不像你的二头肌上的超人徽章？

example_sentences.en: In center , col. edwin e. " buzz " aldrin holds the apollo 11 insignia .
example_sentences.zh: 在中间，上校埃德温e.“巴兹”奥尔德林握着阿波罗11号徽章。

meaning: n. 象形文字；形符

example_sentences.en: Our empirical research in letter words proves that Chinese has adopted the Latin letters into its pictograph writing system .
example_sentences.zh: 我们对字母词的实证研究表明现代汉语的方块字中已经接纳了拉丁字母的书写形式。

example_sentences.en: “ Mountain ” in Chinese is a pictograph character which has its origin in the shape of the mountain .
example_sentences.zh: “山”是个象形字，是由大山的形态演化而来的。

meaning: n. 清楚，明晰；透明；明确；清晰度
zh_source: clarity 清晰来自clar-,清晰的，词源同clear.
variation: 易混淆的单词： Clarity

example_sentences.en: Those who opposed it demanded greater clarity and certainty .
example_sentences.zh: 反对者要求充实规定内容，使之变得更加明确和具体。

example_sentences.en: The result will be confusion , not clarity .
example_sentences.zh: 结果将会含混不清，而不是清楚明白。

meaning: adj. 海上的，航海的；船舶的；海员的，水手的
zh_source: nautical 航海的来自拉丁语naus,船，词源同navigate,navy.引申词义航行的，航海的。

example_sentences.en: John is obsessed with all things nautical and this fits the bill .
example_sentences.zh: john喜欢一切和航海有关的东西，所以这个正和他心意。

example_sentences.en: Its proximity to england had also allowed some english words to slip in , noticeably nautical terms .
example_sentences.zh: 由于邻近英格兰，一些英语单词也不知不觉进入了诺曼法语，尤其明显地反应在航海术语中。

meaning: n. 天文学
zh_source: astronomy 天文学词根astro, 星。词根nomy, 学说，学科。

example_sentences.en: The here and now are defined by astronomy and geology .
example_sentences.zh: 这儿和现在是被天文学和地质学定义的。

example_sentences.en: Without this understanding , astronomy is very difficult .
example_sentences.zh: 没有理解这些，天文学是相当困难的。

meaning: vt. 把（某人）遣送回国，遣返；回国n. 被遣返回国者
zh_source: repatriate 遣返re-,向后，往回，-pater,父亲，词源同 father,compatriot.比喻用法。
variation: 复数： repatriates第三人称单数： repatriates过去式： repatriated过去分词： repatriated现在分词： repatriating

example_sentences.en: It pledges to repatriate mr thaksin as part of a political-amnesty scheme .
example_sentences.zh: 它承诺将遣返他信作为政治特赦计划的一部分。

example_sentences.en: Because few illegal immigrants have papers , it 's hard to repatriate them .
example_sentences.zh: 因很少非法移民有证件，很难遣返他们。

meaning: vt. 记住，熟记；[计算机科学] 存储，记忆
zh_source: memorize 记忆来自memory,记忆，-ize,使。

example_sentences.en: Memorize a few good latin phrases and insert them whenever you can .
example_sentences.zh: 记住一些很好的拉丁词语并时常的穿插到你的话语中。

example_sentences.en: Sure , you have to memorize a few new key-combos , but once you ?
example_sentences.zh: 当然，你可以熟记一些新的组合键，一旦你使用上？

meaning: adj. 合适的；在（法律上或道德上）合格的；有资格当选的；称心如意的n. 合格者；合适者；称心如意的人；合乎条件的人（或东西）
zh_source: eligible 有资格的e-, 向外。-lig, 选出，词源同college, elect.
variation: 复数： eligibles

example_sentences.en: Now unsecured commercial paper is also eligible as collateral .
example_sentences.zh: 现在无担保的商业票据也有资格作为抵押品了。

example_sentences.en: It 's unfair that he 's eligible for this .
example_sentences.zh: 他有资格来角逐这个奖，真是不公平。

meaning: vt. 使直立，使竖起；建立，创立；安装；[医]使勃起adj. 直立的，垂直的；（头、手等）朝上举的；直竖的；[医]勃起的
zh_source: erect 竖直的，垂直的e-, 向外。-rect, 竖直，词源同right, correct.
variation: 第三人称单数： erects过去式： erected过去分词： erected现在分词： erecting

example_sentences.en: Spam and hacking attacks force network operators to erect security firewalls .
example_sentences.zh: 垃圾邮件和黑客攻击迫使网络运营者不得不建立安全防火墙。

example_sentences.en: But if you erect a wall , they will look for easier targets .
example_sentences.zh: 但如果你竖起一堵墙，他们就会去寻找更容易的目标了。

meaning: vt.& vi. 收到；接到；接纳；接待vt. 接收；受理；欢迎；承受vi. 接到，获得；接见，欢迎；[电子学] 接收；[橄榄球] 接球
zh_source: receive 接收，收到re-,向后，往回，-ceive,抓住，拿到，词源同 conceive,capable.
variation: 第三人称单数： receives过去式： received过去分词： received现在分词： receiving

example_sentences.en: When did you receive your first e-mail ?
example_sentences.zh: 你是第一次收到电子邮件是在什么时候？

example_sentences.en: Users input tracks and receive recommendations .
example_sentences.zh: 用户输入音乐名，然后接收推荐。

meaning: n. 功效；效力；效验；生产率
zh_source: efficacy 功效ef-, 向外。-fic, 做，词源同fact, effect.

example_sentences.en: There are limits to the efficacy of the food safety simulator .
example_sentences.zh: “食品安全模拟器”的功效也有其局限性。

example_sentences.en: They also say this argument should not be just about short-term efficacy , but morality as well .
example_sentences.zh: 他们也认为，这场争论不仅仅关系到短期效力，更关系到道德问题。

meaning: adj. 绘画的；有图片的；图画似的；形象化的n. 画报；画刊；画页；图画邮票

example_sentences.en: My favorite english magazine is english pictorial .
example_sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的英文杂志是英语画报。

example_sentences.en: According to the magazine pictorial display , the north korean authorities had also presented her limousine .
example_sentences.zh: 据月刊画报上显示，朝鲜当局还曾向她赠送了高级轿车。

meaning: n. 清洁，清扫；[建]净空；空隙，间隙；放行证
zh_source: clearance 许可，兑现来自clear,清楚的，解决了的。
variation: 复数： clearances

example_sentences.en: Perhaps a user might want to download a tv game from google 's android market without requiring clearance from sony .
example_sentences.zh: 而用户在从google的androidmarket下载电视游戏时，也不必从sony清除。

example_sentences.en: Will you take these to the clearance counter ?
example_sentences.zh: 你要带这些去通关柜台吗？

meaning: vt.& vi. 辞职，放弃n. 辞去职务vt. (to)使顺从
zh_source: resign 放弃，屈从，顺从，辞职来自拉丁语 resignare,取消，放弃，投降，解除，来自 re-,相反，signare,作记号，作标记，词 源同 sign.比喻用法，引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： resigns过去式： resigned过去分词： resigned现在分词： resigning

example_sentences.en: In such circumstances , he was right to resign .
example_sentences.zh: 在这种情况下，他决定辞职是正确的。

example_sentences.en: And she does not want to resign this loving career .
example_sentences.zh: 她更不愿意辞去这份她热爱的工作。

meaning: adj. （有）海军的，军舰的，船的
zh_source: naval 海军的来自navy,海军。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Naval

example_sentences.en: Both ships were positioned near the naval air station .
example_sentences.zh: 两艘舰船都停泊在海军航空站附近。

example_sentences.en: American officials remain wary of china 's secretive naval build-up , which is likely to intensify .
example_sentences.zh: 美方官员仍然对中国机密壮大海军的行为感到怀疑，而且这种行为似有愈演愈烈之势。

meaning: n. 建立，设立；勃起；直立，竖立；充血的过程
variation: 复数： erections

example_sentences.en: If the male has an erection does it indicate consent ?
example_sentences.zh: 男性勃起就表明是同意吗？

example_sentences.en: Two years ago in galilee , a druze community protested the erection of a new tower , claiming that the towers already in their midst had caused cancer rates to skyrocket .
example_sentences.zh: 两年以前在巴勒斯坦加利利地区，一个德鲁兹居民区反对建一座新的发射塔，称在当地的发射塔已经导致癌症患病率猛增。

meaning: vt. 吸引；诱惑；引起…的好感（或兴趣）vi. 具有吸引力；引人注意
zh_source: attract 吸引前缀at-同ad-. 词根tract, 拉，见tractor, 卡车。
variation: 第三人称单数： attracts过去式： attracted过去分词： attracted现在分词： attracting

example_sentences.en: Do high-price sports cars attract or repel women ?
example_sentences.zh: 高价运动型汽车吸引还是排斥女人？

example_sentences.en: The dissenters attract attention , but they are clearly in the minority .
example_sentences.zh: 反对者引起了人们的注意，但是他们明显只占少数。

meaning: n. 接近；<数>近似值；近似额；粗略估计
variation: 复数： approximations

example_sentences.en: But an approximation can be made .
example_sentences.zh: 但可以计算出它的近似值。

example_sentences.en: This will not provide a precise composition but it can give a decent approximation .
example_sentences.zh: 密度法不会给出物质的精确的组成，只是给出一个合适的近似值。

meaning: n. 智力，理解力；有才智的人；知识分子
zh_source: intellect 智力intel-,在中间，来自inter-的变体，-lect,选择，选出，词源同collect,elite.即鉴别的能力，引申词义智力，才智。词义演变比较science.
variation: 复数： intellects

example_sentences.en: Light yellow is associated with intellect freshness and joy .
example_sentences.zh: 浅黄色与智力、新鲜和喜悦联系在一起。

example_sentences.en: But there 's some question as to whether our intellect can overrule our emotion in every instance and in every situation .
example_sentences.zh: 但问题是，我们的理智是否在各种场合和各种情况下都可以克制我们的情感。

meaning: n. 容器，放置物品的地方
zh_source: receptacle 容器来自 receive,接收，收到，-pt,过去分词格，-acle,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： receptacles

example_sentences.en: Officials have said they would consider bringing in an outside container to store the water if a suitable receptacle can be found .
example_sentences.zh: 官员说，如果能找到合适的容器，他们会考虑引入一个外部冷凝器来存水。

example_sentences.en: An alternative method was to use a large shallow receptacle rather than a cauldron ; oil , tallow or pitch then being poured in . The victim was then partially immersed in the liquid and fried to death .
example_sentences.zh: 另一种方法是不用大锅，而是使用一个大的浅性容器，油，牛油或沥青随后被浇入.受刑人会部分被浸在液体中被煎炸而死。

meaning: n. 记忆，记忆力；回忆，往事；[计]存储器，内存
zh_source: memory 记忆，存储器来自拉丁语memor,记忆的，提醒的，思考的，来自PIE*mer,记忆，词源同memorize.拼写me-为mor的韵律重复。引申词义内存，存储器等。

example_sentences.en: The third category is memory computing .
example_sentences.zh: 第三方面是内存运算。

example_sentences.en: Samsung is the world largest manufacturer of memory chips and apple is one of its most important customers .
example_sentences.zh: 三星是世界上最大的存储芯片制造商，而苹果是其最重要的客户之一。

meaning: adj. 有效率的；（直接）生效的；能干的；（因省钱、省时或省力等而）收效大的

example_sentences.en: The voting machine metaphor underpins the efficient market hypothesis .
example_sentences.zh: 投票机的说法支持有效市场的假设。

example_sentences.en: This is not a jquery best practice , but a must for efficient javascript .
example_sentences.zh: 这并不是一个jquery最佳实践，但必须进行有效的javascript操作。

meaning: n. 照片，画像；图画，图片；影片；情景vt. 构想，想象；描绘，画；描述
zh_source: picture 照片，图片，电影来自拉丁语pictus,图画的，来自pingere,绘制，画图，来自PIE*peig,砍，切，词源同paint.

meaning: n. 宣言，布告，公告，声明；（纳税品在海关的）申报；[法]（原告的）申诉，（证人的）陈述，口供；[牌]摊牌，叫牌
variation: 复数： declarations

example_sentences.en: The declaration may yet be whittled away to nothing .
example_sentences.zh: 这项决议声明还不见得就完全是纸上谈兵。

example_sentences.en: Yet mr. broun 's declaration was met with applause .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，布朗先生的声明却受到掌声欢迎。

meaning: n. 天体物理学
zh_source: astrophysics 天体特理学词根astro, 星。physics, 物理，词源同be.

example_sentences.en: She is also the director of the yale center for astronomy and astrophysics .
example_sentences.zh: 她也是耶鲁天文和天体物理学中心主任。

example_sentences.en: So for decades , astronomers have used it as a " standard candle " in the field of high-energy astrophysics .
example_sentences.zh: 因此几十年来，天文学家一直将其视为高能天体物理领域的“标准烛光”使用。

meaning: n. 辞职；辞职书；顺从；听从
zh_source: resignation 辞职来自 resign,辞职。
variation: 复数： resignations

example_sentences.en: Olympus announced mr. kikukawa 's resignation two weeks ago .
example_sentences.zh: 奥林巴斯在两周前宣布了菊川刚辞职的消息。

example_sentences.en: It remained unclear whether the military would accept the resignation .
example_sentences.zh: 目前尚不清楚军方是否会接受内阁的辞呈。

meaning: vt. 驾驶；航行于；使通过vi. 驾驶；航行
zh_source: navigate 导航，航行来自拉丁语navis,船，来自PIE*snau,流动，游泳，词源同naval,nourish,-ig,驱动，词源同act,agent.引申词义导航，航行。
variation: 第三人称单数： navigates过去式： navigated过去分词： navigated现在分词： navigating

example_sentences.en: Some bats with poor eyesight depend on echolocation to navigate .
example_sentences.zh: 蝙蝠视力很差，它们通常用超声波定位来导航。

example_sentences.en: If you 're driving with friends , ask one of them to navigate .
example_sentences.zh: 如果你和朋友们一块开车，请其中的一位来导航。

meaning: n. 接近，邻近；接近度，距离；亲近
zh_source: proximity 最近，最接近来自proximate,最接近的，-ity,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: The new tablet computer also lacks a proximity sensor .
example_sentences.zh: 这种新款的平板电脑也没有接近传感器。

example_sentences.en: America 's power and europe 's proximity bestow particular responsibilities .
example_sentences.zh: 美国的实力和欧洲地理位置上的接近，赋予了它们特殊的责任。

meaning: v. 放弃
zh_source: abnegate 否认，放弃前缀ab-此处用于强调义。词根neg, 否认，见negate, 否认，词源同no.
variation: 第三人称单数： abnegates过去式： abnegated过去分词： abnegated现在分词： abnegating

example_sentences.en: We can 't abnegate the fact .
example_sentences.zh: 我们不能否认这个事实不适合。

example_sentences.en: What a real growth is need courage and faith to try new thing and abnegate old things .
example_sentences.zh: 真正的成长是要有勇气和信心去尝试新的事物，同时放弃旧有的事物。

meaning: adj. 永不知足的

example_sentences.en: No one loves him because of his insatiate desire for money .
example_sentences.zh: 大家都因为他对钱的贪得无餍而不喜欢他。

example_sentences.en: He is insatiate for wealth .
example_sentences.zh: 他对财富贪得无餍。

meaning: n. 压缩；紧压的感觉；束紧；压缩物
variation: 复数： constrictions易混淆的单词： Constriction

example_sentences.en: It causes hallucinations and blood vessel constriction , causing the necrosis .
example_sentences.zh: 这引起幻觉和血管收缩，引起坏死。

example_sentences.en: She feels a constriction in the chest .
example_sentences.zh: 她胸部有压迫感。

meaning: adj. 智力的；有才智的；需用智力的；智力发达的n. 知识分子；脑力劳动者；有极高智力的人；凭理智（而非感情）办事的人
zh_source: intellectual 智力的，有才智的来自intellect,智力。
variation: 复数： intellectuals

example_sentences.en: What will happen to our intellectual property ?
example_sentences.zh: 我们的知识产权会发生什么？

example_sentences.en: I always wanted to read and do intellectual things .
example_sentences.zh: 我一直想去阅读或者做知识分子的事。

meaning: vt.& vi. 记得；牢记vt. 记着；纪念；回想起；送钱[礼物]给…
zh_source: remember 记忆，想起，纪念来自拉丁语 rememorori,记忆，想起，来自 re-,再，重新，memorari,记忆，词源同 memory. 拼写受 member 影响俗化。
variation: 第三人称单数： remembers过去式： remembered过去分词： remembered现在分词： remembering

example_sentences.en: Do you remember that day ?
example_sentences.zh: 你还记得那天吗？

example_sentences.en: Remember what that feels like ?
example_sentences.zh: 记得是什么感觉么？

meaning: n. 暴力，强暴，暴虐；猛烈，激烈；歪曲（事实），曲解（意义）；冒渎，不敬
zh_source: violence 暴力来自拉丁语vis,力量，能量，强健，来自PIE*weie,追寻，渴求，猎捕，词源同Venus,win, venison。后词义贬义化，用来指暴力。

example_sentences.en: We strongly oppose violence and war .
example_sentences.zh: 我们强烈反对暴力和战争。

example_sentences.en: The violence is underpinned by competition for natural resources .
example_sentences.zh: 对自然资源的争夺，使暴力行为愈演愈烈。

meaning: adj. 美丽的；别致的；生动的；奇特的，独创的
zh_source: picturesque 风景如画的来自picture,图片，照片，-esque,形容词后缀。比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: The natural beauty and the tidy , picturesque villages , weekly markets , and range of activities - from horseback riding to skiing - make it a sought-after region for holiday-makers and second-home buyers alike .
example_sentences.zh: 这里美丽整洁的自然风光，独特的乡村，周末市场，还有各种各样的活动---从骑马到滑雪---使它成为度假者和买家共同喜爱的一个炙手可热地方。

example_sentences.en: Mr. roger button , the president of roger button & co. , wholesale hardware , began to run toward doctor keene with much less dignity than was expected from a southern gentleman of that picturesque period .
example_sentences.zh: 罗杰巴顿先生，罗杰巴顿五金批发公司董事长，略带着那个美丽年代的南方绅士的尊贵跑向基恩医生。“基恩大夫！”

meaning: adj. 错误的；不正确的；不能接受的；（说话或举止）不合规矩的
zh_source: incorrect 不正确的in-,不，非，correct,正确的。

example_sentences.en: Thanks to them , incorrect information generally disappears quite quickly .
example_sentences.zh: 由于这些政策，不正确的信息很快就消失。

example_sentences.en: Some had incorrect grammar or needed updating .
example_sentences.zh: 有些有错误的语法或者需要更新信息。

meaning: adj. 轻率作出的；不动脑筋的；轻易可得的
zh_source: facile 简单的，轻率的来自PIE*dhe, 做，放置，语源同do, fact. 即好做的，简单的。后词义贬义化，用来指轻率的，肤浅的。

example_sentences.en: The explanation is too facile for such a complex phenomenon .
example_sentences.zh: 这种解释对于这样复杂的情况来说过于肤浅了。

example_sentences.en: The nominal sums may be different , but the comparison is not facile .
example_sentences.zh: 名义金额也许不同，但两者的对比并非轻率。

meaning: adj. 易受影响的；易受感染的；善感的；可以接受或允许的
zh_source: susceptible 易受影响的，敏感的sus-,在下，向上，-cept,拿，抓住，词源同 accept,capture.引申诸相关比喻义。
variation: 比较级： more susceptible最高级： most susceptible

example_sentences.en: Food prices are particularly susceptible to increased japanese demand .
example_sentences.zh: 食品价格对日本需求增加尤其敏感。

example_sentences.en: These supplies will still be inadequate to cover a world population of 6.8 billion people in which virtually everyone is susceptible to infection by a new and readily contagious virus .
example_sentences.zh: 几乎每一个人对新的和容易传染的病毒都是易感者，这些储备尚不能充分覆盖世界68亿人。

meaning: adj. 有魅力的；引人注目的；迷人的；招人喜爱的
variation: 比较级： more attractive最高级： most attractive

example_sentences.en: The stockmarket is a comparatively attractive savings destination .
example_sentences.zh: 股市是一种相对有吸引力的储蓄目的地。

example_sentences.en: Share prices of cement manufacturers are also looking attractive .
example_sentences.zh: 水泥生产商的股价看起来也很诱人。

meaning: n. 信号，暗号；预兆，征象；动机；导火线vt. 向…发信号；用动作（手势）示意；以信号告知vi. 发信号adj. 显著的，优越的；暗号的，作信号用的
zh_source: signal 信号，暗号，标记，表明sign,标记，记号，-al,名词后缀。引申词义信号，暗号等。
variation: 复数： signals第三人称单数： signals过去式： signalled过去分词： signalled现在分词： signalling易混淆的单词： Signal

example_sentences.en: That signal may prompt greater wariness from neighbors .
example_sentences.zh: 这个信号可能会让邻国更加戒备。

example_sentences.en: Red appears to signal rank in virtually all cultures .
example_sentences.zh: 红色在几乎所有的文化中都有着等级的标志。

meaning: vt. <正>使充分满足于（尤指坏事），使餍足，使厌腻
zh_source: sate 满足来自古英语 sadian,使满足，来自 Proto-Germanic*sadona,使满足，来自 PIE*sa,使满足，词源 同 sad,satisfy.
variation: 易混淆的单词： SATE

example_sentences.en: Only her blood will sate the kraken .
example_sentences.zh: 只有她的血能满足海妖。

example_sentences.en: Blimps , mr watts reckons , will help them sate that appetite .
example_sentences.zh: 他认为气球飞艇将使空军能充分满足陆军的胃口。

meaning: n. <正>自我克制；放弃；抛弃；（对子女等的）拒绝承认

example_sentences.en: Her abnegation and constancy were rewarded at the miss universe .
example_sentences.zh: 她的克制和稳定性得到了回报的环球小姐。

example_sentences.en: The adolescent man adapted her acknowledgment as a abnegation .
example_sentences.zh: 这个年青人把她的答复解释为谢绝。

meaning: vt. 使著名；使显著；使显眼；向…发信号
variation: 第三人称单数： signalizes过去式： signalized过去分词： signalized现在分词： signalizing

example_sentences.en: Many great inventions signalize the last 150 years .
example_sentences.zh: 许多伟大的发明使过去的一百五十年放出异彩。

meaning: vt. 促进，助长；使容易；帮助
zh_source: facilitate 促进来自facile, 简单的。即使简单，简化，促进。
variation: 第三人称单数： facilitates过去式： facilitated过去分词： facilitated现在分词： facilitating

example_sentences.en: It will facilitate the culture and commitment that the firm hopes to build .
example_sentences.zh: 这将有利于促进公司所希望的文化和承诺的建立。

example_sentences.en: Having liberalised its economy , britain can facilitate economic reforms on the continent .
example_sentences.zh: 英国已施行了经济自由化改革，因此可以促进欧洲大陆的经济改革。

meaning: adj. 可满足的
zh_source: satiable 满足的来自拉丁语 satis,足够的，满足的，词源同 sate,使满足。-able,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: A satiable thirst ; a satiable appetite .
example_sentences.zh: 可满足的欲望；可满足的欲望。

example_sentences.en: She is a satiable woman .
example_sentences.zh: 她是个容易满足的女人。

meaning: vt. 责备，责骂；使丢脸；申斥；损伤…的体面n. 责备，责骂；耻辱，污辱；谴责；[宗]应答圣歌
zh_source: reproach 责备，指责re-,相反，-proach,接近，词源同 approach.比喻用法，比较 approachable,接近的，亲切的。
variation: 复数： reproaches第三人称单数： reproaches过去式： reproached过去分词： reproached现在分词： reproaching

example_sentences.en: If macmillan has escaped reproach , it is not because he succeeded , but because the task was so hopeless .
example_sentences.zh: 如果麦克米伦逃脱了责备，倒不是因为他成功了，而是因为这项任务几乎没有希望完成。

example_sentences.en: The price of failure , the conservative prime minister said , would be that " our successors will reproach us as we reproach the victorians for complacency about slums and ugliness . "
example_sentences.zh: 这个保守党首相说，失败的代价就是“我们的继任者将责备我们，正如我们责备维多利亚时代对于贫民窟和丑陋的自满。”

meaning: vt. 取消，使无效；否定，否认；使作废vi. 否定，否认；无效n. 反面，对立面
zh_source: negate 否定，使无效来自拉丁语negare,否认，否定，说不，词源同no,deny.
variation: 第三人称单数： negates过去式： negated过去分词： negated现在分词： negating

example_sentences.en: You can also posit strength and joy , or you negate abuse and addiction .
example_sentences.zh: 你也可以喜欢力量和欢乐，或者你否定不良的习惯。

example_sentences.en: One weak link in the chain can negate many of the advantages that innovation offers .
example_sentences.zh: 一个薄弱的环节就有可能否定掉改革所能带来的大部分好处。

meaning: n. 斗篷； 披肩；海角； 岬
zh_source: cape 披肩，斗篷，海角。1.披肩，词源同cap, 帽子。 2.海角，来自词根cap, 头，见captain.
variation: 复数： capes易混淆的单词： CapeCAPE

example_sentences.en: The original mission-control centre was at the cape .
example_sentences.zh: 原来的任务控制中心是在卡纳维拉尔角。

example_sentences.en: Beach grass sprouts from sand dunes at cape hatteras in north carolina .
example_sentences.zh: 在北卡罗莱纳州的哈特拉斯角的海滩上，海滩草正从沙丘上发芽。

meaning: vt. 使收缩，使收敛，压缩
variation: 第三人称单数： constringes过去式： constringed过去分词： constringed现在分词： constringing

meaning: vt. 充分满足，使厌腻
zh_source: satiate 满足来自拉丁语 satis,足够的，满足的，词源同 sate,使满足。-ate,使。
variation: 第三人称单数： satiates过去式： satiated过去分词： satiated现在分词： satiating

example_sentences.en: We satiate ourselves with sun , fun , and good food .
example_sentences.zh: 我们满足于享受到的阳光，嬉笑和美食。

example_sentences.en: However , we are destined not to satiate and alive .
example_sentences.zh: 然而，我们注定不是为了吃饱喝足而在世。

meaning: vt. 违反；妨碍；侵犯；亵渎，强奸
zh_source: violate 违反词源同violence,暴力，引申词义违背，违反。
variation: 第三人称单数： violates过去式： violated过去分词： violated现在分词： violating

example_sentences.en: Such naked protectionism may violate international trade rules .
example_sentences.zh: 如此赤裸裸的保护主义难免违反国际贸易规则。

example_sentences.en: It is also walking a legal tightrope because many clips violate copyright .
example_sentences.zh: 它同样在走法律的钢丝，因为很多视频文件都侵犯了版权。

meaning: n. 智力；聪颖；情报；情报机构
zh_source: intelligence 智力，才智来自intelligent,聪明的，有才智的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Intelligence

example_sentences.en: I believe in the inherent intelligence of human beings .
example_sentences.zh: 我对人类天生的智能坚信不移。

example_sentences.en: Rose is a woman who possesses a rare intelligence .
example_sentences.zh: 罗丝是一个拥有非凡智慧的女人。

meaning: n. 首都；资本；资源；大写字母adj. 极好的；最重要的；资本的；首都的
zh_source: capital 首都，资本来自词根cap, 头，词义外延不断扩大。
variation: 复数： capitals易混淆的单词： Capital

example_sentences.en: I have two coupons for the capital cinema .
example_sentences.zh: 我有两张首都电影院的赠券。

example_sentences.en: Capital and trade flows collapsed .
example_sentences.zh: 资本和贸易流通崩溃。

meaning: adj. 消极的，否认的；[数]负的；[心]反抗性的；无预期结果的n. 否定词语；否定的观点；消极性；[摄]底片vt. 否定；拒绝
zh_source: negative 负的，负极的，消极的来自negate,否定。引申义负的，负极，消极的等。
variation: 复数： negatives第三人称单数： negatives过去式： negatived过去分词： negatived现在分词： negativing

example_sentences.en: Contagion thinking isn 't always negative .
example_sentences.zh: 感染思维并不总是负面的。

example_sentences.en: They 're also negative to themselves .
example_sentences.zh: 他们对自己也是消极对待。

meaning: adj. 压缩的，收敛性的

example_sentences.en: Unified justice holds that justice should be pursued under the restriction of institutions , aiming at process justice , regulating consequential unbalance and lessening initial discrepancy ; as a result , social distribution will be constringent to consequential justice .
example_sentences.zh: 统合公平观认为，公平应在基于非歧视的规则约束下，来保障过程公平，并在可行的范围内去调整结果失衡和缩小起点差异，从而使社会分配收敛于结果公平。

meaning: vt. 疏忽；忽略；遗漏；疏于照顾n. 玩忽；被忽略的状态；怠慢
zh_source: neglect 忽视neg-,否定，没有，-lect,选择，词源同collect,elect.即没有选出来，忽视。
variation: 第三人称单数： neglects过去式： neglected过去分词： neglected现在分词： neglecting

example_sentences.en: But we shouldn 't neglect the biggest anomaly .
example_sentences.zh: 但我们不应忽视最大的反常。

example_sentences.en: One physiological need that we often neglect is sleep .
example_sentences.zh: 睡眠是经常被我们忽略的一项生理需求。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使满意，满足vt. 使确信；符合，达到（要求、规定、标准等）；消除；履行vi. 使满足或足够；使满意
zh_source: satisfy 使满足，使满意来自拉丁语 satisfacere,使满意，使足够，来自 satis,足够的，词源同 satiate,facere,做，制造， 词源同 fact,factory.
variation: 第三人称单数： satisfies过去式： satisfied过去分词： satisfied现在分词： satisfying

example_sentences.en: Professionals identify and satisfy their customer 's needs .
example_sentences.zh: 专业人士发现并满足顾客的需求。

example_sentences.en: While this is an attractive image it somehow doesn 't satisfy .
example_sentences.zh: 虽然这是一个有吸引力的形象，但不知为什么，它并不令人满意。

meaning: vt. 疏忽；忽略；遗漏；疏于照顾n. 玩忽；被忽略的状态；怠慢
zh_source: neglect 忽视neg-,否定，没有，-lect,选择，词源同collect,elect.即没有选出来，忽视。
variation: 第三人称单数： neglects过去式： neglected过去分词： neglected现在分词： neglecting

example_sentences.en: But we shouldn 't neglect the biggest anomaly .
example_sentences.zh: 但我们不应忽视最大的反常。

example_sentences.en: One physiological need that we often neglect is sleep .
example_sentences.zh: 睡眠是经常被我们忽略的一项生理需求。

meaning: n. 均摊，人头税，按人头计算
zh_source: capitation 人头税来自词根cap, 头，词源同captain. 即按人头收的税。

example_sentences.en: Ethical guidelines for physician payment based on capitation .
example_sentences.zh: 医生道德准则为基础的。

example_sentences.en: The irish education department said that schools were getting more funding for basic operating costs following an increase in the capitation grant last year to 200 for each student .
example_sentences.zh: 爱尔兰教育部门说，去年政府为学生按人头提供的补助费已增加到每位200镑，各所学校基本运转资金也随之增加了。

meaning: n. 设备；容易；能力；灵巧
zh_source: facility 设施来自facile, 简单的。即促进事物简化的设施或工具，后词义通用化。
variation: 复数： facilities

example_sentences.en: North korea has stated it would rebuild the facility .
example_sentences.zh: 朝鲜方面表示，将重建这一设施。

example_sentences.en: Specialists will guide you through the facility .
example_sentences.zh: 专家们将引导我们穿过这些设备。

meaning: vi. 扣押（人、财物等）

example_sentences.en: If he does not pay will the court distrain upon his house ?
example_sentences.zh: 如果他不付款,法院会扣押他的房子吗?

example_sentences.en: Article 55 the company registration authority may temporarily distrain the business license which needs confirmation , and the time limit of distrainment shall not exceed 10 days .
example_sentences.zh: 第五十五条公司登记机关对需要认定的营业执照，可以临时扣留，扣留期限不得超过10天。

meaning: n. 满足，满意，舒服；妥善处理；（债务的）清偿；（伤害的）赔偿
variation: 复数： satisfactions易混淆的单词： Satisfaction

example_sentences.en: Set yourself tasks from which you 'll gain satisfaction .
example_sentences.zh: 给自己制定可以实现自我满足的任务。

example_sentences.en: There is satisfaction for both parties in either outcome .
example_sentences.zh: 不管结果如何，双方都是满意的。

meaning: n. 疏忽；[法]过失；粗心大意
zh_source: negligence 疏忽，失职来自negligent,疏忽的，失职的。

example_sentences.en: Many are caused by negligence and lax safety procedures .
example_sentences.zh: 原因常常是疏忽大意和松懈的安全措施。

example_sentences.en: Goldman essentially admitted to negligence , not to fraud .
example_sentences.zh: 高盛实质上承认了它具有过失，而非欺诈。

meaning: n. 海军；船队
zh_source: navy 海军来自拉丁语navis,船，词源同navigate,nautical.引申词义海军。
variation: 复数： navies

example_sentences.en: The u.s. navy has sent a guided missile destroyer .
example_sentences.zh: 美国海军出动了一艘制导导弹驱逐舰。

example_sentences.en: When I played cassio in othello I imagined what it would be like to be a lieutenant in the venetian navy in 1604 .
example_sentences.zh: 当我在《奥瑟罗》中扮演卡西奥时，我想象作为一名1604年的威尼斯水军的副官是怎样的。

meaning: vi. 认输，屈服；屈从，停止反抗；有条件投降；让步
zh_source: capitulate 屈服来自capitulation的回构词，原指协议，条款，来自词根cap, 头。-ul, 小词后缀。指小头，一条一条的条款，后指有条件投降，比较chapter。
variation: 第三人称单数： capitulates过去式： capitulated过去分词： capitulated现在分词： capitulating

example_sentences.en: The government was wise to capitulate .
example_sentences.zh: 政府的让步是明智的。

example_sentences.en: The rally is forcing some contrarian investors , who bet on a price fall due to large inventories , to capitulate , traders said .
example_sentences.zh: 交易员表示，本轮反弹正迫使一些曾押注金属价格会因库存量大而下跌的逆市投资者投降。

meaning: n. 疏忽；[法]过失；粗心大意
zh_source: negligence 疏忽，失职来自negligent,疏忽的，失职的。

example_sentences.en: Many are caused by negligence and lax safety procedures .
example_sentences.zh: 原因常常是疏忽大意和松懈的安全措施。

example_sentences.en: Goldman essentially admitted to negligence , not to fraud .
example_sentences.zh: 高盛实质上承认了它具有过失，而非欺诈。

meaning: vt. 宣布；声明，声称；申报；[法]供述vi. 声明，发表宣言；宣称
zh_source: declare 公告de-, 向下，强调。-clar, 清晰，明确，词源同clear, clarify.引申义公告。
variation: 第三人称单数： declares过去式： declared过去分词： declared现在分词： declaring

example_sentences.en: So should we declare mr eckert guilty as charged ?
example_sentences.zh: 我们是否应该宣布埃克尔特有罪吗？

example_sentences.en: I declare peace and harmony within me and around me .
example_sentences.zh: 我宣称和平，和谐在我的内心和周围。

meaning: n. 小集团，宗派；派系间斗争，内讧
zh_source: faction 派系，派别，内讧来自词根fact, 做，词源同fact,face. 即做事情的不同人或派别，词义贬义化，指派系等。
variation: 复数： factions

example_sentences.en: The enlightened have been known for being a powerful support faction .
example_sentences.zh: 圣贤已经成为了一个众所周知的强有力的支撑派系。

example_sentences.en: For 28 years mr flores led the shining path 's faction in the huallaga valley .
example_sentences.zh: 弗洛莱斯在瓦亚加山谷中领导着“光明之路”的小派系长达28年。

meaning: adj. 令人满意的；符合要求的；[神]赎罪的
variation: 比较级： more satisfactory最高级： most satisfactory

example_sentences.en: Is there a satisfactory way out of the dilemma ?
example_sentences.zh: 有令人满意的走出这种两难困境的方法吗？

example_sentences.en: But there may be no satisfactory future until we create one .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，如果我们不去创造，就不会出现令人满意的未来。

meaning: vt. 记起，想起v. 想起；回想，追忆，回忆，记忆；使（自己）想起一时忘掉的事；想到
zh_source: recollect 回想，想起re-,向后，往回，collect,收集，想起。
variation: 第三人称单数： recollects过去式： recollected过去分词： recollected现在分词： recollecting

example_sentences.en: As far as I recollect , there were few people in the village then .
example_sentences.zh: 据我回忆，那时候村子里没几个人。

example_sentences.en: Little sister had a name , but no one seemed to recollect it .
example_sentences.zh: 妹妹是有名字的，但似乎没人能回想起来。

meaning: n. [数]长方形，矩形
zh_source: rectangle 直角rect-,直的，正确的，angle,角。
variation: 复数： rectangles

example_sentences.en: Never limit your imagination to a plain rectangle !
example_sentences.zh: 千万别把想象力局限在一个矩形内！

example_sentences.en: How was the unusual red rectangle nebula created ?
example_sentences.zh: 这个不寻常的红色矩形星云是怎么形成的？

meaning: vt. 杀头n. 斩首，杀头；刽子手
zh_source: decapitate 斩首de-, 向下，砍下。-cap, 头，词源同chief, captain. 即砍头，斩首。
variation: 第三人称单数： decapitates过去式： decapitated过去分词： decapitated现在分词： decapitating

example_sentences.en: Decapitate me after my harakiri .
example_sentences.zh: 等我切腹之后再斩首。

example_sentences.en: It would in effect " decapitate " the free syrian army , the official boasted .
example_sentences.zh: 这位官员吹嘘道，这将完成对自由叙利亚军的“斩首”。

meaning: adj. 可以忽略的；微不足道的；无足轻重的；不足轻重
zh_source: negligible 可忽略的，微不足道的来自neglect,忽视。引申词义可忽略的，微不足道的。

example_sentences.en: His support among self-described moderate republican voters in iowa is negligible .
example_sentences.zh: 他在自我描述为温和的共和党投票人中的支持微不足道。

example_sentences.en: Despite the massive rise in numbers china 's per capita consumption is still negligible .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管葡萄酒总量大幅增长，中国的人均葡萄酒消费量依然微不足道。

meaning: vt. 抑制，压抑；限定，限制；制止；监禁
zh_source: restrain 限制，约束re-,向后，往回，-strain,拉，词源同 constrain,constrict.即拉回，引申词义限制，约束。
variation: 第三人称单数： restrains过去式： restrained过去分词： restrained现在分词： restraining

example_sentences.en: Inflation is stable because there is less idle capacity to restrain prices .
example_sentences.zh: 而通胀的稳定是因为没有闲置的产能来抑制价格。

example_sentences.en: The work suggests that the hormone may restrain aggression in stressful situations .
example_sentences.zh: 这项研究表明这种荷尔蒙可能可以抑制人在压力环境中的攻击倾向。

meaning: adj. 不自然的；虚假的；人为的；人造的
zh_source: factitious 人为的，虚假的来自词根fact, 做，词源同fact,face.词义贬义化，即人为的，虚假的。

example_sentences.en: Brokers created a factitious demand for stocks .
example_sentences.zh: 经纪人造成了一场人为的股票需求。

example_sentences.en: The monopoly of china telecommunication is factitious monopoly caused by system bulwark .
example_sentences.zh: 我国电信行业的垄断是由于存在制度性进入壁垒而形成的人为垄断。

meaning: vt. 浸湿，浸透；使充满；[化]使饱和；使渗进，使湿透adj. 浸透的，渗透的；饱和的；颜色浓[深]的
zh_source: saturate 浸透，使饱和来自拉丁语 saturare,装满，浸透，来自 satur,满的，来自 PIE*sa,使充满，词源同 satiate,satisfy. 引申词义使饱和。
variation: 第三人称单数： saturates过去式： saturated过去分词： saturated现在分词： saturating

example_sentences.en: To use , shake the bottle and saturate a cotton pad with the lotion .
example_sentences.zh: 使用时，摇动瓶子，让乳液浸透化妆棉。

example_sentences.en: Heavy rains can saturate hillsides , leading to devastating mudslides .
example_sentences.zh: 大雨会浸透山坡，会导致毁灭性的泥石流。

meaning: vt. 改正，校正；[化]精馏；[电]整流
zh_source: rectify 纠正，矫正rect-,直的，正确的，-fy,使。
variation: 第三人称单数： rectifies过去式： rectified过去分词： rectified现在分词： rectifying

example_sentences.en: Value-recoverystrategies are designed to rectify a lapse in service delivery .
example_sentences.zh: 价值恢复策略是为了纠正提供服务过程中的过失而设计的。

example_sentences.en: I wanted to do what I could to rectify the inequity .
example_sentences.zh: 我想尽我所能矫正这种不公正。

meaning: n. 自我主义，利己主义，自私自利
zh_source: egoism 自我主义ego, 自我。-ism, 主义。

example_sentences.en: It was not egoism or narcissism , he insisted .
example_sentences.zh: 他说，这不是自我中心，更不是自恋。

example_sentences.en: In this sense ethical egoism is a moral guide only in a purely technical philosophical sense .
example_sentences.zh: 在这种意义上，伦理利己主义是一个仅仅具有技术意义（在哲学里）的道德准则。

meaning: vt. 选择；挑选；选拔adj. 精选的；挑选出来的；苛择的；〈口〉爱挑三拣四的，挑剔的
zh_source: select 选择se-,分开，-lect,拿，收集，词源同 collect,elect.即拿出来，分开，引申词义选择。
variation: 第三人称单数： selects过去式： selected过去分词： selected现在分词： selecting

example_sentences.en: Select and install idea management software for your intranet .
example_sentences.zh: 为内部局域网选择和安装理想的管理软件。

example_sentences.en: Ought employers to use genetic testing to select their workers ?
example_sentences.zh: 雇主应该利用基因检测区挑选他们的员工吗？

meaning: n. 因素；<数>因子；代理人vt. 把…因素包括进去；[数学]分解…的因子，将…分解成因子；以代理商（或管家等）的身份行事，做代理商（或管家）vi. 做代理商（或管家）
zh_source: factor 因素，要素来自词根fact, 做，词源同fact,effect. 即做事情的必要条件，因素，要素等。
variation: 复数： factors第三人称单数： factors过去式： factored过去分词： factored现在分词： factoring易混淆的单词： Factor

example_sentences.en: Inflation is also a factor .
example_sentences.zh: 通胀也是一个因素。

example_sentences.en: Speed is also a factor .
example_sentences.zh: 速度也是一个因素。

meaning: vt.& vi. 染上（恶习，疾病等）；缩小，紧缩vi. 订契约，承包
zh_source: contract 合同，收缩con-, 强调。-tract, 拉，拉紧，词源同attract, retreat. 引申义确立条款，签订合同。
variation: 复数： contracts第三人称单数： contracts过去式： contracted过去分词： contracted现在分词： contracting

example_sentences.en: I nailed downa contract to sell a thousand cars .
example_sentences.zh: 我敲定了一个出售一千辆汽车的合约。

example_sentences.en: In contrast , the uk economy continued to contract .
example_sentences.zh: 而与之相反的是，英国经济仍在继续收缩。

meaning: vt. 断言，宣称，辩解；提出…作为理由
zh_source: allege 声称前缀al-同ad-，在字母l开头的词根前同化为l. 词根leg, 送，派，见legate, 教宗使节。提交证据，指控。
variation: 第三人称单数： alleges过去式： alleged过去分词： alleged现在分词： alleging

example_sentences.en: Some media reports allege ill-treatment of farm workers .
example_sentences.zh: 一些媒体报道更是宣称了农民工的不良待遇。

example_sentences.en: Moreover , western politics is less broken than many allege .
example_sentences.zh: 此外，西方政治并没有像许多人宣称的那样支离破碎。

meaning: adj. 可行的；可用的；可实行的；可能的
zh_source: feasible 可行的来自法语。来自词根fac, 做，词源同do, fact.即可做，可实行的。

example_sentences.en: A proper restructuring is legally feasible and economically necessary .
example_sentences.zh: 适当的重组在法律上可行，在经济上亦属必需。

example_sentences.en: Then we have to consider practicalities and what is politically feasible , and to prioritize .
example_sentences.zh: 然后，我们要考虑实际问题，以及哪些在政策上是可行的，从而确定优先顺序。

meaning: n. 悬崖，峭壁
zh_source: precipice 悬崖pre-,在前，-cip,头，词源同cap,captain.即头在前，一头栽下，引申词义陡坡，陡崖，悬崖等。

example_sentences.en: But we are standing on the edge of a precipice .
example_sentences.zh: 但我们正站在悬崖的边缘。

example_sentences.en: Above them a great fortress extends the precipice way beyond its natural height .
example_sentences.zh: 在它们上面一个大堡垒超出悬崖的天然高度沿着峭壁的方向延伸出去。

meaning: n. 签名；署名；识别标志，鲜明特征；[医]药的用法说明
zh_source: signature 签名，署名来自 sign,签字，签署，签约，-ate,使，-ure,名词后缀。引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： signatures

example_sentences.en: Every musician has a specific signature or a logo .
example_sentences.zh: 每个音乐家都有一个独特的签名或标识。

example_sentences.en: America argues that even signature strikes are precisely targeted and that civilian casualties are minimal .
example_sentences.zh: 美国辩称，即使是特征打击也有精确的定位，造成平民伤亡的情况微乎其微。

meaning: n. 操行端正；笔直
zh_source: rectitude 正直rect-,直的，正确的，-itude,名词后缀。引申词义正直。

example_sentences.en: The irish-born actor george brent played donovan as a man of superhuman rectitude .
example_sentences.zh: 爱尔兰出生的男演员乔治布伦特把多诺万演成一个正直且有超凡能力的人。

example_sentences.en: Obsessive dramatic and emotional he has an unwavering belief in his own rectitude .
example_sentences.zh: 他性格偏执、引人注目而又情感丰富，对于自己的正直，他深信不疑。

meaning: vi. 食言；违例出牌vt. 否认；食言，违约；放弃；拒绝n. 出牌违例；[牌]有某种花色的牌可跟而违反规则不跟
zh_source: renege 背叛，食言，违约re-,表强调，-neg,否认，词源同 no,negate.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： reneges过去式： reneged过去分词： reneged现在分词： reneging

example_sentences.en: There is no sign a big western government is about to renege on any deals .
example_sentences.zh: 目前没有迹象表明，哪个西方大国政府会在任何一宗交易上违约。

example_sentences.en: The showdown between republicans and president barack obama over the debt ceiling in august could have forced the federal government to renege immediately on its bills .
example_sentences.zh: 共和党人和总统巴拉克奥巴马（barackobama）在8月份就债务上限的最后摊牌原本可以迫使联邦政府立即在其短期票据上违约。

meaning: vi. 贬低；减损vt. 转移（注意等）
zh_source: detract 贬低de-, 向下。-tract,拉，词源同attract, contract. 即向下拉，贬低。
variation: 第三人称单数： detracts过去式： detracted过去分词： detracted现在分词： detracting

example_sentences.en: The implausibility of that claim should not detract from the potential impact of the plan .
example_sentences.zh: 这个看似不太真实的声明无法降低这个计划的潜在影响。

example_sentences.en: In addition to wasted space , clutter can distract those who enter your work area and detract from the efficiency of the business at hand .
example_sentences.zh: 那些杂乱的东西除了浪费空间外，还能是进入你办公室的人分心从而降低你手头生意的效率。

meaning: n. 方言，土语；语调；[语]语支；专业用语
zh_source: dialect 方言dia-, 穿过，相互。-lect, 说，词源同lecture, legible. 即人与人之的对话交流，后用来指区域性的语言，即方言。
variation: 复数： dialects

example_sentences.en: The tuscany dialect became what we now know as italian .
example_sentences.zh: 托斯卡纳方言后来就发展成为如今我们所知的意大利语。

example_sentences.en: School would be over soon . He no longer complained about berry or his classmates , whose dialect he could barely understand .
example_sentences.zh: 这学期很快就要结束了，他不再抱怨学校和那些口音完全没法懂的同学。

zh_source: infect 传染，影响in-,进入，使，-fect,做，产生，词源同affect,effect.引申词义做进去的，传染，感染，影响。

example_sentences.en: The new virus could infect all of these types of cells .
example_sentences.zh: 这种新冠状病毒，可以感染所有这些类型的细胞。

example_sentences.en: Not every flu virus can infect every animal .
example_sentences.zh: 并非所有的流感病毒都能传染所有的动物。

meaning: n. 灾难；彻底的失败；不幸；祸患
zh_source: disaster 灾难dis-, 不，非，使相反。-aster, 星星，星辰，词源同star, asterisk.即星位不正，在古代占星术中预示着灾难降临。
variation: 复数： disasters易混淆的单词： Disaster

example_sentences.en: Investors believed disaster had been averted .
example_sentences.zh: 投资者认为已经躲过了灾难。

example_sentences.en: So far rust has not caused a disaster .
example_sentences.zh: 到目前为止，锈病并没有造成灾害。

meaning: vt. 限制，限定；约束，束缚
zh_source: restrict 限制，限定，妨碍来自 restrain,限制，约束，-ct,过去分词格，此处形容词作名词。
variation: 第三人称单数： restricts过去式： restricted过去分词： restricted现在分词： restricting

example_sentences.en: It has laws that restrict deforestation in the rest .
example_sentences.zh: 剩下的森林也有严格的法律限制砍伐。

example_sentences.en: New european legislation to limit nitrogen emissions will further restrict their operation .
example_sentences.zh: 限制了氮排放的新欧盟法会进一步约束煤炭工厂的运营。

meaning: n. 图章，印vt. 盖章于
variation: 复数： signets

example_sentences.en: It 's a signet ring of a jewish official from the time of the bible .
example_sentences.zh: 它是圣经时代一名犹太官员的图章戒指。

example_sentences.en: His signet ring bore the emblem of a dagger .
example_sentences.zh: 他的图案戒指上刻着匕首的标志。

meaning: vt. 下掷，由高处抛下；使提前或突然发生；[气象] 使凝结而下降；[化]使沉淀vi. [气象]凝结；[化]沉淀；倒落，一头栽下adj. 仓促行进的，匆促的；轻率的，冲动行事的水蒸气，降水；突然发生的n. [化]沉淀物；结果，产物
zh_source: precipitate 一头栽下，沉淀，凝结，降水，降雪precipitate 鲁莽的，仓促的pre-,在前，-cip,头，词源同cap,captain,-ate,使。即使头在前，一头栽下，后用于气象术语，降水，降雪，引申物理术语沉淀，沉积，积灰，如Electrostatic Precipitator,电除尘器。pre-,在前，-cip,头，词源同cap,captain,-ate,形容词后缀。即使头在前的，一头栽下的，引申 词义鲁莽的，仓促的。

example_sentences.en: That is due to the use of leverage : price declines precipitate the forced liquidation of leveraged positions .
example_sentences.zh: 那是因为使用杠杆的缘故：价格下滑促使杠杆化的仓位被迫平仓。

example_sentences.en: The solution is then treated to precipitate uranium oxide .
example_sentences.zh: 得出的溶液会用来沉淀出铀氧化物。

meaning: adj. 难辨认的，字迹模糊的；潦草
zh_source: illegible 不能辨认的il-,不，非，legible,可读的，可辨的。

example_sentences.en: This note from grandpa is almost illegible .
example_sentences.zh: 爷爷留的这张便条几乎难以辨认。

example_sentences.en: I cannot read this note , it 's illegible .
example_sentences.zh: 这张字条字迹潦草，我看不懂。

meaning: n. 叛徒；变节者；改变信仰者adj. 背叛的；变节的vi. 背叛
variation: 复数： renegades易混淆的单词： Renegade

example_sentences.en: They presumably fear jeopardising the stability of their renegade ally .
example_sentences.zh: 他们可能害怕此举会破坏这个变节盟国的安定。

example_sentences.en: They disrupted the transfer of arms to the biggest renegade , george athor .
example_sentences.zh: 他们阻断了向最大的变节者乔治阿瑟（georgeathor）的武装提供武器的通道。

meaning: vt. 使分心；使混乱
zh_source: distract 分心dis-, 分开，散开。-tract, 拉，伸，词源同attract ,contract. 引申词义分心，精神混乱。
variation: 第三人称单数： distracts过去式： distracted过去分词： distracted现在分词： distracting

example_sentences.en: It 's easier to distract yourself when running outside .
example_sentences.zh: 当然室外跑的时候更容易让自己分散注意力。

example_sentences.en: Bubbles tend to distract attention from such long-term trends .
example_sentences.zh: 泡沫往往会转移人们对这些长期趋势的关注。

meaning: adj. 传染的；有传染性的；易传染的；有感染力的

example_sentences.en: Dr. peter hotez is an infectious disease expert .
example_sentences.zh: 彼得霍特兹博士是一名传染病专家。

example_sentences.en: These countries also have among the highest burdens of infectious diseases .
example_sentences.zh: 这些国家的传染性疾病的几率也都很高。

meaning: n. 意义；意思；重要性
zh_source: significance 重要性来自 significant,重要的，-ance,名词后缀。引申词义重要性。
variation: 复数： significances

example_sentences.en: But the reform is nonetheless of symbolic significance .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，改革仍然是具有象征意义。

example_sentences.en: Chinese realities change the meaning and significance of confucianism .
example_sentences.zh: 儒家思想对改变中国现实的意义和重要性。

meaning: n. 骨炎

example_sentences.en: Osteitis caused by bacille calmette-guerin vaccination : an emergent problem in chile ?
example_sentences.zh: 卡介苗性骨炎：是智利的一个紧迫问题吗？

example_sentences.en: Clinical observation of one-thumb massage and ointment in treating 30 cases of osteitis condensans ilii .
example_sentences.zh: 一指禅手法配合膏摩治疗髂骨致密性骨炎30例临床观察。

meaning: n. 限制，限定；拘束，束缚；管制
variation: 复数： restrictions

example_sentences.en: Enticing research also comes from studies of caloric restriction .
example_sentences.zh: 诱人的研究也来自热量限制的研究。

example_sentences.en: Secret ballot enables the voters to express their free will on the candidates without any restriction .
example_sentences.zh: 秘密投票使得全民可以不受任何约束，自由表达自己的选举意志。

meaning: adj. 有害的，有毒的
n. （达到）饱和状态；饱和度；浸透，浸润；饱和剂
zh_source: saturation 饱和，饱和点saturate,使饱和，-ion,名词后缀。
variation: 复数： saturations

example_sentences.en: It 's more that we 've reached saturation point .
example_sentences.zh: 看起来更像是我们已经达到了饱和点。

example_sentences.en: The saturation and lightness of light also affect our perceptions .
example_sentences.zh: 饱和度和亮度也影响到我们的感觉。

meaning: n. 自我主义者
variation: 复数： egoists

example_sentences.en: That is the perfect egoist .
example_sentences.zh: 这是一个彻头彻尾的利己主义者。

example_sentences.en: I just wish you wouldn 't act like such an egoist all the time .
example_sentences.zh: 我只希望你不要总是表现得像个自我主义者。

meaning: adj. 险峻的；多悬崖的；急躁的；鲁莽的
zh_source: precipitous 陡峭的，仓促的，贸然的来自precipitate,一头栽下，-ous,形容词后缀。引申词义陡峭的，仓促的，贸然的。

example_sentences.en: Es cubells is a small village nestled among the orange , lemon and olive groves on precipitous terraces .
example_sentences.zh: 鄂古北尔村庄藏在陡峭梯田的橙子林、柠檬林和橄榄树林之间。

example_sentences.en: Freshwater fish populations are in precipitous decline .
example_sentences.zh: 淡水鱼数量急剧下滑。

meaning: vt.& vi. 拉紧，拉伤；用力拉n. 血统，家族；性格，脾气；语气；一段音乐vt. 拉紧，拽紧或扯紧；尽量使力；扭伤；歪曲vi. 不懈；受到强大的压力；拉紧，紧绷
zh_source: strain 拉紧，拽紧，使力，扭伤，过滤，压力，拉力，张力strain 动植物的品种，品系，病菌的类型来自古法语 estreindre,绑紧，拽紧，来自拉丁语 stringere,绑紧，拉紧，压紧，来自 PIE*strenk, 紧的，窄的，词源同 strict,stress,stringent.拼写比较 rain 来自古英语 regnian.引申词义扭伤， 过滤，及相关词义压力，拉力，张力等。来自中古英语 streon,种族， 品系， 血统， 来自古英语 streon,收获， 财富， 繁殖， 来自 Proto-Germanic*streuna,堆积，收获，来自 PIE*stere,展开，伸展，词源同 strew,stratum,structure. 后用于指动植物的品种，品系，以及病菌的类型，种类等。
variation: 复数： strains第三人称单数： strains过去式： strained过去分词： strained现在分词： straining易混淆的单词： StrainSTRAIN

example_sentences.en: Even in asia , capital markets are under strain .
example_sentences.zh: 即使在亚洲，资本市场也备受压力。

example_sentences.en: The nasty strain had five mutations in two genes .
example_sentences.zh: 这一危险的菌株的两个基因里有五种变异体。

meaning: adj. 重要的；有意义的；有重大意义的；值得注意的n. 有意义的事物；象征，标志
zh_source: significant 重要的，有意义的sign,标记，记号，-fic,做，使，词源同 fact,efficient.引申比喻词义重要的，有意义的等。

example_sentences.en: True , there are still significant benefits to eu membership .
example_sentences.zh: 确实，欧盟成员资格仍有显著的利益。

example_sentences.en: But now significant policy risks are resurfacing .
example_sentences.zh: 如今重大的政策风险再次显现。

meaning: adj. 有害的，有毒的
zh_source: noxious 有毒的来自拉丁语noxius,有毒的，伤害的，来自PIE*nek,死亡，致死，词源同innocent,necro-.

example_sentences.en: And it promises to cut down on its noxious pollution .
example_sentences.zh: 而且承诺减少它的有害污染。

example_sentences.en: But chemistry goes far beyond noxious fumes .
example_sentences.zh: 但化学的范畴远远超出有毒气体。

meaning: n. 不正当，不法行为，渎职

example_sentences.en: Trade officials on both continents are fond of scathing op-eds and public statements alleging malfeasance .
example_sentences.zh: 两国大陆的贸易官员都喜欢发表尖锐嘲讽的社论和公告，讽刺对方所谓的不当行为。

example_sentences.en: This , argues mr desai , has warped incentives and fostered malfeasance .
example_sentences.zh: 他认为，这有扭曲的激励作用和孕育渎职罪的可能。

meaning: adj. 思想不集中的；心烦意乱的；遭受矛盾的感情的vt. 使分心(distract的过去式和过去分词)

example_sentences.en: I berated myself for getting distracted .
example_sentences.zh: 我责备自己过于心烦意乱。

example_sentences.en: They have low self-control , are easily distracted and impulsive .
example_sentences.zh: 他们自我控制力低下，很容易走神或者冲动。

meaning: n. 演讲；训斥，教训vi. 作演讲vt. 给…作演讲；教训（通常是长篇大论的）
zh_source: lecture 讲座，演讲来自拉丁语legere,读，词源同legible,进一步来自PIE*leg,收集，选出，整理，词源同collect,colleague.用指教堂读经，讲经，后词义通用化。
variation: 复数： lectures第三人称单数： lectures过去式： lectured过去分词： lectured现在分词： lecturing

example_sentences.en: I read the news on his lecture with care .
example_sentences.zh: 我用心阅读了关于他演讲的新闻。

example_sentences.en: The lecture is an old form of education .
example_sentences.zh: 讲课是一种过时的教学方式。

meaning: vt. 表示…的意思；意味；预示vi. 具有重要性，要紧；辱骂
zh_source: signify 预示，表明，表达，表示sign,标记，记号，-fy,使。引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： signifies过去式： signified过去分词： signified现在分词： signifying

example_sentences.en: So what might the criticism signify ?
example_sentences.zh: 所以这些批评可能意味着什么？

example_sentences.en: So the tone of tuesday 's address may signify nothing about the obama administration 's future policy .
example_sentences.zh: 所以周二演说的基调可能并不意味着奥巴马政府的未来政策。

meaning: adj. 完美的；正确的；优秀的；极好的n. [语]完成时
zh_source: perfect 完美的per-,完全的，-fect,做，履行职责，词源同fact,effect.即完全做好的，引申词义完美的。

example_sentences.en: Of course , this analysis isn 't perfect .
example_sentences.zh: 当然，这种分析并不完美。

example_sentences.en: It seems japan is a perfect partner for china in its bid to clean up .
example_sentences.zh: 在治理空气污染方面，日本似乎是中国的理想合作伙伴。

meaning: adj. 精确的；绝对的；严格的，严谨的；[植]笔直的
zh_source: strict 严格的，严厉的来自拉丁语 strictus,紧的，拉紧的，过去分词格于 stringere,拉紧，绑紧，收缩，词源同 strain,stress,stringent.引申词义严格的，严厉的。
variation: 比较级： stricter最高级： strictest

example_sentences.en: Lots of countries are strict about rubbish .
example_sentences.zh: 许多国家对垃圾实施严格管制。

example_sentences.en: France , with little tradition of discovery , has strict privacy laws .
example_sentences.zh: 一些传统论据表明，法国有着严格的隐私法。

meaning: vt. 提取；（费力地）拔出；选取；获得
zh_source: extract 摘录ex-, 向外。-tract, 拉，词源同drag, contract. 即抽出来的一块，摘录。
variation: 复数： extracts第三人称单数： extracts过去式： extracted过去分词： extracted现在分词： extracting易混淆的单词： Extract

example_sentences.en: They may prove easier to extract than the oil .
example_sentences.zh: 也许到头来这些矿产比石油更容易提取。

example_sentences.en: High oil prices have made it economical to extract .
example_sentences.zh: 高油价也使得此类天然气的开采具有了经济性。

meaning: n. 传说；传奇人物；铭文；图例
zh_source: legend 传说，地图图例，刻印文字来自拉丁语legere,读，说，词源同lecture.原指读，讲述宗教圣徒的生平事迹，后词义引申为使徒传说或传奇。现也用于地图图例等词义。
variation: 复数： legends易混淆的单词： Legend

example_sentences.en: Indeed , donald was something of a local legend .
example_sentences.zh: 事实上，唐纳德是当地的一个传奇人物。

example_sentences.en: Or is that an urban legend ?
example_sentences.zh: 还是这是一个都市传说？

meaning: adj. 精通的，熟练的n. 能手，老手，专家
zh_source: proficient 熟练的pro-,向前，-fic,做，词源同efficacy,fact.引申词义熟练的。

example_sentences.en: Proficient means students have a solid understanding of the material .
example_sentences.zh: 熟练意味着学生对材料有扎实的理解。

example_sentences.en: If you are a proficient writer you can write a book or a play .
example_sentences.zh: 如果你是一个熟练的作家，写一本书或一出戏。

meaning: n. 苛评；指责；紧束； 约束
zh_source: stricture 限制，束缚stricture 指责，非难来自拉丁语 strictus,紧的，拉紧的，过去分词格于 stringere,拉紧，绑紧，收缩，来自 PIE*streng, 紧的，窄的，词源同 strain,stress,stringent.引申词义限制，束缚。来自拉丁语*strictus,击，打，刮，过去分词格于 stringere,击，打，来自 PIE*streig,击，打， 刮，擦，词源同 strike,stroke.引申词义指责，非难。
variation: 复数： strictures

example_sentences.en: How should be stricture of congenital head blood-vessel treated ?
example_sentences.zh: 先天性脑血管狭窄该如何治疗？

example_sentences.en: His administration of the company was even more deserving of stricture than it appeared .
example_sentences.zh: 他对该公司的实际管理情况要比外表看上去的情况更该受到严厉的批评。

meaning: n. （计算机）文档，证件；公文vt. 证明；记录；为…提供证明
zh_source: document 文件，文献来自词根doc, 教，教导，词源同doctor.词义引申为文件，文献。
variation: 复数： documents第三人称单数： documents过去式： documented过去分词： documented现在分词： documenting

example_sentences.en: But the document is more than two years old .
example_sentences.zh: 但这份文件两年多前就已存在。

example_sentences.en: Translation will proceed as with other supported document formats .
example_sentences.zh: 翻译将与其它被支持的文档格式同时进行。

meaning: adj. 旋转的n. 旋转式机器；环行交叉路
zh_source: rotary 旋转的，转动的来自拉丁语 rota,轮子，来自 PIE*ret,旋转，转动，词源同 round,roll,rotate.
variation: 复数： rotaries

example_sentences.en: Geoffrey hughes from the rotary rocket company supported shawcross 's view .
example_sentences.zh: 来自旋转火箭公司的乔弗雷.休斯支持肖克罗斯的观点。

example_sentences.en: With the right configuration of muscles it is even possible to produce rotary motion .
example_sentences.zh: 只要配置得当，它甚至还能产生旋转运动。

meaning: vt. <贬>延长，拖延（某事物）
zh_source: protract 拖延，延长pro-,向前，-tract,拉，词源同draw,tractor.

example_sentences.en: The cat can protract its paws .
example_sentences.zh: 猫能伸其爪。

example_sentences.en: Delay always breeds danger ; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it .
example_sentences.zh: 推迟经常孕育危险；拖延一个伟大的工程常常意味着毁灭它。

meaning: adj. 传说的；传奇的；极其著名的n. 传说集；[宗]圣徒传
zh_source: legendary 传奇的来自legend,传奇。
variation: 复数： legendaries易混淆的单词： Legendary

example_sentences.en: A large part comes from his legendary work ethic .
example_sentences.zh: 大部分的原因在于他传奇式的工作作风。

example_sentences.en: Two years on from that loss , she honored that promise with a now almost legendary appearance on a british television talent show .
example_sentences.zh: 这一损失过去两年后，她，以一次现在看来几乎算得上传奇的在英国电视选秀节目上的表演，遵守了自己的承诺。

meaning: n. 收益，得益；利润；红利；净值利润率vt. 有益于…，对…有益的；得益；创利润vi. 有益；获利
zh_source: profit 利润，利益pro-,向前，-fit,做，词源同benefit,effect.字母c脱落。即做事的收益，引申词义利润，报酬。

example_sentences.en: How can these two profit measures diverge so dramatically ?
example_sentences.zh: 这两项盈利指标怎么会出现这么显著的差异？

example_sentences.en: They 're very good at contributions where you can fund the contribution through the profit mechanism .
example_sentences.zh: 他们很擅长通过盈利机制来捐款。

meaning: adj. 严格的；迫切的；（货币）紧缩的
zh_source: stringent 严格的，严厉的，紧缩的来自拉丁语 stringere, 拉紧， 绑紧， 压缩， 来自 PIE*strenk, 紧的， 拉紧， 绑紧， 词源同 strict,string,strong.引申词义严格的，严厉的，紧缩的等。

example_sentences.en: A stringent regulatory environment ought to erode profits .
example_sentences.zh: 严格的监管环境应该也会侵蚀利润空间。

example_sentences.en: The oils have met stringent jet fuel regulations .
example_sentences.zh: 这种燃油已达到严格的喷气燃料的指标。

meaning: n. 牺牲；献祭，供奉；牺牲行为；[宗]基督的献身vt.& vi. 牺牲，把…奉献给…；廉价卖出；牺牲，献祭；[棒]作牺牲打vt. 献祭；奉献；牺牲；亏本出售
zh_source: sacrifice 牺牲，献祭，祭祀sacri-,神圣的，-fic,做，词源同 fact,benefice.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： sacrifices第三人称单数： sacrifices过去式： sacrificed过去分词： sacrificed现在分词： sacrificing易混淆的单词： Sacrifice

example_sentences.en: Bringing a friend to jesus always requires sacrifice .
example_sentences.zh: 把朋友带到耶稣面前总需要牺牲。

example_sentences.en: His hard sacrifice makes it evident that our spontaneity needs calvarylike discipline .
example_sentences.zh: 他辛勤的奉献证明我们的自发性需要耶稣受难地之类的戒律。

meaning: n. 教义，教条，信条；武断的意见adj. 教义的，教条的，信条的
zh_source: dogma 教条来自希腊语dogma,教导，教条，词源同doctor, doctrine.
variation: 复数： dogmas易混淆的单词： Dogma

example_sentences.en: But the old consensus against capital controls was not mere dogma .
example_sentences.zh: 但过去反对资本管制的那种共识不仅仅是一种呆板的教条。

example_sentences.en: But its members are sworn to exalt strict internal brotherhood discipline over religious dogma .
example_sentences.zh: 但其成员就宗教教义宣誓加强内部严格的兄弟会纪律。

meaning: vt.& vi. （使某物）旋转；使转动；使轮流，轮换；交替adj. [植]辐状的；有辐射部分的
zh_source: rotate 旋转，转动来自拉丁语 rotare,旋转 ，转动，来自 PIE*ret,旋转，转动，词源同 round,roll,rotary.
variation: 第三人称单数： rotates过去式： rotated过去分词： rotated现在分词： rotating
