meaning: vt.& vi. 结束，终止；推断；议定vt. 得出结论；缔结；推断出；决定vi. 终了；作出决定或达成协议
zh_source: conclude 结论con-, 强调。-clud, 关闭，词源同close, clause.
variation: 第三人称单数： concludes过去式： concluded过去分词： concluded现在分词： concluding

example_sentences.en: You might conclude that without radical reform japan will continue to underperform .
example_sentences.zh: 可以断定，如果不能采取根本措施进行改革，日本经济将会延续目前的糟糕状态。

example_sentences.en: You conclude the deck contains 52 different cards ( no. 1-pattern recognition ) .
example_sentences.zh: 你断定这副牌有52张不同的牌（第一点模式识别）。

meaning: vi. 迁移，移往；移动；随季节而移居vt. 使移居；使移植
zh_source: migrate 迁徙，移居，转移来自拉丁语migrare,离开，移除，搬家，来自PIE*meigw,来自PIE*mei,改变，变动，词源同move,mutable,motion.引申词义迁徙，移居。

example_sentences.en: Twice a year in the gulf of mexico rays migrate .
example_sentences.zh: 墨西哥海湾每年两次照射着动物的迁移。

example_sentences.en: Europeans are unlikely to migrate to escape vat .
example_sentences.zh: 欧洲人不可能移民美国以逃避增值税。

meaning: n. 避难所；庇护所；圣所；庇护
zh_source: sanctuary 圣所，圣殿，庇护所，鸟兽保护区，禁猎区sanct-,神圣的，-ary,表地方。即圣所，圣殿，引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： sanctuaries易混淆的单词： Sanctuary

example_sentences.en: The hotel felt like a sanctuary from the chaos outside .
example_sentences.zh: 酒店感觉就像个避难所，远离外界的混乱局势。

example_sentences.en: Members of both groups have found sanctuary with the milf and a haven on mindanao .
example_sentences.zh: 这两个组织的成员得到摩罗伊斯兰自由阵线的庇护，在棉兰老岛有一个避风港所。

meaning: adj. 粗野的，粗鄙的，无理的
adj. 预期的；未来的；可能的；有希望的
zh_source: prospective 有希望的，潜在的来自prospect,前景，展望，勘探。比喻用法。

example_sentences.en: But a prospective conservative government is not the only cloud on its horizon .
example_sentences.zh: 但是悬于地平线之上，并非只有未来的保守政府一朵乌云。

example_sentences.en: It spurs rival firms to innovate since the prospective pay-off is greater .
example_sentences.zh: 这刺激了对手公司进行创新，因为预期回报更大。

meaning: n. 指导者，教师
zh_source: instructor 指导者，导师来自instruct,指示。引申词义指导者，导师。
variation: 复数： instructors

example_sentences.en: I learned this technique from my gym instructor .
example_sentences.zh: 我从我的运动教练那里学到了这些技巧。

example_sentences.en: The resource allows me to learn , contribute and even interact with an instructor .
example_sentences.zh: 这里的资源让我可以学习、贡献，设置是与教员互动。

meaning: n. 博学，学识；博雅
zh_source: erudition 博学e-, 向外。-rud, 粗糙，见rude.引申义博学。

example_sentences.en: Mr hitchings reviews such matters with cool erudition .
example_sentences.zh: 希契斯以他非凡的博学评论了这些问题。

example_sentences.en: The course felt like a stage display of multilingual erudition .
example_sentences.zh: 整个课程感觉是一个表现多种语言学识的秀场。

meaning: adj. 迁移的；有迁居习惯（或特色）的；流浪的；<医>游走性的
zh_source: migratory 迁徙的来自migrate,迁徙。

example_sentences.en: Millions of migratory geese are in their northern breeding grounds .
example_sentences.zh: 成千上万迁移的鹅群来到北方生育繁殖。

example_sentences.en: Can migratory birds carry h5n1 over long distances ?
example_sentences.zh: 候鸟会长距离携带h5n1型禽流感病毒吗？

meaning: n. 监狱；牢笼；监禁；入狱
zh_source: prison 监狱，监禁来自古法语prison,监狱，来自拉丁语prehensionem,抓住，来自prehendere,抓住，握住，词源同prehensile,comprehend.-s,过去分词格。引申动词词义监禁，关押。

example_sentences.en: Their son was born in prison .
example_sentences.zh: 他们的儿子在监狱中出生。

example_sentences.en: Dissent can result in harassment and long prison terms .
example_sentences.zh: 异见者会遭到侵扰和长期的监禁。

meaning: adj. 决定性的；令人信服的；确凿的；消除怀疑的

example_sentences.en: So far , none of this constitutes conclusive evidence of fraud .
example_sentences.zh: 迄今为止，所有这些均不能构成欺骗的确凿证据。

example_sentences.en: There is a final , conclusive point .
example_sentences.zh: 还有最终的、决定性的一点。

meaning: vt. 阻塞；堵塞；阻碍；阻止vi. 阻塞；妨碍；（给…）设置障碍
zh_source: obstruct 阻碍，阻挠ob-,相对，对着的，-struct,堆积，建造，词源同structure,construct.即堆在对面的，引申词义障碍，阻碍，阻挠等。
variation: 第三人称单数： obstructs过去式： obstructed过去分词： obstructed现在分词： obstructing

example_sentences.en: He continued his soliloquy on korean reunification and the american plot to obstruct it .
example_sentences.zh: 但他只是继续自言自语，嘴里嘟囔着有关朝鲜统一和美国阻挠的内容。

example_sentences.en: The opposition voted against the package in both houses , but agreed neither to amend nor obstruct it .
example_sentences.zh: 反对派在两院投票反对这项一揽子法案，但同意既不会改动它也不会阻挠它。

meaning: n. （长篇）小说；[法]新法，附律adj. 新奇的；异常的
zh_source: novel 小说来自拉丁语novus,新的，词源同new,-el,小词后缀。引申词义新事物，新故事，后特别用于指一种文学体裁，即小故事，小说（长篇小说）。
variation: 复数： novels易混淆的单词： NovelNOVEL

example_sentences.en: She adapted the novel for movies .
example_sentences.zh: 她把小说改编为电影。

example_sentences.en: His empirical work was novel and carefully executed .
example_sentences.zh: 他的实证研究是新颖的而且是谨慎实施的。

meaning: n. 内容说明书；（即将出版的书等的）内容介绍，简介；计划书，意见书；（讲义等的）大纲
zh_source: prospectus 简章，简介来自拉丁语prospectus,展望，视野，词源同prospect.引申词义简章，简介。

example_sentences.en: As the rest of the prospectus shows , lining the founders ' pockets is all groupon cares about .
example_sentences.zh: 招股说明显示，梅森等人关心的只是自己的钱袋。

example_sentences.en: Vallares also provides a model for the art of prospectus writing .
example_sentences.zh: vallares还为招股说明书的书写技巧树立了一个榜样。

meaning: vt. 使结冰；以冰（或冰河）覆盖；使受冰河作用；冻结
variation: 第三人称单数： glaciates过去式： glaciated过去分词： glaciated现在分词： glaciating

meaning: adj. 粗鲁的；简陋的；狂暴的；近乎下流的
zh_source: rude 粗鲁的，无礼的，原始的来自拉丁语 rudis,粗糙的，粗鲁的，词源不详。可能来自 PIE*kreue,生肉，带血的肉，词源 同 raw,crude.
variation: 比较级： ruder最高级： rudest易混淆的单词： Rude

example_sentences.en: How could he punish this rude and terrible person ?
example_sentences.zh: 怎样才能治治这个粗鲁可恶的老妇人？

example_sentences.en: How do I react to people who are rude ?
example_sentences.zh: 人们无礼时我该作出怎么样的反应？

meaning: n. 轮回；转生

example_sentences.en: Just as you said , everything has the transmigration .
example_sentences.zh: 就像你说的所有的东西都会有个轮回.

example_sentences.en: Some say that they learned these doctrines from egypt ; others believed that , either directly or indirectly , they learned the theory of transmigration from india .
example_sentences.zh: 有人说，他们是从埃及学到了这些学说；另外一些、无论直接还是间接相信灵魂的人，可能是从印度人那里学到了轮回的理论。

meaning: vt. 公开；揭露；使显露；使暴露
zh_source: disclose 揭露dis-, 不，非，使相反。close, 关闭。即打开，揭露。
variation: 第三人称单数： discloses过去式： disclosed过去分词： disclosed现在分词： disclosing

example_sentences.en: The chinese central government doesn 't disclose death-penalty statistics .
example_sentences.zh: 中国中央政府没有披露死刑的统计数据。

example_sentences.en: She declined to disclose how much they 've contributed .
example_sentences.zh: 她拒绝透露已与丈夫捐出了多少。

meaning: n. 报复（行为）；（特指国家间的）暴力性报复，报复行为，[史]（对敌国人民，财产的）报复性劫掠；〈罕〉赔偿，赔款
zh_source: reprisal 报复，报复行动re-,向后，往回，-pris,抓住，缩写自 prehens,词源同 prehensile,prison.即抓回，后引申词义报 复，特指国家间收回领土，财物等的军事行动。
variation: 复数： reprisals

example_sentences.en: Mr. aumran uses a pseudonym for fear of government reprisal .
example_sentences.zh: 由于担心政府报复，奥姆朗使用了化名。

example_sentences.en: When I filed a complaint , I was subjected to a racist reprisal .
example_sentences.zh: 当我对此表示不满的时候，遭到了种族主义者的报复。

meaning: n. 郊区，城郊；边缘；附近，周围
zh_source: suburb 郊区sub-,在下，-urb,城市，词源同 urban,urbane.引申词义郊区，城乡结合部。
variation: 复数： suburbs易混淆的单词： Suburb

example_sentences.en: Wembley is not london 's most appealing suburb .
example_sentences.zh: 温布利不是伦敦最吸引人的郊区。

example_sentences.en: Falls church virginia is really a suburb of washington dc .
example_sentences.zh: 福尔斯彻奇市其实可以算作华盛顿特区的郊区。

meaning: n. 障碍物；阻碍的行为或例子；阻碍，受阻；妨碍议事
zh_source: obstruction 阻碍，妨碍来自obstruct,阻碍，阻挠。
variation: 复数： obstructions

example_sentences.en: The liews have pleaded not guilty to the obstruction charges .
example_sentences.zh: 刘氏夫妇对妨碍司法公正的指控拒不认罪。

example_sentences.en: He was convicted of perjury and obstruction of justice , and sentenced to 34 months in prison .
example_sentences.zh: 于是他被定罪为伪证罪和妨碍司法公正罪，同时判处34个月有期徒刑。

meaning: n. 卫生系统或设备
zh_source: sanitation 卫生设备来自拉丁语 sanus,健康的，词源同 sane,健康的。-ation,名词后缀。引申词义卫生设备。

example_sentences.en: Not for him tricky questions of sanitation or finance .
example_sentences.zh: 他不喜欢处理公共卫生或者财政方面的棘手问题。

example_sentences.en: Hospitals , sanitation plants and offices ground to a halt .
example_sentences.zh: 医院、公共卫生场所和办公室也停工了。

meaning: n. 新奇；新奇的事物；新颖小巧而价廉的物品
zh_source: novelty 新奇，新颖来自拉丁语novus,新的，词源同new,-ty,名词后缀。引申词义新奇，新颖。
variation: 复数： novelties

example_sentences.en: Or perhaps this is to confuse novelty with importance .
example_sentences.zh: 或也许是把新奇和重要混为一谈了。

example_sentences.en: A novelty of this year is chance .
example_sentences.zh: 今年最新颖的是chance汽车。

meaning: vt. 尊重；尊敬；关心；遵守n. 尊重，恭敬；敬意；某方面
zh_source: respect 尊敬，尊重re-,再，-spect,看，词源同 specter,retrospect.即再看，反复看，引申词义尊敬，尊重。
variation: 第三人称单数： respects过去式： respected过去分词： respected现在分词： respecting

example_sentences.en: We have to respect all differences .
example_sentences.zh: 我们必须尊重所有的差异。

example_sentences.en: Yet in one respect the election has clarified matters .
example_sentences.zh: 然而大选在一个方面澄清了事实真相。

meaning: n. 冰河，冰川
variation: 复数： glaciers易混淆的单词： Glacier

example_sentences.en: This is a rock glacier rather than an icefield .
example_sentences.zh: 这是一个岩石冰川而并非是一个冰原。

example_sentences.en: Down the middle of the glacier run dark gray stripes .
example_sentences.zh: 下方在冰川的中部有深灰色的条纹。

meaning: vt. 使惊奇，使诧异；意外发现[撞见]，出其不意获得；突袭n. 令人吃惊的事物；意想不到（或突然）的事；令人惊奇的事（或消息等）；惊奇，惊讶
zh_source: surprise 吃惊，意外sur-,在上，-prise,抓住，缩写自 prehens,词源同 prison,comprehension.引申词义突然抓住，吃 惊，意外。
variation: 第三人称单数： surprises过去式： surprised过去分词： surprised现在分词： surprising易混淆的单词： Surprise

example_sentences.en: This shouldn 't come as a surprise .
example_sentences.zh: 这一点不该让人感到吃惊。

example_sentences.en: The return of the mining mega-merger was no surprise .
example_sentences.zh: 矿业公司兼并后的回报是毫不惊奇的。

meaning: n. 神志正常；心智健康；头脑清楚；通情达理
zh_source: sanity 神志正常，精神健全来自 sane,健康的，精神正常的，-ity,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: And how you suffered for your sanity
example_sentences.zh: 你是怎样挺过来的为了清醒的头脑

example_sentences.en: This is about self-preservation and sanity .
example_sentences.zh: 这是保持自我，也是通情达理。

meaning: adj. 个人的；独特的；个别的n. 个人；个体
zh_source: individual 个人，个体in-,不，非，divide,分开，分割。即不可分割的，原指耶稣的圣父，圣灵，圣子三位一体不可分开，后用来指单个的人，个人，个体。
variation: 复数： individuals

example_sentences.en: Individual firms may find enforcement difficult .
example_sentences.zh: 个体公司也许会发现执行困难。

example_sentences.en: Many individual sector prices are falling .
example_sentences.zh: 许多个别行业的价格正在下降。

meaning: adj. 食鱼的
adj. 可敬的；品行端正的；可观的，相当大的；体面的

example_sentences.en: Yet this respectable average hides a series of problems .
example_sentences.zh: 然而这样的可观的数字背后却是一系列的问题。

example_sentences.en: A volatile 2010 closed with a respectable fourth-quarter growth performance .
example_sentences.zh: 不稳定的2010年以第四季度可观的经济增长而告终。

meaning: vt. 重建；重现；改造；复兴
zh_source: reconstruct 重建re-,再，重新，construct,建造。
variation: 第三人称单数： reconstructs过去式： reconstructed过去分词： reconstructed现在分词： reconstructing

example_sentences.en: Virtues that are harder to reconstruct than any battle .
example_sentences.zh: 比任何战争都难于重建的品质。

example_sentences.en: Many modern palaeontologists try to do something similar , except that what they reconstruct is behaviour .
example_sentences.zh: 许多现代古生物学家除了重现古代动物的行为外，也在尝试做着同样的事情。

meaning: adj. 顽皮的，开玩笑的
zh_source: ludic 顽皮的，爱开玩笑的来自拉丁语ludere,游戏，玩乐，词源同allude,prelude.

meaning: n. 参考；参考书；提及，涉及；证明人，介绍人v. 引用；参照
zh_source: reference 参考，查阅，推荐人来自 refer,查阅，参考。
variation: 复数： references第三人称单数： references过去式： referenced过去分词： referenced现在分词： referencing

example_sentences.en: Search engines are unique internet reference guides .
example_sentences.zh: 搜索引擎作为独特的网络参考指南。

example_sentences.en: My deep-seated fear now has a url reference .
example_sentences.zh: 我根深蒂固的恐惧现在有了一个url参照物。

meaning: vt.& vi. （使）轻松；（使）松弛；放宽；（使）放松vt. 缓和，减轻；（使大便等）通畅vi. 变得轻松；变得随和；变得和蔼；通便
zh_source: relax 放松，休息，松弛re-,向后，离开，lax,放松的。即松下来的，引申词义放松，休息等。
variation: 第三人称单数： relaxes过去式： relaxed过去分词： relaxed现在分词： relaxing易混淆的单词： Relax

example_sentences.en: You may need time to relax .
example_sentences.zh: 你可能需要时间放松一下。

example_sentences.en: So why relax the rules on weight and body art ?
example_sentences.zh: 那么为什么要放宽对体重和纹身的规定呢？

meaning: adj. 不合法的，违法的；违反规则的n. 非法移民，非法劳工；间谍
zh_source: illegal 非法的il-,不，非，来自in-在以字母l开头前的拼写异化形式，legal,合法的。
variation: 复数： illegals易混淆的单词： Illegal

example_sentences.en: Change money privately is illegal in china .
example_sentences.zh: 私下换钱在中国是违法行为。

example_sentences.en: My husband says it was illegal .
example_sentences.zh: 我的丈夫说此行非法。

meaning: vt. （用墙、篱笆等）把…围起来；把…装入信封；附入
zh_source: enclose 包围en-, 进入，使。close, 关住。
variation: 第三人称单数： encloses过去式： enclosed过去分词： enclosed现在分词： enclosing

example_sentences.en: Enclose your cottage garden with a picket fence or a natural stone wall .
example_sentences.zh: 用尖桩篱笆或天然石墙把花园围起来。

example_sentences.en: We enclose our sales contract no. 45 in duplicate .
example_sentences.zh: 附上我们第45号销售合同一式两份。

meaning: n. 冰河学

example_sentences.en: European mirror , data catalog of wdc a glaciology .
example_sentences.zh: 冰川学数据目录欧洲镜像站。

example_sentences.en: Doctor frank paul is an expert in glaciology from swiss federal institute of technology .
example_sentences.zh: 法兰克保罗医师是瑞士联邦理工学院、冰河学专家。

meaning: adj. 法律的；合法的；法定的；法律（上）的n. 法定权利；依法必须登报的声明
zh_source: legal 法律的来自拉丁语legis,法，法律，来自PIE*leg,选择，收集，词源同collect.引申词义收集的规则，法规，法律。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Legal

example_sentences.en: She became a legal consultant .
example_sentences.zh: 她改行当了法律顾问。

example_sentences.en: Some legal experts expressed skepticism .
example_sentences.zh: 一些法律专家表达了质疑。

meaning: n. 胆怯，羞怯

example_sentences.en: Overconfidence among soldiers can be as dangerous as timidity .
example_sentences.zh: 士兵过分自信和胆怯一样危险。

example_sentences.en: I assign that timidity to two other causes .
example_sentences.zh: 我将这种羞怯归于两个因素。

meaning: n. 结构；构造；建筑物；体系vt. 构成，排列；安排
zh_source: structure 结构，构造，体系来自拉丁语 structura,装配，建造，布置，来自 struere,连接，组装，建造，堆放，来自 PIE*ster, 展开，延展，词源同 stratum,strew,construct.引申词义结构，构造，体系等。
variation: 复数： structures第三人称单数： structures过去式： structured过去分词： structured现在分词： structuring

example_sentences.en: Then the structure will be complete .
example_sentences.zh: 届时基本结构将渐趋完整。

example_sentences.en: Most likely the structure belonged to a rice farmer .
example_sentences.zh: 那座建筑很可能是属于一个稻农。

meaning: n. 基本原理；雏形； 萌芽；退化器官
zh_source: rudiment 雏形，萌芽，基本原理，基础rude,原始的，-ment,名词后缀。引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： rudiments

example_sentences.en: The angular - shall , even rudiment !
example_sentences.zh: 那角应当，就算是雏形！

example_sentences.en: It does not take me long to pick up the rudiment of the language .
example_sentences.zh: 我没有费多少时间就学会了这一语言的初步知识。

meaning: vt. 排除，不包括；排斥；驱除，赶出
zh_source: exclude 排除ex-, 向外。-clud, 关闭，词源同close, conclude.
variation: 第三人称单数： excludes过去式： excluded过去分词： excluded现在分词： excluding

example_sentences.en: The picture is also similar when you exclude financials .
example_sentences.zh: 在把金融企业排除在外后情况同样如此。

example_sentences.en: If so , they will always exclude jewish liberals .
example_sentences.zh: 如果是，那他们会一直把自由派的犹太人排除在外。

meaning: n. 天才；天赋；天才人物；（特别的）才能
zh_source: genius 天资来自词根gen, 生育，词源同generate.原义为守护精灵，传说中每个人出生时都会有守护精灵相伴而生，并一生陪伴成长，引申义天资。参考电影《黄金罗盘》。
variation: 复数： geniuses易混淆的单词： Genius

example_sentences.en: Such is the simple genius of japanese tv .
example_sentences.zh: 这是日本电视节目的天才所在。

example_sentences.en: Boldness has genius , power and magic in it .
example_sentences.zh: 胆识将赋予你天赋、能力和神奇的力量。

meaning: n. 初学者，新手；新信徒；尚未赢过大赛的赛马
zh_source: novice 新手来自拉丁语novus,新的，词源同new.引申词义新人，新手。
variation: 复数： novices

example_sentences.en: He was a novice in politics and business .
example_sentences.zh: 他在从政和经济方面还是新手。

example_sentences.en: They 're common in novice runners who tend to breathe more quickly and shallow .
example_sentences.zh: 这在试图想呼吸的更快速和浅的新手中比较常。

meaning: vi. 受痛苦；受损害；变糟；变差vt. 忍受；容忍；容许；遭受
zh_source: suffer 受苦，受难，忍受，遭受suf-,在下，-fer,承担，承载，词源同 bring,infer.引申诸相关比喻义。
variation: 第三人称单数： suffers过去式： suffered过去分词： suffered现在分词： suffering

example_sentences.en: Apple is unlikely to suffer a similar fate .
example_sentences.zh: 苹果不可能会遭受同样的命运。

example_sentences.en: But the government will suffer nonetheless .
example_sentences.zh: 但是政府仍将受到批评。

meaning: n. 合法性；墨守法规；法律上的义务
zh_source: legality 合法性来自legal,法律的。
variation: 复数： legalities

example_sentences.en: Great doubts remain about the legality of such measures .
example_sentences.zh: 人们仍然强烈怀疑此类措施的合法性。

example_sentences.en: The authorities are trying to consolidate security with legality and infrastructure .
example_sentences.zh: 有关当局正试图通过合法途径和基础建设来巩固治安。

meaning: n. 消遣，放松；松懈，松弛；放宽；[生理]驰松
variation: 复数： relaxations易混淆的单词： Relaxation

example_sentences.en: You can achieve total relaxation by using heavy breathing .
example_sentences.zh: 你能通过深呼吸可以完全得到放松。

example_sentences.en: The relaxation is not as big as banks had hoped .
example_sentences.zh: 标准放宽的幅度不如银行预期的那样大。

meaning: adj. 文雅的；有礼貌的；有教养的；上流社会的
zh_source: genteel 假斯文的来自词根gen, 生育，词源同generate. 原指出生高贵的，优雅的，后词义贬义化。

example_sentences.en: He came from a genteel family .
example_sentences.zh: 他出身于有教养的家庭。

example_sentences.en: This , rather genteel lady wrote to the schoolmaster inquiring about the wc .
example_sentences.zh: 这位颇有上流社会意识的夫人写信给校长，询问有关厕所的问题。

meaning: vt. 使转移；使调动；转让（权利等）；让与vi. 转让；转学；转乘；转会（尤指职业足球队）n. 转移；调动；换乘；（运动员）转会
zh_source: transfer 转移，转与，转让trans-,转移，转变，-fer,带来，词源同 bring,infer.
variation: 第三人称单数： transfers过去式： transferred过去分词： transferred现在分词： transferring易混淆的单词： Transfer

example_sentences.en: A final element was a deal on technology transfer .
example_sentences.zh: 最后一项协议是有关技术转移的。

example_sentences.en: Technology transfer will also be a thorny issue .
example_sentences.zh: 技术转让也将是棘手的问题。

meaning: n. 基础，下部结构，地下建筑
vt. 憎恶；（厌恶地）回避；拒绝；淘汰n. 厌恶者，拒绝者
zh_source: abhor 憎恶前缀ab-,离开，此外用于强调。词根hor, 恐怖，见horror,惊恐。指厌恶到恐惧的程度。
variation: 第三人称单数： abhors过去式： abhorred过去分词： abhorred现在分词： abhorring

example_sentences.en: Even the most china-friendly of taiwanese abhor this notion .
example_sentences.zh: 即使台湾人中最亲大陆的人也厌恶这种设想。

example_sentences.en: We abhor the creeping delegitimisation and demonisation of israel .
example_sentences.zh: 我们憎恶暗中削弱及丑化以色列的行径。

meaning: vt. 劝告；训诫；（温和地）责备；轻责
zh_source: admonish 警告前缀ad-, 去，往。词根mon, 建议，警告，同monitor,班长。
variation: 第三人称单数： admonishes过去式： admonished过去分词： admonished现在分词： admonishing

example_sentences.en: Yet do not regard him as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
example_sentences.zh: 只是不要以他为仇敌，乃要劝戒他如弟兄。

example_sentences.en: Admonish your friends privately , but praise them openly .
example_sentences.zh: 要私下告诫朋友，但是要公然褒奖朋友。

meaning: vt.& vi. 立法，制定法律；〈美〉以立法程序创立
zh_source: legislate 立法来自拉丁语legis lation,立法，legis,法律，词源同legal,lation,提出，带来，词源同translate.
variation: 第三人称单数： legislates过去式： legislated过去分词： legislated现在分词： legislating

example_sentences.en: Governments cannot legislate away popular prejudices .
example_sentences.zh: 政府无法通过立法消除普遍存在的偏见。

example_sentences.en: He also said australia would legislate to tighten disclosure requirements on short-selling .
example_sentences.zh: 他同时表示，澳大利亚将通过立法，收紧对卖空的披露要求。

meaning: adj. 基本的，入门的，初步的

example_sentences.en: Human rudimental bovine serum albumin check-up .
example_sentences.zh: 人的牛血清白蛋白残留。

example_sentences.en: With the review , the author tries to clear up the rudimental logic touching the development of political movement after liberation .
example_sentences.zh: 通过这种考察，笔者力图对解放以来影响政治运动发展的基本逻辑进行梳理。

meaning: adj. 有礼貌的；恭敬的；殷勤的；穆
zh_source: respectful 值得尊敬的来自 respect,尊敬，尊重。

example_sentences.en: Relations between the conservatives and the liberal democrats , its two constituent parties , have degenerated from respectful union to surly cohabitation .
example_sentences.zh: 组成联合政府的保守党和自由民主党之间的关系已经从恭敬的“联姻”变成互生怨气的“同居”。

example_sentences.en: Two weeks after king bhumibol 's birthday speech , the bangkok post ran a stiff , respectful profile of him under the headline : " king in waiting " .
example_sentences.zh: 在普密蓬国王发表生日讲话两周后，《曼谷邮报》发布了王储一幅照片，他表情肃然、令人起敬，所配标题是“待位之君”。

meaning: adj. 真正的；坦率的，真诚的；血统纯粹的，纯种的；[医学]真性的
zh_source: genuine 真实的来自词根gen, 生育，词源同generate. 即天生的。

example_sentences.en: These are the underpinnings of a genuine commercial venture .
example_sentences.zh: 这些是才真正商业性企业的根基。

example_sentences.en: Most of us can spot a genuine smile .
example_sentences.zh: 大部分人都能辨别出真诚的微笑。

meaning: adj. （动物）野生的，未驯的，野蛮的
zh_source: feral 野生的，狂野的来自PIE*ghwer, 野的，野生动物，词源同fierce, panther.

example_sentences.en: And we 'd have two larger categories : domesticated bots and feral bots .
example_sentences.zh: 我们会有两大类的机器人：家庭机器人和野生机器人。

example_sentences.en: Writing in nature communications , the scientists said stray and feral cats were the worst offenders .
example_sentences.zh: 科学家在《自然通讯》中提到流浪猫和野生猫是最坏的罪犯。

meaning: n. 上部结构，上层建筑；（建筑物、船等的）上面部分
zh_source: superstructure 上层建筑，上部结构super-,在上，上方，structure,结构。

example_sentences.en: It 's a flat-bottom decker with a focsle and an enlarged aft superstructure .
example_sentences.zh: 带有平底甲板和载员舱，以及增大的船尾上层建筑。

example_sentences.en: The whole corporate superstructure of our economy can be made " too big to fail , " beyond retrospective regrets or futile tinkering .
example_sentences.zh: 我们经济的整个公司上层结构，会是“太大而不会倒闭”，在回顾遗憾或者无用的修补之外。

meaning: n. 拒绝，杜绝；排除，驱逐；被排斥在外的人（或事物）；排外主义
variation: 复数： exclusions

example_sentences.en: They felt a deep sense of urban exclusion .
example_sentences.zh: 他们深刻感受到了城市的排斥。

example_sentences.en: His exclusion will also make it tougher for him to achieve his eu goals .
example_sentences.zh: 被排除在外将会使卡梅隆更难达到自己在欧盟的目标。

meaning: n. 立法机关；立法机构；立法部；（特指）州议会
zh_source: legislature 立法机关来自legislate,立法。
variation: 复数： legislatures

example_sentences.en: Arnold schwarzenegger 's government is dysfunctional and the legislature gridlocked .
example_sentences.zh: 阿诺德施瓦辛格的政府运作不良，立法机关也陷入了僵局。

example_sentences.en: That set the stage for the florida legislature .
example_sentences.zh: 这就为佛罗里达州议会创造了条件。

meaning: vt. 挖出，发掘出
zh_source: exhume 为检查死因掘出尸首ex-, 向外。-hum, 土，词源同human, humus.
variation: 第三人称单数： exhumes过去式： exhumed过去分词： exhumed现在分词： exhuming

example_sentences.en: To dig up or remove from a grave or tomb ; exhume .
example_sentences.zh: 从坟墓中掘出；掘墓。

example_sentences.en: But in 2008 , russia finally gave hungary the approval to exhume the grave site .
example_sentences.zh: 到2008年，俄罗斯最终同意匈牙利到墓地掘出遗体。

meaning: n. 延缓（作用）剂adj. 延缓的，使迟滞的

example_sentences.en: Present status and developing tendency of flame retardant .
example_sentences.zh: 阻燃剂的发展现状和开发动向。

example_sentences.en: Formulas for the intumescent polyurethane flame retardant coating .
example_sentences.zh: 膨胀型聚氨酯防火涂料配方。

meaning: adj. 可笑的；荒唐的
zh_source: ludicrous 开玩笑的来自拉丁语ludere,游戏，玩乐，词源同allude,prelude.

example_sentences.en: Women bosses have escaped ludicrous stereotypes to become normal .
example_sentences.zh: 女老板脱离了荒诞可笑的陈旧观念，越发正常化。

example_sentences.en: Now , in a ludicrous way , visually combine ' bacon ' with the sight of your front door .
example_sentences.zh: 现在，用一种滑稽的方法，把“腌肉”和你家大门的样子形象化地结合起来。

meaning: n. （动植物的）属；类；种；型
zh_source: genus 属来自词根gen, 生育，词源同generate. 用于科学术语。
variation: 复数： genuses genera

example_sentences.en: Are the so-called hobbits really members of our genus homo ?
example_sentences.zh: 所谓的霍比特人真是人属中的一员吗？

example_sentences.en: Artiodactyla camelidae non-humped camel ( alpaca ) 1 species of the genus .
example_sentences.zh: 偶蹄目骆驼科无峰驼（羊驼）属的1种。

meaning: adj. 专用的；高级的；排外的；单独的n. 独家新闻；专有物；独家经营的产品（或项目、设计等）；排外者
variation: 复数： exclusives易混淆的单词： Exclusive

example_sentences.en: Maritime law has evolved with exclusive economic zones around territories ( see article ) .
example_sentences.zh: 海事法随着领土周围的专属经济区而演变（见文）。

example_sentences.en: The seas were areas of common use under no one 's exclusive control or jurisdiction .
example_sentences.zh: 这些海域属于公用区，没有一个国家拥有这些地区的专属控制权或司法管辖权。

meaning: adj. 法人的，团体的，社团的；公司的，总体国家的；〈古〉团结的；共同的，全体的
zh_source: corporate 公司的来自词根corp，身体，见corporeal. 即成为一体的，成立法人实体的公司。

example_sentences.en: Mr schloss did not spend time tailing corporate managers .
example_sentences.zh: 施洛斯没有花时间去纠缠公司的经理们。

example_sentences.en: Things are not much better in corporate disputes .
example_sentences.zh: 在涉及法人的纠纷中，情况并非有所好转。

meaning: n. 显示屏，屏幕；[计]显示器；监测仪；监控人员，班长vt. 监控，监听；搜集，记录；测定；监督vi. 监视
zh_source: monitor 显示屏，监视器，班长，监督员来自拉丁语monere,警告，提醒，监视，使记忆，来自PIE*men,思考，考虑，思想，记忆，词源同mania,comment,mind.引申词义学长，班长，监督员等，后也用于指显示屏，监视器等。

example_sentences.en: United stationers doesn 't monitor how much time employees spend on foundation work during the workday .
example_sentences.zh: 联合文具集团并不会监控员工在工作日花在基金会中的时间。

example_sentences.en: It could also possibly morph into a premier messaging app for companies who want to monitor employee communications .
example_sentences.zh: 此外，其也可能成为希望监督员工通信的公司首选的消息应用。

meaning: adj. 令人厌恶的adv. 令人厌恶地

example_sentences.en: The idea that mr obama is applying proper standards of justice to terrorists is as abhorrent to al-qaeda as it seems to be to mr cheney .
example_sentences.zh: 奥巴马将恰当的司法准则应用在恐怖分子身上，不但切尼看不顺眼，在基地组织看来也甚为可恶。

example_sentences.en: He writes that nine out of ten persons in the population were affected by some of this country 's abhorrent diseases .
example_sentences.zh: 他写道，每十个人中就有九个得过那让人憎恶的疾病。

meaning: n. 回顾，回想vt.&vi. 回顾；追溯
zh_source: retrospect 回顾，回溯retro-,向后，往回，-spect,看，词源同 respect,spectator.
variation: 复数： retrospects第三人称单数： retrospects过去式： retrospected过去分词： retrospected现在分词： retrospecting

example_sentences.en: In retrospect this faith may have been misguided .
example_sentences.zh: 现在回想起来，这个想法可能是被误导了。

example_sentences.en: In retrospect , not such a good idea .
example_sentences.zh: 回顾检讨过去，这主意不怎么好。

meaning: adj. 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的vt. 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
zh_source: humble 卑微的，谦逊的来自古法语humble,卑微的，来自拉丁语humilis,尘土一样的，来自humus,土，尘土，词源同humus.引申词义卑微的，谦逊的。习语to eat humble pie,赔礼，道歉，来自umbles,动物内脏，词源同loin,lumbar.动物内脏在过去属于下等食品，是给仆人或奴仆等下等人吃的，因而引申该词义，同时，由于umbles对大多数人来说都属于陌生词，词义又恰好与humble吻合，因此，拼写最终被humble所代替。插入字母b,比较number,numerate.
variation: 第三人称单数： humbles过去式： humbled过去分词： humbled现在分词： humbling易混淆的单词： HumbleHUMBLE

example_sentences.en: The truly humble could never carry out a task like that .
example_sentences.zh: 真正谦卑的人永远不可能完成这样的使命。

example_sentences.en: This is why you cannot grow without a humble , teachable attitude .
example_sentences.zh: 这正是为什么我们要存谦卑受教的态度才能成长的原因。

meaning: adj. 胆怯的，羞怯的adv. 胆怯地，羞怯地n. 羞怯，胆怯
zh_source: timorous 胆怯的，胆小的来自拉丁语 timor,恐惧，胆小，来自拉丁语 timere,使恐惧，词源不详，词源同 timid.

example_sentences.en: In the darkness the timorous wolves crept into the living-room .
example_sentences.zh: 那些胆怯的狼在黑暗中爬进了客厅。

example_sentences.en: He was the most timorous person in that event .
example_sentences.zh: 在那次事件中他是个胆小鬼。

meaning: n. 公司；法人；社团，团体；〈口〉（凸出的）大肚子
variation: 复数： corporations

example_sentences.en: This news channel is owned by qatar media corporation .
example_sentences.zh: 该新闻频道为卡塔尔媒体公司所拥有。

example_sentences.en: It then started negotiations with the muncie-delaware county chamber of commerce and the indiana economic development corporation .
example_sentences.zh: 并开始与芒西所在的特拉华郡商会和印地安纳经济发展股份公司磋商。

meaning: adj. 残忍的；极度的；凶猛；恶
zh_source: ferocious 残暴的来自feral, 野生的，狂野的。

example_sentences.en: A pair of benin leopards have cute whiskers , but are ferocious in their intensity .
example_sentences.zh: 来自贝宁的对豹有着可爱的胡须，但是强壮有力、凶猛无比。

example_sentences.en: India 's brothels are also unusually violent , with ferocious beatings common and pimps sometimes even killing girls who are uncooperative .
example_sentences.zh: 印度妓院里的暴力现象也异常凶猛，残酷殴打司空见惯，皮条客们时常会惨无人道地将不愿合作的女孩杀害。

meaning: n. 女人政治，女人当政
zh_source: gynarchy 妇女当政gyn, 女人。-archy, 统治，见anarchy.
variation: 复数： gynarchies

meaning: n. 序曲，前奏曲；开场戏，序幕；前兆，预兆v. 为…作序，开头；成为…的序曲；演奏序曲，唱开场戏
zh_source: prelude 前奏pre-,在前，早于，-lud,玩，演奏，词源同allude,interlude.

example_sentences.en: That might be a prelude to bigger policy changes .
example_sentences.zh: 而这可能成为更大政策变革的前奏。

example_sentences.en: He thinks the public debate about sovereign-wealth funds is the prelude to action against them and that the " kindling is dry " .
example_sentences.zh: 他认为公众有关主权财富基金的讨论是日后实际反对行动的序幕，而且“干柴已经准备好了”。

meaning: adj. 无中心的，离心的

example_sentences.en: There is a non-linear relationship between thermodynamical properties and acentric factors of substances .
example_sentences.zh: 本文提出物质的热力学性质和偏心因子之间存在着非线性关系。

example_sentences.en: Prediction for parameters of aggregation activity of compounds using both acentric factor and configuration factor .
example_sentences.zh: 应用偏心因子和构形因子预测化合物的聚集活性参量。

meaning: vt. 使蒙羞，使丢脸，使出丑；屈辱，羞辱
zh_source: humiliate 羞辱来自拉丁语humilis,尘土一样的，卑微的，来自humus,土，尘土，词源同humus,-ate,使。即使像尘土一样卑微的，引申词义羞辱。
variation: 第三人称单数： humiliates过去式： humiliated过去分词： humiliated现在分词： humili-ating

example_sentences.en: We won 't let them humiliate us .
example_sentences.zh: 我们不会让他们羞辱我们。

example_sentences.en: The iranian authorities have used this technique before to humiliate and discredit opponents .
example_sentences.zh: 伊朗当局之前就用这种手段来侮辱和诋毁对手。

meaning: vt. 翻新，修复，整修；革新，更新；恢复（精神）adj. 恢复的，革新的，翻新的
zh_source: renovate 修复，翻新re-,再，重新，-nov,新的，词源同 new,novel.
variation: 第三人称单数： renovates过去式： renovated过去分词： renovated现在分词： renovating

example_sentences.en: All china must pull off to host the games is to renovate bits of its big cities .
example_sentences.zh: 要举办奥运会中国所必须做出的努力是翻新大城市的某些部分。

example_sentences.en: It borrowed millions more with the help of the city 's industrial development agency to renovate the space .
example_sentences.zh: 该基金会在纽约工业发展局（industrialdevelopmentagency）的帮助下，借到了数百万美元，对大楼进行了翻新处理。

meaning: n. 凶猛，残暴；暴行
variation: 复数： ferocities

example_sentences.en: The british fought back with astonishing ferocity , killing around 1 00000 kenyans .
example_sentences.zh: 英国的反击凶猛惊人，约10万肯尼亚人被杀害。

example_sentences.en: But the march in athens on wednesday was shocking both for its size and ferocity .
example_sentences.zh: 但是周三雅典的游行却因为其规模和凶猛，震惊了对垒的双方。

meaning: vt. 包括；包含；计入；包住
zh_source: include 包含in-,进入，使，-clud,关闭，词源同conclude,close.引申词义包含。
variation: 第三人称单数： includes过去式： included过去分词： included现在分词： including

example_sentences.en: But what exactly should it include ?
example_sentences.zh: 但这究竟应该包括什么？

example_sentences.en: The end points include all earlier and later years .
example_sentences.zh: 数据终点包含了靠前与滞后的年份。

meaning: adj. 中央的，中心的；重要的，核心的n. 电话总局；电话转接员
variation: 复数： centrals易混淆的单词： Central

example_sentences.en: China 's central government responded promptly .
example_sentences.zh: 中国中央政府迅速做出反应。

example_sentences.en: Economic aid will be central to the talks .
example_sentences.zh: 经济援助是此次峰会的中心议题。

meaning: adj. 多种多样的，混杂的；不均匀；非均匀；错杂
zh_source: heterogeneous 多种多样的hetero-,相异的，-gen,出生，产生，词源同generate.引申词义多种多样的。

example_sentences.en: Heterogeneous drives and the paternal law .
example_sentences.zh: 介於异质性的驱使和父系法律。

example_sentences.en: Quantifying fungal growth dynamics in heterogeneous soil environments .
example_sentences.zh: 异质土壤环境下真菌生长动态的定量研究。

meaning: n. （电子）计算机，电脑
variation: 复数： computers

example_sentences.en: You have to design a global computer network .
example_sentences.zh: 你必须设计一个全球计算机网络。

example_sentences.en: We could play computer games .
example_sentences.zh: 我们可以玩电脑游戏。

meaning: n. 谦逊，谦恭；谦让的行为；谦虚谨慎
zh_source: humility 谦逊，谦虚来自拉丁语humilis,尘土一样的，卑微的，来自humus,土，尘土，词源同humus,-ity,名词后缀。即把自身放在尘土一样卑微的位置，引申词义谦逊，谦虚。

example_sentences.en: That is a calling which requires patience and humility .
example_sentences.zh: 这是一份需要耐心和谦逊的工作。

example_sentences.en: I say this not boastfully but in all humility .
example_sentences.zh: 我并不是吹嘘，而是谦卑地这么说。

meaning: adj. 肉体的，身体的，物质的
zh_source: corporeal 身体的，实体的来自PIE*kwrep,身体。

example_sentences.en: I was interested in corporeal strangeness .
example_sentences.zh: 我过去很喜欢肉体的陌生感。

example_sentences.en: Corporeal quantity and its unit consolidate exercise .
example_sentences.zh: 物质的量及其单位巩固练习。

meaning: n. 喧闹；狂热；狂怒；抗议
zh_source: furor 群情激愤来自拉丁语furor, 愤怒，发狂，词源同fury.

example_sentences.en: Behind the furor over a climate change skeptic
example_sentences.zh: 热议中的气候变化论怀疑者

example_sentences.en: The new furor was seen as potentially damaging for mr. tusk and his party .
example_sentences.zh: 最近的轰动被视为对图斯克先生及其政党造成潜在的损害。

meaning: n. 妇科医学
zh_source: gynecology 妇科学来自PIE*gwen, 女人，妻子，特别是高贵的妇女，词源同queen，后用做医学术语。

example_sentences.en: There looked that the gynecology department strength is strongest .
example_sentences.zh: 那里看妇科实力最强。

example_sentences.en: More difficult to label were the ukrainian kung fu master and the syrian gynecology student who moonlighted as a male model in beijing .
example_sentences.zh: 另有乌克兰的功夫大师和叙利亚的妇科学学生（并在北京兼职模特），这俩人就较难归类了。

meaning: n. 石油化学产品adj. 石油化学的；岩石化学的
zh_source: petrochemical 石化产品petro-,石油的，chemical,化工产品。

example_sentences.en: Liquid foundation mostly contains mineral oil , which is considered as a petrochemical pollutant .
example_sentences.zh: 粉底液大多含有矿物油，这是一种用于石化的污染物。

example_sentences.en: Shell plans to build a petrochemical refinery near pittsburgh to process gas from the nearby marcellus shale .
example_sentences.zh: 壳牌公司计划在匹兹堡附近建造一个石化炼油厂，就近加工马塞勒斯出产的页岩气。

meaning: vt. 埋葬，把…土葬
variation: 第三人称单数： inhumes过去式： inhumed过去分词： inhumed现在分词： inhuming

example_sentences.en: Let the dead past inhume its dead !
example_sentences.zh: 让死的过去把死的埋葬！

example_sentences.en: Inhume you underground , never wake up .
example_sentences.zh: 把你埋在地下，让你永远都不醒来。

meaning: adj. 都市的；具有城市或城市生活特点的；市内
zh_source: urban 城市的来自拉丁语urbanus, 城市，罗马城。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Urban

example_sentences.en: Urban regeneration is not a fresh discipline .
example_sentences.zh: 城市复兴不是一门新兴学科。

example_sentences.en: Surely an urban myth , I hear you cry .
example_sentences.zh: 城市的人啊，我听见你们要哭了。

meaning: n. 翻新；修复；整修；恢复活力

example_sentences.en: Renovation on the historic building is expected to continue through 2013 .
example_sentences.zh: 对这座历史建筑的翻新预计将持续到2013年。

example_sentences.en: As part of the renovation , workers removed spikes from the crown , above .
example_sentences.zh: 作为翻新的部分，工人们把冠支从她的头冠上移除。

meaning: vt. 使降级；使降职；转移；把…归类
zh_source: relegate 降级，贬职re-,向后，往回，-leg,送出，词源同 legate,delegate.引申词义降级，贬职。
variation: 第三人称单数： relegates过去式： relegated过去分词： relegated现在分词： relegating

example_sentences.en: We shall relegate this problem to the organizing committee .
example_sentences.zh: 我们将把这个问题委托组织委员会处理。

example_sentences.en: It is through this article relegate sushi period of a few words for imagery to explore the mentality of their relegation .
example_sentences.zh: 本文正是通过苏轼贬谪时期词作中的几个意象来探索其贬谪心态。

meaning: adj. 同性质的，同类的；由相同（或同类型）事物（或人）组成的；均匀的；[数]齐性的，齐次的
zh_source: homogeneous 同种类的来自homogenize,同质，同质化处理。

example_sentences.en: Homogeneous risk exposure is the key tosimple public insurance
example_sentences.zh: 同质的风险承担是简单公共保险的关键

example_sentences.en: But they are not a homogeneous group , so their impact varies .
example_sentences.zh: 但是他们并不是一个同质的群体，因此，他们的影响也就各有不同。

meaning: n. 军（团），特殊兵种的部队[单位]，特种部队；兵种；全体，团体；（德国大学的）校友会
zh_source: corps 军，军团来自corp, 身体，实体。即成为一体的，军团。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Corps

example_sentences.en: Reuters / us marine corps / gunnery sgt. leo a. salinas
example_sentences.zh: 路透社/美国海军部队/炮兵中士里奥a.萨利纳斯

example_sentences.en: In the nineteen eighties , he taught english in morocco as a peace corps volunteer .
example_sentences.zh: 20世纪80年代，他曾作为和平队志愿者在摩洛哥教授英语。

meaning: n. 狂怒，喧闹

example_sentences.en: The furore thus created a problem for the party 's propagandists .
example_sentences.zh: 轰动因此为共产党宣传者们制造了一个问题。

example_sentences.en: In massachusetts , the furore that followed a supreme court ruling in 2004 has mostly subsided .
example_sentences.zh: 在马萨诸塞州，2004年那次高院的裁定所引起的轰动已经逐渐淡去了。

meaning: n. 离心机vt. 使离心，以离心机分离
zh_source: centrifuge 离心机center, 中心。-fug，逃离，见fugitive.
variation: 复数： centrifuges

example_sentences.en: Need a centrifuge to separate your dna from cellular junk ?
example_sentences.zh: 需要一台离心机从细胞碎片中分离dna吗？

example_sentences.en: A centrifuge to determine the amount of fat .
example_sentences.zh: 离心机用以确定脂肪含量。

meaning: adj. 死后的；遗腹的，死后出生的；作者死后出版的
zh_source: posthumous 死后来自拉丁语postumus,最后生的，老幺，来自post,在后，-um,最高级后缀，词源同maximum,minimum.后词义和拼写同时受humere（埋葬，入土，词源同humus）影响而俗化。

example_sentences.en: It can take innumerable forms , from buffoonery to the pursuit of posthumous fame .
example_sentences.zh: 它可以有无数表现形式，从插科打挥到追求死后的名声。

example_sentences.en: I doubt , in any case , that he was alluding to philanthropy 's posthumous pardoning power .
example_sentences.zh: 不管怎样，我猜他是在暗示慈善行为在人死后的赦免力量。

meaning: adj. 争辩的，好争辩的

example_sentences.en: India 's disputatious polity is close to ungovernable .
example_sentences.zh: 印度充满纷争的政治体系几乎无法治理。

example_sentences.en: A lively or disputatious discussion .
example_sentences.zh: 大声争论热烈的或引起争论的讨论。

meaning: adj. 缓慢的，缓步类的n. 缓步类动物，节肢动物
zh_source: tardigrade 缓足动物来自拉丁语 tardus,缓慢的，-grade,走，词源同 grade,gradual.

example_sentences.en: Unfortunately , multiple photos exist of the tardigrade .
example_sentences.zh: 不幸的是，这家伙是许多图片中都有的熊虫。

example_sentences.en: We had never heard of a tardigrade , but supposedly it 's one of the most resilient microscopic swamp-dwelling invertebrates and the inspiration for this private residence .
example_sentences.zh: 我们从没听说过缓步类动物，但据说它是恢复力最强的栖息于沼泽的无脊椎微生物之一，而且是此私人住所的灵感来源。

meaning: adj. 可怕的；极不友好的；极讨厌的；令人震惊的
zh_source: horrible 可怕的，恐怖的来自拉丁语horrere,恐惧，颤抖，词源同horror.引申词义恐怖的，可怕的。

example_sentences.en: Clooney arrested for protesting the horrible violence in sudan .
example_sentences.zh: 克鲁尼因为抗议苏丹可怕的暴力遭逮捕。

example_sentences.en: Naturally , facing pain will feel horrible and unnatural .
example_sentences.zh: 自然，直面疼痛会感到可怕与不自然。

meaning: adj. 回顾的；怀旧的；[法]有追溯力的；可追溯的n. 回顾展
variation: 复数： retrospectives

example_sentences.en: Now this is theoretical because it is based mostly on retrospective studies .
example_sentences.zh: 现在由于它主要根据回顾性研究，这只是个理论。

example_sentences.en: Recall bias happened because the study was retrospective rather than prospective .
example_sentences.zh: 发生回忆偏差是因为研究是回溯性的，而不是未来性的。

meaning: adj. 人科的n. 原人，类人动物
zh_source: hominid 人科homin-,人，-id,相似，外观。引申词义人科。

example_sentences.en: Why do I keep calling you a hominid ?
example_sentences.zh: 为什么我总是称之为原始人类？

example_sentences.en: She calculated such a hominid could have sweated up to 13.6 litres a day .
example_sentences.zh: 她估计，当时一个原始人类每天的流汗量可达13.6升。

meaning: adj. 都市化的；彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的
zh_source: urbane 练达的来自urban, 城市的，引申词义练达的。比较astute.

example_sentences.en: Even urbane foreign-ministry types are waking up to the new mood in japan .
example_sentences.zh: 甚至彬彬有礼的外交部官员都意识到了日本这种新的情绪。

example_sentences.en: Charming , persuasive and urbane , prof tufano would be hard to refuse .
example_sentences.zh: 图法诺教授有魅力、有说服力、温文尔雅，要对他说不很难。

meaning: adj. 引起反感的；可怕的；恐怖的；极讨厌的
zh_source: horrid 讨厌的，厌恶的来自拉丁语horrere,恐惧，颤抖，词源同horror.引申词义讨厌的，不友好的。

example_sentences.en: Having a weeping pa is horrid .
example_sentences.zh: 有个爱哭的私人助理很可怕。

example_sentences.en: If so , they might well have expected to make a better job of relations with the natives than had the horrid portuguese catholics .
example_sentences.zh: 如果是这样，那么他们很可能期望能和原住民建立良好的工作关系，而不像令人恐怖的葡萄牙天主教徒那样。

meaning: n. 缓慢；迟延；拖拉

example_sentences.en: Don 't believe that tardiness is out of control ?
example_sentences.zh: 迟到已经超出了人们的控制范围，不相信？

example_sentences.en: People become impatient or angry at your tardiness .
example_sentences.zh: 人们因为你的迟到而不耐烦或者生气。

meaning: n. 狂怒；[罗神]复仇三女神之一；暴怒；激怒者
zh_source: fury 狂怒来自拉丁语furia, 狂怒，狂暴。
variation: 复数： furies易混淆的单词： Fury

example_sentences.en: America 's mission in abbottabad caused fury in pakistan .
example_sentences.zh: 美国在阿伯塔巴德的任务引发了巴基斯坦的愤怒。

example_sentences.en: Islamabad reacted with fury to the attack .
example_sentences.zh: 伊斯兰堡对袭击的反应是暴怒。

meaning: n. 人，人类adj. 人的；有人性的；显示人类特有弱点的；人本性的
zh_source: human 人，人的，人类的来自拉丁语homo,人，来自homus,土，词源同humus,humble.比喻用法，即相比于神的永恒而言，人类如同尘土一般卑微的存在。参照《圣经》上帝造人或中国神话女娲造人的传说。该词本身为形容词，其名词词义人缩写自human being.
variation: 复数： humans易混淆的单词： Human

example_sentences.en: The human brain is hard-wired to recognise faces .
example_sentences.zh: 人类的大脑可以直接辨认不同的脸。

example_sentences.en: The second great threat is human .
example_sentences.zh: 第二个威胁是人类。

meaning: adj. 向心（力）的
zh_source: centripetal 向心的center, 中心。-pet, 飞向，追求，词源同feather, perpetual.

example_sentences.en: Centripetal force keeps the planets from flying off into the space .
example_sentences.zh: 由于向心力的作用，行星不能离开轨道飞人太空。

example_sentences.en: The happy blood is unable the backflow centripetal dirty .
example_sentences.zh: 幸福的血液无法回流向心脏。

meaning: adj. 可争辩的，可商榷的，有争议的

example_sentences.en: He made some very disputable claims about his record .
example_sentences.zh: 他声称创造了纪录,那可大有争议。

example_sentences.en: The question whether there is life on mars is still disputable .
example_sentences.zh: 火星是否有生命这一问题仍在争论之中。

meaning: vt. 使震惊，使感到恐怖
zh_source: horrify 惊吓，恐吓来自拉丁语horrere,恐惧，颤抖，词源同horror,-fy,使。即使恐惧，恐吓，惊吓。
variation: 第三人称单数： horrifies过去式： horrified过去分词： horrified现在分词： horrifying

example_sentences.en: Have fun and do your best to horrify your story !
example_sentences.zh: 有情趣，尽最大努力惊吓你的故事！

example_sentences.en: These are acts that will horrify civilizations .
example_sentences.zh: 这些是令文明国家震惊的行为.

meaning: adj. 迟发的

example_sentences.en: Tardive dyskinesia also is mentioned as a possible complication .
example_sentences.zh: 迟发性运动障碍也作为可能的并发症被写入其中。

example_sentences.en: An association study on catechol-o-methyltransferase ( comt ) gene polymorphism and tardive dyskinesia .
example_sentences.zh: 基因多态性；迟发性运动障碍；关联研究。

meaning: adj. 仁爱的，慈善的；高尚的
zh_source: humane 人道的来自human的拼写变体，并于18世纪开始产生词义的差别。

example_sentences.en: They simply have to do it in a more humane style .
example_sentences.zh: 他们只是不得不采取更为人道的方式。

example_sentences.en: The work may be humane , but rampant overtime is not .
example_sentences.zh: 工作本身并非毫无人道，但缺少约束的加班绝对缺乏人性。

meaning: vt. 授予，颁与；比较，对照vi. 商议，磋商
zh_source: confer 商谈，协商，授予，颁发1.商谈，来自con-, 强调，-fer, 谈话，交谈，来自PIE*bha, 说，词源同confab, phone, for(拉丁词，说，讲)。 2.con-, 强调。-fer, 携带，词源同bring, infer. 指带来，授予。
variation: 第三人称单数： confers过去式： conferred过去分词： conferred现在分词： conferring易混淆的单词： Confer

example_sentences.en: These are the memories that confer your individuality .
example_sentences.zh: 这些记忆赋予你自我的个性。

example_sentences.en: But the point of shares is that they confer ownership .
example_sentences.zh: 但是股票的意义就在于他们将股票所有权授予了持有人。

meaning: n. 眼镜；奇观，壮观；光景，景象；表演，场面
zh_source: spectacle 眼镜，精彩表演，壮观场面来自拉丁语 spectaculum,表演，来自 spectare,观看，观赏，反复格于 specere,看，注视，-ct, 过去分词格，此处表反复，词源同 spectator,aspect.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 复数： spectacles

example_sentences.en: But this was only the foreground spectacle .
example_sentences.zh: 不过这只是台上的景象而已。

example_sentences.en: This is a moving spectacle .
example_sentences.zh: 这是一个感人的场面。

meaning: adj. 包括的，包罗广泛的；包括…的；一切开支包括在内的；（语言使用上）不分男女的
zh_source: inclusive 全包的来自include,包含。

example_sentences.en: Cambridge university has an inclusive design programme .
example_sentences.zh: 剑桥大学有一个包容性的设计项目。

example_sentences.en: Comedy makes us more inclusive of others and helps us see the big picture .
example_sentences.zh: 喜剧可以让我们对他人更有包容性，帮助我们看到全面的情况。

meaning: vt.& vi. 辩论，争论vt. 就…进行争论，辩论；对…的真实或有效进行争论，怀疑；争夺，竞争；抵抗，抵制n. 辩论；争端；（劳资）纠纷；罢工vi. 激烈争辩；争执；争吵；吵架
zh_source: dispute 争论dis-, 分开，散开。-put, 思考，词源同compute, putative. 即不同的思考，引申词义争论。
variation: 复数： disputes第三人称单数： disputes过去式： disputed过去分词： disputed现在分词： disputing

example_sentences.en: He referred the dispute to the board of directors .
example_sentences.zh: 他将这件纠纷转给董事会处理。

example_sentences.en: The dispute puts further pressure on the thai prime minister .
example_sentences.zh: 这场争论给颂猜总理更大的压力。

meaning: adj. 默认的

example_sentences.en: She 'd been of the reluctantly acquiescent school .
example_sentences.zh: 她已经成了不情愿默认派。

example_sentences.en: He is of the acquiescent rather than the militant type .
example_sentences.zh: 他是属于认命的而不是好斗的那一类型。

meaning: n. 厌恶女人；厌女癖
adj. 行动缓慢的； 缓缓移动的；晚的； 迟的
zh_source: tardy 缓慢的，迟缓的来自拉丁语 tardus,缓慢的，词源同 retard.
variation: 比较级： tardier最高级： tardiest易混淆的单词： Tardy

example_sentences.en: And they were tardy in entering emerging markets .
example_sentences.zh: 在进入新兴市场方面，他们总是表现的很迟缓。

example_sentences.en: Nonetheless , her government 's response has been criticised as tardy and ineffective .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管如此，人们批评英拉政府的挽救措施迟缓且不起作用。

meaning: adj. 场面富丽的，壮观的；引人注意的；惊动一时的；惊人的n. 壮观的场面，精彩的表演；〈美〉一小时半以上的大场面电视节目；特大霓虹灯广告
zh_source: spectacular 精彩的，壮观的spectacle,精彩表演，壮观场面，-ar,形容词后缀。
variation: 复数： spectaculars

example_sentences.en: Beyond canary wharf are the rather spectacular royal docks .
example_sentences.zh: 在金丝雀码头后面是非常壮观的皇家码头。

example_sentences.en: Specialist managers are gathering assets and fees at spectacular rates .
example_sentences.zh: 一些专业基金管理公司正以惊人的速度聚集着资产、赚取服务费。

meaning: vt. 使神秘化；使迷惑；使困惑
zh_source: mystify 迷惑，使糊涂来自mystery,神秘，-fy,使。即神秘，引申词义使迷惑，使糊涂。

example_sentences.en: Figuring out how to adjust for inflation can mystify some investors , although the internet now offers several web sites that quickly adjust numbers for inflation and some mutual funds and independent mutual-fund analysis services calculate returns adjusted for fees and taxes .
example_sentences.zh: 要搞清楚如何对通货膨胀进行调整可能令一些投资者感到困惑，不过现在互联网上有几个网站可以迅速对数字进行通货膨胀率的调整，一些共同基金和独立的共同基金分析服务也计算经费用和税收调整后的回报率。

meaning: vt.& vi. 专心于；注意；集中；聚集vt. 浓缩，（使）浓缩；[采矿]汰选；选矿，精选，富集vi. 凝缩，浓缩，提纯n. 浓缩物adj. 集中起来的，经过浓缩的
zh_source: concentrate 集中con-, 强调。-center, 中心。
variation: 第三人称单数： concentrates过去式： concentrated过去分词： concentrated现在分词： concentrating

example_sentences.en: They make it beguilingly easy to concentrate risk .
example_sentences.zh: 以上几点使得风险极易集中。

example_sentences.en: Rather concentrate on making british universities as good as possible .
example_sentences.zh: 倒不如集中精力把英国大学越办越好。

meaning: n. 恐怖，可怕的事物；嫌恶，痛恨；讨厌的人或事；〈口〉非常丑恶
zh_source: horror 厌恶，恐惧来自拉丁语horrere,因恐惧而毛发竖立，颤抖，来自PIE*ghers,竖立的毛发，硬毛，词源同hair.引申词义厌恶，恐惧。
variation: 复数： horrors

example_sentences.en: Terrorist attacks are a monthly rather than daily horror .
example_sentences.zh: 恐怖袭击已降低到每月发生，代替了每天的恐惧。

example_sentences.en: Similar horror stories are unfolding almost everywhere .
example_sentences.zh: 同样恐怖的事几乎到处都有。

meaning: n. 死尸，尸体
zh_source: corpse 死尸来自词根corp，身体，见corporeal.
variation: 复数： corpses

example_sentences.en: Mrs merkel may find herself governing with a political corpse .
example_sentences.zh: 默克尔可能发现自己以一具政治尸体施政。

example_sentences.en: Plus , most pathogens can 't survive long in a corpse .
example_sentences.zh: 而且，绝大多数病原体无法在尸体内存活很长时间。

meaning: n. 会议；讨论；（正式）讨论会；[工会、工党用语]（每年的）大会vi. 举行或参加（系列）会议
zh_source: conference 会议来自confer, 商谈。
variation: 复数： conferences

example_sentences.en: Google voice will also offer free conference calls .
example_sentences.zh: google语音也提供免费的电话会议。

example_sentences.en: But he was the most talked-about feature of the conference .
example_sentences.zh: 但他是这次大会最受热议的嘉宾。

meaning: adj. 非人的，不近人情的；残忍的，野蛮的；无人性的；不人道
zh_source: inhuman 非人的，恐怖的in-,不，非，human,人。

example_sentences.en: C. torture and other cruel , inhuman , or degrading treatment or punishment
example_sentences.zh: 酷刑和其他残忍的、不人道的或有辱人格的待遇或惩罚

example_sentences.en: The inhuman orders of the polish command caused the protest of some polish officers .
example_sentences.zh: 波兰司令部惨无人道的命令招致一些波兰军官的抗议。

meaning: vt. 使不安，使烦恼；使不平静n. 忧虑；不安；内心不平静；烦恼
zh_source: disquiet 不安dis-, 不，非，使相反。quiet, 安静。
variation: 复数： disquiets第三人称单数： disquiets过去式： disquieted过去分词： disquieted现在分词： disquieting

example_sentences.en: Either way , a degree of public disquiet seems certain .
example_sentences.zh: 无论哪种方式，公众不安总是存在的。

example_sentences.en: China ready to quell disquiet over new environmental policies
example_sentences.zh: 中国准备好了消除关于新的环境政策的忧虑

meaning: vt. 解除武装，废除军备；使非军事化
zh_source: demilitarize 去军事化de-, 不，非，使相反。militarize, 军事化。
variation: 第三人称单数： demilitarizes过去式： demilitarized过去分词： demilitarized现在分词： demilitarizing

example_sentences.en: The peacekeepers are supposed to help the lebanese army demilitarize southern lebanon and stop the flow of weapons to hezbollah .
example_sentences.zh: 这些维和部队期望能够帮助黎巴嫩军队来解除在黎巴嫩南部的真主党武装和阻止那些向真主党运输武器的国家。

example_sentences.en: Ma has proposed a peace treaty that would demilitarize the strait , and said he would ease restrictions on investments in the mainland .
example_sentences.zh: 马已经准备好了一份旨在促进海峡两岸非军事化的和平协议，此外他还表示将对到大陆的投资放宽限制。

meaning: adj. 同一中心的，同轴的adv. 同一中心地，同轴地

example_sentences.en: These threats can be described in four concentric rings .
example_sentences.zh: 这些威胁可以说是四个同心圆。

example_sentences.en: Place a picture of concentric circles a few feet away and stare at it .
example_sentences.zh: 在离自己几英尺远的地方挂一张画有同心圆的图，注视着这张图。

meaning: vt. 减少，减轻；[法]取消法令，作废vi. 减轻；失效n. 减轻；折扣
variation: 第三人称单数： abates过去式： abated过去分词： abated现在分词： abating易混淆的单词： Abate

example_sentences.en: Li 's drive did not abate abroad .
example_sentences.zh: 在国外，李祥林的干劲并没有减弱。

example_sentences.en: The demands of the north will not abate .
example_sentences.zh: 北方的需求不会减少。

meaning: n. 给予，商量，授予
variation: 复数： conferments

example_sentences.en: Conferment ceremony of rector emeritus and academic council chairman emeritus .
example_sentences.zh: 授予庄善裕教授永远荣誉校长暨秦达德教授学术委员会永。

example_sentences.en: Nctu and overseas university collaborative degree conferment regulations .
example_sentences.zh: 国立交通大学与国外大学合作颁授学位办法。

meaning: n. 一夫多妻制；[植]多雌蕊；多偶婚
zh_source: polygyny 一夫多妻制poly-,多，复，聚，-gyn,女人，词源同queen,gynecology.

example_sentences.en: Most women benefit from polygyny , while most men benefit from monogamy
example_sentences.zh: 大多数女人在一夫多妻制中受益，而大多数男人在一夫一妻制中受益。

example_sentences.en: So polygyny increases competitive pressure on men , especially young men of low status .
example_sentences.zh: 所以，一夫多妻导致男人们之间的竞争加剧，特别是社会地位较低的青壮年。

meaning: adj. 灵巧的；精巧的；设计独特的；有天才的，聪明的
zh_source: ingenious 灵巧的，精巧的来自拉丁语ingenium,天生的品质，能力，来自in-,进入，使，内在，-gen,生育，出生，词源同gene,engine.即出生就具有的，后引申词义陪明的，灵巧的，精巧的。

example_sentences.en: The buildings displayed ingenious adaptations to galle 's balmy climate .
example_sentences.zh: 这些建筑展示出了对加勒温和气候的巧妙适应。

example_sentences.en: Turning that ingenious fiction into a viable reality is another matter altogether .
example_sentences.zh: 把那精巧的小说变成可行的现实完全是另一回事。

meaning: n. 秘密，谜；神秘，神秘的事物；推理小说，推理剧；常作 mysteries 秘技，秘诀
zh_source: mystery 神秘，奥秘来自希腊语mysterion,神秘的仪式，神秘的教条，来自mystes,开悟的人，神点化的人，通灵的人，巫师，来自myein,关闭，合眼，合嘴，词源同mute,myopia.可能来自巫师做法时的神态。原带有强烈的宗教色彩，后词义通用化，引申词义神秘，奥秘。

example_sentences.en: The remoteness and mystery of the place stoked my curiosity .
example_sentences.zh: 这些遥远而神秘的地方撩拨着我的好奇心。

example_sentences.en: The nature , the timing and the conditions attached to that help is the main mystery here .
example_sentences.zh: 救助的性质、时机和附加条件是其中最大的秘密。

meaning: n. 不安，焦虑

example_sentences.en: Make the person generates the sentiment of be agitated impulse , mind inquietude .
example_sentences.zh: 使人产生烦躁冲动的情绪，心神不宁。

example_sentences.en: The world does not have sincere letter inquietude , the country does not have sincere letter flabby , course of study does not have sincere letter not flourishing , the home is on bad terms without sincere letter , civilian do not stand without sincere letter , guan mocheng letter is disloyal .
example_sentences.zh: 世无诚信不宁,国无诚信不稳,业无诚信不旺,家无诚信不和,民无诚信不立,官无诚信不忠。

meaning: adj. 古怪的，异常的；偏离轨道的；离心的n. 古怪的人；[物]偏心轮
zh_source: eccentric 古怪的ec-, 向外，同ex-. center, 中心。原为天文学术语，远离轨道的，后指人古怪。
variation: 复数： eccentrics

example_sentences.en: I was happy about loeffler 's eccentric crushes .
example_sentences.zh: 我对吕弗勒古怪的爱好感到高兴。

example_sentences.en: Galton , however , should not be dismissed as an eccentric .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管如此，高尔顿还是不应该被视为一个古怪的人。

meaning: n. 战斗性，交战状态

example_sentences.en: But the army says militancy is down to a " subcritical " level .
example_sentences.zh: 但是军队称交战状态已经降到“临界点以下”的等级。

example_sentences.en: The league is well known for its militancy .
example_sentences.zh: 这联合会以好战闻名。

meaning: adj. （指人或人的身体）肥胖的；便便
zh_source: corpulent 发福的来自词根corp，身体，见corporeal. 此处用于比喻义，长身体的，长粗壮的。

example_sentences.en: He was fifty or there abouts and was corpulent and tall in person .
example_sentences.zh: 他大约50岁，身体肥胖高大。

example_sentences.en: It 's not surprising that the sight of a corpulent or pregnant woman would have caused their brains to light up with pleasure and attention .
example_sentences.zh: 肥胖的妇女或孕妇雕像，会让他们的大脑充满快乐和关注，这没什么可奇怪的。

meaning: n. （警察武器）警棍；（乐队指挥用的）指挥棒；接力棒
zh_source: baton 警棍来自法语。bat, 马鞍，同bast. 可能指赶马的棍子，后指警棍。
variation: 复数： batons易混淆的单词： Baton

example_sentences.en: But the dealmaking baton was about to pass from strategic bidders to the new breed of private equity groups .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，交易撮合的接力棒即将从战略收购者传到一批新的私人股本集团手中。

example_sentences.en: The moment has come for emerging powers to seize the baton and assume our legitimate share of international responsibilities .
example_sentences.zh: 新兴大国的机会已经来临，他们要拿过接力棒，夺取我们在国际责任中的合法份额。

meaning: n. 减湿器
zh_source: dehumidifier 除湿机de-, 不，非，使相反。humidifier, 加湿机。即除湿。

example_sentences.en: How to choose the best dehumidifier
example_sentences.zh: 如何选用最适合的除湿器？

example_sentences.en: Testing and modeling of a cross-cooled dehumidifier .
example_sentences.zh: 交叉冷却式除湿器之性能测试与分析。

meaning: n. 静止

example_sentences.en: This results in alternating periods of quiescence and activity - remarkably like the build-up and collapse of a sand pile .
example_sentences.zh: 这会导致变换的静止和活动的周期－与沙堆的堆砌和崩塌非常相像。

example_sentences.en: Precursory quiescence and recovery ofaftershock activity before some large aftershocks .
example_sentences.zh: 一些强余震前余震活动的前兆性平静和恢复。

meaning: n. 动力学、力学；（音乐中的）力度变化；力度强弱法；动态；动力( dynamic的名词复数 )；力学；力度；活力
variation: 易混淆的单词： Dynamics

example_sentences.en: Our emotional lives and our spiritual lives have different dynamics .
example_sentences.zh: 我们的情感生活和灵性生活具有不同的动力。

example_sentences.en: Start with the bond-market dynamics .
example_sentences.zh: 首先是债券市场的动态。

meaning: adj. 神秘的，奥秘的；同mystic；神奇
zh_source: mystical 神秘的来自mystery,神秘。

example_sentences.en: Maybe such pairs simply obey their own mystical pattern .
example_sentences.zh: 也许这种“成对”组合只是在遵守自己的神秘模式。

example_sentences.en: Perhaps most worryingly , many in japan appear to believe the country has nothing to fall back on if manufacturing fails ; that its workers are uniquely suited to monozukuri , the almost mystical concept of " making things " .
example_sentences.zh: 或许最令人担忧的是，日本的许多人似乎相信，如果制造业没落，日本将再无可依靠；日本工人独一无二地适合“造物”（monozukuri）一种近乎神秘的“造物”理念。

meaning: n. 观众，旁观者
zh_source: spectator 观众spectate,观看，观赏，-or,人。
variation: 复数： spectators

example_sentences.en: You are not sure if the spectator is male or female .
example_sentences.zh: 你搞不清楚这位观众是男是女。

example_sentences.en: What a privilege to be a spectator during that process .
example_sentences.zh: 能够成为那过程的旁观者可真是种荣幸。

meaning: adj. 清静的；僻静的；不起眼的；不激动的vt.& vi. 安静下来，使…安静，平静vt. 减轻（病痛、疑虑、恐惧等）；[法律]确定（产权等）prep. 克制的，稳重的，不张扬的n. 宁静；寂静adv. 安静地，平静地
zh_source: quiet 安静的来自拉丁语quies,静止，平和，休息，来自PIE*kweie,休息，安静，词源同while,quit.
variation: 第三人称单数： quiets过去式： quieted过去分词： quieted现在分词： quieting比较级： quieter最高级： quietest易混淆的单词： QuIETQUIET

example_sentences.en: And I promise to be very quiet .
example_sentences.zh: 并且我保证我将会很安静。

example_sentences.en: A quiet sun causes its own problems .
example_sentences.zh: 太阳活动平静也会造成麻烦。

meaning: n. （陆军的）一营（大约有一千兵士）；大军，部队；（组织在一起工作的）队伍；大批，许多，大量
zh_source: battalion 营词源同beat, 击，打。此处指打战的队伍。
variation: 复数： battalions

example_sentences.en: Joseph signed on to work for a battalion in baghdad .
example_sentences.zh: 约瑟夫签约受雇于在巴格达的一个陆军营。

example_sentences.en: Marines with battalion 1 / 8 kick back in the transit tent of forward operating base edinburgh .
example_sentences.zh: 1/8大队的海军陆战队员返回爱丁堡前方作战基地的中转帐篷。

meaning: vt. 除湿，使干燥

example_sentences.en: This is the working principle of air-conditioners to dehumidify .
example_sentences.zh: 这就是空调器能除湿的工作原理。

example_sentences.en: Chengdu serves as southern city , the condition of laid floor is close friends than northern city , basically adopt the method such as ventilated , dehumidify can .
example_sentences.zh: 成都作为南方城市，铺设地板的条件比北方城市要好，主要采取通风、除湿等方法即可。

meaning: n. 炸药；具有爆炸性的事物，有潜在危险的人；引起轰动的人(或物vt. 破坏，炸毁；装炸药adj. 极好的
zh_source: dynamite 炸药来自希腊语dynamis, 力量，权力，统治者。瑞典化学家诺贝尔借用该词来指炸药。
variation: 复数： dynamites第三人称单数： dynamites过去式： dynamited过去分词： dynamited现在分词： dynamiting易混淆的单词： Dynamite

example_sentences.en: His most famous invention is dynamite .
example_sentences.zh: 他最为人所知的发明是炸药。

example_sentences.en: Should there be restrictions on whom they sell such financial dynamite to ?
example_sentences.zh: 那么，是否应该对银行销售这类金融炸药进行限制？

meaning: vt. 堵塞；阻隔；吸收（气体）
zh_source: occlude 堵塞oc-,向前，朝向，-clud,关闭，词源同close,conclude.引申词义堵塞。
variation: 第三人称单数： occludes过去式： occluded过去分词： occluded现在分词： occluding

example_sentences.en: Occluding or tending to occlude .
example_sentences.zh: 封闭的封闭的或倾向于封闭的。

example_sentences.en: The use of a self made airway occlude in bronchoscopic lung volume reduction .
example_sentences.zh: 自制气道封堵器在经支气管镜肺减容术中的应用。

meaning: vt. 释放；放开；发布；发行n. 释放，排放，解除；释放令；公映的新影片，发布的新闻[消息]
zh_source: release 释放，松开，解雇，公布来自古法语 relaissier,relesser,遗留，离开，留下，来自拉丁语 relaxare,松开，松手，re-,向后， 离开，laxare,松开，词源同 lax,relax.引申诸相关词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： releases过去式： released过去分词： released现在分词： releasing

example_sentences.en: It helps quiet the mind and release anxious thoughts .
example_sentences.zh: 它有助于平静思想和释放意念。

example_sentences.en: We expect to release the new product in december .
example_sentences.zh: 我们希望能在12月发布新产品。

meaning: n. 细胞，血球，小体
zh_source: corpuscle 红血球来自词根corp，身体，见corporeal. -cle, 小词后缀。
variation: 复数： corpuscles

example_sentences.en: Objective to prepare the liquefier of kx-21automatic digital corpuscle count instrument .
example_sentences.zh: 目的研制适用于kx-21全自动电子血细胞计数仪的稀释液。

example_sentences.en: This is a normal lymph corpuscle .
example_sentences.zh: 这是真的淋巴球。

meaning: n. 平静，寂静
zh_source: quietude 安静，寂静来自quiet,安静的，静止的，-ude,名词后缀。

example_sentences.en: The only thing the mind hears all day is clanging bells and noise and argument , and all it wants is quietude .
example_sentences.zh: 头脑整天只听见叮叮当当的钟声、噪音，和争辩，但它只渴望平静。

example_sentences.en: Despite hosting regional media-giant , al jazeera -- known to many as the voice of the arab revolutions -- qatar has remained the picture of quietude over the past few months .
example_sentences.zh: 尽管是半岛电视台（因传达阿拉伯革命的声音而众所周知）的所在地，过去几个月里的卡塔尔依然一如既往的平静。

meaning: n. 精力充沛的人；[物]发电机
variation: 复数： dynamos易混淆的单词： DYNAMO

example_sentences.en: When electric dynamos were first introduced , the steam engine would be ripped out and the dynamo would replace it .
example_sentences.zh: 在发电机刚刚面世的时候，人们拆掉了蒸汽机，用发电机取而代之。

example_sentences.en: Her husband phil , also 63 , is a different kind of dynamo .
example_sentences.zh: 她的丈夫菲尔同样63岁，同样是个精力充沛的人。

meaning: adj. 斗志昂扬的，富于战斗性的；激进的，好战的；战斗中的，交战中的；好斗者n. 激进分子，好斗分子；富有战斗精神的人，斗士
zh_source: militant 好斗者，好战的，激进的来自military,军事的，军队的，-ant,人。引申词义好斗者，好战的，激进的等。

example_sentences.en: Many consider it the forerunner of modern militant islamism .
example_sentences.zh: 多数人将其视为现代好战伊斯兰教的先驱。

example_sentences.en: Pakistani officials said the air attack hit a militant hideout near the afghan border .
example_sentences.zh: 巴基斯坦官员表示，这次空袭击中了阿富汗边境附近一个好战分子藏身之处。

meaning: n. 闭塞，锢囚锋；咬合；堵塞

example_sentences.en: Diagram of carotid circulation indicating sites of vessel narrowing and occlusion .
example_sentences.zh: 显示血管狭窄和闭塞处的颈动脉循环图

example_sentences.en: Imaging tests can reveal signs of vascular occlusion requiring operation .
example_sentences.zh: 影像学检查能够揭示血管闭塞需要手术的征象。

meaning: vt. 组成公司；包含；使混合；使具体化vi. 包含；吸收；合并；混合
zh_source: incorporate 吸收，并入in-,进入，使，corporate,共同的，全体的，公司的。
variation: 第三人称单数： incorporates过去式： incorporated过去分词： incorporated现在分词： incorporating

example_sentences.en: Analysing the consequences of any policy must incorporate how bad luck may skew the outcome .
example_sentences.zh: 对任何一项政策所引起的结果的分析都必须包含噩运对结果的影响。

example_sentences.en: Mr cooper thinks it feasible to incorporate unique human search strategies in rosetta or other algorithmic approaches .
example_sentences.zh: 库帕先生打算将这种包含了人类独一无二的搜索策略应用到罗赛特软件或者其他算法途径。

meaning: n. 偿清；解除；寂灭；死
zh_source: quietus 寂灭，解脱来自quiet,安静的，静止的，-us,名词后缀。委婉语，即安静或平和的死去。
variation: 复数： quietuses

example_sentences.en: The police gave the villain his quietus .
example_sentences.zh: 警察结果了那坏蛋的性命。

example_sentences.en: After a quietus of twenty years she returned .
example_sentences.zh: 她隐退二十年后又东山再起。

meaning: vt.& vi. 连续猛击；捣碎，打烂；磨损；使内倾，使倾斜n. （铅字的）磨损，毁损；（用鸡蛋、牛奶、面粉等调成的）糊状物；击球员，击球手；墙面的倾斜
zh_source: batter 连续猛击词源同beat, 击，打。-er, 表反复。
variation: 复数： batters第三人称单数： batters过去式： battered过去分词： battered现在分词： battering易混淆的单词： Batter

example_sentences.en: A baseball deliberately thrown at the batter 's head .
example_sentences.zh: 投球手有意投向击球手头部的球。

example_sentences.en: She somehow resisted the temptation to eat the batter .
example_sentences.zh: 不知什么原因，她甚至能控制住冲动不去吃面糊。

meaning: n. 坏名声；不光彩；声名狼藉
zh_source: disrepute 不敬dis-, 不，非，使相反。repute, 尊敬，声望。

example_sentences.en: The night was a place populated by people of disrepute - criminals , prostitutes and drunks .
example_sentences.zh: 夜晚是那些声名狼藉者罪犯、妓女和醉汉的乐园。

example_sentences.en: But this ruse , if ever legitimate , has now fallen into disrepute .
example_sentences.zh: 但是，这个计策，如果曾合法过，现在已经被视为不光彩的行为。

meaning: vt. 使推迟；使延期；拖延，推迟；[军]使延期入伍vi. 服从；延期；推迟
zh_source: defer 推迟，延迟defer 遵从，顺从de-, 分开，散开。-fer, 拿，带，词源同bring, infer. 即分散开，引申义推迟，延迟。de-, 向下，离开。-fer, 拿，带，词源同bring, infer. 即拿走，转移，词义引申为转交，遵从，顺从。
variation: 第三人称单数： defers过去式： deferred过去分词： deferred现在分词： deferring

example_sentences.en: You can either delegate them , or defer them .
example_sentences.zh: 你可以把它们委托出去，或者推迟它们。

example_sentences.en: Multinationals can generally defer paying tax to their home governments by retaining profit earned abroad in their foreign units .
example_sentences.zh: 跨国公司大多通过从保留从国外挣的利润汇回国内从而尽量延迟他们在国内上税。

meaning: adj. 天真无邪的，朴实的；坦率的
zh_source: ingenuous 天真无邪的，天真的，单纯的来自拉丁语ingenuus,天生的，出生高贵的，来自in-,进入，使，内在，-gen,生育，出生，词源同gene,gentle.原指出生高贵的，后引申词义真诚的，天真无邪的，但现在多用于贬义天真的，单纯的。

example_sentences.en: His attitude towards the students is very ingenuous .
example_sentences.zh: 他对学生的态度非常坦率。

example_sentences.en: She is too ingenuous in believing what others say .
example_sentences.zh: 她太天真，轻信别人的话。

meaning: adj. 潮湿的；湿气重的；湿润的；温湿
zh_source: humid 湿热的来自拉丁语humid,湿的，使湿润，来自PIE*wegw,湿的，词源同humor.引申词义湿热的。

example_sentences.en: Glasses and camera lenses can also suffer in humid conditions .
example_sentences.zh: 眼镜和照相机的镜头也常常在潮湿的情况下模糊不清。

example_sentences.en: Outside , the sun beats mercilessly down in the humid air .
example_sentences.zh: 外面，太阳在潮湿的空气中无情地照射着。

meaning: n. 王朝的君主，统治者（尤指世袭的）

example_sentences.en: The case study here is robert mondavi , the californian wine dynast .
example_sentences.zh: 加州葡萄酒大王罗伯特蒙达维（robertmondavi）就是一例。

example_sentences.en: As cities boom and village voters seek education , jobs off the farm and more responsive government , the most privileged dynast will find it hard to laud meritocracy and the most media-shy politician to praise transparency .
example_sentences.zh: 当城市繁荣，农村的选民寻求教育，非农业就业以及更负责任的政府时，最具特权的王朝会发现赞美精英统治以及让媒体前羞涩的政治家去倡导透明是十分困难的。

meaning: adj. 军事的；军用的；讨厌的；好战的n. 军人；军队；武装力量
zh_source: military 军事的，军队的来自拉丁语militaris,战士的，战争的，来自miles,战士，可能来自希腊语homilos,集会人群，队伍，来自PIE*sem,一，一起，词源同same,assembly.

example_sentences.en: But reed also advocates a balanced look at military leadership .
example_sentences.zh: 不过，里德也提倡人们用公正的眼光看待军队的领导。

example_sentences.en: Unverified assertions that the company is " linked " to the chinese military appear regularly in news articles .
example_sentences.zh: 关于华为有中国军方背景的传言经常见诸报端。

meaning: adj. 无实体的，无形的，非物质的；无影无形
zh_source: incorporeal 无形的in-,不，非，corporeal,有形的。

example_sentences.en: Something that exists , especially a spiritual or incorporeal entity .
example_sentences.zh: 精神存在的某物，尤指精神的或无形的存在。

example_sentences.en: Element of incorporeal spacing design of the interior construction .
example_sentences.zh: 论建筑内部空间的非实体设计要素。

meaning: vt. 阻止；排除；妨碍
zh_source: preclude 阻止pre-,在前，-clud,关闭，词源同close,conclude.

meaning: adj. 无学的，无知的

example_sentences.en: Love is changeable , harmful , uncontrolled , nescient , yeasty and nonsensical .
example_sentences.zh: 爱是易变的、有毒的、不受控制的、无知的、浅薄的以及无意义的。

meaning: n. 王朝；朝代
zh_source: dynasty 朝代来自希腊语dynamis, 力量，权力，统治者。引申词义朝代。
variation: 复数： dynasties

example_sentences.en: The al maktoum dynasty has ruled dubai since 1833 .
example_sentences.zh: 阿勒马克图姆王朝自1833年起开始统治迪拜。

example_sentences.en: The first is that there has been almost total impunity both for the grasping dynasty and the torturing soldiers who guarded it .
example_sentences.zh: 第一是无论是这贪得无厌的朝代还是保卫它的残酷的士兵们，几乎完全没有受到惩罚。

meaning: vt.& vi. 与…作战；争斗n. 战争，战役；比赛，较量；长期论战或长期作战；激烈的竞争
zh_source: battle 战斗词源同beat, 击，打。-le, 表反复。
variation: 复数： battles第三人称单数： battles过去式： battled过去分词： battled现在分词： battling易混淆的单词： Battle

example_sentences.en: Israel fought a desperate battle for survival .
example_sentences.zh: 以色列为生存而进行殊死战斗。

example_sentences.en: They are fighting an uphill battle against corruption .
example_sentences.zh: 他们正在打一场反腐败的攻坚战。

meaning: n. 增湿器，湿润器，湿度调节器
zh_source: humidifier 加湿器humid,湿的，-fy,使。即使湿润的机器。
variation: 复数： humidifiers

example_sentences.en: Your doctor may recommend a humidifier to moisten your indoor air .
example_sentences.zh: 医生或会建议在室内使用空气加湿器。

example_sentences.en: We switch to formula , replace matthew 's bed linens , and start using a humidifier in his room .
example_sentences.zh: 我们换了婴儿食品，又换马修的床上用品，并且开始在他的房间里面使用增湿器。

meaning: vt. 思索，猜测，推测vi. 投机；推测；思索
zh_source: speculate 推测，猜测，投机，炒股来自拉丁语 speculari,看，观察，来自 specere,看，观察，词源同 spectate,aspect.引申诸相关 词义。
variation: 第三人称单数： speculates过去式： speculated过去分词： speculated现在分词： speculating

example_sentences.en: Observers speculate that disney may become a major backer .
example_sentences.zh: 观察员推测，迪斯尼可能会成为主要赞助商。

example_sentences.en: Some speculate that it would be used for espionage activity .
example_sentences.zh: 一些人猜测，领事馆将被用于间谍活动。

meaning: adj. 无所不知的
zh_source: omniscient 全知全能的omni-,全，总，-sci,知道，知晓，词源同science.引申词义全能的。

example_sentences.en: We need to stop that , to stop pretending to be omniscient beings .
example_sentences.zh: 我们需要停止那些，停止假装是一个无所不知的人。

example_sentences.en: Still , his omniscient style is reminiscent of the very men he chastises .
example_sentences.zh: 即便如此，他那无所不知的笔触却恰恰让人联想起他所谴责之人。

meaning: n. 迂回的话语；托词；累赘的话；累赘的说法
zh_source: circumlocution 迂回说法circum-,圈，周围，-loc,说，见locution,colloquy.
variation: 复数： cir-cumlocutions易混淆的单词： Circumlocution

example_sentences.en: With typical circumlocution , king abdullah of saudi arabia recently said as much .
example_sentences.zh: 沙特的阿卜杜拉国王最近也同样语意婉转说了不少。

example_sentences.en: Under the market economy , the genius of the republic of letters was increasingly fickle , the literary spirit deviated and descended , creative writing displayed circumlocution and speedy commercialization .
example_sentences.zh: 在市场经济条件下，文坛风气日益浮躁，文学精神变异沉沦，文学创作日趋边缘化，文学作品快速商品化。

meaning: vi. 不同，相异；不同意，意见相左；争吵
zh_source: differ 不同dis-, 分开，不同。-fer, 携带，含有，词源同bring, infer. 即不同的，分开的。
variation: 第三人称单数： differs过去式： differed过去分词： differed现在分词： differing

example_sentences.en: The legal implications of this differ across countries .
example_sentences.zh: 在不同国家有其不同的法律含义。

example_sentences.en: Even molecules that differ by a single atom can vibrate quite differently .
example_sentences.zh: 即使只相差一个原子的分子也会有差别很大的振动。

meaning: vt. 把（错误等）归咎于
zh_source: impute 归因于，归咎于im-,进入，使，-put,考虑，思考，计算，词源同compute,repute.即经过考虑的，引申词义归因于，归咎于。
variation: 第三人称单数： imputes过去式： imputed过去分词： imputed现在分词： imputing

example_sentences.en: Blessed the man to whom the lord will not impute sin .
example_sentences.zh: 主不算为有罪的，这人是有福的。

example_sentences.en: The statisticians " impute " an implicit rent , based on what similar homes fetch on the rental market .
example_sentences.zh: 统计学家们将原因“归咎于”房子隐含的租金，租金依据租赁市场上类似房子的租价来计算。

meaning: n. 格斗，搏斗，战斗；〈美〉竞赛，比赛；论战vt. 与…战斗；与…斗争；防止；减轻
zh_source: combat 战斗com-, 强调。-bat, 击，打，词源同beat, batter.
variation: 复数： combats第三人称单数： combats过去式： combated过去分词： combated现在分词： combating

example_sentences.en: The upper yellow and red pennant means combat readiness .
example_sentences.zh: 上面的黄红相间的信号旗表示战斗准备就绪。

example_sentences.en: Insisting on real names is supposed to combat spam .
example_sentences.zh: 坚持实名制本来是为了对抗垃圾邮件的。

meaning: vt. 使潮湿
variation: 第三人称单数： humidifies过去式： humidified过去分词： humidified现在分词： humidifying

example_sentences.en: The seawater greenhouse uses seawater to cool and humidify greenhouses and to convert sufficient humidity back in to fresh water to irrigate the crops .
example_sentences.zh: 海水温室采用海水使得温室比较凉快潮湿，还把盐水变成淡水来灌溉农作物。

example_sentences.en: The effect is achieved by trickling seawater over porous cardboard screens -- called evaporators -- which cool and humidify the dry desert air , creating a favorable growing environment for crops .
example_sentences.zh: 它是通过把海水渗透过多孔的卡纸实现的，我们称这种卡纸为蒸馏器，它能够冷却干燥的沙漠空气并增加湿度，为农作物创造一个适宜的生长环境。

meaning: adj. 口语的，会话的
zh_source: colloquial 口语的col-, 强调。-loq, 说话，词源同locution, loquacious.

example_sentences.en: The system understands multiple , colloquial forms of a question .
example_sentences.zh: 这个系统能够理解一个问题的多种问法以及口语表达形式。

example_sentences.en: Notice that final colloquial phrase , " to go . "
example_sentences.zh: 注意到最后一句口语化的短语“去吧”

meaning: n. 渡船；渡口；摆渡；用船渡运vt. 航海；渡运；（乘渡船）渡过（河等）vi. 摆渡
zh_source: ferry 渡船来自PIE*per, 向前，穿过，词源forth , fort. 引申词义渡船。
variation: 复数： ferries第三人称单数： ferries过去式： ferried过去分词： ferried现在分词： ferrying易混淆的单词： Ferry

example_sentences.en: I took the ferry to staten island and campaigned there .
example_sentences.zh: 我乘坐渡轮到斯塔滕岛进行竞选宣传。

example_sentences.en: After the crash , the ferry continued to its destination .
example_sentences.zh: 两船相撞之后，这艘渡轮继续驶向目的地。

meaning: vt. 猜疑（是）；怀疑，不信任；怀疑…有罪n. 嫌疑犯vi. 怀疑
zh_source: suspect 怀疑sus-,在下，向上，-spect,看，词源同 spectate,respect.引申词义怀疑。
variation: 第三人称单数： suspects过去式： suspected过去分词： suspected现在分词： suspecting易混淆的单词： Suspect

example_sentences.en: I suspect this is too optimistic .
example_sentences.zh: 我怀疑这是过于乐观。

example_sentences.en: Mr radulovich 's sister was even more suspect .
example_sentences.zh: 拉杜洛维奇先生的姐姐更是可疑。

meaning: adj. 准军事的；辅助军事的n. 准军事部队的成员
zh_source: paramilitary 准军事的para-,辅助，准，military,军事的。

example_sentences.en: The central intelligence agency has expanded paramilitary operations inside afghanistan .
example_sentences.zh: 中央情报局已在阿富汗内部拓展准军事业务。

example_sentences.en: The cia may relish its conversion into a paramilitary force .
example_sentences.zh: 美国中央情报局或许对自身向一支准军事力量的转变感到沾沾自喜。

meaning: vt.& vi. 使集合，聚集adj. 聚集的，集合的；集体的；集团的
zh_source: congregate 聚集con-, 强调。-greg, 集合，词源同aggregate, egregious.
variation: 第三人称单数： congregates过去式： congregated过去分词： congregated现在分词： congregating

example_sentences.en: Sometimes sex offenders are barred from living near places where children congregate .
example_sentences.zh: 有时性侵犯者被禁止居住在儿童聚集场所的附近。

example_sentences.en: Does this mean that we suffer confusion about people 's gender as soon as they congregate in groups ?
example_sentences.zh: 这是不是意味着人集合为一个群体之后，我们就混淆了人的性别呢？

meaning: n. 谈话，对话
variation: 复数： colloquies

example_sentences.en: By the end of the colloquy , luther and zwingli wept together and asked forgiveness for bitter words .
example_sentences.zh: 在会谈的末了，路德和慈运理一起抱头痛哭，为尖刻的言语寻求赦免。

example_sentences.en: The third session of the marburg colloquy ( sunday morning , october 3 ) featured the christological debate that formed the heart of the entire controversy .
example_sentences.zh: 马尔堡会谈的第三场会议（周日，十月三日）的主题是基督论的辩论，这是整个争议的核心。

meaning: adj. 肥沃的；可繁殖的；丰富的；[物]能产生裂变物质的
zh_source: fertile 肥沃的，能生育的来自词根fer,带来，携带，词源同bring, infer. 引申词义肥沃的，多产的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Fertile

example_sentences.en: When agriculture powered economic development cities grew near fertile soils .
example_sentences.zh: 促进经济发展的因素是农业时，城市就在肥沃的土地附近成长。

example_sentences.en: Large parts of south sudan are invitingly fertile .
example_sentences.zh: 南部苏丹的广袤地区非常富饶。

meaning: adj. 有预知能力的，有先见之明的
zh_source: prescient 预知的pre-,在前，早于，预先，-sci,知道，知晓，词源同science.

example_sentences.en: Other moves proved to be remarkably prescient .
example_sentences.zh: 程守宗所采取的其他措施后来被证实颇具先见之明。

example_sentences.en: Although motorola has been a drag on google 's earnings since then , the move seems prescient now .
example_sentences.zh: 虽然摩托罗拉一直在拖累谷歌的收益，但现在来看他的这一招似乎有先见之明。

meaning: n. 名气；美名；声望；名誉vt. 把…称为，认为
zh_source: repute 名誉，名声，听说，耳闻re-,再，重新，-put,思考，计算，词源同 putative,compute.即需重新考虑的，引申词义名誉， 名声，以及贬义词义听说，耳闻。
variation: 第三人称单数： reputes过去式： reputed过去分词： reputed现在分词： reputing

example_sentences.en: Riccioli was an astronomer of some repute .
example_sentences.zh: 奥利是一个小有名气的天文学家。

example_sentences.en: But the fact is that mr tata , in public , and by widespread repute in private too , has stood against corruption .
example_sentences.zh: 事实上，无论在公开场合还是私下里广泛传播的声誉，塔塔先生都是反对腐败的。

meaning: n. 怀疑；嫌疑；疑心；〈口〉一点儿vt. 怀疑
zh_source: suspicion 怀疑sus-,在下，向上，-spic,看，词源同 suspect,despicable.引申词义怀疑。
variation: 复数： suspicions易混淆的单词： Suspicion

example_sentences.en: But why the suspicion in the first place ?
example_sentences.zh: 但是为什么一开始就怀疑了呢？

example_sentences.en: Suspicion among all three historical enemies dates back centuries .
example_sentences.zh: 这三个历史仇敌之间的猜疑存在了几个世纪。

meaning: n. 对话；（文学、戏剧、电影等中的）对话；对白；意见分歧者之间的意见交换vt. 用对话表达vi. 对话；进行非正式的意见交换
zh_source: dialogue 对话dia-, 穿过，相互。-log, 说，词源同lecture, travelogue. 即人与人之间的对话，交流。
variation: 复数： dialogues

example_sentences.en: I wish this round of economic dialogue great success .
example_sentences.zh: 我希望这轮经济对话取得圆满成功。

example_sentences.en: And the screenplay and dialogue are well-written .
example_sentences.zh: 剧本和人物对白都也十分出彩。

meaning: v. 废止种族隔离
zh_source: desegregate 废除种族隔离de-, 不，非，使相反。segregate, 种族隔离。
variation: 第三人称单数： desegregates过去式： desegregated过去分词： desegregated现在分词： desegregating

example_sentences.en: The island was a link in the trail for blacks escaping southern slavery , and was one of the first places in the country to desegregate everything , including beaches .
example_sentences.zh: 这个岛屿是黑人逃离南方农奴制途中的一个联结点，也是美国第一批废除一切种族隔离制度的地方之一，包括海滩隔离。

meaning: vt. 推断；猜想，推理；暗示；意指vi. 作出推论
zh_source: infer 推断，推论in-,进入，使，-fer,带来，词源同bring.即带进来的，引申词义推断，推论。
variation: 第三人称单数： infers过去式： inferred过去分词： inferred现在分词： inferring

example_sentences.en: But you cannot infer cause and effect from an accident of timing .
example_sentences.zh: 但你无法从时间上的巧合推断二者的因果关系。

example_sentences.en: No longer are we constrained simply to infer mental functions from observable behavior .
example_sentences.zh: 而且我们也不再简单的受限于从可观测的行为推断相关的神经功能。

meaning: n. 讨论；辩论；争论；辩论vt.& vi. 辩论；仔细考虑；思考；盘算
zh_source: debate 争辩de-, 加强。-bat, 击打，词源同beat, batter. 引申义交锋，争辩。
variation: 复数： debates第三人称单数： debates过去式： debated过去分词： debated现在分词： debating易混淆的单词： DEBATE

example_sentences.en: News of the deal has sparked vigorous debate .
example_sentences.zh: 这笔交易的消息引发了激烈讨论。

example_sentences.en: Much of the debate is semantic .
example_sentences.zh: 争论大多是语义层面的。

meaning: adj. 全部的；整个的；全体的；囫囵
zh_source: entire 整个的来自拉丁文integrum, 整体。来自in-, 不，非，-teg, 接触，词源同contagious, integrate. 即没有接触过的，完整的。
variation: 易混淆的单词： Entire

example_sentences.en: Our laboratory is the entire universe .
example_sentences.zh: 我们的实验室就是整个宇宙。

example_sentences.en: You can add these entire preselected circles or individual people .
example_sentences.zh: 你可以将这些人全部圈起来或者只圈个别人。

meaning: n. 废除种族隔离

example_sentences.en: Portfolio desegregation in emerging market investments .
example_sentences.zh: 新兴型市场中投资组合的废除。

example_sentences.en: Fly in the ointment : school segregation and desegregation in the ohio valley .
example_sentences.zh: 美中不足、俄亥俄谷内的学校种族隔离与废除种族隔离。

meaning: n. 演说艺术；朗诵法（指姿态，风度，口才等），发声法
zh_source: elocution 演说术e-, 向外。-loc, 说，词源同locution, colloquy.

example_sentences.en: Deadline for registration of the three languages elocution contest .
example_sentences.zh: 三语演讲比赛报名截止。

example_sentences.en: And that 's your elocution ?
example_sentences.zh: 这就是你的辩解吗?

meaning: adj. （与敌人或批评者）处于交战中的，受围攻的；严阵以待的v. 列阵(embattle的过去式和过去分词)；布阵；严阵以待；整军备战
zh_source: embattled 危机四伏的em-, 进入，使。battle，战斗。

example_sentences.en: Stock prices jumped : those of embattled french banks soared by almost 20 % in just two days .
example_sentences.zh: 股票价格上涨：严阵以待的法国银行在短短的两天时间里邹然飙升20%！

example_sentences.en: The site looks scruffier than it did four years ago , when this correspondent last visited it . Litter drifts around empty pitches , wasps hover near overflowing bins and dogs bark outside each embattled caravan .
example_sentences.zh: 这里比四年前记者最近一次采访时更肮脏了：空旷场地上垃圾随风飘动，满溢的垃圾箱上黄蜂轻轻盘旋，严阵以待的吉普赛篷车外狗在吠叫。

meaning: vi. 退休；撤退；后退，退却vt. 退休，退隐；使撤退；收回n. 退休；退隐；退兵信号
zh_source: retire 撤离，退休re-,向后，往回，-tir,拉，词源同 tirade,tier.即向后拉，引申词义撤退，撤离，后用于指退休。
variation: 第三人称单数： retires过去式： retired过去分词： retired现在分词： retiring

example_sentences.en: Many people worry about their finances when they retire .
example_sentences.zh: 很多人担心自己退休之后的经济状况。

example_sentences.en: Don 't you want one more shot at a ring before you retire ?
example_sentences.zh: 你难道不想在退役之前为总冠军戒指奋力一搏？

meaning: n. 子孙；后裔；结果；结局
zh_source: progeny 子孙来自pro-,向前，朝向，-gen,生育，词源同gene,generate.-y,小词后缀。引申词义子孙。

example_sentences.en: You want to maximise your progeny 's chances of survival by providing a good , stable upbringing .
example_sentences.zh: 你想尽可能让你的后代生活下去，提供优越和稳定的成长环境。

example_sentences.en: I did not sign up my progeny for infant language classes , yoga , creative dance or baby sign language .
example_sentences.zh: 我没有为了自己的后代，报名参加过婴儿语言课、瑜伽、创意舞蹈或幼儿手语。

meaning: adj. 鼻的，鼻腔的

example_sentences.en: Clinical observation of simple rhinologic headache due to rhinal structural abnormalities .
example_sentences.zh: 鼻腔结构异常所致单纯性鼻源性头痛临床观察。

example_sentences.en: Modern medicine thinks chronic rhinitis belongs to rhinal mucous membrane and mucous membrane lower chronic inflammation .
example_sentences.zh: 现代医学觉得慢性鼻炎属于鼻腔粘膜和粘膜基层的慢性炎症。

meaning: n. 背信，变节，叛教
variation: 复数： apostasies

example_sentences.en: If you abandon your religion , you commit apostasy .
example_sentences.zh: 如果你背叛了你的信仰，你就是叛教。

example_sentences.en: A senior saudi government official said on sunday that while it wasn 't yet clear what charges mr. kashgari will face , charges will likely include apostasy , or renunciation of islam .
example_sentences.zh: 沙特政府的一名高级官员周日说，尽管目前还不清楚喀什葛里将会受到何种指控，但对他的指控中很可能会包括伊斯兰教法中的叛教罪。

meaning: adj. 可疑的；猜疑的，怀疑的；多疑的，不信任的；多心
zh_source: suspicious 怀疑的，可疑的suspicion,怀疑，-ous,形容词后缀。

example_sentences.en: So there is every reason to remain suspicious .
example_sentences.zh: 所以有足够的理由保持怀疑的态度。

example_sentences.en: This in and of itself may be suspicious though .
example_sentences.zh: 不过单就这一行为就足够可疑了。

meaning: n. 激烈的长篇指责或演说
zh_source: tirade 抨击，严厉批评来自法语 tirade,齐射，猛拉，长篇演讲，来自 tirer,拉，拉长，来自 PIE*der,撕，撕开，词源 同 tear,tier,tire.引申词义抨击，严厉批评，特指长篇大论的连续批评。
variation: 复数： tirades

example_sentences.en: His tirade against mr paulson is unseemly as well as unconvincing .
example_sentences.zh: 而他对鲍尔森的长篇大论不仅不合时宜而且没有说服力。

example_sentences.en: She looks bewildered , and totally unaware of my yelling tirade .
example_sentences.zh: 她看上去不知所措，而且完全不知道我的喊叫长篇大论。

meaning: n. 纪念碑；遗迹；遗址；丰碑
zh_source: monument 纪念碑来自拉丁语monere,警告，提醒，记忆，词源同admonish,monitor,mind.-ment,名词后缀。引申词义纪念碑。

example_sentences.en: This book is a monument to human curiosity and reason .
example_sentences.zh: 这本书是一座人类好奇与理智的纪念碑。

example_sentences.en: Death valley national monument was designated a biosphere reserve in 1984 .
example_sentences.zh: 1984年，死谷国家历史遗迹被指定为生物圈保护区。

meaning: n. 鼻炎，鼻黏膜炎
zh_source: rhinitis 鼻炎rhin,鼻子，-itis,炎症。

example_sentences.en: Excuse me next irritability rhinitis have those symptoms !
example_sentences.zh: 请问下过敏性鼻炎有那些症状！

example_sentences.en: Quality of life of allergic rhinitis patients after immunotherapy .
example_sentences.zh: 过敏性鼻炎患者接受免疫疗法之生活品质。

meaning: n. 放弃原来信仰的人；叛教者；脱党者；反叛者adj. 放弃信仰的，脱党的，变节的
zh_source: apostate 变节前缀apo-, 离开。词根st, 站立，同stand. 即放弃原先立场。
variation: 复数： apostates

example_sentences.en: He likened his debating partner , who happens to sit on the kingdom 's national human-rights board , but who ( he insisted ) should sit in a separate studio , to an apostate .
example_sentences.zh: 他的辩论对手正好是阿拉伯人权委员会的一员，但他坚持她应该坐在分开的独立隔间中，他还将她比作一个叛教者。

example_sentences.en: Return , o apostate children ; I will heal you of your apostasies .
example_sentences.zh: 背道的儿女阿，回来罢；我要医治你们背道的病。

meaning: vt.& vi. 回收（废热，废料等）；使再生；革新；使悔悟adj. 再生的；革新的；改过自新的
zh_source: regenerate 再生，复兴re-,再，重新，generate,产生。
variation: 第三人称单数： regenerates过去式： regenerated过去分词： regenerated现在分词： regenerating

example_sentences.en: Planarian flatworms divide and regenerate indefinitely - even growing new brains
example_sentences.zh: 真涡扁虫可以无限期分解和再生甚至长处新的大脑

example_sentences.en: The influx of cash and credit will regenerate global activity , increasing the real value of most of these assets .
example_sentences.zh: 现金和信贷的流入将恢复全球经济活动，从而提高大多数资产的真实价值。

meaning: n. 折扣；回扣vt. 减少；打折
zh_source: rebate 折扣，返还来自古法语 rabattre,打下，赶回，来自 re-,向后，abate,减轻，减少。引申词义减免，折扣， 返还。
variation: 复数： rebates

example_sentences.en: But china doesn 't always give importers a full rebate .
example_sentences.zh: 但中国并不总是向进口企业进行完全退税。

example_sentences.en: The rebate means a partial refund for exporters .
example_sentences.zh: 出口退税指的是向出口商退还缴纳的部分税款。

meaning: adj. 雄辩的，有口才的；有说明力的；富于表情的，逼真的；动人的
